user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jen Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIT4ZjvEJ_nCaBqe7fWtYrsC6d0dsqcwlth96meb-UAaVk_EJe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rode bikes over to try the new food place in Pitt Meadows. Food is fresh, place is clean and fair prices. I had the best Customer Service experience by Nipun (cashier). He was so friendly and helpful. Knows the menu and was able to give recommendations. Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcCcRym2y4HH5Kod0plETUSf1k7ICFw8pCTAfV&fid=0x0:0xddad2273cf242f75"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Gautam Chauhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKIrHftaMcLoy7lh-w-M8IUlSOzf20roQNF6XA7tMCDEmen20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Go Grill and had an exceptional experience! The food was fantastic, and the service was top-notch. Our server, Cristina, was attentive and friendly, making sure we had everything we needed throughout the meal. She had great recommendations and made us feel right at home.

The chef, Raju, prepared some of the best dishes I’ve had in a while. The flavors were fresh, perfectly balanced, and everything was cooked to perfection. You can really tell the passion and skill that goes into the food here.

Highly recommend Go Grill for anyone looking for delicious food and excellent service. We'll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Grimkowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPgPGBYZZc5HzizweI73snfhOql0F3cSkMD29JK-r-yK03KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"first time going here with my wife and we really enjoyed it. the food is good and the prices are very affordable. I got the burrito bowl with chicken and guacamole and it is delicious. my wife got the garlic chili chicken which she thought was great. I really hope this place stays around because the fresh ingredients at the affordable price make eating healthy very easy.. parking is great when we went at dinner time. overall it was really good and we'll be coming back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saar Dvir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXGHkbuG2Ma3DU2io3X6uWQ0amHvz1IG2QLFeWhSBm-ndm9VYnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had the Mexican bowl.
The beef portion was too small. The meat was chewy. The vegetables portion was very small as well. The Guacamole was only a small tea spoon. The food had no flavor.  And just to put things in perspective: 90% of the bowl consisted of white rice. Flavorless.
Big disappointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deepu Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj47A1-Z5jXIbT5XRjMaWmxYzLzzY3xYnQpm4Ik-G_M4cwdgRDcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New addition to Pitt Meadows airport area. The food taste and quality is very good .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMl9IvQh0K3AeGOSLHmjutXmy12JjRmiVM6LFj&fid=0x0:0xddad2273cf242f75"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Samantha Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn4n6HUx6aGkgmuZK23Na9fGd6tB0UD9lumDFqZ1m7SbIT6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Our first time ordering and unfortunately, our last.

My daughters school had go grill cater a hot lunch and they had a gluten free option for her (she is celiac). She has been talking about it since so we decided to order there tonight as there aren't many local options that will accommodate her.

I spoke to the PAC person and she told me the ginger garlic sauce was gluten free and showed the email from the manager confirming this. I went on the website to order but this sauce doesn't exist in the build your own bowl so I called. During the call, I told the person who answered about our school and gluten free and she confirmed the ginger garlic sauce was the one. I said I would call back with the rest of our order.

Less then 5 minutes later I called back and I said "okay I will get one of those ginger garlic with chicken and rice" then I ordered the rest of our meals. She said ok, it would be ready in 25-30 min. I told her my name and said my husband would be picking up and gave her name. This was not a rushed conversation. She had lots of time to clarify anything.

So my husband went in time to pick it up. He forgot his phone at home. I noticed it was taking super long to come back. When he finally arrived he told me that when he went to pick it up, the lady told him that she knows I wanted gluten free but nothing I ordered was gluten free. He said that was weird but paid anyway and left. He then had to go to a different restaurant to pick up something else for my daughter, spending more money and taking more time.

When he got home and told me, I called back and was told I ordered a different dish. I said if that was the case, and you knew I was ordering gluten free since I just spoke to her and I told them it was me asking about the gluten free, why did she not confirm with me at the moment of ordering instead of waiting for when my husband went to pick up? Even if he had confirmed that was wrong, he would have had to wait for them to remake the dish. It would have made much more sense for everyone if she just confirmed when I ordered instead of not saying anything, especially since I kept saying gluten free. I am not the expert of their menu, they are.

She kept essentially blaming my husband and kept condescendingly saying "I understand" (sounded like this was their training, because it was clear she did not understand). She offered no solutions so I ended the call. She called back and I chose not to answer. In the voicemail, she said she would make it no extra charge and we can go pick it up. But this isn't really a solution since 1. We already paid for the one they made that wasn't gluten free 2. I already spent extra having to get an alternate meal for her 3. It would have taken even more of my time to wait for it to be made and then drive back. Personally, I think they should have offered a refund or a coupon for the cost of the meal at the very be least.

As for the meal we got, those of us could eat it felt it was all just okay. Good value for money. It's a big serving. Had the customer service been good we would have tried again as it is good value for money.

Bad customer service combined with just okay food means we won't be repeat customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erik Ostensen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQpXi3wqlUgDP12KMcq1OauP6eTj3rkSzpWb3LA9l6F_pUCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I work in the area and go here for lunch very often. Always fresh, perfectly cooked, and personable service. I also like you remember my order every time =)
Thanks for providing a healthy option for the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina Gomes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR0XeP1ln2r2NSQUZ5Wk5de1kur7NBvUAAq1X4kd3xnYnf6IY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Go Grill is a fantastic spot for delicious and customizable food options. Their menu offers a wide variety of fresh ingredients that you can mix and match to create your perfect meal. The concept of choosing your own ingredients and watching your meal being prepared adds a fun and interactive element to the dining experience. The flavors are bold, and the portions are generous, making it a great choice for a satisfying meal. Overall, Go Grill is a must-try for those looking for a tasty and customizable dining experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"カイテン","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2xZtgNct2pr5d6ZT0hrISWo4RAMAR1E3B4oR9MUqY8Qf6ZnWb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This is the farthest from authentic I have ever seen for Thai food. People claiming this is authentic has not eaten from street carts in Thailand...

The pad thai is made from ketchup instead of tamarind... which is literally the essence of pad thai. Gone is the flavour of tangy sour noodles to disgustingly sweet bright red ketchup noodles. Plenty of chicken in there, barely any tofu. Not even a lime wedge. HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED.

The Tom Yum Rice, which I have never seen, had a decent spicy flavour however the short grain rice they use was mostly overcooked and mush.

I'm not 100% certain if the thai iced tea was done north american style with sugar and half and half, but it didn't taste anything what I am used to from thai teas. However it wasn't half bad.

Perhaps it is more catered to western tongues, but it certainly is the farthest from real thai food I have ever seen. The portions are pretty small compared to other thai places, but there was plenty of the protein.

The interior is also incredibly dirty with dead flies on the windowsills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQtvOVxfZ1NR5bT2ZkOiaAklW-4CliweRtwYLQ&fid=0x0:0x138cc6888409a8ac"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Karen Learmonth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAYLqvwPqKN1kTBLaAVkwsaxCfbuBqQ76DtTJc9JuAX7yorH1j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little restaurant that is great for tasty healthy meals and knowledgeable about gluten free foods.
Food spectacular! Service good; they never hover, but are happy to get you what you need. Atmosphere nice, cafe style decor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODUo4jzr8n1N3v6UZEWas_aA99VIFZP2DAaj59&fid=0x0:0x138cc6888409a8ac"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Kevan Dobsin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrtZpUOl51Lg3ds8u47ssKb_t5IWw54ZHPItjLc2hK0TnBQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have dined in and got take out many times. Their food is consistently delicious and we often get take out for larger groups. The owners are courteous and very pleasant to work with. If you haven't tried Thai food, we highly recommend you give them a try and you will probably be a repeat customer like us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCD4K9QJKK6AEC5_mUtlnhQveSuAP0ka9XxJ2Ol6F1xsiRJw4u=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered online for pick up in 45 mins for a weeknight dinner. When I showed up (on time) they haven’t even started cooking. Had to wait an additional 25 mins with little kids in the car waiting to be fed. Owner not even apologetic for the delay.
Makes the whole experience not ideal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Beatrice Gandu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-m69YxvoaMOoMimuj6-sA4-k4eYqu5MNiPHLVrevqzu-K2Gac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's always a nice experience. Love the food and the mango sticky rice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw6ByM-Ed8YQ4H3JH_Wxvb-480bdzjQQuTl56J&fid=0x0:0x138cc6888409a8ac"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love it here. Tasty food, home-style cooking. Great friendly staff! Good location at Lougheed & Harris. Restaurant decor is outdated and washroom is tired, both needs to be updated.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKN8jCqMbmReAYoRRq-UcK2b69ZZGQ2vtJTxNdErd6_wwmQkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was unexpectedly great! Decor is nothing special but it was busy and the food was fantastic!! Had the Pad Thai with shrimp, the shrimp were huge! Also ordered the green curry and the chicken lettuce wraps, both so good! highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Savannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn2CD0vRivO2-5giVteHZMjb-4fmhyLsD9FrkqVRezsAZo_yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Pad Thai!

The chicken Pad Thai is very delicious. Very nice staff, family owned. The food is ready pretty quickly after you order, depending on the time you order it.

This restaurant is a must try next time you are craving Pad Thai!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzSU3aCh6b0IFlcRMKtSYi3gR9SCN7JBL2_WU&fid=0x0:0x138cc6888409a8ac"],"When":"2023-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daniel Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfH4IGtDH-RZPfkWL0P5tVuSs9PJ8oLSHVNJs_o3NyG6_oaSvUng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place blew my expectations out of the water. This was truly a culinary experience from start to finish. The food quality and flavour were unbelievable, something I wasn't expecting. I would highly recommend this place for a romantic date, business meeting or if you just want to have a fantastic meal. Chef Gordon keeps the menu small and fresh, based on what he's buying - for example he will buy half a cow, do his own cuts and pre the menu based on this.

The service was also great, it is a family run business and would highly recommend you visit. The prices seem high at first, but once you have the first bite you can see why. This ranks as a tie for the best meal ever for me, tied with another restaurant in Vancouver that costs twice as much.

I am not exaggerating by saying that this restaurant should be considered for the Michelin Guide. it is simply that good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCBvDzLMY9xCd2xMKgD_Nvd0wHtM5v8ajL9VjK&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2023-8-11"},{"Name":"kari k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVvcUii6EUlxfY9JlhQ_ZfOv49WO9fppCar9xI2DZ5eIyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place honestly blew me away. The atmosphere is so nice and quaint, the staff were lovely and the food, oh my God. Incredible. It is on the pricier side but honestly 1000% worth it. Treat yourself and come here for a beautiful experience. Even tried things both my friends had and it was all delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQUcjMey3Cgo-T05w6RD7RUWsE5E-3GeQvF2k&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Jozi Child","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFGifWG8BdvF18VaKbFjDKs7F8rZetFQSzDeQ-MEH000zpoiCNUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Meant for the true foodies who appreciate food made with true thought and precision.

Found from google reviews and so happy I did. Easily found right across from the fire house. Amazing service, absolutely delicious food made with care and attention. Not your typical menu where you can count on it being the same each place. For the real deal foodies. Lovely relaxing atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO12zpwhA1zxw-L0eD0zfXjQG5hgNge3E2_CUA5&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've dining here many times and the food is aleays amazing. Service is top notch too. When you want a tablecloth, nice cutley and a fine evening out you cannot go wrong going there. To start we had cod paddies and beef cappaico, so delious. Then for mains I had the cod and it was perfectly prepared and so tasty. My wife enjoy a pork chop, but it was so tender you didn't need a knife, just marvelous. My daughter enjoyed the roast chicken with a cheese risotto. Spectacular 😍. Dessert was a wonderful "apple" made of chocolate and I don't know what, but it was so good. 100% recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Fumu0awyzzZSqGZJ-252GXiYdlzGJdG_3nik&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Susan Rochefort","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8rVH08cPR6VwUL0HKwjObsOf9gnrVDYn2ehalr65L6-oUpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and the service was phenomenal. We had made a reservation and once seated the waiter noticed I was having an issue and offered to move us without me even asking. We were looking for fine dining food with a little more casual atmosphere and this place nailed it with the food, service and ambiance.  My husband ordered the steak (medium) and it literally melted in your mouth. The seasoning they used was outstanding as it added flavor without taking away the taste of the meat. I had the chicken which was perfectly cooked. From the great service to the amazing food, this is a hidden gem and we will return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKhO2JG-Ub35HwlsCuGd4CPsXJOY3scTW-S0Yn&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2018-5-7"},{"Name":"Tabitha B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeJCnFjpiqVd5yKgo41hAPVbZX9OKQejn0mrUyiMQ2BxxSg5CJrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I called to request a donation for a local family who had suffered a tragic loss, hoping for a small gift certificate (between $25-$50) to help raise funds. When I asked if the person I spoke with had five minutes to discuss the request, his response was "for what?" in a rather aggravated tone.

After explaining the reason for my call, I received very emotionless responses. He mentioned the struggles of the restaurant industry post-COVID and how he was barely able to pay his own mortgage. When I clarified that the gift certificate would likely drive business (as the recipient would need to spend beyond the gift's value), his response was, "I get what you're saying, but $25 isn't going to do anything. It's at least $100 per person, but I'll think about it."

Given the lack of empathy and unwillingness to engage positively, I decided not to move forward with the request and ultimately withdrew it. I’m disappointed by the response and would hesitate to support this business moving forward.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cory Wiebe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-koG_9qZqepUMUiLDirk4JwjzAM3O7NdZujZl2CgAT98K4Cp9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I only thought to take photos half way through our meal...

My wife and I went here for our anniversary. It was a wonderful experience.
I've always seen this place, but never knew it was a restaurant, and had no idea it was the level of restaurant that it is.
First off, the staff were so friendly. It felt more like friendly conversation than a business transaction, plus they were so interesting! I just wanted them to join us for food and chats.
The food was amazing. We had the French onion soup followed by the ravioli and ragu over gnocchi. For me, the basil tomato sauce was the star of the show. Soooo good.
We finished up with a sticky toffee bread pudding on vanilla ice cream.
I'm always most impressed by good soups and good desserts. Both cases were brilliant.

My only sadness was learning that Chef simply didn't have time to do cooking classes. Oh well. I'll just have to go back.

Side note: I loved the dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9WrA1mYy_iI4nPFRaw_BtAJcGuR2Jl24UOc28&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2022-5-10"},{"Name":"John Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX_G2KhQ4UDvw4Nu1dqA3AsXfC53tIj_AZn0iIn-6oDOg1Yst1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just the right serving size and very exquisite. The food looked so delicious that we forgot to take pictures before we ate.The waiters are very nice and helpful too. However, the food is very expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9kctvZ_EfqMKNvER5ZqK9A_9mo7ipN99phLMY&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2022-5-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahshad Refahatnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0MWQXxK5H2ziADPybrpxrMcK2Wslz2Div7r7YjJ_M8wxhH16N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic! I just finished my lunch and didn’t waste any time writing a comment. I ordered the “Lunch Box B” (chicken), and I’m so happy with my choice! The waiter was also very polite and friendly. Good choice😊.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcqG20aRWSiZ8GlSxrDRuLReRtl6_ukd-QJrdM&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Ana T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6qyNt5y_HddRrNE3HFvlLSKc1M3fIS2cKYSDXj52qO5dtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to Meadow Sushi last month and sadly, will not be returning again. I held back on writing this review for a while because i don’t like writing bad reviews, but in this case because there are so many 5* reviews (which I myself mistakenly trusted before coming here), I feel it my duty to share my experience.

I walked in an hour before closing. The space/atmosphere was initially nice and cozy. However within minutes of being seated, there were several employes buzzing and rushing hurriedly around creating an uncomfortable rushed feeling that they all wanted to get out of there.

The waitress greeted me promptly, was very friendly and polite throughout service. Sadly, the great service cannot compensate for the horrible food. Everything i ate tasted unfresh and bad, even the water tasted off.

I ordered the beef teriyaki dinner box. First arrived water which had a strange unpleasant taste - how water can taste bad…i don’t know. Then came a complimentary “thing” (see photo) which was a nice touch and pleasant surprise. I call it a “thing” because I was not told what it was when it was brought to the table. Its taste was ok at first until I tasted dirty burnt frying pan. If you look at the photo you can actually see the burnt gunk on its edges. I’m not one to be ungrateful and complain about free things, but this was bad. The miso soup was the worst miso soup I’ve ever had (and I’ve had a lot in my life). It was lukewarm, watery, tasteless and had only 2 tiny pieces of green onion and no tofu whatsoever. The ebi sunomo arrived next. This tasted ok but the shrimp did not taste fresh and kind of grossed me out. The beef teriyaki was the worst. It came in a foul liquid instead of a sauce and believe it or not, tasted more like Chinese food than teriyaki. The gyoza, spring roll and tempura tasted good but old/unfresh. The salad was ok/standard. The dynamite roll was thick and packed but tasted fishy. I usually have a hard time taking food photos which convey the deliciousness of the food, but alas in this case the photos depict food which in reality tastes vile and unfresh. The friendly lady asks me “how was everything?” and of course I can’t say that everything tasted horrible, so i say “good, thank you”, what else can i say? I can’t very well complain about everything. I couldn’t finish my food and took the rest to go. I normally give leftovers to my dog but this time I wouldn’t because I didn’t want to risk him getting sick.

I really am sorry to have to write a bad review for a local business. If this was a matter of slight taste preference, portion size, slow service or mistakes, I never would have written this review. However, when they serve me food that is this unfresh and old (who know how many hours or days old), they knew exactly what they were doing and such a thing cannot be rectified or explained away. Unless you have so little respect for your customers that you think they can’t tell the difference between old stale food and fresh food. I would not eat this food again if they were giving it away for free. And I’m the least picky eater ever, I’ll eat just about anything and be content. The service was friendly though…what a shame…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5r1mKxcRKBTg3bUDBvKDadIIChvLw_8dqYB8j&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Mandy Ouellett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKq9lp3Y1LfcLTPRaesiXyjPP6C2jhRCHNKPvuDgywEv1cAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time eating here and honestly it’s very good. The food is so fresh and full of flavour, everyone is so nice  and friendly! I don’t live close but work in the neighbourhood occasionally, this is my go to lunch now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaiUt1NxDo1WYR2cNRDacFaol4u10JM59CluS2&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Avery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwwOELl7oOpoi0mNOwdLpbzY0mhwgXaZoy5xy_h-LiWb_-5kc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is the best!! Great sushi and miso soup. Very good service and nice staff, fast delivery too!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlQCxXXXI8EfX2plGCaujx1vPUvRQy9a7c9FYI&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Jacquie Pope","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEbSAljgFnim-vUD1HEX7deTWXs4WABCPv4a9dNFSn82V_8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly just the best sushi out there. I haven’t had sushi this fresh in ages and I have fallen in love with the volcano roll, I get it every time I come here!! I am from Toronto and this is a must go to restaurant for me every time I visit the Vancouver area. The staff is attentive and wonderful and all the food is fresh and so delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq4Ci-uSUpAa6Jo55xdrR00ZbmIH4nk0BEYk2B&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2023-9-2"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvVixfNvoeqJ5ZqIx2wGxhhgnvbWvwCAda1KwpELNOIt2lSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pretty disappointed. I ordered a salmon and avocado roll and added cream cheese, and there was no cream cheese in it. Also, the spring were pretty soggy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnNkn3utgCCXxldytG9YoqrmTsJ0Kcf-Vf7Xwg&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Emma Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYfGOozHm7v5w244yWKspUwMUI3lnF7eG9c0o2MFpRxoMa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great service here, the employees are so kind and the food is always super tasty. Fish is also very fresh!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHXOxhz3ymqvu22jrFgeX6NvsxmVrB_MD2-eA&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Sampson Low - eXp Realty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5-nAJ3Hfrda7C10R7DZFzGI9EIQe40LQVumTj4ikshD9ogtV4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went past this cute little eatery and decided to give it a shot. Turns out to be really good. Lady server was the kindest and friendliest and she was so patient with kids. The food was good too and I just love the tiny Christmas decorations and set menus they have. Fried ice cream was a hit with all of my family. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO95lvbpvK2aUPkY3K00aVG4iKLh5Z4ADnAA_Hn&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2023-1-3"}]

[{"Name":"Eric Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9BQ9-guwzVZgMdx6E5TMWxOgM0bRFcsx3ziShqChLONeWOF-5iQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was craving a roll that combined some fish and mangos so the chef personally came by to ask me what I wanted to make and created this yummy creation below.

Hope this restaurant continues to do well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFQiLbqzkzO-n7XiGFJ09FZqeJuJGqMQS6ve55&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Youn-Gyou Kook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzb-HO1nkWlb74MtGBqbHQbgN2n6BsyaP8WL_hqvt-Kmmr3zRBeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's one of the best sushi I've had in the Tri-Cities!  The portion was generous and the fish was very fresh.  The staff are also very friendly.  I brought guests from all over Edmonton and they all gave it a thumbs up, saying it was so delicious!  In particular, the bento lunch box was well prepared and delicious, and the grilled LA ribs were also very delicious!  I went from afar, but I definitely want to go back next time I get a chance when I'm nearby!  thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAptu-6MaxO_y5fB6qI_gp3_S5mY0ytGlzXdUl&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"Daniel Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwMXnjjWRSOu6HQEOnfaMdC0M7dE8D7GnkR2-oRaj6cYthB-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit this restaurant so often, and today I brought one of my friends who doesn’t normally like sushi to come eat. He LOVED it! The sushi was so fresh and the deep-fried tempura was extremely crispy and so well made. The house made sauce leaves hits the tongue with a bunch of heavenly flavours. Of course, I wouldn’t normally leave a review, but my friend’s opinions changed so much that I felt it was necessary to show our love for this restaurant. We’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJWpUOgTgna84V87iwSa5YBin_Dj1jHWMgtuGY&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Ana T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6qyNt5y_HddRrNE3HFvlLSKc1M3fIS2cKYSDXj52qO5dtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Updated Review:
I frequent Sushi House regularly now, it’s my favourite place to eat out in Pitt Meadows. No matter what time of day or day of the week, and no matter what I order, I’m always completely satisfied. The food is consistently delicious and fresh, the service is always exceptional, and the prices are very reasonable. My favourites are the Dynamite roll and the gyozas, (especially the veggie gyoza, it’s sooooo delicious). I highly recommend Sushi House!
**********
Original Review:
I recently visited Sushi House and was very impressed by the exceptional customer service, the delicious food at an unbeatable price, and the clean and inviting atmosphere.  I highly recommend this place!

When I entered, I was immediately greeted by the warmest, sweetest lady and by a friendly chef. I sat down and was brought a menu immediately. I asked for a glass of water which arrived instantly. I ordered the dyna-cali lunch combo special (dynamite roll, California roll and miso soup). You can’t find a better price for this combo anywhere. I hope they will keep this special.

As I waited for my food (which was not very long), I admired the space. It is the perfect welcoming atmosphere; very tidy, everything is precisely in its place, the decor is minimal and warm. But the level of cleanliness makes this place stand apart. I don’t think I have ever seen a restaurant this clean, it was spotless. There was not so much as a crumb on the floor, a streak on the table or a smudge on a glass, the place was immaculately clean.

The food arrived fast (but not rushed clumsily). The presentation was beautiful and clean just like the restaurant. The food was delicious and clearly made with love and attention to detail. The miso soup was flavourful and warm, the California roll and dynamite rolls were both fantastic and perfectly rolled. I especially enjoyed the dynamite roll; it was phenomenal.  The lady was attentive and checked on me the perfect amount and exactly as much as I needed/wanted her to without being overbearing.

As I ate, I overheard some “difficult customers” (you know, the type who want to power trip on others to compensate for the lack of control they have over their own meaningless existence). Customers making numerous ridiculous requests like “no green onions is the miso soup, no vegetables in the sushi and so on, and on…). The lady (owner/employee) dealt with them and their ridiculous demands so politely, without argument, and with so much grace and kindness (which they did not deserve). Indeed, the customer service here is ABOVE OUTSTANDING.

For once eating out, my bill did not give me a heart attack. Both the lady and chef thanked me and said goodbye before I left. Overall, a wonderful experience and I will definitely return! I only wish they were open Tuesdays so I could come here and go to a Hollywood 3 movie next door on cheap movie Tuesdays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQT1nrRpwZnJ7DkhsXZ-uWj0eA-yoi6FqySLlI&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"korn vorakijkamjorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKidx-Bl_RSOibV1JgF_iKUpQdRfa440hevV_KxRqmN0ZHh0Gh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I do not normally leave reviews, but I must say, the atmosphere was so welcoming, and the owners were super nice! Food was AMAZING, definitely worth the experience 🙏🏻

Anyone near Pitt Meadows or just coming into the Tri-Cities should definitely drop by. 11/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXqVr7Gvvmi8ZrFiD_nGFeBn2i3fIH-UeMNEav&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"Jesus Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZV6A6BHISR3SmG_3nO2585tMHA5tJNpBnjLa0XvliKe2nMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is really delicious, just as the service is excellent, very fast, affordable prices and excellent taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVuCi7_x6j7pmoobICv-u2zUX2k2LB_ioLw46L&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Sanam Moazed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUUOYhkX29z9qCjgd10EkrpiAtczSR92vfn2lbtPdDrjk2eoT6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend! The service was amazing and the quality of the fish was out of this world. They are my new go to!!! The Salmon don was exquisite and their rice was to die for. The ambience of the restaurant only added to the experiences. You can’t go wrong with choosing sushi house!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHg5EzWIlICPmDRjb4bBGg29-S32z0nmcHAf2M&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Lance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpK049YxjLTfPjPvPIegILVFEA0U7wjDRNGKhK6TidH_6qprU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried this place for the first time today and loved it. The people running this spot are so nice, and I greatly enjoyed my sushi lunch box - everything tasted fresh and delicious, and I felt all the food I got was a good deal for the $18 I paid. I'll definitely be back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMvnKZX5fcLaGKF2ZwIMLLnB-6Zhj42HU_CXsl&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2023-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tara Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafp5-DbmdXd42lrIMIaPpUa4TG8IACFTFef3W9rqO44JjPcQgRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I enjoyed my chicken caprese and my friend her steak salad. What we weren't thrilled with was the service. The place was quite empty yet we were told our party of 10 was too big for the specials. They finally relented, and only one of us ordered it. The waiter was slow to check in for drinks. I easily would have had at least another, but he was missing and by the time he came back I was over wanting one. It also took way too long to get the bill and then wait for the bill to be fixed. I liked my meal and it was clean and in a nice location but I felt there was nothing special about the evening. I'm not sure I'd go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1A-gl_I8GkfC5NRTv5O5QgKiYMrN43U-HUACY&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Jim McAdie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-13-EGR_Lu7cU4Hn29WE_0T0MjDbq8biaK-w2BWXLRJzw-ft1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tables are spaced very nicely and the noise level in the dining room is very pleasant. The staff was attentive and the food was outstanding. We are new to Maple Ridge and it is our first time going to The Loft but it won't be our last. Dylan was our waiter and he gave us White Glove treatment. All in all it was a wonderful experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTlcHOnN1Y_P8i7yAuyqaF0Qvno8USrEfh9as8qA5pMJpj_n-z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for the Thanksgiving three course. Service was excellent. The live music was fine from where we were seated but quite loud at the staircase up to the restaurant.

My companion enjoyed her salad starter. My butternut squash soup was tasty but closer to a puree in texture and it would have benefitted from a little stock or cream.

The turkey dinner was very good. The turkey was moist, the mashed potatoes were smooth and the gravy added a lot of flavor. I would have preferred more veggies and less potatoes, but the proportions were pretty standard for most restaurants.

The pumpkin pie was smooth and tasty, if a little cinnamon forward. It was a bit surprising but I liked it.

This was our first visit to The Loft and we will definitely be going back to try brunch and prime rib night.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Antonio Vidal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh_xAWsf04qNgEzZEcU9YIpjJ4mya_-AYPRaWQ1_Pj-gNwn70DRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was disappointed. I understand that it was new year's eve but they should've planned better considering the price of the "experience" they were offering. The French 75 drink wasn't very well made - Prosecco mixed with gin and citrus are just not a good combination. Plus it wasn't served cold. The kushi oysters were weirdly served with carrot and turnip/radish slices. The carpaccio, while good, had too little beef and was overwhelmed by the salad. The Cesar salad was good.  The soup was good too and so was the surf and turf. The beef medallion was perfectly cooked but the scallops were too salty. They forgot to serve the palate cleanser between the starters and entrees. The creme brulee was much too thick and sweet as if made with condensed milk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn00zQfvMrVj1waX5Hlm7uAJNaNkUloexMaFcx&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful space. The food tasted good and they had good options for the wine flight. The bread was complementary which added to the dining experience.
We went on a Sunday evening and the place was really quiet. It’s good if you’d just like to relax and enjoy your food but I prefer a busier place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9T4DQuAsHB1pIcQsCTWs5OCBxIw7OEA9bCPcd&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"danielle loranger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnptNzs1wQbaw2FFsd1jy4E7t0vjMoJDS7syMM-SOyTKG9og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great view from the restaurant and beautiful at sunset. We stopped in after hitting the driving range up one night and enjoyed some cocktails which were great and I’d go back for the Caesar salad alone! We both really enjoyed our meals and can’t wait to try them out again hopefully for their prime rib night!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheida Ji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfmsaPSmIspnVYmHG0D2yN09pwU4n-gVoapn6SGWlQigfUs2rQGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m mad at myself for not coming here sooner !
It was AMAZING !
All the dishes we got were very tasty and the waitress ( grace ) was very friendly and nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ7vARWmUF7N8JkUc08bnHi7-UOAq6Jngjah-m&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2023-9-1"},{"Name":"Tanya Grubic REALTOR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnpefUHC_L67dV5Iazonxfl2ZjNS2LupqOELwQK_dGIraI59FLjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a true gem, offering a dining experience that combines top-notch cuisine with a beautiful setting. Whether you’re coming off the green or simply looking for a great meal, this establishment promises to deliver on all fronts. Highly recommended for its excellent food, superb service, and delightful atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Artista Pizzeria
address: 191b St, Pitt Meadows, BC V3Y 2B6
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sia Ghaem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEMQ83Io5sE_IiypwGW5tpjSnD5RcP1dPzKLkdTOi-SisSW8bCuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far the best pizza place I have ordered from. We looked up this place online and drove to order and pick up in person.
Nick (the owner) greeted us like we have been there many times. Patiently explained the pizzas and their most popular options.
While we were waiting for our order, he brought a bowl of water for our dog. Then one of the staff Naomi brought us 3 slices of freshly baked banana bread - it was amazing - all and all, they left of with a great experience. The pizzas were also delicious!
We will definitely come back to this place.
Truly a hidden gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRrvLFQn7wJEUb-9WIzydplCsVD5MjVl7bcEol&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely incredible service, you can tell the owner is very passionate and takes pride in his work!

We ordered the Artista pizza and it did not disappoint; in fact, it exceeded expectations by far out of all the stone pizzas we've tried. Was a gem close to home!

We will definitely be going back regularly and recommending this place to all our friends and family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRrNKkyqs9yJQ-QYHLFnuN1JgYkZF6unmuCVYJ&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Genina Sanico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIF_qw6gdGzlbkVrAxN3BqViWc3kP3ISjy9jSuxwN14MmSsBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried Artista for the first time today after being recommended by a friend. We didn’t realize that it’s much better to call and order ahead, but the wait for the pizza was definitely worth it. Ordered the Talk Honey pizza and it was delicious. Can’t wait to try others from here. The owner Nick was so pleasant and chatted everyone up and was so kind to let us try the massive Nutella cookies. Even after we ate our pizza and he saw us getting back into our car from inside the shop, he took the time to come outside and ask us how it was. Will definitely be back. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiR54Af8HhOLJ7Ll3lvpy3iEQdaI2ySA5jSd36&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Brittney Cerritos Kroiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzs74OWdsTEXPNevXDKt4yjRt1tvG8kz7_IZQS_xePF-HLCrj-gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite take out pizza from the Tricities to Maple Ridge. We especially love their white F&P (fig and procsuitto) pizza. Owners are also super friendly.

They get busy so you may want to order early. It's pick-up and cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTQ9-9Uk87Qw5Oe2RHU02Ash7ot8Tm5JLgUcyk&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Jeremy Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9h-pOVPEAO5xTo8LGpQ0sa5A7PNB_Rp1SEXGX_qf0-nayw0WaDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the phone call to the pizza this place is a gem in the rough. Order anything and you'll be happy. Best pizza in Vancouver? It's in the running. Best part is the dude that runs the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-n69G1nbWwtcMnm1tmOoOSYRgYQwgbiawzYFG&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"AF Marketing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPdZHxbhbOeibJn9XiyQqrcfmXro1ul-Qsns_fIQGg9H8CXQQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A geniune experience, the owner is a absolute character. The pizza is the reason I wrote the review though, and the nutella cookie was an amazing addition! Will be going back as much as I can while I am visiting, can’t beat it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMANoLwmS5dDRmlye_NTpz8Vve8RScgxsCKRhP3&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Ron V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTegioHVvjjbpZSBVKahhv5o4DFw_D_ru9b3GGxnNM5kjBaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous find!  This pizza rocks. Honestly, one of the best pizzas I’ve ever had the pleasure of enjoying. Reminds me of a place in NYC I visited many years ago.  Top notch.  Wood fired oven, great dough, cheese and sauce. The owner Nick seems very sincere in his mission to provide fantastic personalized customer service.   Naomi, the girl making the pizza, looked genuinely happy to be there.  Note – bring cash -no cards accepted.  I will definitely hit this place again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Middleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKa6CDh1NqY_ttVOKKFD3vdMwnTdhYr4eAdK2OX4TwgkcLtWI8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Do not miss this hidden gem! Authentic hand made pizza in a wood fired oven. Absolutely incredible! Not like all the other cookie cutter pizza joints out there. And Nick, the owner is amazing - such great service! From the time he answers the phone, you can tell this guy cares about people! He's authetic, down to earth, and offers service second to none. An easy 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria Fernanda Guaraná","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU949zWMPKzgd78YIgipV_4PUI5bJb069xY2JNqEIjY4HsjgWnfzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently moved to Pitt Meadows and came across this restaurant online when looking for sushi restaurants nearby. Was very surprised by the food and prices. Me and my boyfriend had dinner there last Friday and the food was DELICIOUS, service was very fast and the atmosphere of a historic house gave us the idea of traditional homemade food which we loved! Their prices are very reasonable! I definitely recommend this place for anyone who love sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgc1jLdml4fIms8UicIA5u2MTjALS3l6HgCSJw&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Muh Ruri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkStAcVhSLoWZluIOVQ74c2fLDnRh9SyZ_LHSDWUY1b4U3yJnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Akasaka in Pitt Meadows offers a delightful Japanese dining experience where presentation and ambiance truly stand out. The restaurant is located in a small, cozy house with a fireplace, providing a very friendly and homely atmosphere. With only 4 to 5 tables, it feels intimate and personal, almost as if you're dining in someone's home. It's assumed that the top floor is residential, which adds to the unique charm of the place.

The presentation of the dishes at Akasaka is nothing short of impressive. Each plate is a work of art, meticulously arranged to please both the eyes and the palate. The vibrant colors and thoughtful garnishes enhance the overall dining experience, making each dish as visually appealing as it is delicious.

The quality of the food at Akasaka matches the high standards set by the restaurant’s ambiance and presentation. The flavors are authentic and fresh, providing a true taste of Japan. However, it’s worth noting that the pricing here is relatively high compared to its contemporaries. Despite this, they do offer a decent lunch special, which provides good value and allows diners to enjoy their exquisite cuisine at a more affordable price.

For those in Pitt Meadows looking for a restaurant that offers great food in a beautiful and cozy setting, Akasaka is the perfect choice. The combination of excellent presentation, a wonderful vibe, and the option of a well-priced lunch special makes it a standout destination for Japanese cuisine","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAOJQqUztjjNjL7b9XVFYCbwwu28UD6YyzeTT6&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really good atmosphere restaurant.  If you dine in this restaurant, you do feel you are dine at home. The decor of this house is an old farm house.
This house is nice in and out. The service are warmly and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8EWLrhqQs2ewZT_xX3e7Y2UrVc4Nzz2mzA9fq&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Nova Ember","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInptqH07SvjBDYreZDili7yUF4N5-8pTdYburZcf75y3-E4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time dined in this restaurant. We were the only customers there but the service was slow. We didn’t get water until we placed the order( it seems like they were waiting us to order before serving us anything)
The portion was surprisingly small for a Chicken Breast Teriyaki $24.95, and we didn't get the ice cream. Nothing stands out for us to return to this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWgrt0P3b7Tui0SaNgydWB4ZgoR_DKRpHcw_pO&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Radical Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzxgdzIIKP9vqAYzRsir8K2Nid_X0M2c-rfedCHEHaELHzk40=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi and always fresh!! I really like this place. I’ve never actually eaten inside but my wife and I get take out quite often. Their food is really consistent so you always know what you’re going to get. It’s a little bit on the pricey side but I’d rather pay a bit extra and get good quality. It’s about a 10min drive for me and I go past about 6 other sushi places on the way so that tells you it’s worth it. In the photos is a dinner box D, wild sockeye sashimi and salmon avocado roll with cucumber which came to a grand total of $57 after tax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC0nbZ-QR7sRuGMnKxalBiSC_PxBKIPvCQ98Lt&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2023-1-14"},{"Name":"G W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG1FFo9GTnRGQNpjln74dhjBn3V4nGRQE_Yjur_OV6HYJsv04F_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice simple decor, matching Heritage Home.  The food was nicely presented. Pieces are a bit thin. Tempura was Perfect! The sauce was really nice too. I would recommend you take some time to do a good deep House Cleaning.  Your windows are filthy, some half Christmas star pieces stuck still on the glass. Check your pictures and dust control. Or I would have given you a 5. I recommend people try it. Perfect for a quiet date.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J ason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLK8lS8cjzF3ZgjIcZyXI7ooB5w1ArRePHhAcera0e4BMQGng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cool old house, great food and service highly reccomend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNudU9k3Gfsg5qJdVn7xZqAIrgUo36V69zHgMgc&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Kat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9KU6JHMNV2dJVHVeBb2rvEzltNXWG-yaPrGGgPwOBW0ejMgGu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely the go-to for my entire family for sushi in Pitt. High quality at a reasonable price. The takeout is great but eating in is an experience of it's own. It's at probably one of the oldest houses in Pitt; the Masson house. Service is great and the surroundings are interesting to look at. I can say that I've never been disappointed eating here so yeah, I'm repping the homies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNc0olQehEexSbrSywuqPbQ0_1P19oYK7USkUg&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2018-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Coouge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOhVIUgazlpqQpH9aCaVTzRLyPtVq31vFZS_qDtOymUv_OgjKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been ordering Chinese food from KJ Enjoy Garden here in Pitt Meadows for about 3 years now. They’re the only one that has good Chinese food in the area. We’ve tried other Chinese restaurants too, but they’re in Maple Ridge. I’d say KJ Enjoy Garden is better in terms of quality and service. They were always nice on the phone whenever we order. Our order from last night was delicious and everyone in the household was happy. Our favourite is their deep fried squid with spicy chilli salt. Really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ95orjm5NAucTenw6uS1EMVzXyJTdYYTDvdqS&fid=0x0:0x675ca0effe70a166"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"AlbertBev Armstrong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK7Ccq8znLK-UzrFRjQPhvmuJGywYwFd3yj651KBIs4N2BYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered for the first time with KJ tonight and our prawns were full of black poop.  When I called to complain she said that they all come like that…blah…and then she hung up on me!   Most disgusting food and service ever.  Basically threw $80 away.  Never again!!
Trying to add picture but doesn’t seem to let me.  Received one star only because I had to to be able to post this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG4YlD21ZIno-KcqS1jGQkYNtWsIu0KBVQHhGG&fid=0x0:0x675ca0effe70a166"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Charmaine B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJhbWFA8MlzvU01gNTZbNyZFJbl3fQcxjoSmBuTcZ4GVR_GSH3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was really good, not greasy/soggy. Not sure what people are complaining about portions were more than enough for 5 of us. Also the weird comment about the shrimp veins (digestive tract).. it's safe to eat & if it's a problem you should de-vein it yourself lmao.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Myrna Todd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI87HRXpEEEeLO4OiwZN-9lB4JTwBGpQrIRWljw8Jv257vBLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have eaten in once prior to this last experience and it was good. I picked up a takeout combo C yesterday and found it very greasy which permeated all the food. It tasted like old food reheated - not good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Warren Berry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZ2p-lbvEBM7pqif56krgpG26_49i2p7PSRedx5noOvhwWew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5/5
Got take out
Clean kitchen
Takeout was hot(i was there 4 minutes early)
-food cooked well(brocolli was perfectly crunchy)

I think for some people they are turned off by the dining room. This is a place for cheap chinese takeout and 99.9% of the food they sell is take-out. Who cares if the dining room is dated.

You can see into the kitchen and it was clean enough looking to me.

Staff were friendly but clearly busy on a Saturday night at 5:45 processing orders(a good sign if you ask me)

Will go here again.

Photo is from home. Food looked good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1Z3j6_fG0H-nC-zbHGukLNImj4QZCEVPirPoy&fid=0x0:0x675ca0effe70a166"],"When":"2022-10-23"},{"Name":"Tam P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLlCdxogvH9ZK1So8JtErwaykHmuvDTDAStfBHXjXRtIr6LFk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have been ordering here for years. Not sure if there are new owners, I ordered a combo c & there was only a few tiny pieces of pork, the rest was rice & chow mien, the pork was so dry, the chow mien has no flavour, its really too bad, our family is not ordering from here anymore!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roger Gaudette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvdd1fsxm0CHqCYD5rH2SBxTju50CU8hcCQKWj0ecaaf1jJ-jC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"KJ Enjoy Garden has undoubtedly captured the hearts and taste buds of our community as the go-to take-out Chinese restaurant. With each order, they redefine the concept of quick and delicious dining. The convenience of their service is only matched by the outstanding quality of their food.

Every bite from KJ Enjoy Garden is a symphony of flavors that transports you to the heart of authentic Chinese cuisine. The menu boasts an impressive array of dishes, from classics to innovative creations, all crafted with an evident passion for culinary excellence. The attention to detail and use of fresh ingredients result in a harmonious blend of tastes that leaves a lasting impression.

What truly distinguishes KJ Enjoy Garden is their commitment to providing an exceptional customer experience. The staff is not only efficient in processing orders but also attentive to special requests, ensuring that each order is tailored to perfection. The packaging is not just practical, but also reflects their dedication to presentation.

In a world where take-out often sacrifices quality for convenience, KJ Enjoy Garden strikes the perfect balance, delivering a sensational dining adventure to your doorstep. With their delectable offerings and impeccable service, they have undoubtedly earned their place as the quintessential local take-out Chinese restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCVmIsjX9jvcj8_1CqhwFzzuLmHczA9zM38Pgg&fid=0x0:0x675ca0effe70a166"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Nancy Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgCK1CLv7FGjk9Njyg015ij5oTRNAbBKtfz9nl1JUHeRNkT2-Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Disappointed with ordering for years even on skip to pay a higher cost and not receive chop sticks and no sweet n sour sauce for chicken balls.  Won’t be ordering again has it has happened more than once.  The size portion also has become too small for 3 or 4 items for individual meal.  Same container you pay for more but you are not receiving it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Angela Longo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY1oq49pKa6hIgCWasLoQyfZXLAxCQ6hu--JV9EUi6xd7-tSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't get enough of this place. I have been here several times already, and every time we leave quite full and satisfied. The last time was on December 1st for our wedding anniversary. We ordered the veggie dinner combo, a side of dynamite rolls, and miso soup. The service is also top-notch. Our server, knowing that we were celebrating our anniversary, gave us a side of their dessert, fried ice cream. That was a nice and appreciated surprise. We will continue to support this establishment because they truly deserve it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkjT_NXLAgVOVK91erIwqsAiEH-WN44tbWSV9-\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sango Sushi is a great sushi restaurant option in Pitt Meadows. I had the lunch nigiri box and the portions are huge! The sushi was fresh and the side dishes were great. I'm not a fan of spring rolls in Japanese restaurants, so I would skip this in the future. For a Korean-run Japanese restaurant, I would definitely return if I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyL7Q8PFuW644bR6VClu_7G3IAZsX1T7Q-Mod5\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"SUNGHA HONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpys9pM2moaIRveDIiFAx3VbojxYKrAH5ZiigfCKg9RTXmDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing and cozy sushi restaurant in Tri-city!! Easy to access from Coquitlam, Maple Ridge and even Langley as well!! Sushi expert and avengers are here. Owner is using very fresh fishes and vegetables, then kitchen foods are also very awesome 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJD3F954ByLuPetZRAGrFg5WkKfB5V-Ar8Dxjn\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"VERONICA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIGASoyd_KbC_lsYvL_nRHwH7gDa1y7co5Vefue-pGUphByA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found a new great restaurant! The sashimi was so fresh and the atmosphere was as pretty as a cafe. There was also a room, so I could eat quietly with my family. The taste and atmosphere service were good, too. I will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5Ztm1d4cglF8Eb560yzRI1DDqqQ1bS_Dj3K2p\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Elie Amaral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0qgeTcCD4lRK01GmIPB40Q73bEESOdpgxaOOn1kpjuOoUi2yY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Big lunch… sushi pretty good, home good, sunomono good except for the skinny flat shrimp (better to do a few tiny shrimps, tempura food the yam a bit too greasy and miso soup needed more miso! Overall a7-8 out of 10. A really good deal for $16.50!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoEaZ9QY8KQrxVhstf-O3SPj1KJcVHB6RmewJh\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Lloyd Smyth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO73zP8fsm01W-SAdN2zsTkTfpqxLYY4H2ASnShCMTC_XL9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been waiting years to be back in Canada to have sushi again and Sango Sushi did not disappoint! Huge menu range for special sushi rolls - the Baked Salmon Roll is an absolute must! Service was attentive, friendly and very fast for our lunch for 9 people. Will be back !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnUOlt8bwsy7v9DFJe5Z8zm2NbVg9e6Je18lK1\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2023-6-22"},{"Name":"Suman Bhandari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrnk9wt3gtXf77pcTHOn49F7Cf4BXrdzL7G_AYfSWCGcgKJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a takeout. We liked all except Teriyaki chicken, a lot of cabbage, opted for extra chicken but the portion of chicken too small for extra $4. Rest was awesome. Really enjoyed rest.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK2NqCWXxTYpjA1nwCHwJ543QJfkwq6rwVihMY\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Nicole Eslinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ZKBs_btQnSWmtdNrE5qyv_ocoi5RfLPyOG3-rjtwIsnyVib-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sango always delivers amazing quality food, I eat here multiple times a week, either in person or via delivery and I’ve never had a bad experience. But the main reason I always go back is because of the service. Every employee is kind and friendly, the service is quick, and I often am given freebies. Definitely my top choice for not only sushi, but any restaurant in Maple Ridge or Pitt Meadows! :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

I must say the pizza was absolutely delicious. Flavourful sauce and enough of it, generous amount of toppings and perfect crust. I must say i really enjoyed this pizza. Good price and service also! This will be my new go to for pizza take out. Can't wait to have it again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sebastian Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcnZFucde6xPMfQPlJVld3_oxVduXCLMqnsvKowqMxXGXz_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When ever my partner and I order pizza we always order from this location. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Parul Khara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUj_y2m7zmUYIhHfoT1nhjzRn5DqWYe1kzWq56gUTKEq0MfVto=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Tiffin services, good Indian food, always fresh roti and amazing Sabzi all the time.

Have tried 8 total tiffin services including Yogis as well, and I can assure they are 5 times better than yogis. Raj & Raman are very responsive. Keep you in loop, available to answer and very adjustable.
Best in tri-city area to be honest.
Please give them a try and you will not be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdzQ5wqbcGjwOT6YPezR1L-tetwAsa4z0Batml&fid=0x0:0x99f680907246a548"],"When":"2024-1-23"},{"Name":"Neha Sehrawat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL98hQykNXBchQOZgvIDYLIaLrPZIQMvRRAhqw-AsGlk61Fhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tiffin delivery always on time, nice and hygienic packaging in containers, not spicy, could be a little less oily for subjis, menu rotates every week, decently priced, soft and good size of rotis, Nice to deal with Raj, very responsive.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aman Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINTSmDBk3QrTZ9cp7n9dHWSgQKuZZJ0D_0hqOHexHOynd0Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great tiffin service, very adjustable and understanding. Food quality is awesome. Best tiffin service I ever had. Plus, I love the packaging as it is very convenient to carry it to work, and we can heat up food in the same containers. Thank you for the amazing service.  👏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harsh Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4iaRmcWTG6YbSv_8Dpzj7ueeSN22UIImFq2vGm4Nxv7Xviwzf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is overall good, hygienic and well packaged. Could be a little bit less oily for subzi. Delivery is good and on time.  Price is perfect. Recommend to anyone looking for tasty and filling desi food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sudarshan V Naidu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8-ePBAj5t-97jBeuav1Gii6VQb5oi4gDdwu4Y3vttsxIc0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and quality for the price offered. Very prompt delivery of meals everyday and neatly packaged. Would easily recommend to anyone looking for meal delivery services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Divy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIy9uaGA449JJxyzwr3mwN1I1J-ZIULgutuR36GTR-l9N3SKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great quality Tiffin service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manoj Rangra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_E_RUkFMufd_pKrhPPRZthDK-uCEO7ejVnzpCOTjj0Bydvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Baljit Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXheAafVtFKrZ9Cis2JIHayzEugsZJKHfPzsfIQ9HvUdWqwmgAP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very consistent food flavours profile. Authentic Vietnamese! Love the food here. Good service and friendly attentive staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3GtBO4SsCRtpEGuTGlrx_GVd-ZGOVbl5RNOk&fid=0x0:0xe87ff2137a106d9c"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Allison Lund","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd-6_ztsJMsK50g-5FXJRWZuRGXDb7YstngfSx2aIA444L79k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just ordered a Pho Soup and two Spring Rolls to go, and although inflation prices have affected us all, the flavours were wonderful and to be expected. It was my first time patronizing this local restaurant in Pitt Meadows, and I would go back to eat there again.
I hope to return to taste their coffee also! Happy to support local small businesses!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Lingal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcUbeWQj8wh4uoqEHBHLO5vnJlrMH8w5oKSkMTmnYjOe7jrsE3Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One star was for the food as it was decent although not fairly priced. If you can avoid this place, by all means please do. You can find other Pho restaurants in the area that are cheaper and just as good. If i can only give absolutely no stars for the service, i would. The server (and i would also assume the owner) did absolutely nothing but take our order, put the food on the table and take our money. He was extremely unwelcoming and downright rude. He asked us to sit at a table only to be told to sit at a different one. He would abruptly take your dishes without even asking. My mom was still working on her plate when he took it away. If he was indeed the owner, he'd probably do better. What a disappointment and a shame.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time visit to DT pho in pitt meadows on Ford road.
Was pleasantly surprised.
Cute little restaurant; very clean, well maintained; and nicely decorated.
Food was HOT, FAST and DELICIOUS.
A bit pricey but hubby and I found the bowls were well stocked with pricier ingredients - so worth a little extra.
We will go back.
Back novembre 29th
Awesome pho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPonm-uaXaGiCcR21Ye3lRqtZE1N5Py9oSh8YlD&fid=0x0:0xe87ff2137a106d9c"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Quinn Matthews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeuog888W1aRKdGrpNpVvSE_7hbaylgvy6o6aglX9ZNWT7Bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here after camping for some warm soup. I left very happy! Everything was good, from the tea to the banhmi. The broth was nice and perfectly salted with a clove flavour which set it apart from other places I’ve been to. Very very good. Don’t expect to be babied by the staff here - they are friendly and willing to chat, but have a job to do!

Everything in the photo came out to $50 before tip. Enough for two hungry dudes.

Will be back if I’m in the area again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPodLe60YDACO5LAnSyqo-XtoaVbH2kQHzN0cqi&fid=0x0:0xe87ff2137a106d9c"],"When":"2023-1-3"},{"Name":"Alice Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSabLEqcemt-2KAauM2vbbDg67dC-dDk8Gyg-Xtd1xlnwMUara=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst Viet restaurant experience. Food was salty. The restaurant looked messy as soon as we walked in. The man (looked like the owner) just yelled across the room, telling us to sit wherever we want. We haven't even sat down before he started to ask us tea or water. We didn't even have time to react before he said again impatiently. We ordered the seafood noodle and a beef noodle, and a salade roll. We had questions about the salade roll but was rudely cut off by him asking, "That's why I'm asking you how many you want!" Seriously? And the seafood had only three shrimps and two crab meat sticks. The salade roll was tasteless and stuffed with 90% of rice noodles. The chili oil had hair in it, but at this point, we didn't want to bother complaining it. We just want to leave asap. Horrible. Never coming back and won't even recommend it to other people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDJ1W9dIABZByWHh49QwpoZUE4I7w2hCiv3veH&fid=0x0:0xe87ff2137a106d9c"],"When":"2023-2-14"},{"Name":"Stacey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQQm6FNhNdTusV-KC-f3v5KZhW1DbNJWkTvpJPGBZYaaPKvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The quality doesn’t match the inflation of the prices. The increase in pricing for 1 salad roll is ridiculous and the quality is less than or sloppy. The lid to the sauce wasn’t put on properly and caused a sloppy mess. Not impressed with this place anymore. Sad it’s the only Pho place in Pitt Meadows.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA94J64oX0G3McktXAOWdQ46p6R9L3Oi4c4JQJ&fid=0x0:0xe87ff2137a106d9c"],"When":"2023-10-24"},{"Name":"Chad Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKK79Mao6HhjtlHc8AwQ2Ntd1kwXxg3JTJ2UZiHFSsEbNyv4KUtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had the seafood soup. Very tasty. Good service. Looks pretty clean overall. Will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLTB6daakTULkWbDZZU6M6q9ECG_Jrop730FHD&fid=0x0:0xe87ff2137a106d9c"],"When":"2024-6-9"}]
