[{"Name":"Beedo Mady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKM09R4p8RiwJ3pHhiaLqC785Bo-SGMPnZtpC9epNw_p-NuXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food to be honest isn’t good and unusual like other branches. The chicken was very smelled and not well cooked unfortunately.
Well I can’t touch to comment with the staff but just they’re good but needed to be more friendly and welcoming. Mission branch is awesome in all levels. I believe this will get back on perfect way soon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOL1wlVUcAtsO-EeyLpYTgfz4RfWketwcYQdcnK&fid=0x0:0x1da5380ddc11aeb0"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Alex T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVydfcSioG60hkw5Mvpj_CTyhdPy6kDkaUAWcqvubAe4kVsHLuz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had 5 piece chicken strips. Breading was coming off in the box so it seemed that they may have been breaded poorly or kept in fryer a little too long. A little pricey for 5 chicken strips, fries and a can of pop. $18.99 but this seems to be the new standard for fast food.
Would not purchase again for that price as I didn't see the quality they are talking about as the breading was falling off the strips. Also some of the wedge fries were a bit hard on the inside as well (perhaps cut too thick - uncooked)

Service was good for fast food. Attentive, listens well, friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagdeep Sran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeizqAxlrXC-QgbwRT4OoySO5R63we68ObZww5ruobZOihzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I will rate this place 10/10. The food was hot and delicious. Friendly staff. Specially Harman, she was really sweet and kind. I have tried other locations too but I recommend this location because of its cleanliness and quality service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Linda Lee Georgina Takimoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInxzk1c67MnPc2fzEXLWVdw9wYZNC889OgoiU6VqumRwTKg5Yx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not greeted when arriving or placing an order. Had a fresh order, as 20 min till ready, so was nice and hot. No on in there when we arrived and still seats were not cleaned were we were sitting to wait. So, a 3 due to unfriendly  staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gagandeep Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDhnZWnA2u_nCctGkDRgI1ryJTZrHLcc-3DVFiQ37CtHrOZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is best plus the employees are kind and helpful. Their is a girl named harman working their who remembers my order every time I go their and always have a very good attitude, while working . Definitely one of my favorite food spots.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sze Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_kypcgkmuPcr0ZtnuPMvxEm9J4HLkbZJzWHBm-l1rfheFaa4t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Chicken was average, the thigh was kinda dry.  The table and the floor wasn't cleaned/swept from previous day.  I saw food on the ground when I dined in earlier today.  They don't have a soda machine, so they serve the pop by cans and charge 11 cents for the deposit and recycling fee on top of it, then plus tax.  If you guys don't want to invest a pop machine and this is your way of serving drink, then you should not charge the customer for the deposit fee.  Very sneaky!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLZwmrjb0aJgEotVBqJTckMdkhkWnjvBEEtP-N&fid=0x0:0x1da5380ddc11aeb0"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"Bayan Nk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDBo9FWRRaGypC-4FlWatlZbYRlFE1DkbWm-P6sGHO2caleFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We tried MB Chicken for the first time, and it was a terrible experience. We're used to spicy food, so we ordered the spicy chicken as usual. However, it was so unbearably spicy that my husband started coughing so badly he almost choked. I went to ask if they could change it to the regular chicken, but the staff simply said, "Sorry, we can't." It was really disappointing, and we will never return to this restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathy De Vaal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUTNG8yOfdw6Eqbg5MxwbUsDoIv8DUuF0kT4XlIiV10mPP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After not so good experiences at other locations I tried this location and was impressed.  The food was hot, fresh and good.  The place was clean and I even saw tables being wiped during our stay (something that has been lacking at other fast food restaurants lately)!

Only 4 stars as the drink options for kids menu were limited (juices only no water) and there’s no coffee","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sadaf Jabarkhel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILNZ3QN9BcRB3pyEowY5qmwZa7b3FiNGZUDVbJO6eohpbfUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I always go there to get food and everyone is nice but there’s a rude and unprofessional lady too,  who knows nothing about communication or customer service at all. She is either a middle eastern or asian. I forgot to ask her for no cheese and asked her to remove it, while I was on a call. She yelled at me and said ; why didn’t I tell her before.

She ruined my meal and I ended up throwing more than half of my food to the garbage. So, I called to get her managers name and number, she called herself the manager/owner and started cursing me again and laughing at me. Being in the food industry/customer service I have always been told, customer is right but apparently she thinks; if she is serving the food, she has the right to be disrespectful/rude towards the customers. Come on lady ! You are not serving food for free.

I really want the manager or owner to know about her bad skills, and rude behaviour. She is probably new to the country with absolutely no knowledge of customer service, definitely shouldn’t be behind the counter !!

Not returning again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAQNqr9BrGpT2v43ywxKEBEpr7hYUBn7OZ7UHt&fid=0x0:0xcfa8ed77d3d81b9d"],"When":"2023-11-2"},{"Name":"Kevin Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxfppIpB778bAcJWLiOFkQnwZK-D-CXSEUvtOUycR4wnrqWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order beef souvlaki and Caesar salad combo, and they served without pita. They  asked for 4 dollars for pita if I wanted to add it back. Who hired the rapper to be a cashier?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wanda Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9LKkKsuBek7hEQLkvif_0pJMStja89rFTVcqcsm7vKb6P3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I just had a order delivered by Ubereats.  I had calamari and Greek salad.  The Greek salad was awful.  Two tiny pieces of cucumber, 1 small slice of red onion, 1 small sliver of green pepper and no feta cheese but lots of tomatoes  and 2 olives The calamari was cold and had to be reheated.  I don't know what the sauce was but it wasn't  what usually comes with calamari.  It had a very bitter, sour taste
Very disappointed in the meal.  This is the second time I have ordered this meal and it's been awful.  I will not be ordering anything from your restaurant.   Obviously whoever cooked the calamari and put the salad together didn't really care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoJALK2j4nQN5nKrKUbF1xTuy_BYSN1BXtoSezLHPSN-1RUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I dont understand why the Greek salad is basically all romaine lettuce. Not good.  I purchased several platters and spent good money but really wasn't expecting this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzE0eCbgp8gR6byv3nNg7TQN3xVxftAyUD_j-8&fid=0x0:0xcfa8ed77d3d81b9d"],"When":"2023-10-26"},{"Name":"J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuoMsaN6Or9bB1cOBnvmNsKllR39hlLWhzeeBnVWTvXLwOq5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I go there every time i'm at that plaza. my mom loves calamari and she doesn't like it over cooked, she's asked multiple different restaurants to not over cook them, this is the only place she gets to enjoy Calamari.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhNneK53gAf-nL_LUNJ9661bkgW98r0StatKztYRu3tT786Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are super friendly.
My family and I come here often great food never disappointed.
The place is always clean and stocked as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brent Hampton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUemCINLTquGUwjX4yAuUjSdMREK_aSb6lxju5GYp2_5aDN-hU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Always consistently good food. Price is a little steep though when you go to feed two people and have to mortgage your house.

UPDATE: Opa, what happened???

My wife and I visited your Meadowtown location tonight, excited for date night and having our favourite Greek food. When our food was ready, we were so disappointed. Slim toppings, no tzatziki on the wraps, very little feta… but the same high price. $30 for three wraps and fries. Sorry, but if this is the new Opa, we won’t be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHx655DAeR5IbC8mSd98gzD0HG0LFsRKt49OSA&fid=0x0:0xcfa8ed77d3d81b9d"],"When":"2022-2-26"},{"Name":"Venus Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUga1tlnNWpQarzUfwUA73NevowzuEV7nhR91bSOMQ419geC12m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location is particularly not good. The service is bad and the workers are not even paying attention to your requests. The food was not good at this location and dry. Please hire new staff thank you.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The sushi is hands down some of the best I've ever had. I was really surprised with the Palm Springs roll. The fruit additions to it were fresh and delicious!
The initial walk in was friendly and the prices were great. Only negative I have is my empty glass of water sat at the edge of the table the entire meal and no one came to check.

Besides that, absolutely coming back for take out. Fantastic sushi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd13ee-_lNif4B6HscdfH6OARv74e_3spbD5G7&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Chloe D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQcQz8Kl8hKO23hZqVCOss3Om6Wt10FQPjv4VNUIFeAKqYp8i8Ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The tuna was still frozen in the middle. One of the pieces had a piece of plastic on it. I’ve also never seen sashimi cut so thick. Their portions are large, but I wouldn’t recommend this restaurant if you’re looking for quality sushi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsySJQYlMb1p21OGcjunsPJjh2UoL_NmF20Zpw&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2023-5-2"},{"Name":"Joe blow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTmAYUihSjY3aQxhMRCf3kvXeQny8FVYLOtxkJ4rrloGmArw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We’ve had both dine in and take out. Food is always really good. Staff are really really friendly and polite. When dining in they have the AC turned up so high you freeze. Are they trying to get people to leave quicker? Kind of kills the experience. Take out was typically very good, but lately when opening up our orders at home the contents of the box look like they’ve been kicked across the kitchen. Rolls falling apart and all over the box. Need to start taking more care with the orders. Its not how people want to see their food when opening the boxes. And this has happened several times..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM817o5Azmoiq9FTboZKIthN9aIX119KnLzOla&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"J Kilroe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCCkMIsqr6iMJr68mDRYoNX0qzCw95JzN3Mrcx-eKfVje5_5s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a work lunch here today and we arrived as soon as they opened.

They were super friendly, food was quick, and it was also delicious! We had 6 in our party and we ordered a ton of food! They had no trouble dealing with the order volume and the food was all fresh and top quality.
We will see you again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soo Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJU8KYvTGbyxQiIHNiW7cHF-utfJfwdb_uH14Fu7SkzU6ovOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Contrary to my expectations, I had a bad experience as their service and food quality were poor. The fish was not fresh, and it also smelled really bad. The dishes seemed not cleaned properly as lipstick stains remained on the cup and dried rice was on the soy sauce plate. I had to pay the bill for the disgusting food I did not even eat and left. Truly a nauseating experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Hendley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyoBLsRcF2O0U93f7arqHkg_MXEXD8l4p3n-VIAex5mWH3Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first time ordering from Kabuki and I can say this will be our new go to place for sushi in Pitt Meadows! The service was great and the food was fresh and delicious. We ordered the salmon oshi, California roll, chicken roll and gomae roll. Can’t wait to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPsdGvohH7Plm3xpmWh1hl1Fci_eg4qAe6VuzQ&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2023-6-7"},{"Name":"Jason Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkvHVZqne9KN9-ofplOlt6HLyyrR3C1usZfRX3AV_AG5Fb_VSV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We Played 1 team 4 golfer at Golden Egle Golf North course.
Beautiful outumn leaves & Mountains snow view of blue sky is fantastic!!
We ordered Special menu...
# 4 person x Golf A (ref..Pictures)
Very delicious 😋 & good value pric
Staff were very kind serving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjpdQ5AB7IOH461znEIi_EpwMQcavZTCsddi80&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2022-11-13"},{"Name":"Michael E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLihbFa0W9-WIgTsNnCtV6xiWC6NIuIC6HQzX7GDEoZRsJmcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered sushi for dinner, wife's teriyaki roll were dry and tasted old.  My salmon roll and tuna nigiri had an off taste, ended up tossing it to be safe, beef teriyaki roll was good.  Overall disappointed..we have friends in the area that swear by this place and rank it high on their list but unfortunately for us it was a big miss.  Hopefully it's a one off situation but I don't think we will be trying it again any time soon.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Brunch menu i’ve seen in a minute.

Ordered The Lumberjack and it was a little heavy and rich but if you’re really hungry you’ll be happy you went for it.

Good prices too and the staff were awesome.

Surprised I never wandered into the Maple Ridge location before but i’m glad I changed that!

Cheers :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjHdJYS5Nkx9fp0gQhvGc_wLwJvIRsS9jxVtSb&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Nathan Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlKwIGO9PHjqLgc7mRGN7qYIzJ_Yb1JOij4343pL12ye4fG4D-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They get a 3 star.

I always like the food, service is usually exceptional...

But when we we seated in the patio, the table felt... Dirty.

Like built up grease that just doesn't wash off ...

Then, upon actually pausing to look at the table...

We saw this.

Do better Brown's.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu-pvRvgvZYnUGCvT1etFxOW11BwEvmkgQClgj&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We dined in with our kids. I was hesitant at first because I am not sure if this is a kid-friendly place to dine. However, it was around 8pm on a holiday and most restaurants were already closed around the area. Coming from a long drive, we decided to take our chance and dined here with the kids. There were only a few diners so it was favorable for us. The food was great. The servers were great and accomodating. We made the right choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPonaW_Z7yfcVvjv3yeL9nJm_OoHa5JmEnCpAYP&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2023-4-11"},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time @ Brown's on a monday for lunch.  Loved it!!  Prices were high but food was good.  Service was outstanding.  Our server was super attentive and friendly - which actually added alot to the overall experience.  We would go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTkxIfAd_HPnYF2aZZhr_Tql6Kz91jKh5igJZV&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome if you’re in Maple Ridge area, food menu is versatile my picks are chicken bowl , any burger or steak and desert Oreo cheesecake cookie jar is 🔝 of the notch.
Plenty of parking space, friendly employees so no reason not to stop and try this Browns restaurant.
I recommend and thumbs up for this one","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyEvQgas5nRKQTc_yyOw_G2KqZoRkkvNH1XjCv&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Mary Ann Casusi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDYtqTjaPWTw4sJbsLutOu3i5uKukdYsEFxa5oNrl4gqQ2CdPYwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hosts are always friendly. The food is excellent, and I have never had an unpleasant experience .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSVsd44mbeLcAZ_UY1k3hCvkg9O9QO5jdpMwR1&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed the food; the staff was exceptionally welcoming during my dinner. The order arrived promptly, and the food tasted fantastic. The only hiccup in my recent experience was not receiving my second drink, although I was charged for it. However, they promptly corrected the issue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFfc4LIeQ2jDVOYfU0wgbIHdsMhmtzbdSBJxN-&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Andrea Wicki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwpNPLBT7SuJkViPKkt6ckEWcJSQE26-gbxUe4LDAXZrX3dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We made a reservation for my daughter’s 19th Birthday. There were 15 of us plus an 18 month old. We were welcomed warmly by all of the staff. Our server, Brooke was very organized and friendly. The food and drinks came out quickly, and they were delicious. We had such a nice evening! Thank you so much to all the staff who made my daughter’s night so memorable. 😊","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cavin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm889P0Cn7GlG4qcREEm8xAbZo6MbJBbtxPFZQI4yz6lhZXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"(Bento Sushi is located inside Superstore.)

Surprisingly decent. Quality and freshness was similiar to a local resturant take out.

The sushi is prepped and made behind the cooler in front of you.  The chef appears to be Japanese as well.

The price point is slightly on par with resturants.  As it is still "a groccery store sushi", I would enjoy it more if the price was a little bit lower.

In a pinch, this will do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo_7DPxKaznk0OPJDs-Ve6yzFpq2YEGpnjABgz&fid=0x0:0xd27c640a79be251"],"When":"2022-3-31"},{"Name":"Steven G Shi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn2epa5lhv4TntJzyVFm8GXKQOv_UA_mx882NL1blVX6-w15g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter likes their sushi.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mackavelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxXMiPu7YMhc1QgReEro0QPoLjSJx18pMrfy-cqK7HWi-EYG6L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The only thing that saved this meal was the friendly server and the two sausages that were actually cooked properly. Food showed up with no meat, eggs were rubber, hashbrowns were half burnt, bacon cooked well done, ham was overcooked and rubbery also. Bread was absolutely soaked in butter.\n\nI’m not trying to be rude I am just brutally honest, do better next time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLKEPX2En6-lnLZ88pBukSB6nBUwAPnQHiBSYk\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"bealatina 143","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1M2eMZBA9AqqscxNbQV3xS529sLfDb96YTiFfwhk5L7u9iTf3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch here with my cousin and  We shared a club sandwich, chicken strips and a poutine.  It was delicious. Our server Nikki was  amazing with her radiating smile. she really made our experience here outstanding!  If or when i come back i hope she is my server again because i was so impressed at how well she did your job!  Thank you for the great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHUVp2Mb8LSEOEK6WbTcl9IE69f7syVYsTd0aY\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"James Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGMUsvXLijMfgZydLJhU2TpG1bqPFbrelq3iJSQAmmOzYoUfG8Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff is very friendly and accommodating. The food was excellent and made with care. The coffee was good, and they kept coming around to refill my cup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8W-4dsx0P0Or3d_ljp7ASfCNVkzFNSreUBVcl\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Home restaurant was a great find while I was in Maple Ridge. What a great comfort food restaurant. I enjoyed the homestyle food and fresh ingredients. I even enjoyed a slice of their promoted home made pies that are on display as I entered. Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrI777A6I3xtT4h75DfGOF_v54we5KRAu-AB39\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"GHEYF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXePK0A3xq4DR1S1jf5vf69nXWa8YZB-VEttRoV1BYi31N5oCs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has me fascinated; it's the perfect stop if you're going to Cultus Lake. Even if you're not going there, it's worth traveling across Canada to try the pies—they're scrumptious! The food is amazing. The atmosphere is very Canadian, making me feel like a tourist, lol. The service is excellent with very friendly people. The ingredients in the food feel very fresh, which makes it special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2aJVHFpsl_4xj9TDXq_bGhqoYh0UTgehlWqpZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Meral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZgJDSBQQNKp8dP0oLNQ0hDG3ysmSYlwA2fle373dORaWJmgoR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought pie for $7+tax+tip so almost $10 for each slice,but to go sizes are so much smaller than what they led us believe. So disappointed. You can see how little that pie is next to my finger and hand cream","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkiP0Y_XmvTIRiEfeApg4CkBT_ktVgZ3GVoRwo\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Taz e Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUZQyNVNSfKOL9C89OWIJAxQIkFj-drpgJaXIBnJ3XH8o9jkaH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite restaurants the staff are very attentive. The food is just like the name Home \"cooked\" everything on the menu is awesome never had a bad meal in many years of going. I have taken  my friends and family here their all hocked . We just did Dad's 80th birthday here and everyone was happy with the food the service the whole package. Did I mention they have some of the best Pies I have ever had many people come to just buy the pies to take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzh0iayn86ffihFCsFPTDtzFbGLnguFR1bfd1R\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2023-3-13"},{"Name":"J. F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvnPrghjIIxyliVLQ5qdXC_aHHLxKWdRLtv7_c0XpUi4UfZmBiFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great homestyle food and fair prices. Pretty large portions for what you pay for. We went for an early dinner and had The Schnitzel with mushrooms,  it was very good and came with two large pieces!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML0c-LGPcYxbKjQicXzphekRLAxHeHTj5SfoJC\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2023-8-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"E Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSf46GoVDYA6DwVd9VW9_YDSbB2ZybZwD8Gjg5Qpn6bN0v14Wr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food and service at this location are below the standard you would expect from other Boston Pizza. Not too many table (around 5-ish in the afternoon), but service was slow. Can see a few servers standing around chit-chatting. The ones that were working just kept walking around not sure what they were busy with. The "Slow-Roasted Pork Back Ribs" was boiled meat with sauce brushed on top. Kid's "Bugs n' Cheese" was swimming in tasteless soup-like liquid (have to use the team "liquid" because there is no way you can taste any sort of cheese). Only decent dish is the pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPlbgXM8x2YZkq4S2QUsx77-SJhlVL3ujlZwm3&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Sam Sepehri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYthwgE8t4OmmLX3SIv6kEE1WHACJ1czP2SVCGU2ZI1HmJUI50=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pro:
Beautiful restaurant
Good service and very kind staff

Con:

I think they forgot to put the pizza in the oven and the pizza dough wasn't cooked enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgl9SU2g6nX5BAaE7xj3U_R6_moQPImdftD0t6&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Dan Telep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1RA8i7GTOqg4UR9gQEmByxzNobvR0hsiUNFGl0520LZXbGNUt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Kids enjoyed their kids meal, but adult meals were served over 5.minutes after.the kids.  The kids actually stopped eating their good, hot.food, in order to eat with us (parents)  Adult meals were less than average serving size.  We will not be back.  Reduced menu and the experience described above are the major motivators.  So many better local options.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blair Berks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYm9Znf4gcYJhRYQqCTxa556cWjh44hOC6Vs8l9n5T1WfxXBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tried to stop in for brunch this past Saturday. The greeter and only server working was fantastic and informed us two large groups were coming and suggested we sit in the bar which we agreed to. The manager immediately came out and told her that was not an option and to sit us next to the group as she was the only server working. The manager then tried to explain that our only option was to sit next to groups and we decided to just leave based on the option presented.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wednesday night date night and we enjoyed the appy’s all day menu. It wasn’t too busy, service was very good and restaurant had a casual atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIid5AyTplrBj4TWRIJWD0TD3CmHYZNE-Yv5Lh&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"makeshift auto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPk3PvFgBlWxLlrV5DLALlNHnj6fzB7P1Nl0LNZrAG1TKtZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"was here yesterday, the place was fairly dead plenty of staff yet it took them a long time to come to my table, once they finally did i ordered my drink and food since i was well decided..... they brought it out but i was not happy with it. did they do their usual stop by to check how everything is after approximately 5-10 minutes? NO they certainly did not, in fact it took them 35 minutes to come by and by that time by food was cold and gross my beer was flat and i just wanted to leave. the service here is non existent i will not be going back to this location unless i want to spend my entire afternoon eating a cold TINY appetizer and drink a flat beer","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1nIjgQMvi7OUGd3rXyfWM-M_cvJENcCtThVA4n_LhbXrbbZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"What happened to you, Boston Pizza? I swear you used to have some decent food. Unfortunately the food is very sub par. Pizza has little toppings, and has a lot of crust. Lasagna barely has any meat. The wings are a huge ripoff at almost $2 ea, and were not spicy at all. The shaker cheese I didn't think could get any worse, but is now really small and tasteless instead of the larger round pieces of 'cheese'. Service was not bad, I believe it was the manager we had and he was quite nice. $70 plus tip for three really unforgettable items without any drinks. No thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIR8Had75UooOUL8OPQJ3zVM7hZgvw1gumBMl8&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"Hope Hood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmvHORJtBrNufhRRWHXz-abrBtZBcKpzL1NISQxoZzfm-AJYlk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady that served us was really nice and pleasant. The food was well made and tasted good. We ordered pasta for pasta tuesday for the good deal and got starter salad which was a good size for 3.99. We were so stuffed after but wanted to try out dessert which was fresh and hot and obviously the best part.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7XAs1JkkYIrmDlTSn0Os4uw8q7tUKpPpZcv8t&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2018-7-4"}]

[{"Name":"aeva adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWcll_RqraYGc5nI9M6kJolkpNynJJlOgisWFKmxX9pO55eww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"They used to have really good pizza but I just went with a friend after months and it was horrible, the service was good but the pizza was thin,REALLY oily and the cheese tastes like plastic, the amount of oil is actually making us sick,we put a piece of newspaper on it to try and take some oil off and we’re shocked at how much came off, also there was practically no sauce","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeVYlfqW-IEqJJZLlTuQ3CJPkDVmAyRCH5d5Zq&fid=0x0:0xa99f7dc57f522e11"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Gregory Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBPCurR5UGMHmdZUAHnDFHTNCihgF3K4gCFOaXI6gq94e_S0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wife and I went here for the first time ever to try the new Plant Based Chick'n Sandwiches! (Spicy and Original) We were blown away! The bun, pickles, vegan mayo and patty were all perfect! We will be back for sure!
Food aside, the customer service was awesome! In an age where it seems C.S. is getting diluted and lost, the 2 workers here were outstanding, from greeting us right away, to checking how we enjoyed our food!

Pitt Meadows Pizza Pizza rocks! Keep it up guys! ❤️🍕🌱","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVHWCH_g-6R0-hDBVKBdKAstCvXMcfKmFpgErb&fid=0x0:0xa99f7dc57f522e11"],"When":"2021-9-4"},{"Name":"paul poco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzzFoiHx35naekVr_3IR45jvtUju85m0rla0RmX5UfdyPOwBT2qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The crust on the bottom is terrible, next time going to order from Green Olive or Papa Leos.

The crust on the bottom has a 2mm layer that is almost burnt, and tastes like cardboard.

Phoned customer support, they send another pizza, exactly the same.

Called customer support they wouldn't do a refund, offered some small credit.  This credit is usless if you are never going to order from Pizza Pizza again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWb_RFPR1EfQYXuqqxWFwhgygpHqqwX4C-KzD3&fid=0x0:0xa99f7dc57f522e11"],"When":"2021-8-2"},{"Name":"Ryan Low","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0wmacA5xPzvSFSU4G11WRNVegGsS5EjIGeG1scICzmpIBMhos=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Slow... waited half an hour for a slice and "cup" of curly fries. Watched 4 walk in orders come and go before I got my order. Also, pretty sure the slice I got sat for a bit. So much for a quick in and out dinner","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Susan Boutilier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDJUdsc_7I8oYSvdLK1LSbFFEq7UZ9HggQdevfp6hVD-xt7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered pizza for delivery for the first time. We had two pizzas and wings, everything was delicious! The driver was friendly and the delivery was reasonably fast. I'm very pleased with this experience and we will order again.  Thanks so much!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnuEdi7DLKsGc5UmXGmLTYnev3QIbXWRyrYXRFT2XLVP-P0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Might be the grossest food I’ve ever had. Chicken sandwich was weird and the bacon cheeseburger Panzerotti tasted like the meat was rotting. Never again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ankitmacwan0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdtDGQrh_inp7_Tiwv3HKfhlcf1XuYG2tWVIEdeyMjNRdSMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is 3rd time bought pizza from pitt meadows store.it was burn and they cut one pice of the pizza and put it back to the box and gave it to me.what unprofessional crew they are.   This,store not deserving to be serving pizza. I do not recommended  to anyone one to order from this store. Totally waste of money. I should give zero star for this store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pedro Gomes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQCQV25yF7FZNSk-Rk3tDEqEXOMw492WHzzl2itowkGYrlkhIN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent customer service and very kind people! I had a great experience and would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO95kw3y-eWzeoV-ubxZNqI1BMnQJjyX_EHSkTT&fid=0x0:0xa99f7dc57f522e11"],"When":"2021-7-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Erin St. Jean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdslMTDqD7xwonayaFqyCGMU0GHtPG6rXhW5RpEhNUW2Q9__I7CA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love Tim Hortons. But I don't understand why - when I make a mobile order - I can't add a special request. Most restaurant app systems give customers the opportunity to leave a modification instruction - for example, the McDonald's app lets me add a special request for "tea bag out". The Starbucks app lets me reduce my tea bag count from 2 to 1. It's so simple! And I am a customer who really appreciates that feature. I'll tell you why. I prefer my tea very lightly steeped. But if I order an XL specialty tea at Tims, it automatically comes with 2 tea bags in the cup. And that makes the tea too dark for me. If I could add a comment, I could ask for one bag in, one bag out, and my problem would be solved. Will Tim's please consider adding a customer comment box on the mobile app? Pretty please?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ajay Dey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCHZX-_MApTrC08ZgHKSTfZDWiMKP2cK1tf7nWAJOttsl_HDBv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most disgusting food a restaurant can serve, such a shame!

Went to grab a quick meal, got the habanero chicken bowl and steeped tea, surprisingly the drink and bowl was served in less than 30 seconds, after driving away with the food I realized that the bowl had rotten lettuce and the chicken was so mushy as though someone already chewed it and spat it out. And then followed the steep tea which was served cold.
Everything went to trash!

I mean bad quality is one thing but these guys are ridiculously disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJzfeGZZh-WVM3tjs-7sBIb5D_pGsPI5IvQ7ji&fid=0x0:0xd2f7f5e919c35e54"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Miranda Purdon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD8_n2Gl4zjWiGN35PdpbwDWYX8sJNHOxQvSHc3QpXiXUmOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My bagel had the least cream cheese I’ve ever seen on a Tim’s bagel. When I asked for more they refused and said it’s just ‘by portion’.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO64-o5BvcsDuL0FvYsw3GhQguAhJtyc661XoAq&fid=0x0:0xd2f7f5e919c35e54"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Adam Bach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS5tw0c05NJrrpK2YlAgFfGfLj2NI5IoxkGr45gDlKYRqZuWY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrific location.

It's unfortunate that I work in the mall complex that Tim Hortons is situated in. This place is so poorly mismanaged. Drive-through customers get first priority and walk-in customers are forgotten about. Walked to this location from my shop to grab a coffee. I had one person in front of me and 3 people behind me. I made a mental note of the time when I walked inside. It took 10 full minutes to help the customer in front of me and for them to prepare my coffee. Every customer in the lineup was very vocal and talked out loud about how there was nobody serving them.  There were no less than 5 people working in the drive-through and 1 person helping in-store customers. I asked to speak to the manager and I was talked down to by a lady who just made excuse after excuse about staffing. I watched no less than 17 cars get served before I got my coffee. It pains me but I drive my truck through the drive-through now instead of taking the 2-minute walk.  Better yet I'm just going to Waves Coffee on the other side of the lot, at least they care.

Edit:

Went through the drive-through at 5:10 a.m. and got my coffee and breakfast wrap. I could see and hear the manager making my wrap when I pulled up to the window.  She asked   her employee why isn't the grill on, to which he mumbled something. He then proceeded to come to the window and tell me the grill was not working. I asked him, Is it not working or did you not turn it on? he just smiled and said it would be 10 minutes for it to heat up. Frustrated I just grabbed my now cold wrap and left....

Apparently, I give too many chances to local businesses. Ordered a large turkey, bacon club. this was the lettuce they put on my sandwich. It is very evident this location has ZERO care in the world. I will not be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3GW8myTguKRSKiVVR2Oa4KaPavG5msZeAlqjj&fid=0x0:0xd2f7f5e919c35e54"],"When":"2023-10-27"},{"Name":"Jona Sandstorm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgYE7HhHKk3n_vD6i_1RBWnnQh_fU0Rn4jT3L_UhkjSQFhZ8ok=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Drive through person taking the order being snarky over not being able to hear the order, though it's their own system causing it not the customer.  Also, ordered a 'loaded' wrap and instead got a tiny half-filled wrap.  Obviously not keeping up to franchise standards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCfzRu_kviqgDqaFBY21RPku4lylAA3zIIk14A&fid=0x0:0xd2f7f5e919c35e54"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Gurneets here","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtB-qpW5APMv46OvrdGehOuR2izZl57djSM2AoZNXl3ARGTCK6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a really great experience at this Tim Hortons location since they made my very confusing drink order and also made my food with good quality. The employee who served me was Amrit and he did a really good job making my drink. He was really nice and good at his job. I will be going out of my way to go to this location because there icecaps are also just better then the other Tim hortons near by.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tina Tehrani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJovydGs84LUAZ0kkYBSngS96c0egPFhYZqMCKAmBQ62eyGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m a regular customer at your store, and I wanted to share my experience on December 12th around 6 PM. Unfortunately, it wasn’t a pleasant one.

Two staff members, who appeared to be Indian women, were talking loudly in their native language and laughing a lot. What bothered me most was that they were making jokes about customers and laughing at them while interacting with them. Since I understood their language , I could follow everything they were saying, and it was really upsetting.

It is truly embarrassing that a company as old as Tim Hortons, with all its history and charitable efforts, would have employees who behave like this.

I will no longer be returning to this location, and I am genuinely sorry for the management of this branch. I hope they take this matter seriously and make the necessary changes, or else I can’t imagine anyone continuing to patronize this store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sharon Roeder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCpJqVx09Sy39vrr8uTRBO1uuFA7VhQW2SQ-bizIyha0WGyAZp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don’t usually leave negative reviews but today I was shocked at the service I received. I visited Sunday November 23 at 3pm. I order several wraps and was waiting for my food. I was standing where they give you food and where you can clearly see the staff making the food. A family had returned some food in a bag to the staff saying they got the wrong order. She said they unwrapped it and it wasn’t right. The staff member took the bag from her. She looked at the contents and realized it was my order. a few moments later she then called out my order and gave me the same bag of food, the family had given her, which they had already took to their table and previously opened. When she gave me the bag, I told her I refuse to take food that somebody else had already taken to their table and opened up. I was horrified! I will never be back. If staff believe that it’s ok to give customers food that was returned by others, I’m not ok with that and I don’t think anybody should eat there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rose Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEZN6Jp2sdXZuycOhlLCrFmULMG7W4UHOyCzCH_Jn46bjpOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t believe we hadn’t tried this great little small business before now. The menu is exactly the right size for each item to get the attention it deserves, and focuses on traditional diner dishes like breakfast and burgers. The tomato basil soup is great, and even better paired with the incredible Parmesan crusted 4 cheese grilled cheese!
Omelettes are perfectly cooked, with hash browns fancied up with onion and peppers. Love the sourdough bread! Our server Miranda was an absolute delight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU3vLEt9JIL-tDiSvPp9gu2RBgDKizcXTTd4gh&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Hemant Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCmWxkyjYv7PKwZ6ybYox_-smlfUHZeT12o3_8VllBRzoBeRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Recently visited Ricky’s Country Restaurant and had a pleasant experience overall. The service was fantastic—our server was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. The atmosphere was also a highlight, offering a cozy and welcoming environment that made for an enjoyable dining experience.

However, I must mention that the food was a bit of a letdown. I ordered the chicken sandwich, and few other things but unfortunately, the sandwich was quite bland and lacking in flavor. Despite this, other aspects of the meal were satisfactory.

In summary, Ricky’s is a great spot for a relaxed meal with excellent service and a lovely atmosphere. While the chicken sandwich didn’t impress, I’m looking forward to trying other items on the menu on my next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdSvNGylvLjLgi7wZWmxXE4ushe68gLepIMM4&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Ricky's Country Restaurant in Maple Ridge was pretty good. I only had the Cheese Lovers Omelette with cubed hash browns and sourdough toast. The omelette was good, although the cheese could have been melted more. The hashbrowns and toast was decent. The service was top-notch, since the waitress was very cordial and came to my table frequently. I will come back to this location the next time I am in Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrlk4Ajxg-nLrNXIWmwD8woD7BDhl2SdUYQdzn&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service, our server was very attentive to our table and the food was out in 10 minutes! We ordered the big breakfast with the veggie chicken omlete. I replaced the toast for buttermilk pancakes and I am so glad I did because the pancakes are amazing!

Addition: we visited this restaurant again today and I would like to aknowledge Shannon as an excellent server, she was very attentive and exceptionally nice! Love the energy she brings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCP9iVEGlJY3qhwpDF7uAMI8NTIuTJzt0tCoKi&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious 👌🏼
I highly recommend this restaurant when you’re in Maple Ridge","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAR4gV8BbiJlMbacua5ZLyt_brb717LA5m_x_Q&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was ok. Few vegetarian and vegan options. I got the avocado toast without egg and it was a little sad TBH. The meat dishes others at my table ordered looked much better though. Friendly service. Gendered bathrooms.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk-cri_Nphzuqrcwp0wxB7za5YCqw5Vc7bWFY&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Jamie Marchand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLHCICIGmDe3ikuqwvvxfxv0KoSickBkjAxg4OpQHFM_hqiTE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would say the service was even a 6 star experience. The food here never disappoints and they always have something new and fun to try. Ricky’s always has well trained staff that communicate well with customers, smiling and patient yet efficient! We always leave full and happy. The kids love the treasure chest too, great idea! The bench seat we were at needed a little love, but we were still comfortable. Thanks for the service and good food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blake Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLr6CliOagk-ptarMCoZSHXojGr-ApVBclb60FlmLRpUMAGdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely Sunday meal. The food was fantastic. The desert was an extravaganza, a delicious deep dish Apple Crumble. Our server Cheska was excellent and wished us a happy Sunday.
We will definitely be back every weekend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hamid Salim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI3TG9oSjOLechuar9EkdFNIAYsOe-RKsY9UYMVUD2QQtKMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I love Thai foods but is hard to find a good one. We discovered this restaurant by accident and are so glad we did dine there. It was an hour before closing on Sunday evening. The lady who served us could not be more helpful. The quality of food was excellent, ingredients were screaming freshness. Contrary to most south Asian foods that come very sweet or oily, couple of dishes we had were just right on both. We definitely will go again. The portions were large, the best option is to go with few family members or friends and get different dishes to share.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDDAqHd6PEdf1IxqNLj95dUMVHdum-IDrrt3aP&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Price was ok
Atmosphere was good and nice setting
Good services too

Food is average ….it’s so difficult to find good Thai food in Greater Vancouver area😞

- The curry was too watery and meat were cut too big
- The Pineapple fried rice was mostly plain rice with tomato sauce; didn’t really see much pineapple nor meat
- Skewers were good and interesting how they serve sticky rice with skewers
- Most of the dishes serve with a bowl of rice
- Taste overall was ok but the way the food was chopped in bigger chunk not delicate as expected","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ETZLMaeUoUPqW_YrVYHAScUus2S2D48rgIIH&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Jamak Golshani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUj2LK0XJaxGCkMdV1Y3vwaPy3axo29-O-pu7Kb7eqy9PgvRrN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been to the Langley location and the food was amazing so we decide to try this location. We were not disappointed. I personally like the atmosphere here better than Langley.

The service is topnotch and the food is very tasty. The only caution I have is it could get pricy. Three course meal for four will cost you around $200.

Lastly, get a reservation to be on the safe side. It gets packed pretty quick around dinner time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeEnFBHRuCn4CmfTZBtnCs_xifAmpzSOjsqq17&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2022-11-13"},{"Name":"Simon Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKARXZijowQGioSxiOMCg-EzyxEm1UrGAfGF9hiOguYSh8sPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'll be honest : the staff are nice, but the food is nothing fancy. It can be a bit crowded and noisy, but overall, the atmosphere is okay. Recommended if you're looking for a nearby Thai restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnkyNPnq0O3qvk_sAJ33P6HSWWB7uSABjjGRTS&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Pramod Neel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw41ptGAFzVooQILRjvGPIfC76VhEZGfXXgi0sQ9YlceSXmckPQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time around and they didn't disappoint in terms of the food or the service. The appetizing starters (chicken satay, veg n chicken spring rolls) set the ball rolling and whet our appetites for the main course to follow. The mains were pineapple fried rice with yellow curry, pad Thai, Thai chicken fried rice. All the dishes were one better than the other. The spice levels were accurate. The entire family gorged down the food, which left no space for any dessert (a promise to myself for next time 😉). Will recommend this place to anyone who would like to taste some delectable Thai cuisine. Kudos to the chef 👏.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPm076KnKc1LXEYq-rBglmNyeMpiKg75uMnWIZT&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2022-5-15"},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Edit/Update: I recently came here and had there Khao Soi soup. It was rich in flavor and I loved the crunchy noodles on top. Large portion size compared to other local Thai restaurants. Loved their spicy calamari with the green sauce dip. Delicious! Good service again too.

Great Pad Thai lunch special for $15! I ordered the Pad Thai with shrimp. The portion size of the noodles was big compared to other Thai restaurants. The flavour of the noodles was good. It came only with 3 pieces of shrimp but the shrimp was a good size, fresh and cooked well. It was served with a small bowl of soup and salad on the main plate. For $15 it was a really good deal. I had only eaten here once before and did not like the sweet and sour seafood dish. This time around was much better. Servers were friendly. They have nice decor as well. I'd definitely come back to try their other lunch specials.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK59KB_qry66bGbsBTvvhsqYzW1DyXMI7GuqeD&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2022-10-13"},{"Name":"Eston Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZf50HNdIFLNy3MPJ7T0z_SKBvprsk5TrIt59f6By2jLBx8sq5rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great Thai food and drinks! The restaurant's atmosphere is nice and all the staff were very friendly. The food is a little pricey but the portion size is large, I definitely recommend sharing a couple dishes. The service was great even on a packed Friday night our food showed up in 15 minutes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgdldUNaXuuWrqnnYdQGKILmS4cUpDiO-ShwOv&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Shaz Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0UI1cdx8QlB8EQtgs3_0gzmuw9WKyTApAk7qnPExS0XdLhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just wanted to share the recent experience that our family had at this location of Ban Chok Dee. We just celebrated a milestone birthday that went off without a hitch. Lynn the restaurant manager went well above and beyond to make the evening and dining experience FANTASTIC. Not only did she make special accommodations for our family that were quite difficult to work with she also made sure that the entire experience from arranging the evening, presenting sample menus that would please the family was ready the day of. Lynn is a gem and so are her staff that she has handpicked! The food was fantastic and everyone was impressed by the quality and selection. We are a pretty particular bunch when it comes to our meals and not one complaint was had. I would not hesitate to recommend Ban Chok Dee in Maple Ridge to anyone who is looking to book a venue for a special event. The only reason I gave 4 stars for the atmosphere was that it was actually quite hot in the restaurant and the AC wasn't operating in the dining area. Other than that we had no complaints! Lynn now has life long customers from my entire family all because of how she took care of us. Thank you Lynn!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Daase","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBwt1y__ieOQ6rtxWrbLx79gFmQDxZHTIlyMirneXVdm7BEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is beautiful inside! A hidden gem, it wasn’t busy at all on a Friday evening which I was surprised. The food was delicious (Greek salad the best I’ve had) the Greek style ribs were tender (lacking salt, but once I added salt it was really yummy) over all I would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhGgjYPib05tBlTwUJIY3txFEcyYAMcyS11TmP&fid=0x0:0xc7f0e74e24c00bc0"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Alvaro ADA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHfR0wv7SAbPUpdi8lH7IrK4oJU5U7YtQ6w224hdNUnfPXA7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed the attention and the food. The waiter was very polite and try to make us feel at home. Food was serve shortly after ordering with a good portion presentation and warm. Taste: I can just say, my son and wife love it! That should say enough. When finish we were offer desert but food took its toll with us. Finally, I highly recommended for your lunch or dinner meals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Iman Rahmaty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4fZOqYHX8glodHVRySbk9_tWVDRu59jLTmQrTwItu0Etgfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I had an incredible experience at Socrates. The atmosphere was perfect—warm, inviting, and just the right mix of elegant and comfortable.

The food was fantastic, with fresh ingredients, rich flavors, and beautifully plated dishes. Every bite was memorable, and both of our meals were absolutely delicious.

The service was top-notch. Our server was friendly, attentive, and made great recommendations, adding a personal touch to the night.

Socrates is a true gem where everything comes together—amazing food, great service, and a cozy ambiance. We can’t wait to return! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor Safonov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH7q93d1K9tn9Dnmg-HYEGcil6kwKd6Jh5GVCelXsB2yHcMtq3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a family dinner at this restaurant. We ordered several different dishes. Overall, the food was delicious. The atmosphere is nice and not loud. Service is good. Unpleasant surprise at the end of the evening - they automatically add a 20% tip for a group of 6 or more. I have no problem with tipping, but in this case I feel like someone is just reaching into my wallet without asking. At the entrance to the restaurant we noticed a lot of people taking take out. We won't go there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Bosnjak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5dDkomF66OX55DVF0cecHSvIVXQw82_r6Nj7yxfmIxBJx-Vo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and a super friendly atmosphere. I had the Lamb shoulder and the taste took me back to my grandmother's house when I was young. Great meal and great restaurant. Highly recommend for Greek food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leah C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSvkg4jot2o9e-I5XPpyMexBrtiq8sg9MIK4yISu3_L0cYww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Server Julia was an absolute quality, professional server with an enchanting disposition

Owner was especially accommodating and displayed a professional disposition. This was my second visit and continue to be impressed with appetizer and dinner options","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaeda Okell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWIW6EvO7vOUAEpF7_qb1mhH2RhcyN5niBvAHaJp-fAp3B6mY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my boyfriend went out for my 23rd birthday and I had an amazing experience! Our waitress Yasmin was very good specially because it was her first day, and I had no complaints:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcv_FSz1mYv8BCJBk3JVxx_ZmUGCN-ew2s09vh&fid=0x0:0xc7f0e74e24c00bc0"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Street Hazard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURFbIXZgFohAMrMR_ZDnInasbkLj2VtqII5gRfvJ8LxVhZgb_sCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food wasn’t horrible but it’s definitely just an bad attempt at real Greek cuisine
Start off with the fact that the “Greek salad” was hardly edible due to the HUGE cuts of the tomato’s and cucumbers, then is topped with some “in house dressing” that goes horribly with it and isn’t even a attempt at Greek salad dressing which I find amusing
Secondly I’m not sure why they put raw onions with the calamari?? Never seen that before
Additionally the lamb rice and potatoes weren’t bad, potatoes reminded me of home and the lamb was well cooked and so was the rice
Lastly the service was not bad but I was the only person in the whole restaurant so can’t definitively say service was amazing and quite disappointed when I said happy Easter weekend to her and got a weird look and no response (Easter is tomorrow)
Wouldn’t recommend to someone looking for authentic Greek food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuXXvnRJHIazc5_yObsm_IcRiJFoMsoSaWosUQ&fid=0x0:0xc7f0e74e24c00bc0"],"When":"2024-5-5"}]

[{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it was an overall pleasant experience. The cleanliness and organization of the place were commendable. The staff members were notably friendly, adding to the positive ambiance.

While the food was generally good, the poutine left me with mixed feelings; its taste wasn't my favorite. On the bright side, the burger was undeniably delicious, making up for any minor disappointments. This place certainly has its culinary highlights, and I would recommend trying their burgers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhPzUcCvi4y8ciy1m_DTCAGnGnenKxPXQM_jUL&fid=0x0:0xc1e655dac827535b"],"When":"2023-10-30"},{"Name":"Paras Kansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5U2Qj7ViVfgmYIrAi6dL33vWgf3gl6BzZe-Q2iAgmKqhC_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't find a better BK within Maple ridge then this one, every time I am in the area, I am tempted to go this BK for a Whopper. They have the best Whopper I find so far, the burger platter is just good, not over cooked and right amount of Vegetables. Also nicely packed with wrapping for each Whopper.
Restaurant is very clean and nice
That's why I give 5 Stars to this BK.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JASLEEN KAUR GREWAL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXLOkGjNi7yvDrJLnm8li7e78ikpLEWPx0gmOh2V1gbqy_0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for mayo to be added on the both sides of the bun. They gave a cold patty without any. Their customer service is the worst. I dont know how they got hired. Never going again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTBPgl0Khm0BikqedJcaXJWd-xNDBC4_bbYdnz&fid=0x0:0xc1e655dac827535b"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Arthur Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlxYPFkvC81vA5tasND7__T2ksVDw4UlwiyGw0M_hn9habTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Long history as I know since 1996 at least.  A lots free parking available in the front.  Portion is big.  Price is super good with coupon.  Friendly employees even they looks pretty seriously sometimes.  Overall, I would recommend this fast food restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7rtSOSUDU8fzrzN5w9LUMVWewE_mxDL5NTnNs&fid=0x0:0xc1e655dac827535b"],"When":"2019-2-10"},{"Name":"Charlene Alimot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK49oevTBzIqwreFOt7DPeIa3qXCXxyJ2zOmFgYQExA20Kp8Nm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"There was a fly in my food.

I usually don’t have problems whenever I go and the staff are always kind but it really sucks eating your food and seeing a fly in it.
Mistakes happen, but this one really sucked.

The staff apologized when I called to let them know what happened.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPENAvpc5FRN1gXl6qy83r1hVp9Pppq18h1b6gr&fid=0x0:0xc1e655dac827535b"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Navjot Rai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIURzLibUPWSa8q85ld33LMTLbxNnXnvyJ0Ge18XUSEqZ6HoI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I just ordered sandwich meal at night time. It was the worst food I had. Poutine was useless. Moreover sandwich seems to be made without any sauce. No napkins . No ice in coke. I think you should better change your staff or close your franchise. Don’t ruin goodwill of burger king. Hope you take it seriously.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSYYjgfzzK1WPP-hwIX-99HbCLAkj6n3O3uEbX&fid=0x0:0xc1e655dac827535b"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"JM (OU812)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfsvLIoFkWKzm_KAGMndeu4qOo0YUtBW8yZ5Hc4wvZ7IG_wcJAjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a good place for a quick bite. Not a particularly new Burger King but a clean one. The food is typical Burger King fast relatively tasty and for a change from other Burger King's I've been to hot. If you like fast food and enjoy Burger King you'll be happy with your choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP11KklZkTjA93Y_ncPvtKeg0WtM8g7Q-xACw-9&fid=0x0:0xc1e655dac827535b"],"When":"2018-4-6"},{"Name":"Momo Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKInDHyKpxgmPV61HkzU0SvS_YevyBKRdVUWfv54dCUyduXmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to this burger king location today i dont understand when you go to drive thru why these employees cant wait when they’re taking your order they wont listen fully your order they keep saying anything else anything else why are they so impatient they are always in a hurry All these Indian people they have AirPods in their ears talking on the phone while on their job thats why they’re always in a Rush to take your order and they even so rude wont even talk to you hand out you your order and ask u too pay and then shud window on your face food quality is just ok but staff behaviour is very bad this needs to be changed i dont know how these type of people get hired not going to this location again","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kwan Fu Sit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxITaxZ3hn037Zh1z9TQmbQPt6WsiezaGcj9Pv2Zl7Dcs1bGxF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a baconator combo and when the clerk gave me the burger she mumbled double baconator and I asked her, is that my baconator and she said yes.

When i get home to my surprise it's not even a baconator, just a single!  What the hell?  Would not recommend this location.  Been here a few times and each time it was bad","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOof5cTxkshb6qIPVdoZAZ8efKHGiQcekECeMl4&fid=0x0:0xf6a9f673239af39d"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Fredrick Zoller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL01F2QlXvuCUnZwPCtofa0r29cQHvBmtrY6v5OjsG39ImLPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ate in the restaurant for breakfast. It wasnt busy, and all of the booths were empty but were dirty, with old trays and food. No staff came out to clean them for the half hour I was there.

The food was fresh and tasted really good. The breakfast potatoes and the breakfast baconator were both really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAFT6y48pcfAer14NSNmR5XZdsnGlI7qjfvKWu&fid=0x0:0xf6a9f673239af39d"],"When":"2023-10-31"},{"Name":"Kenneth Wourms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyjwJ5PmMoIXgzWyq3YmiyqVwetAcqPoCHNAiHiV85lckagnxj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This is the fourth time in a row that they didn't give us spoons for our frosties. Do they think we're drinking them through that little hole in the lid? They do realize these are a frozen drink, right?? Or are they convinced that EVERYONE just buys them to dip their fries?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jackie spears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSpIRsoeLZKzPhRjMQrTuHhWXI2eeJUv_G6fSe8jGwzpSrvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered delivery from Uber eats from here a few days ago. Got the Spongebob collab burger, pineapple frosty ,chicken nuggets and cinnabits.
Only to have my delivery sent to me and my burger was cold and mushy and gross. I did not receive my cinnabites and I received two chicken nuggets in the pack. My frosty looked like it was half eaten just like my 6 piece nuggets obviously were and I guess they just forgot to give me the cinnabits. I did report this discrepancy to Uber eats to be faced with not eligible for refund (even though I sent pictures of my order and what was missing) nope they didn't care! So I've taken to google for my review of this location! I want my money back Wendy's I'm not paying for your staff to eat my food! So despicable. Will not ever be ordering from this establishment ever again! Stay clear of this place 😞","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Gerlach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrEvt8WPP6iriDpH0OkxJmJYGPkDnaeurZUiT5zf5D4GtWug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is usually pretty good. I've had missing items from my drive through order. Also don't come here when they are busy. They seem short staffed. I've waited 30min to order and receive my food before. Like most fast food places they prioritize skip and uber and drive through and leave the customer who come inside feeling forgotten about. Hire more staff if you can't keep up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4lHp1xaS9fuDL8ehRwtF1BG_sk7DTce36yt19&fid=0x0:0xf6a9f673239af39d"],"When":"2022-2-24"},{"Name":"Luke Sweet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9QeFiL7Y_5vgEXhwPtQROLfzuFoGuUMMTWJA3gL_TYNU4OALy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Super unprofessional.. I was going through the drive through waited 2 mins for them to say something at the speaker and all I could hear in the background was laughing and messing around while taking my order. After that I pulled up to the window to see them screwing around and laughing while spilling my coffee all over my cup and then proceeded to hand me a wet straw.. and yes they’re cardboard straws so I got a soggy straw and a coffee which was also spilled all over the cup. Super disappointed won’t be going back again anytime soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Ulrich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD6f9LeJuwM9yA12l9039u49wt8-HhJCcGbAHaOypdE6Pofbaq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a large chili with cheese, no cheese,
I ordered a large fry well don, they were soggy and cold.
I ordered spicy nuggets, got regular ones
Ordered a Dave’s double with heavy pickle and mayo. No heavy pickle or mayo and it’s cold.
Also no straw for my lemonade.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Hillock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrzRoOQIhVr_Azv33mg4FgqnXjS5clP8SiddvR3MVEWC9e9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hot and fresh and does customized orders with perfection. They are so fast. Amazingly fresh and juicy. They don't use old stuff. I saw a woman manager leading the team.

Thanks! Please keep up the good work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSNAC5XGHJfC5BHKoGZjuFeEb92JoAj6X5MDCp&fid=0x0:0xf6a9f673239af39d"],"When":"2022-7-28"}]
