user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Josh Pugh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdo-qeYVPKl1TsBx7lb6E71mriV6RGK_xzkOT3OMUQsSTHcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The second time this has happened. Ordered pizza for game 7 of the Stanley cup. Order was taken and was told one hour. At an hour an fifteen minutes I called. They asked me what’s your address again? I said why don’t you tell me what you have. It was incorrect but the right street so I figured it would just be a few mins. Kids are starving and getting cranky. 45 mins later still no pizza. I called the store and suggested that the pizza should be free and he agreed. When the driver shows up two hours and 15 mins later he said we ll give you 10 percent off. Not a chance. Extremely disappointed with this whole experience and will never get pizza from this chain again. Never once did the actual driver call me. Ordered pango and it was at my door in 25 mins. They also just called me to give me a 10 dollar credit for any delays the other day when it was wasn’t delayed. So many better pizza places to order from dont go here and if you do be prepared to possibly wait over 2 hours and we’re talking about pizza here. 🤣","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Funk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9Bc1lGK4JsbLWCSw4nuVaV6oIom_QZhCJHgoPQMsUXn9oWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little pizza place. Grabbed a Pappa Leo’s favourite for lunch and it didn’t disappoint.
It was ready in 15 min for pickup
Staff was kind and courteous

If I’m in the area again I will go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt2m0U0BgUAiBKEKEevosO3CJOM9qTd90pGMij&fid=0x0:0x2f2aca7a620a43a1"],"When":"2022-3-17"},{"Name":"tony m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8Dr9BTtGFsD_c-o7_H_wp3vx_RnT_kYgVQkAjZTqV7abysg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 2 large pizzas Won’t order from that location ever again . Hardly any toppings . All I tasted was the bread , cheese is burnt.awful .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"omeed rahimzadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0xHYaX6KVD_kgONYYN1RbJMtFVaYznsbmm0yousQSuFxZVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to come for pizza very friendly staff and they take care of you I would definitely come here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxHdcdm6SNBAaLwojcWdbbdKMY0iDYYQgfXoFi&fid=0x0:0x2f2aca7a620a43a1"],"When":"2021-10-13"},{"Name":"Wilbur & Sabastian's, a small bistro Ltd.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX08RCl1iw2DUIkCfZ9wZdfmRgpgxs1Q5dd4HP6BLEcVIUYn2aEyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good honest slice of pizza. Whether it's a quick slice as a snack or  whole pizza for family dinner, you get your money's worth. The cheese and sauce is solid, not too sweet like most. The crust is thick but yet airy. Never had a bad pizza from here. Service is quick and knowledgeable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adele Swecera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHbYDMueeP5HRZksFf4a8I-UNdJb51YazkZoUIVEHgUusbmyck=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Papa Leo’s Pizza is so good! The staff is  friendly and always happy to accommodate requests. For instance, I am g/f (celiac)  ask them to take out the  G/f pizza early!! Most pizza places burn the g/f pizza because it is so thin. It is a learning curve. Let restaurants know so they can improve! Be kind.
Also, if you want to make sure they have  specific slices of pizza call them in advance ~they will make sure they have it. All you have to do is ask them!
I find errors here are uncommon, but if you ever have any, let them know and they will fix it!
We are Pitt proud here and love this pizza joint!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renan Tarras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2YkSpyYz4DzxRWbsZFRNDuS-32L_wFKM3IHM90r06ulv8UuSlhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little pizza place you are able to buy singular pieces of pizza to try out different types or if you are on a budget it's also awesome. They have full size pizzas also and lots of selections  The staff are absolutely wonderful they are very quick and eager to help. The location is in a very convenient area I'd like to add as it's in the same parking Lott as 711 great job pappa Leo's and staff 5 stars all around I will be coming back soon 🙏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brad Yates","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq39jrEzTD0VinqrtHqnGaD_DrOkDEsX3-MRyAjNvdaMbtu-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent quality Pizza here with a reasonable price.

$5 for 2 large slices (and a pop) is a great deal, and they always have great quality pizza.

Their Hawaiian is awesome - love the way that you get ham in every bite. (they layer sliced ham below all of the toppings - covering the entire slice!)

Their Buffalo/Barbeque chicken pizza is my favorite, however I have not seen this offered as a 'by the slice' option.  Maybe something to try sometime???","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelvin Liew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5_6qeykN2WiLweJ8YUQuifTCU3O13-PRLxMVMteoJHx-TVt3I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Local gem, love their presentation. The food is tasty and is definitely comparable to popular sushi spots in vancouver.

Tuna tataki in the photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1XSVrCm-LnqRXR5OHvBcK7lVLIe7Ca8cv4dnt&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Sage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZG5jDF-aYdeki0OFGxAs77w7rLWv2b6nYHO0jMEL4f4ztnhSNVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great local sushi/Japanese in Pitt Meadows. Kind staff, and everything was super fresh.

The special bluefin Toro was at a great price for incredible quality bluefin.

And the oshi was on point for this Vancouver staple.

Also has Sapporo on tap!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9TPXOpHvWYuYVs8X5jGGFoSY_KEkvnjFUkh7w&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Aple G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAlK_xYB-UEv4a0OvWRpvHvUfXzfMBueXFU0EYf8mRLuE9XLY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service came slow, but at least they ask you twice if you want to order. The tonkotsu was crispy and moist. But if you want authentic ramen, keep looking - not recommended. We ordered the Spicy Tan Tan, featuring gyoza meat patty. The ramen peanut sauce more sweet than spicy. The pickles are special, reminds me of essential oil. The miso was served cold, but hey if you ask for hot they’ll at least meet you halfway at lukewarm, just like my feelings about this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyopGpR710sjJ7VJMtHiPlpRTA8xG3MnwACrj1&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Elisha R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQi7E9QIgqhf-Aqp2-1839iyCuma_GAEGVE7WIfLRwgWpbWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband had brought me here and said it was some of the best sushi he had tried so of course I needed to try it!

The first thing I noticed was the restaurant was very clean and they had very spacious seating, not like some where you are incredibly close to the table next to you or beside you.

Everything i tried was so fresh, very flavourful ! They offer a great variety of menu items along with the specials.
Most importantly the have a good variety of Gluten Free options that are affordable and great in taste!
It is hard to find a sushi restaurant that is consistent in their flavors and taste. Everytime i have been here it has been spot on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andre Bueno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH5SUaQ7I07ULutYyqq57BUbzjWcRO691ZQjx7O-gqyaKongm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'd say that this restaurant is the best I've tried so far in Metro Vancouver and Tri-Cities. The food is amazing. We can taste and see the high-quality ingredients, as well as the care in every single detail when preparing the food. The menu has many yummy options, and as much as I try, I want more. On top of that, the cleanliness is impeccable. The service is excellent with friendly and polite staff. I strongly recommend you try this restaurant. You won't regret it for sure. Congratulations to the owner(s) and all the crew! You are doing excellent work! Please keep it that way 🤩.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZYMTM4r7DN7JtqeZwj6BG9PJk-3FUnvMWvFH8&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"Elise Lien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2hWtg0KjFGoIRjgqbChDbDmwLwVmzWwwoNUOozeKB9F5ORzuraw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and the portions are sufficient
Fabulous service
Excellent environment
Highly recommended👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV9jk7ahkgKzVErwLTgORLSeWosvlLwPmPEpP8&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Nadiia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCI0bBdateEVyKA53tgft7NUABuW1QMLHiMMz3N4gl3dt9rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Atmosphere is very nice, but food and service….

Portions are small. Wait is insane. Only 3 tables were busy but I had to wait almost an hour for my order of sushi.

Don’t recommend this place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"P K HP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe8VMHrgJxt3sbCwis_tAIzHXM5k4hWakw9wgTYPMONOlZRRLa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ridiculous Tonkatsu in such kind of shape! Teishoku only had one salad and few pickles $20 dollars?? Plus they charged tea,, didn't event tell customer in advance.

PS:Third fouth pictures are real JapaneseTeishoku (Salmon)tray okay!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM99XoHay2qBBm3kKxh-0EI-1ptbGFRSpmTMoRb&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-1-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just average donair. The ambiance of the restaurant looks too tired and needs some love. While the tomatoes, onions, cucumbers and iceberg lettuce are fresh and crunchy, there’s not enough flavour in chicken donair, garlic sauce is not garlicky at all. Good location in Maple Ridge, easy to find and easily accessible from Lougheed Highway, Dewdney Trunk Road, and 207 Street. But what I am looking for a great Shawarma is the ones that you can find in the streets of Dubai, Doha, Riyadh, Jeddah, Abu Dhabi and other Middle Eastern towns and cities.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIQPd4E_o7w_BbGyfqPk915vsWz1S8eH70Rz8&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Paxton Skrukwa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIn2o1TGm6qhK760ufU-Ks7kFr_uE1jgLQEnBiAZxtwNR7zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Donair was hot and fresh , I've never experienced so much flavour. I ordered a super Hawaiian beef. Sure it  isn't the largest donair available in town but the flavour is off the charts. The fresh hot meat was absolutely insane . Great job ! this may be a monthly occurrence since I'm out of town . Its that good . Tell him Cactus Jack sent you !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHgQao0OeuiW5zKxrRPHm3XHJacxPgUExW92cC&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Aaron Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwH-T4meTA46mZWwBX8SW-8HRP3aTbI4qdWLp7QDk8OwKOg_kvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic establishment. He has been there for years. Always consistently great. Dog friendly too. Asked if I could get some chicken for my dog and he gave me a small amount no charge. I was so impressed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joni Outlaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiwQJqCgKmRrr3onNf_Keaeft5OYCtq8cmojr1vFYhvg8Hig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Poutine donaire  will change your life! I love coming here for food. The falafels are superb! The food is amazing.... the fries and falafels are made to order they are so hot and fresh. NEVERMIND the prices . It's a steal. I don't even live in maple ridge but make the commute often to eat here. They have delicious beef and chicken as well I just prefer the falafels myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNZLZeJxYHUamHEcsS-3f7nYAZ-IBAabR5u-lj&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Amy Lapka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz5WqBgZ-zOQMq0YADkQNpSRdLNSESLBD_mbCIt7uT_WLpFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love Donair Top! They offer generous toppings, good flavours, and lots of options. Any time we’re there, we’re never the only regulars in there. My pictures are of tonight’s chicken salads!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8B_uAMdw62GFbfxByZe4axPxMpxFrsk0biYgv&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2020-3-5"},{"Name":"Kim Lovino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgFvPz1MLcDh2p7hkNMTeAwE3jmU0_hDAwvlUIGOia6_lY6RBkFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HAVE YOU TRIED A DONAIRxPOUTINE YET? For less than $10 you can!

We tried this small Donair shop at Maple Ridge and it's 🔥! Hands down one of the best Donair places we've been to in a while! 👌 With the price, you also get a drink 👀

We ordered:
-Super Donair Poutine ($8.50)
-Chicken Platter ($10.00 w/ pop pop)
-Hawaiian Lamb Donair ($8.50 w/ pop)

Check the place out when you're HANGRY and you're near the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA5DZTlvcsL8Y5pWGihmlRWo07dKeuy26Dd1Pv&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2020-2-10"},{"Name":"Farzad Yarahmadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVL1ZNumRCDrzHwZgrUFz5SXcIggox3bY1UrnohOO-CZKUBM3msA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently purchased a chicken donair from Donair Tope, and I am extremely disappointed with the quality. The donair had a terrible smell, making it inedible. I couldn't even take a single bite before having to throw it away in the garbage. This experience was very frustrating, and I don't recommend to any one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Bruneau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEfdwdzg7a-t-FvED_e_ICeY6c2F9wWHziEFSCxCklwPPHJYvB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They're one of my favorite donut places and I kid you not I have tried everywhere. Nowhere is as good as this place and if anybody says different then they are absolutely out of their freaking minds. Every time I have to order a donor protein from somewhere else it's always missing one thing whether it's the gravy the cheese or the taziki. I'm not sure why every other donor place doesn't just make their donairs exactly like this place.

The only downside of this place is they do not have any delivery services they need to get on skip or Uber or something. I would literally become a delivery person just for this place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiQJYF4_BS-QCtzODpwt_N5rIUplgHFCiJnOSYNTLBW_fQWDG4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pardeep working close tonight was AMAZING.
He got the long line dealt with QUICKLY and made sure to get all the details right for everyone's order ahead of us.
All I had to say was that I wanted the jerk chicken bowl (he even let me know what came in it!), and he took care of the rest! I didn't have to list off everything I wanted in it, and he omitted the cheese per my request.
Food was phenomenal. Best bowl I've ever had.
Absolutely amazing service from him.
Would absolutely come back in a heartbeat due to his service!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 stars to him alone!
Give that man a raise!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at this particular subway lougheed highway (203rd).
Eat in area is tiny (maybe 6 tables).
Shop was busy.  Plenty of staff kept the line moving.  Food was good.
Ingredients are fresh and you add what yoy like.
Lobby Area was clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5Tq-aP6HlzCZEJHzHwiBPXrMv2J12YZYTO8eH&fid=0x0:0x532a8cf0e2066c35"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Sahil Jhamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi61en5o7COh8vP6mtco_YkqCLtcfHpnNfb3x0ncWhE5kxcBzRUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Online ordering was not working due to some tech issue at location, location denied to use app coupon as they facing some issue, and ask to go to another location ? Is there no way to entertain manually ? Surprised! Then the member said ok I will do this time for you, is it a favor you are offering to customer when there is tech issue ? Will not be going back to location, no rewards to my account as there system failure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave backeland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcv64Vs5yBlfxYxoVSibb1CSK_GewvZ_CHwRAGyPnm_H2NUHk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My daughter and her co worker both nurses at the local hospital ate here today during their dinner break. My daughters co workers had a steak sub. They had already eaten then noticed the maggots on the wrapper of the steak sub. Do not eat here I will contact the appropriate agency to deal with this. Should be closed pending an Investigation. They quickly left leaving the maggot covered wrapper.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veerpal Kaur Sran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBNQKpadS6X7lyFj0bmmYePq51U1wBDv_gQk6Qr4JvEOqVDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am really disappointed by the service and food. I went there at 9.30pm may be and the girl who was making the sub was really rude she don't even ask for the patty that which patty do you want. It was really a bad experience for me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roman Rapoport","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ1RhWJk7FNleGt5iAf_4WNTf0NEMtRINKw-n19Y7BK3Oh9vvq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Puneet & Prabhjot were amazing, super friendly and kind. Kind of people that make you want to come back and order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aarav saraon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNpGMrFAcOG9hVTK0Vb9-EE6Ym1HHLGJafzt9fTiy4MdH_P_qS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A good sandwich shop. Recommend if hungry or want something else. And it is simple and very customizable, you can easily order by asking "Can I get a footlong (what sandwich you want)." Than add your toppings. The cookies are great too, they just taste so good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ynday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpxBZuYdrIP3-2FyehoRc3qi4pGPkMQfcVRc4KIHLqx54GJocY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cashier charged me for 3.29$ for the fountain water. I never asked for “carbonated”fountain water. I just told her I will just have to water from the fountain. And she told me they charge it for 3.29$

If I didnt call someone I know from Subway, she will not refund me

Also, we are 4 people inside and they were in the back by the computer talking so loud with their language from back home.

Very UNPROFESSIONAL","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"todd lazarenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMWhJK6u9XNG2-gmnhPqFucz9pNeWhp5Mzp9oBrrbII94Vr5o9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We go to Maple Ridge Keg about once every 2 or 3 months. The food has continued to be consistently good. We almost always sit at the bar as we can walk right in at just about anytime and get seats right away. From the Baked garlic shrimp and the wedge salad to the 12 ounce sirloin, it was all fantastic and we were stuffed. They even gave us a free birthday Billy Miner pie to go with a candle. Courtney was our server working behind the bar. She gave us absolutely flawless service. I am a Maple Ridge Keg alumni so I can certainly appreciate great service paired with great food. Now the Keg ain't cheap, with the 20% tip it was $242.00. I don't mind as we enjoy our meals there. Keep up the great job Courtney and Maple Ridge Keg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaACummdyJEVgGY0I39CTjR_UvRfRFIlSt65Y&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were celebrating my friend his birthday. We were 6 people. We had so much fun, we got the food at the same time no issues. Scotty was our server. Let’s put it this way, he knows his job very well. Let us feel super comfortable and made sure that we’re happy with everything at all time. Food was good. The wings with the chilli oil and the blue cheese omg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIggME2dZvlWZ9ueSj2a71MgvQVwhXFJbwXzln&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Star Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX3bxa6epj-Pmj6Ysk7djR6GPyFN2Nb3oWlupv9ZY8ucFacX7F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this Keg it's casual dining 3 steaks are always done right, and food tastes amazing. I had half Lob and steak it was very good meal. Great waiter named Declan, who helped us celebrate our  22nd anniversary dinner! Thanks for a memorable night, Keg!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPImFZO5frUVCDMLYyHWb04fRXCWc_vDNHAY5YM&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Olivia Leaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzloLoDK6qGN7OOG3lV2DyC7b9nIFZQdd3rh1F80nxbwNaod8v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful night! Zoe was an attentive and accommodating server, and both her and the kitchen were very mindful of my partners shellfish allergy. They also managed to get me the rarest piece of prime rib possible, which was fabulous! We appreciated it, and will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0XPURyEP4MDPMGUIx0ZikzWqejuc_bua0wUFi&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"S M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaVQBXA2LqzncrzyqIA7NUO-NlvmCIPf8x9w2beJYJtlvwkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an exceptional dining experience at The Keg, thanks to our waiter, Jarred. He was attentive, knowledgeable, and made excellent recommendations that elevated our meal. His friendly demeanor and prompt service ensured everything ran smoothly. Jarred truly went above and beyond, making us feel valued and well taken care of. I can't wait to return and hope to have him as our server again! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuqaxfaCnCiXPjlH1wGlkoULMBFXQYi7bRU5qpZ_0Tn5TVHIi3aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been quite awhile since I've been to a Keg, and my first time at the Maple Ridge location. We were crazing a steak and wow they did not disappoint tonight! It melted in my mouth and was exactly what I was craving!! Loved the beets with green beans tonight as well, it's not often you get beets. Service was great and dinner was a beautiful night out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rayant Yeo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaSGd8rGguK-MzK7O72I-ocdHyBHvKJG59MOmI710XLPYz1DeB_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I must compliment the restaurant manager for going the extra mile in making us feel comfortable while waiting for our table. We made reservations for 8 pax at 730pm. However, our table was taking a bit longer than usual. So, the restaurant manager offered us complimentary drinks and appetizers while waiting for our table.

Food at The Keg never disappoints; delicious & fresh; especially the lobster and salmon.

Thank you for your Great Service!! 👏🏼👏🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_djeCr3xBpMuJZMvMITSpE8XqVIlWMv4zn0iM&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2023-12-22"},{"Name":"Arthur Pangilinan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGrMo8Q0uYkleyMEXyLc0uVJCPhvFTuVKvzIq5qSp-cV9pow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a fantastic experience with Andrew at The Keg! He was attentive, funny, and kind, making us feel well taken care of. As long-time patrons of The Keg, this was our first time learning about the Keg Classic meal, which included everything we normally order separately. It truly blew our minds—we’ve been missing out on this better deal for years! Also made us feel comfortable bringing our newborn with us on our first ever date. We never felt out of place with the stroller and all! Thank you for being awesome, Andrew and team! We’ll definitely be back to this location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pradyumna Gujjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVHYwZPoeWTWb_r-Pj3URXZmwvjMuE8IJLkPSR4xqAVv86CR0HjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better coffee spots this part of town.
Live their white chocolate mocha and caramel macchiato.
The crustless quiche was alright but their blueberry almond croissant was delicious l.
Ample seating space and a cozy atmosphere.
The staff are friendly and always greet customers with a warm smile!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9dRoqL3BsSp9XqSAU7gRN_nD5TgAc5tKMruzM&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got a white mocha and an iced matcha latte, pretty mediocre - not bad.

The GF Bagel was dry, lacking something while the cheddar and kale scone was also lacking some flavour.

Cute sitting area, new view to look out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHJUzRGAyBksruWXWvJPvpMsi63q35C7vJuASE&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good amount of outlets. Tables and chairs weren’t the most comfortable. Really high traffic on warmer days. Only thing was coffee was really not that good, none of us enjoyed it particularly. Prices are high.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOfU_iw6MKN_VNcprT4qzkhpJDp8qhn7A8ihys&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"George D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqMA7qbYytlO_4Jfi4rlocuHdAGheOdmR3fEbGAbM7yIf_VUe3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good Chai lattes ❤️ just came here with my niece and mom for a coffee but we got a little something something 🫠 to go with our coffee. Highly recommend coming here for sure. If your into coffee and a walk by the  river adjacent to here also a popular thing to do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONNpTeljW_1SvY-Hg84WnPOJkwF_nAxc0OGVow&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Simon Hardy-Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB8AdQYxUYJCAE_cHqFT87JPS7eQsmUoL3mGal92dnU64RGEWt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Dry cappuccino was not dry, nothing really breakfast so ordered the quiche without the salad; price was $6 which seems steep. Nice atmosphere close to the river.

Update July 2017: Got a Cafe Frap but it tasted mostly of milk and not coffee :-(

Update Sept. 2024: 4 people were working in the cage but none were smiling. Nothing looked cleaned  or maintained. Napkin dispenser was almost out. My wife ordered a 20oz coffee and for myself only a 16oz. But we were given two 16oz coffees. Although busy, they told my wife that she was wrong about the size of her coffee. Think this will be our last visit :-(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7INVkA9B6nvoTKjGfrHA8WRwuZS5xBIgO8zDZ&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2016-9-18"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute place, great location and easy parking. Staff was friendly and the coffee ( Caramel macchiatos) we’re so delicious.
I got a grilled cheese, and my friend got a veggie bagel. The bread tasted very fresh. The building is pretty small so limited seating if it gets busy. But super cute cafe and look. Great experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY98G5lU5qiX10hl6orPxomKrz9EF_g7gpoS-1&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2023-2-28"},{"Name":"Hawraa Rashidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnfXqnhjnxiVzwIzqwqkFNU9110Cm2o2ZtxwHhWm_d8FB4WA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVE this cafe! The staff is very attentive, kind and friendly, and the cafe is very cute and doesn’t get loud. The sandwich selection is also very good and all the veggie sandwich options are so tasty. The coffee (I get the Spanish coffee) and pastries are the best I’ve had in all of Vancouver! Usually at cafes pastries are so sweet you can’t taste what you’re eating, but not here! The pastries are the perfect amount of sweetness and there are many to choose from. My favorite is the blueberry almond croissant :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Henry Yim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyAeUh2CClKb5j6bPCfm4WTuRVeJI0Sj2rgBonFkle79yB2OU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Im my opinion, this is one of the best neighborhood cafe in the city area. It is quiet yet cozy . The  Club Panini with juicy chicken breast was delicious. My favorite place in Tri-Cities area for hangout on weekends or a sunny afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfxZD9wRETihmfUARtoMUNVjOP0bKFUmtU-uAU&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2023-6-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paul Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5lxnU3YfG8x9qJBbP15A_fXhwtTX1HkK0tPiOpx4539Uefw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tried this place when I first moved to the area and thought it was decent.

This is my second time ordering here.  I ordered a well done pizza, got a undercooked one.    You can tell by the colour of the dough above the base of the pizza.     It was the most floppy pizza I've ever seen.    I'd rather order Domino's, at least it's always cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpwWEQDU-rXFFvPCiB55GHYGOK1BiFjOQiHdhC&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Tyso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-PMAamIzccUC1PqMGbnx_ywowjHedHr-jT-4dCeppN2zSweu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decided to give it a try because I was in the area and dang, their pizza rocks. The ingredients are super high-quality, the crust is delicious and the sesame seeds. Well, every pizza crust should have sesame seeds. A killer deal for a large two topping for 13.99.
Keep up the great work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXMGW_bqbNKpuhoM6CALD5oiX9seqYeq6ntrtx&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Heather Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-FjuL-J5usI3tdhAx0shsC7MZVKxHrBgw_A8y0ONGYLmhjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good pizza! Better than any of the big chain restaurants that is for sure!

Lots of toppings and nice amount and flavoured sauce. We ordered 2 gluten free pizzas - it was my first time trying gluten free pizza so I have nothing to compare it too; looked thin but maybe that’s normal?

They were running a bit behind, but I’m guessing it’s just because they just opened. The staff is very polite, and some of their pick up deals are insane. They are also open late which is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv2M3Hi0AT-zYJtbGpcpIchJUzBFA6lxcGH1qf&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-2-4"},{"Name":"Vimmi Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAuj0mWs9v0DtwLOyoLGiNRGr_AjmgYpm32RVSrAqlaydz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first time trying Red Swan. It wasn’t overly impressive. Just mediocre. The toppings especially mushrooms were scarce. Q","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkqR6YQlkSflOtk9-VMNz3lj9XkGQDbuVCVgCC&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only have got 1 pizza from this location. Staff are very friendly, there are some tables and chairs inside to sit down and eat. It's definitely a happening vibe with the music, the facilities are new and very clean! The pizza was ok, I got a spicy pierogi, but it's definitely not on the spicy side, tho. I think banana peppers would be a good add to the topings... just my opinion. Will definitely be back to try other pizzas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN85oGfzEcTJV1ZmuG6fPGiVMy_RlD0Kbs7jG8P&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Joseph Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk_ILL6lzJT19B32s4QofXWam1Q3xrQ9wM4qN1TEB1_CFfyjY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I didn't know this pizza place was opened until today. Ordered a personal 8" pizza with Alfredo Chicken Bacon topping (there are 41 choices to pick). It requires 15 - 20 minutes to wait. I lost track of the time but it is not too long and when my pizza arrives, WOW! It is the best in town no doubt. The sesame crust is phenomenal, it is cripsy and tendered, the topping is full, all I can say this pizza is fresh and excellent. I also ordered a regular size wedges. It is very so tasty that the restaurant next door cannot compete. I wish to finish it but the portion of the wedges is big. I am going to try again to see if they are going to maintain the standard. Further, the staff is very courteous and friendly. The interior of the restaurant is clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkT8z6mV57KWYaPEoh1lMS3JkDEjbEMPrAFExN&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Arjun Suresh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEpJoyxT6YA-E54KtAWnbG_xqHyiwWeMNVg-d8SkVDMsUSXZyK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Red Swan Pizza and it was hands down the best pizza experience I've ever had! The crust is perfectly crispy, the sauce rich and flavorful, and the toppings are fresh.

This exceeded all my expectations. Whether you're a pizza connoisseur or just looking for a great meal, this place is a must-visit. I can't wait to return and try more of their amazing menu. Highly recommended! 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashish Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP1lm96XEfH5oggDIqnPQ0PW8yNitVv1eEAHR2soD7K03hbZs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trying second time newly opened restaurant in town! friendly staff and verity of items to choose. ordered tandoori chicken pizza, wings and potato wedges. everything was delicious, wedges cook perfectly with nice seasoning and wings was one of the best that I ever had, with tender and right amount of seasoning. Definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGsI5PhjPMmi1ozy65sYbVHV1MEuY9W2qSbRQ&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-1-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"gabriel rodriguez soriano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtIcieMMHZ1tIC8EBnBnWbl8mCjCeHke0sVurmm6srUVAi5_z2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food: Amazing, it's truly Peruvian cuisine, good ingredients are fresh, and the sauces were better than expected.

Service: perfect! Pierna is amazing really good service People are warm as South America!

Atmosphere: it has music, it's a comfortable space!
Pd: make a reservation or you will be eating in the bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyYqurpmopNHJgaVEsYF-Ha3u_8yV2tTrxicHW&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Shervin A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZOMdYbI9ZUAaQBsupnxEnEAdA_Y91VH6canuFFoPrrYE1ZDuq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here with my wife and mother in law for dinner. Had a really great meal experience! The food is delicious and the staff are super nice. We found out that our waitress was the daughter of the owner! It’s nice to see a small family run restaurant like this. She was also very helpful with explaining the menus and even packing our leftovers so nicely!

The food is great! Really enjoyed every dish we ordered! Highly recommend giving them a go! Try something different, something new! And everything delicious!

Only negative thing I’d say is that I wish the meal could have been spaced out a little better. We still had our few appetizers nearly full but the main courses came out. Timing could have been better there but regardless we had a good impression and enjoyed our meal and time there.

It would be great if one day they could perhaps have live music on the weekends, get a taste of Peru and also a better sense of Peruvian music :)

Hope to go back here soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhKDOIGJboy2m7aVeiJIWmZeegR8vn6z8Dakz-&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Mei Louis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgXRRaGeGHZwDQ3Cd4BP54rgwmhE9FWdhKccUqwHk97sb73g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a gem in Peruvian cuisine. Beyond words in describing how delicious the mixed seafood cerviche, squid pasta and the cake dessert was.  My first time savoring Peruvian cuisine and I am wowed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2NqAvO3Vx3n8oAO5cFgy-JuvxdvlY0LtmgSlm&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Knycole Mendoza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVug_Jq1sRAiJuc8AOtaxescVtGu3yo-S2l-wq1OPUjtj_ayWTP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying Peruvian food in Vancouver, and I was thoroughly impressed. The restaurant is excellent, with outstanding service. The staff took the time to explain the dishes and introduce each one to us, which made the experience even better. I highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmADtHZ50NogU9sAtoUFYODx08QDscE1xNzDjQ&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Chelsea Woolman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAh3V-DCTNjhEJF6vfNeM0cXvTrQg_2QRoVul5HUQYHltz2cO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You will not find better Peruvian food in all of Vancouver! Every dish was beautifully plated and every bite was tastier than the last. A homemade comfort feel combined with a fine dining presentation and a welcoming staff. I’d argue this is the best restaurant in all of Pitt Meadows and Maple Ridge! Will definitely be coming back to try out the rest of the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBtCtUgHTuB6ENBAYXN8r-fXxYNqAiXM9mS0l8&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Carla Cabrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyAMgtnaFupCyPAv17OwvwftYUJ_kVL13H0OIF7_nMrISRiNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best peruvian restaurant ever in BC! I have gone to this place twice so far, and both times, it has not disappointed me. As a peruvian born, I must say this restaurant has the very traditional and authentic flavor of peruvian food. During my 5 years living here,  this is the only restaurant where I could feel it. The outstanding and remarkable dishes are the causa tasting and lomo saltado, which are perfectly cooked. Also, the fish ceviche was delicious. I was so surprised how the chicha morada is well done, you can feel the real purple corn flavor mixed with the cinnamon and the right level of sweetness. The ingredients are fresh, the dishes have the right amount of portion, prices are ok, the staff is friendly, and it is super worth it. The first time I went with my husband was for lunch and he enjoyed it, he was the only one who tried the dessert (lucuma tres leches) cause I did not have any more room, he liked it everything. The second time, I went with a friend who never tried before peruvian food, and she loved it. I would definitely try to go again and get other dishes from the menu. Sadly, I live far, and it's not that easy. Congratulations to the chef and keep going like this. You are doing pretty well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkIIXCpAYcV0xJ2Fs4LroAYoOvQOezD2RL3pcI&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Jennifer Hewitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeARkJuhsN83JqTzkIQifstAKYZMBmnflS4s6Fcqxmgf3UovtWEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for the first time on date night. Was super impressed with the variety of new (to me) ingredients that came from Peru.
The purple corn drink was both delicious and unique. Loved the ceviche flavours. The two of us shared 2 appetizers and 1 main and still ended up taking food home.
The service was warm and friendly. Excited to go back and try more of the menu especially desert!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP49oh54vQFRTYsxfyUI_f_nkHqdJ2RW8rvXsqF&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Anggela Moscoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7IItvEjl4IvWBItKjK6O4o3w5RJhV5-_Wvcu1Or2SJq_FQu31=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG, this place truly captures the essence of Peru! The food was exceptionally tasty and fresh, transporting us straight to Peru with every bite. We were also delighted by the outstanding service. Grecia, our server, was incredibly friendly, attentive, and made our experience even more enjoyable. Without a doubt, this is the best Peruvian restaurant in BC. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9DmUksCFJsH4W3bDRQPUSCqbXhxVM-CNEZwNG&fid=0x0:0x660f15c4ca29c020"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jordan Davies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-3wAFaxMKafYFUC2ETOmJJcLJVib91VqZceyCTqLqOUeICg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered this burger with only tomato mayo and onions , they put a tomato with the core still in it on the burger , they put ketchup mustard and lettuce. I called and explained they didn’t make my burger like I had ordered. They didn’t even offer to make me a new one, I threw it out as I don’t like these toppings waste of money with terrible customer service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtWpHEzOvVp32uIKXgTFCLpaZNAzg26pzUdDgd&fid=0x0:0x2a0d4c7cd55c360b"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Holly Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDTyWnxQ8Ar4m7jgQ2lfL4Nc5PFxWi6Nat4UGeJTAo1rnuiGLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't seen this place full yet, but they surely know how to make their burgers! They keep their food quality at high standards. Those patties were plump and juicy. Cooked all the way through.  A bite got me so much juice from the meat. Lettuce was fresh and well stacked. I would come here for some high quality burger over any other fancy restaurant who charges $20 with lower quality. By far my favorite go-to place when I crave for good quality burger.
Forgot to take picture because I was busy digging in...🫢 🍔🍔🍔🍟🥤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alba Bb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiCJnaLP0VJ2znzj5kXM-jXCt_67iJuibUtYkUwy-theElZxtH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place always deliver great , fresh and tasty burgers 🍔 I don’t know why there isn’t a line up outside the door all the way to superstore!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrvkKaO7Mbi830MTxTcXhlMRphQKsPPr_B4six&fid=0x0:0x2a0d4c7cd55c360b"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Ari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVZFr2lOsm-1DRRKbAML3xGYmN4IFUhEIuuxxMwCh-Sc_HMlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in for a quick burger and got exactly that. Took only a couple of minutes for a good veggie burger. I can't speak to how their beef is, but I was very satisfied with what I ordered.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx6YpxAAaIZ7Cj9PSMphfRQfkkw46YLaNdEeYIQOo495lpxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were greeted as we walked in the door and again as we ordered. Our burgers came quickly and were well presented. My son had the two pattied Canuck. I had the Frank. It was delicious. It was also the hottest temperature I've ever had a burger. I eat a little slow, so it was still very warm on my last bite.
This was our first visit to this location. Probably one of the better burgers I've had, in a long history of eating burgers.
Friendly service and the place was clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Furo Ciousd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW851IfOkxNRj4Tu5eOG9ui3_h-u_5dQabvZTE_4ywXIlDaGsdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Wiped down our table ourself, hallway to rest room looks like its not seen a washcloth in a min. Seems they only had 2 people working today.

Was excited by the menu photo - didn't live up to the picture. The egg was overdone and rubbery sat on the bottom of the bun. So no egg yolk breaking over my patty. The onions were maybe 5 or 6 small strips very overdone /dehydrated - not caramelized like I thought they'd be. Meat was gray throughout, not seasoned and tasted like it had been frozen.

Daughter said her burger had no flavor /  tasted like chicken nuggets.

Fries had not been seasoned and of course they have no salt or pepper at the table.

For 1 meal (pawer and fries + fountain drink) 1 burger and 1 strawberry shake we paid $39

We ate our meal and thanked the staff but what a weird burger experience. Defs doesn't live up to their self proclaimed burger of the year comments. If you're driving and hungry for a burger, Fatburger isn't far. And offers a never frozen smash burger that is far better. And the price points about the same for more food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy9O2_WOvg3o9w_RP8SMo9G28mzj0DPycPhNwu&fid=0x0:0x2a0d4c7cd55c360b"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Jp Bridges","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUE-VGd_Of_sr_ZNGbCSFaeu2naTJ3qe6Cw8Yu__J2QVvUOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They closed at 8:00 pm one night, I went there at 7:35 PM and they wouldn’t let me in .. said they were closed and just shooed me away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO_Cn0Nx2UYdrEQGfwe76h8q4pLaiOJ4jcYzi2&fid=0x0:0x2a0d4c7cd55c360b"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"DAN NOU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpYtBF7XkEge_dJaW_6qxQAvx0BMjlWIVs-s1F2tNjt9jcI0CG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decided to try this location out and for $20 you get a bacon, fried onion cheese burger with yam fries and a drink.  The burger wasn’t juicy as it should be for this price point and thought there should have been more patty as well.  Overall it tasted alright.

The establishment was clean  and the service was good.  Would I go back?  Maybe to try another intel on the menu but would not order the same as before.
M8TRIX5 Rating scale
Atmosphere/Ambiance👍👍👍👍
Cleanliness👍👍👍👍
Service👍👍👍👍👍
Food👍👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMwFxYbkkIRM1_foLcPb7WxQSpe2OP7LIBQJ7Y&fid=0x0:0x2a0d4c7cd55c360b"],"When":"2019-7-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Afsana Tabibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzp6b-InW6PAK15vNh9v8ga8zbWmNjzR0Dlq305Lj5B3Ej-HpL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this intimate Mexican joint! It felt authentic. I loved the food and the service was wonderful!!! I'll definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_IDm6RJc4ZxKv4iWW3o6QjBc4F_L83m3-5h2J&fid=0x0:0x35b7098d30e05281"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The nachos were good because they added pickled onions and house made beans. The steak taco was good but I highly recommend the beef tongue taco. It’s extremely soft and really juicy and has a nice beefy flavour. I’ve been to a few taco places in the lower mainland but this is the first time I’ve seen beef tongue on a menu. Also the fresh made churros were really really good, drizzled with house made caramel. They also had Mexican Coca-Cola! Staff were very friendly and it was very clean inside. Only issue I had was the heat was not on and was very cold inside. A lot of people came and picked up orders for take out. Would come here again in the warmer months.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXJfM9n5_kmoKew-Qc64R5cgomS2Z8b9eBtTj0&fid=0x0:0x35b7098d30e05281"],"When":"2022-1-3"},{"Name":"John M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWItgijJKwgA0f52g38y2veJk-Ddfx32Y6n5pRa8jqM3m7RR0lStA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Mexican food. Family run business and very friendly service. Food is authentic and fantastic! Highly recommend their food.

I feel the decor could do more with some sprucing up for a more authentic vibe.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maya Schouten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO9x8oFl1z-2ncMLmfWu71Y053fpa-t4BYxDTv_0_AzOsAsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our number one choice for Mexican. Their food is SUPERB, full of flavour and clearly cooked with fresh ingredients and a whole lot of love. This is the place to get delicious Mexican food. My personal favourite dish is their Poco Burrito.

Flavours 5/5
Atmosphere 5/5 (love their decor and music)
Service 6/5 (they can’t be beat — so friendly!)
Value 5/5
Cleanliness 5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgEF74v8b2K_CaRidiOgZxy3dzzz1M1fPTsNo&fid=0x0:0x35b7098d30e05281"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Tyso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-PMAamIzccUC1PqMGbnx_ywowjHedHr-jT-4dCeppN2zSweu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy I tried Si Senior. Great Mexican food is almost impossible to find here in the lower mainland, however just had their Carnitas burrito and I can say that it's fantastic. Pricing I feel, is spot on as 👌 All the fresh ingredients are balanced really well and it's not overly riced like a lot of other burritos out there. The owner's a cool guy, too. This will definitely be a regular destination for me.
Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ravi BHINDI PREC - REALTOR in Surrey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiSKObZ0-p7PUs7tzaYHb29Zv--5OieRpSebcMz_TG7SwFBts1Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Si Senior Machete is an absolute gem nestled in the heart of Maple Ridge, and it's safe to say that my recent dining experience there was nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment I stepped through the door, I was greeted with warm smiles and the enticing aromas of authentic Mexican cuisine. Si Senior Machete has truly mastered the art of bringing the vibrant flavors of Mexico to life.

The ambiance of the restaurant is both lively and inviting, with vibrant décor and a cheerful atmosphere that immediately sets the stage for a memorable dining experience. The staff at Si Senior Machete are incredibly friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable. They were more than happy to offer recommendations and share their passion for Mexican cuisine, which added an extra touch of authenticity to the evening.

Let's talk about the food, because it is undoubtedly the star of the show at Si Senior Machete. The menu is a culinary journey through Mexico, featuring a wide range of traditional dishes that cater to all palates. Whether you're a fan of zesty tacos, rich enchiladas, or sizzling fajitas, Si Senior Machete has something to satisfy every craving.

I had the pleasure of trying their signature dish, the Machete, and it was a revelation. The Machete is a mouthwatering combination of marinated grilled steak, sautéed peppers and onions, topped with melted cheese, all served on a freshly baked tortilla. The flavors melded together perfectly, and every bite was an explosion of savory goodness.

The attention to detail in the presentation of each dish was truly impressive. The vibrant colors and artful plating made the food look almost too good to eat. But once I took that first bite, I was transported to the streets of Mexico, where every flavor seemed to come alive.

To accompany my meal, I indulged in a refreshing margarita from their extensive drink menu. The margarita was expertly crafted, striking the perfect balance between tangy and sweet. It complemented the flavors of the food beautifully and added an extra layer of enjoyment to the overall dining experience.

In addition to the exceptional food and drinks, Si Senior Machete also offers great value for the quality of the experience. The portion sizes were generous, ensuring that no one left the table unsatisfied. The prices were reasonable, especially considering the fresh ingredients and the care that goes into every dish.

Whether you're looking for a romantic dinner for two or a lively gathering with friends, Si Senior Machete is the place to be. It's a culinary adventure that will transport your taste buds to Mexico and leave you craving more. With its warm atmosphere, attentive service, and mouthwatering cuisine, Si Senior Machete has earned its place as a must-try Mexican restaurant in Maple Ridge.

In conclusion, if you're in the mood for an unforgettable dining experience filled with the vibrant flavors of Mexico, look no further than Si Senior Machete. Your taste buds will thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSyOo1YJdcn2c1kX9hL1DoxbeuGUN_ZXvVPPTF&fid=0x0:0x35b7098d30e05281"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Si Senor is there for those who know but after my first time there I want to spread the good word.

There is too many terrible chain owned burritos / taco joints in Maple Ridge that don’t hold a candle to the food here, and for a competitive price too, which i’d be willing to pay more for to be honest.

The folks who work here make you feel at home and the food is made with the same heart.

Bring some friends, and enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9usDiRLRxv3hdmq1iWSCSVbe83SMYzQN-qme0&fid=0x0:0x35b7098d30e05281"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Checked the menu for a good Mexican margarita(they didn’t serve alcohol) but that’s ok.
We had the flautas to start, they were good. I ordered the enchiladas, was unable to finish mine but also wanted the for later. They were very delicious by the way, would suggest a little more crispy with more cheese.
We ordered churros but decided to take them to go, the delicious caramel sauce should be served on the side as a dip. The churros were warm and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIBtvbTNi6lF00nFNQJ9ANEvYRr1xJI3BttBcH&fid=0x0:0x35b7098d30e05281"],"When":"2023-9-15"}]

It's a small, cozy little place that's kept clean.\nWe got the half\u0026half chicken. If you get sides with it, you could easily feed a family of 4. My husband likes the sweet flavors and I enjoy spicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsKojRgMaIIBVNY7PaqCL1qEXbbKBJb8M3FzmZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally a hidden gem! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maddie Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYQL8qAGmTqshoOvCaBdSsq6642zngm2cAUSDTjLzVVtrLpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This family owned business offered a variety of delicious foods to choose from. Each one were super tasty and I love that they can customize too based to your preference or remove ingredients that will cause allergies. There are many vegan/vegetarian options. The servers and the owner were very attentive to our needs and came to often us ask if we need anything else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLndGC3GHhppjePZ5bsHgfypqV-1J8mP1GoutX&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mitsuba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPTokkJ7B-7PXzC1asSVZYKNDX01MAmrvmPdKoBlxIra8E3U0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here for lunch with my friend. We ordered a veg platter and a meat platter, and finished off with a slice of salted caramel cheesecake. Food was delicious, but lacking one star due to ordering a 5/10 spice level and the food was definitely lacking spice.
Overall good experience and friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOxldDBLIOnjCpUtt4AhbxsCu_TWic2FxZ8d4E&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-2-16"},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am not the biggest cheesecake lover but kept hearing great reviews about the cheesecake at GM so I finally went to try. The cheesecake was absolutely delicious. The texture and flavours were perfect. 1 slice is $10 and a whole cheesecake is $65. The lovely and friendly owner said that with 24-48 hrs notice they can fill your custom flavor order. We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3JUPV3ePj8FKBEXmBUjWRO3l_-1iS54YfLSrF&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Laura Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYZmTmHFFXOkGtfdW2Ry40xOSRalp27hpu_nLOavLst35yPmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today was my husband’s birthday and by the time dinner rolled around I was too tired to cook (throwing 3 parties in a month is fun but exhausting) so I decided to order out. My daughter has severe allergies and so I called GM and asked about some dairy AND coconut free dishes. With a solid option in hand I looked on the DoorDash menu and couldn’t find it. So I chose something that sounded allergen free and left a note. When my food arrived everything was  there but they had also included a free dairy/coconut free dish for my daughter that was unexpected, delicious and the random act of kindness my heart needed. Thanks GM for going out of your way to bless our family and gift my daughter with food options - it can be hard as a 7 year old to constantly hear “sorry, you can’t have that.”

Not pictured is the garlic naan bread - so delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfzohkWzevQtdqmGpaHJk-7AY0p5daZkiSshoR&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Phil Rumming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI8F-4PSRI8O1IIK_Whhw86Nv8AmAOyTVmk8Hdizbg38WBDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service. I had Butter Chicken (a large serving, enough for 2 at least) along with naan bread and basmati rice: all were very good with an Indian Kingfisher beer. This was followed by an slice (huge!) of delicious eggnog cheese cake and an 'Indian' coffee. They have a large variety of cheese cake flavors to choose from.   Looking forward to future visits.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXniLjCJHKt8Gj17xGqax1pu33ZsNusLLpEEFXEep3h7_9bcNk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I already know this will go against the grain since this place has always been very good and very popular as well as very expensive. Recently we ordered take out from there, typically butter chicken, naan bread and rice. We also ordered one samosa of each flavour. I’m not sure what happened to our food but it was the worse, least tasting butter chicken I had ever had, actually despicable. You spend a fortune on a meal thinking you’re paying a little more but never expecting to get the tasteless slop we ended up with, never again. On the other hand, the samosas were on point!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came for Sunday brunch as it’s one of the only places that allows minors!
The breakfast special was $6! You can’t go wrong. The service was great and overall a great way to start our Sunday.

Back at the Townhall for the long weekend and a tip - don’t come at opening! It’s a bit chaotic getting everyone seated and naturally service was slower, people seated much later getting food and drinks before us 🤯
Not a deal breaker but now we know and we will be back … just not at 10am!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw0OJNAXEZGwg3yhbufhC-2Nh0gbUOrz5_VSRD&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Max Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOIlU5nJBhhMt4LhC3zOj5-erzOKLJv2GOSpcFK4XvUCtyZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Rating: ★★★☆
The special rate for brunch menu was very traditional and simple: sausages, bacon, eggs, toast, and coffee. However, the price was incredibly affordable. If you’re not picky about the variety, this place is a decent choice for something budget-friendly. That said, for such a simple breakfast, you could probably save more by just making it at home, especially if you’re not after the “dining-out” atmosphere.

As for Town Hall, their quality isn’t what it used to be. That said, their Thursday Karaoke Night and 50¢ Wings special are quite tempting. I might give it another shot—it’s hard to pass up deals like that. Overall, nothing too impressive, but the price and vibe are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX1ObEQwhpfTOYg213TrKNo9zbVkalyl0OexsK&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fantastic deal for brunch in a warm, welcoming space. There's plenty of room for groups, and there are a number of tables of you're hoping to catch up with a friend or host a business meeting.

When you arrive, head upstairs to the dining room. There's an elevator and washrooms available by the bar.

Reservations are a good idea, but not required. With our reservation for 2, we were seated by a cozy fire. Perfect start to brunch.

The house special for brunch is $5.99 for 2 free run eggs, 2 pieces of bacon or sausage, toast and Yukon gold home fries. Options for toast today were white, brown or sourdough.

The food was fresh, hot and not greasy. It was seasoned well, and I didn't feel exhausted or heavy after the meal.

We also ordered Caesars ($5) and there were Mimosas available ($4).

On another visit, we ordered the Stack-O-Donuts ($12) and they were delicious. Hot and tender mini donuts covered in cinnamon sugar. They're perfect for sharing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtUGZz9klf5AP6Pb8Vfr9JbpPoBhrZ4CtIWwHF&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Lisa Simmons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUCbM7Sv-M1pAApVUnGKleUtAL_QtjEhlmjRjJZl7LJUXJqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was there on a Monday for the lunch time. Very quiet. Service was great. Nice varied menu. Good specials. Like the location because you can see the mountains from the windows. Great fireplace.

10 October 2024

Had the Chicken corn chowder and the crispy fried brussel sprouts. Hubby had the chicken wings. All great. The chowder does have some medium heat, just an FYI. Loved the sprouts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwsp10gLTRz3ZCyazKQVsGCch_vr2YqlJpl3kL&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Sherri L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtxbJ9ZXtI9Mw2OYEesfB51_kfb1UBrxuZDdU5-5GETSdjGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new Thursday wing night is really good. The wings are nice and crispy even with sauce on them. The strawberry smash drink was really good. The service was also excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSseXgXfvmnT42ylB7S0YaME7fPPDccER1pg4v&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Stuart Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMJR3m2m3b3A-TFm1gu2Ve7-gZIHc-nb8uoyhBCkgGuF6K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here to check out the Monday appetizers special and did not disappointed.
Great foods for great values.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHQVdyeI9qjJ-qFDnrf-YpfTT3ZWVHo1dpDqw&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not recommended. Food takes forever to be served. To wait for ages on a chicken tenders and tater tots order, is not worth the wait. Restaurant was not even busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhNFyn-mIjXr-bPjXP_ZsHDKA89dQJ6iz9cMw&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Fredrick Zoller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL01F2QlXvuCUnZwPCtofa0r29cQHvBmtrY6v5OjsG39ImLPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in on a Saturday night, so it was quite busy. The staff were friendly but it took a while to get the food and drinks we ordered. The spicy Hawaiian pizza actually had a bit of spice to it, and the dough was really well cooked. Their Caesar drinks are very good, would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxAoT7B9opfIQfCN1R2ouw6e3Bw8rSWrUm7C17&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2023-9-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anil Bhatia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAN2ffCY1SkjVxbZuURveOrZuELXir09djxLgAt1SntGW-fd3YKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at “Austin Fish & Chips” and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm smile and friendly service. The atmosphere was inviting and comfortable, perfect for a relaxing meal.
But the highlight of my visit was undoubtedly the fish and chips. They were, hands down, the best I have ever tasted! The fish was incredibly fresh, perfectly crispy on the outside, and tender on the inside. The chips were golden and seasoned to perfection.
What made the visit even more memorable was the outstanding customer service. Cindy, the owner, was particularly helpful and courteous. She went above and beyond to ensure that every guest felt welcome and well taken care of. Her genuine care for her customers truly sets this place apart.
If you're in the mood for some top-notch fish and chips served with a side of excellent service, this is the place to go. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCpjvEi-hvQlaITB3FFdaH0n-RJhkt_Yzo3kyE&fid=0x0:0x776a78d56e5cc479"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Aleena Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDm4yD1FovhioZIZXirV7sr90bwxglobaQh9mIT5nGudknS64cOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely place and I'm so so so glad I stumbled upon it! Everyone is so nice and they were happy to comply with small requests such as getting our drinks as the food arrived instead of immediately! The portions were a lot bigger than I originally anticipated which was a delight for the reasonable price. I almost couldn't finish what I ordered!

I'm a huge fan of the coleslaw (it was super fresh and crisp) and it paired perfectly with the fish. I've taken the time to try out all of the different kinds of fish offered and my personal favorite is wild cod! It was soft and flavorful, with a hint of salt. On my last visit, I tried out the banana fritters and they were super delicious!

It's an awesome place (^~^)/! Be sure to check it out if you're ever craving fish and chips in this area! Your taste buds will thank you 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN66p-RBmSvEjHx2Uq2RsRRmJxcmre5Iei_GIur&fid=0x0:0x776a78d56e5cc479"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Esther K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0VMeE68ciX-ROiPKiHodeYFNny04LazYV3vecTjET-B9Nq37e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time here.  I had the halibut and chips.  The fish was PERFECTION. perfectly fried and not too much batter. Also the best coleslaw I’ve had in a while.  The staff were very friendly, feels very much like a the kind of neighbourhood  restaurant where the staff care about you.  I was surprisingly impressed by the attention of the staff on greeting and saying goodbye to each customer group, and how the helped customers with mobility issues.
I will come again and look forward to trying the chowder, pickles, and mushy peas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFE7JoynhRDgkUbGlqKx1odbVzIpLEkc1GK_Zpg55EJNJYzJKX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As we were looking through the menu outside the owner opened the front door and invited us in. She was very friendly and outgoing and extended a warm greeting to our party.

As it was Tuesday night and we were four seniors we took advantage of the all you can eat seniors discount.

The service was top notch with the young man who came and gave us water and cutlery. He was polite and courteous.

Now the big finish… the fish was incredible. The portions were large and well cooked with the amazing batter. It came fairly quick with endless tartar sauce. It was so good I had two more pieces.

The owner who invited us in came by and chatted with us a few times. Her whole family are apart of this gem of a find.

I highly recommend Austin Fish and Chips in Pitt Meadows. You won’t be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Virginia Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlA9AASKEypIRIjuG-hqK-8_NxPyYg8SJgjDogiBw51rsrRMwm2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing fish & chips! Owner very friendly and prices are reasonable.  Their banana fritters are delicious 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO2RWWH8VME88gLbpQLXWfIZAr0-h48I2JGPN3&fid=0x0:0x776a78d56e5cc479"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Mo W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjCDhIOGWx7uqwBxI_-X79JkYoHmAozfYOjn0TYRazXUyF1eR6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the fish and chips at Austin Fish and Chips, and it was fantastic! The fish was perfectly crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, with a light batter that didn't overpower the flavor. The chips were golden and fluffy, just how I like them. The portion size was generous, and it came with a side of tartar sauce that complemented the dish perfectly. Overall, it was a delicious meal, and I can't wait to go back for more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmizvnVAEdIOn6DL2blUWsdiPhkpvSH_QunCuEsfl5DjbUAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always pass by when I go to my office. Recently I bring my family over. The waiters and owners are very nice with smile all the time. The fish and chip are tasty and crispy. So good will go back for SURE!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1J0kuvtL3zFCiIz-A6TV-S2cCp98ohc1YEgMo&fid=0x0:0x776a78d56e5cc479"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Colin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6CBOsJ6Suj1cSPfUkBZqyRYvpQaV7QWYQf7U-cZTzI7jIlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time back since establishment went under new management.
We were promptly greeted and seated upon entering.
We ordered the Wild cod and chips.
Our order arrived quickly and hot!
The coating on the fish was thin, crispy and the fish was fresh.
No old fish smell.
The fries were golden brown and not over cooked or reheated.
Our server returned a few minutes later to inquire how or meal was.
Overall we were very happy with our experience and will be going back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOl5xPdr4_Gy18WvBhEHxE280WykxI9mK2Sqac&fid=0x0:0x776a78d56e5cc479"],"When":"2023-12-1"}]
