user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melissa Podeszwa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXH8wZlaTQYYVgu_4o3fku5tEdCgLkPWHJC4H70cipGFVmezpaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our first time and De Dutch didn’t disappoint. Our server was the sweetest, so helpful in making our choices with the menu. Their special Dutch pancakes (I can’t spell the name) were SO tasty. Could have been checked on a couple more times but when she was around our server was outstanding. The eggs Benny were prepared as requested  and just the right amount to bring a little home for later. We added Nutella to the banana and strawberry order, perfect addition—they should add it to the list. We will definitely plan to include De Dutch on our future trips to BC!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvpeAFJXuAE0Cnl9JLinRv0gSXt2mUpc25-9K8&fid=0x0:0xd538504bf0fe9fa1"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"LifewithTosin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUU2Jn1mF7Q9mrdolXOXRqLqXIguSKcW4osa8ruFJytk_fbC4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was there not too long with my 3 kids for breakfast, we were left unattended for like 10minutes, the staffs were passing by without acknowledging us, I understand that you might be busy, but cleaning the tables and letting us know that you will be with us shortly would help, no hello, no acknowledgement. I had to leave when my daughter noticed we were neglected and went somewhere else with great service.
So shameful","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"corbin croney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3ABu0kfRMx6ee7BRhw8inZ8kUf8zonsK5yzb6lhPnPy_EQ2WT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a lovely late morning date and was greeted by the lovely Emma. It wasn’t overly busy but definitely busy enough for only one person. She did absolutely amazing especially for being the only server at the time. Everything was very quick, tasted delicious and no wait times at all. Seems like a very hardworking and very kind girl. 5 stars over the top, would absolutely recommend. Thank you, Emma.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jam I am","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyrouZBkOM2ZZWfafmD0vlQIU8tX214ZRCbkrXw8EgpFMSJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great breakfast at De Dutch this morning. Our server was Ema, who provided us with amazing service  .I'm pretty picky about the way my eggs were cooked and the cooks did a great job.
Good food & service.....way to go.
We'll be back for sure","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Skye Annderson Brook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXCLmKkdO7Mvmd70zV2r8i_5vbh4aDXVp3RfbkBxof-Q5onw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went to DeDutch this past weekend as a party of four. Two of which were family members from out of town that we recommended this spot to, because usually it’s good.
However, this trip left us feeling disappointed.
Upon entering the restaurant, there was no hostess around so we waited for about 10 minutes until someone noticed and we got seated. We were given menus but not approached by our waitress for another 10 minutes. We kept it simple— ice waters, a coffee, a juice and a hot chocolate without whipped cream. Again, we waited an additional 10 minutes, before the waitress came back missing a majority of the order. The waters were missing and the hot chocolate contained whipped cream— which was asked not to be put on. The waitress instead of simply saying I made a mistake, just proceeded to say we spoke incorrectly and she was just following what was asked.

Another few minutes, waters came out and so did the next hot chocolate, by a different waitress. The hot chocolate was terrible— hardly any actual chocolate in it and mostly lukewarm water. Had to flag down our waitress who seemed to be avoiding our table, and again didn’t address the mistake, just proceeded to call it ‘odd’. So, gave up on that beverage and ordered another different one.

Food came out and was decent— though not worth the price. The bacon was poorly cooked and hardly edible, the potatoes were bland, and the coffee wasn’t great.

All in all, the lesson learned from this would be to pay more attention to your customers, specially when an allergen is mentioned, and apologize for any mistakes made instead of making it a big deal.

Would think twice about coming back to this particular DeDutch. 😕","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N nova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVwkmAucI_zKw-myeb5xINxQiGjdUygLuG8oftGwvM-DLxuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The pancake (pancake comes with sausage, bacon, eggs, ham, and hash browns). One of the hams had an unusual taste, which unfortunately caused me an upset stomach. This was the only food I consumed for the entire day, and it caused diarrhea. Furthermore, the staff did not give us enough attention, as no one came to inquire about our meal and our coffee remained empty for an extended period. Despite these issues, I decided to leave a 15% tip, primarily due to the friendly and cheerful service provided by the lady in the red shirt who brought us our food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgINrVjPus7X2E5FDloeNKBJfACcjf_BcP1snX&fid=0x0:0xd538504bf0fe9fa1"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Catherine Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgu5jEuZoVvk541rDr20mH2M4gfzorSifSjd-rvRVfpaOGQCCvSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this brunch spot to anyone looking for good quality food and service. My husband and I tried their classic sweet pannenkoekens today and they were very delicious. Our server Emma was amazing and the restaurant was very clean and welcoming.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaded Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHRIJdkHY4xpStGqD0EzePZPrJnnN_cctFK8DxFwk-yX2c4ktu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went their for a birthday breakfast and first the coffee was cold, but the waitress returned with warm coffee quickly. The food was also cold and they suggested to remake it or warm it up. So we opted to warm it up and it was okay after that. Thats the reason for 3 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgXWofuLQKH9ZzJgAVFIduSONPOvlBnJwoF_y9&fid=0x0:0xd538504bf0fe9fa1"],"When":"2020-10-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jass Aulakh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbmM1j7u9yJwNXmQgnt0buVXOXW87adMfL7iNW6izsr0fEFNTy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Slice Above 👆🏻
Andiamo’s Pizza

If you're on the hunt for exceptional pizza, look no further than Andiamo’s. I recently indulged in three of their pizzas, and each one was a testament to their culinary expertise. The pizzas were not only delicious but also had a delightful melt-in-your-mouth quality that speaks to the care and quality of their ingredients.

The atmosphere at Andiamo’s is equally impressive. The restaurant is clean and well-maintained, reflecting a strong commitment to hygiene and customer satisfaction. Whether you're a local or just passing through, I highly recommend visiting Andiamo’s for an unforgettable pizza experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvFGwaJ6uD8jz60x_yAy2R_yPD1VniOFC-I96u&fid=0x0:0xc8d4236b2754cc49"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"George Coupland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzexTD97DVmEnAG3tKPMwmiKmCIZZIWriICj0VZoeP3VwSFEI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had heard that  Andiamos Pizza had been purchased by GM restaurant. I was hoping that the GM quality would have seeped over to the pizza but alas no.
I ordered the Andiamos Special and an Alfredo Chicken Pizza. The Andiamos Special didn’t look anything like the picture on their website. I have added a picture of the one on their website along with the actual pizza I received. It was supposed to have shrimp on it, there wasn’t any shrimp on it and it was terribly salty. The Alfredo was also horribly salty.
The one positive I will add is that the woman who served me was very friendly and pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_SYugk5LvqdIoqEhJWlQx-EnqQy7LmZZaFboA&fid=0x0:0xc8d4236b2754cc49"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Sandi Maki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItcaOKChuKmNvsvgz0cE7d6pyM9VQI0z2jx3OQNSSC9ZQP-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have been ordering from Andiamos for a long time and it was always good. Last time we ordered the pizza was disgusting and we ended up throwing it out. They use canned mushrooms not fresh, what they do to hide the lack of toppings they hide it under the cheese and the toppings are not cooked. When we called to complain they offered us a free pizza next time we ordered, Called a few months later to be told we waited to long and they would not honor their promise. Made all kinds of excuses. Needless to say we will never order from them again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Ballinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLD5a3B3-Ecgk2kT0trv96SQZurGDkcaK_Ugv4coToqzr4J1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered three of their specialty pizzas and they were loaded with cheese and toppings. When I picked them up, I was greeted by a very friendly lady, and my pizzas were nice and hot. They were delicious. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-cZ79vVwFEPuZ0jB7xl3YujoVxBK2BTnin4mf8s3bdVAog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not a complaint but information I wish I had known so I hadn't ordered. The lasagna was a good size portion with a good layer of cheese and a piece of garlic toast. BUT, though it looked like a classic lasagna, the flavours weren't Italian and it had some spice to it. I didn't enjoy it and only ate a little. We both were very disappointed. I'll have to try to mix it with pasta sauce and Italian seasonings to see if I can save it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cootsy Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXW7yU3MWvosAkJw22U9GvyXMv8HmPeuotrpOwu1E1X3C0dbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the baked lasagna with meat sauce & was not disappointed. Reminds me of the place I’d get pasta from back home. My only complaint is that I might gain back some of the weight I lost lol. And lucky for me, I just found my new pasta place & it’s near my work. Thank you so much for the amazing dinner & awesome service. I’ll be seeing you guys soon!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Nagy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5geYbrbW68XZnK-xVVCQbMsaaLeInjrHXcusvGMOmVsZcXLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried 10 pizza places in maple ridge and all agreed this one was the best so far! Soo much cheese. The large pizzas must weigh like 8-10lbs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nigel Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRcTfPJfWRiLcIzFsLQorBBJTnv5z6Li3pJEBTa1z8BoCjrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We go here for a great lasagne. Give the super-helpful crew a short heads-up and you can easily make "additions"!  Our favourite is the meaty tomato sauce with our chosen plusses of mushrooms, spinach and a pinch of chilli flakes. Large servings and garlic bread too. You won't be disappointed 👍👍","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Karen Rowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkxNCxvt79ifEHM7sVnF58Eb7gttmzYhtoqCyeAgIG1iDyCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Today my wife and I attended A\u0026W west Lougheed , I proceeded to tell the attended I had a coupon for two teen burger combos .at the price of 18.99 . when we got home I looked at the receipt and saw the attended charged us for two single combos at 13.99 each , there are no coupons for single teens, so I guess she did not even use our coupon. our meal should have cost us about $29 this would consist of two teen combos 18.99 , up grade one fry to onion rings $ 180, and two teen patties for the pups at $5.98 . We were charged 37.96, with the coupon. We are two old pensioners and can not afford to have such mistakes to occur . We will be very careful from now on, when ordering drive through at A\u0026W .Please be careful and check your receipt before you leave the parking lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJF5vWY-Wh-0xmdBoDPCCBTyVzK1RrVsZjfSDn1gW7RWYKR5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"A\u0026W has always been a dine out spot we looked forward to as it had been consistently good food. Unfortunately, after decades of dining at A\u0026W quality has deteriorated which, was punctuated with our most recent experience extremely disappointing . We ordered a Mama burger and Burger buddy. Surprisingly the size of burger were the same yet the Mama burger was $7 vs $4 for the Burger buddy. This sadly was not the worst of it; the Mama burger was almost completely absent of the condiments…\nThis is certainly not the standard or pride that A\u0026W underpins its advertising on…?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCoo8VhyBwi6jcx6YnxFzEfxVIF052SlFOZYin\u0026fid=0x0:0xee4809162bab10bc"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Derek Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaBRm-VY_m99UwZ6UwdvGjzB7nw1EejvhcMIUbGB5N2HHxrZpHjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Classic A\u0026W with friendly staff featuring a small outdoor seating area in front. We really enjoyed the crispy chicken buger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGsF6Stt2GXTAcZJL6EgXc3f0UtzS7Yapkr6-m\u0026fid=0x0:0xee4809162bab10bc"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Paige Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9dk-fdUxNlAh-v8t-nDfKi3e6rWnIFf9cKzN79eeD274eNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went on Oct 5th for a quick dinner between soccer games. The cashier was amazing (I wish I got her name). She was super helpful when my daughter wanted to order a build your own burger as hers has a few dietary restrictions and wanted to order herself. Service with a smile the entire time. At the end she made a point to give both kids root beer sucker's even though they are young teens and not little kids. It was such a nice treatment we are not used to in fast food. The restaurant was clean and had a great set up for getting food and where to put dishes after.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXCxWQNKWWz0yGDObF5fi9FKJRlT5tXEFM4e_nGjTOaOhGJ1c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mushroom mama and chicken burgers were good.  I did a mobile order and they didn’t add the cheese on my chicken burger.  Fries and rings were good.  All good was warm for a change.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tania Burgi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpi7NKlyqDEXOLRvBE3Dr7tmOG6VaYa2gOhM0xeer3UrvuAgE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So welcoming clean and bright. Staff are a DELIGHT and caring. Not your average fast food place - way above and beyond. Special thx to Elishba for connecting with me and making me feel welcome","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8SMb3mWn8X4NGNbczT3PTMXhp3vKcVv6UvB1BggVmR-n21IonXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for a quick lunch and wow, this fast food restaurant has by far the best service... Especially considering it was free root beer day.     The general manager walked around and encouraged the kids to grab coloring sheets and even offered to bring to us if they didn't want to walk to other side of restaurant.... Wow.  I've been to much fancier places and forced to give tips out with much less service and smiles!  Great job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynn Heffernan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoQybdaqEnaHotq6tBBP-Ni4YR4YD2g5SWouunInMW2GqPTv5Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really fresh toppings on the burger having an included a tomato, lettuce and onions on a teen burger. I don't remember getting all that before. The fries were nice and hot and the gravy was good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ana T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6qyNt5y_HddRrNE3HFvlLSKc1M3fIS2cKYSDXj52qO5dtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Jolly Coachman for the first time. I had an overall enjoyable experience and I highly recommend this local gem!

•VIBES/ATMOSPHERE
The atmosphere was laid back and the place has a fantastic old school pub feel (which is exactly the way I like a pub to be). They also have a lovely patio with some misty water spray to keep you cool in the summer. I didn’t sit on the patio, but it sure looked nice.

•SERVICE
The service was excellent. The waitress (the very tattooed young Asian lady) was fantastic. She was friendly, knowledgeable, attentive, super fast, and made me feel welcomed and comfortable. She checked on me the exact correct number of times (I get annoyed by waitresses who repeatedly pester, this one had good instincts and was on point). My order was taken immediately and my drink/food arrived fast. As a smoker who has no incentive to aimlessly hover in/around a pub with no smoking areas, speed of service is very important to me.

•DRINKS
They have a pretty extensive drink menu with lots of choices. The variety of cocktail choices impressed me as a cocktail drinker. I ordered the Blue Hawaiian. While it was more teal-green than blue and not as sweet as my sweet tooth alcohol taste desires, you couldn’t taste the alcohol but could feel it. And that is everything a successful cocktail should be. I will definitely have to be back to try more of their summer cocktails (and ask for them to be extra sweet!)

•FOOD
I noticed other people eating burgers and being the nosy follower that I sometimes can be, I thought I’d go for the burger special. But when the waitress said the burger is a regular burger, I decided to order the calamari instead (my burgers need to be irregular otherwise I’m bored, there’s a limit to my sheepish follower behaviour after all). The calamari was delicious! It was warm, fresh, crispy, flavourful and a large portion. The tomato & green onion salsa that came with it was sour and salty; tasty and refreshing. The sauce was also delicious, although if you dip every calamari piece, you will run out of sauce on your last 3 pieces. I recommend they add a tiny bit more sauce to ensure that all calamaris are successfully dipped. This calamari was the crispiest calamari I’ve ever had in my life, which was a pleasant surprise. Even the squeezed juice from my lemon and the tomato pieces didn’t and couldn’t make this calamari soggy. I bet you could pour buckets of water on this calamari and it wont lose its crunch. A waterproof non-soggy calamari. It seems I have searched my entire life for such a thing. And now I’ve finally found it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH4AERpkElu4yTZKq9vFJ3c1y1W2XvEbIAHOyN&fid=0x0:0xd08aec90d2675cc2"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Christopher Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcL5bNZ-lkkKT4gy1k5l3D2BvEp2MJobsZwK2jpBW_3saF1nbleg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place, really good food and service, plenty of options to eat and drink. Service was really good from Tim the bartender as the 3 of us sat at the bar be a use the place was packed.

There were reserved sections that were not getting used due to waitress shortage (2 on shift) so to not stretch the staff too thin, about 4 tables (not much) so as we could not find anywhere to sit, we chose the bar.

Had a great time, and we plan on coming back soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcyx4J66dX-2K0eJPsLn9dFQ4eU3qrPUFN-1LCa-9QqLBvskz2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was fast and friendly. We went on a Friday night and it was really busy but we never had to hunt down the waitress.

The food came out in a timely manner and we were a table of five. Portions were huge and a good value for your dollar.

Returned on a Sunday night for dinner. Same good service and huge portions!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlndTPq2rrf0rilRib01JIxdOVseUp8VM2kbzK&fid=0x0:0xd08aec90d2675cc2"],"When":"2016-10-24"},{"Name":"Phuc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKyZ93IRCJCH1JLRAyZ_1EXfrz5einBZ6MH8s6tB1BEDR2Ksg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pub is a bomb! Top-notch food and drink with reasonable price. Big and delicious portion. We came here with no expectation and was surprised with how good this place it.

I had the Double Trouble Burger, my wife had the chicken Parmesan and we ordered the Lettuce Wrap for share. We clearly have the wrong assumption about the portion. The dishes were so enormous that the leftover last us another meal.

I've tried 2 special mock tails(lemonade and ginger, cannot recall full name) and they're both amazing. I guess the rest would be the same quality as well.

A true gem of the city. Would definitely visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fin Orca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaMrB4n_t_X5QV3-nnanceoHp6V4PJBzoMlX9iru7tCd6bkBYY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"GREAT atmosphere, huge portion of food and timely service! The waiters weren't the types that harrasssed you every 2 minutes!

Didn't eat it all since the portion sizes were big, but the food was great! Go for it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGJonILFnsOAy585yCC49V88O36IJJVuEJxSA7&fid=0x0:0xd08aec90d2675cc2"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"AM Friesen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxladyWmO8V-EDSY6e_GVfVLeGw1ProZWrvCAGjSui7VMZmZU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of TVs, nice space for groups - bar for singles & bunch of tall two tops - nice happy hour, daily specials and regular menu options","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"d dezzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVYZcdmcR7Tv6TRilhvh1VyR7lYC9um_PbES6smOXa7NmzitRi5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was great ..  staff very friendly  we weren't  fan's of the music playing  but it's more of a older crowd .. definitely  enjoyed the seat by the fire place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chris greene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfNuJN432mfvJ1rzroxx1I8yyS5f3-wms9o7csjF2excgwi1Pb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this absolute gem of a place out tonight, so very glad I did the meal cost was about 35 per person with drink and tip in mind. Food was spectacular and I can't stress this enough.  10/10 our meal was 2 orders of the Original Burger with fries and a appetizer of Kalimari rather small portion of Kalimari but it is without question the BEST Kalimari I've had in a great deal of years. I will definitely be coming back in the future.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Allen James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy1fDvn7gKz7SsYhyeaz8K1dfy_Nti3qJrko2Tu0bfPqHoRqU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok, so I have a new favorite sandwich joint! Went to get some sandwiches for the crew and they were closed(Tuesday after a long weekend). I looked in the windows and the ladies were just finishing a HUGE catering job. As we were walking away we were called back, invited in and they made us the most amazing and huge sandwiches! Homemade honey dill mustard is incredible. Thank you so much Lunch Doctor!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn6YT9AP_Bt3a3mPgfWPCuyJphbB11tGWvhEls&fid=0x0:0x625700b592701107"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"jay stevens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJASviP__ez0moueGQe7ZwDAXHOqvNw8pJ-fd6vz_diAb8QA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was out in a neighborhood I wasn't familiar with, so I searched google for a lunch place. This came up, and I was really craving just a good old fashioned sandwich. I wasn't looking for some crazy gourmet things with 10 different types of aioli.
Fast friendly service, and quite a few regulars who they knew the names of told me I was in the right spot.
A wonderful selection of buns on display, I chose Sourdough with Turkey, bacon, avocado and provolone. It was the perfect sandwich. I planned to save half for later, but that didn't happen.
If this place was in my neighborhood, I'd be there daily.
If you're nearby , and you think to yourself for a second that you might want subway...say no way.
This is just what the Doctor ordered!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-ceqLj_2TBdOPFJbX7__4EZue1WoNOOO-U0Ll&fid=0x0:0x625700b592701107"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Carl Van der Velden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKNBPwo3sDWZQnajFfaV6ZlZq5v8iRKfS86JKuYL7jegd7CJUG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I've been here 10 times, 3 or 4 times they have had the door locked 2 hours before closing (1pm) This is due to them selling out of buns to make the sandwiches. Not because their sandwiches are so great. But due to poor management/ownership. They would rather save on unsold buns. Than to make more revenue and retain their customers. As a fellow business owner, this blows my mind! As I sit in my vehicle and search for alternatives, I notice endless customers are being turned away! They even have a system so silly to call and reserve your bun, so you don't miss out. The staff are nice and the sandwiches are good. But this place has let me down far too many times. I will not be returning and just a side note for management. You probably are not noticing a loss in customers. Due to population growth, just look how busy the local roads are vs a couple of years ago!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Morden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIeqcIi2GpMByJh2WzjS98wivE0o-o0eecT4O_vzCDHmCc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time at the lunch doctor today. Super friendly staff and a delicious sandwich! The sourdough bun was very fresh and the sandwich ingredients were very good. I had the turkey bacon sandwich on a sourdough bun and my Mom had turkey and avocado. Great little spot with not a fancy interior but a gem of a spot! Definitely will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCOMEcbB-umYuO79RBhIjZT4Y4sbN2d9qi_3o&fid=0x0:0x625700b592701107"],"When":"2024-1-3"},{"Name":"Megan B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIJGmQzRKpqxlnw7zgGCGKK-D4vLa-P5afOXleDsFax1tmHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been going to lunch doctor for years and years and it never disappoints! I recently went and got my usual turkey sandwich on French and it was delicious. The only negative was that as I was walking in, I saw one of the employees was outside smoking a cigarette with her apron on, went to go throw something in the garbage can and grazed her apron on the garbage can. Might not be a bad idea for management to go over food safe expectations with the employees. Other than that everything was great as per usual!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ian B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWS_gMSkaduO38iJEiY1PUuQE5TH1azxT-dC_ApoM7IoaS_xrpl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a fantastic sandwich! Stumbled across this place and was really impressed. The French bun was perfectly crispy and packed with filling. I had a turkey and ham. My only suggestion would be a herb vinaigrette for that classic deli taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKIXhd0F937BCsbWKrIizT3LnM00uMpB0jiw_i&fid=0x0:0x625700b592701107"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"lea “Lea” howard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDu1L_oe7CRcF_qC9V9eWIA_rxaPr1ucAjvHDbhI_ieW2Nkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch doctor got their mojo back!
The new ownership has revived my favorite fresh sandwich joint!  The staff is friendly, the sandwiches are delicious and they are now opened on Saturdays again.
I had the turkey avocado for $10
The only feedback I’d share is that the French buns aren’t quite the same, not as fluffy as they used to be but still tasty.

Update: been going here consistently and I've changed my rating to 5!!
Just like the original Lunch doctor that I remembered from high school!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYrK4jRzbDJY99k4PQ-8p4xfanEMeeVygY-bTw&fid=0x0:0x625700b592701107"],"When":"2017-11-13"},{"Name":"Josh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINPxErUy7rSw0lLPbTPeAHdTAQBtqc8IFYU9U7vATGYfP6yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty, fresh ingredients.
Great selection of sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFXgINikVv4prWvV2u2yhvdE00G_U9cVKb__ff&fid=0x0:0x625700b592701107"],"When":"2024-5-25"}]

[{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This White spot in Maple Ridge is unique with always kind personnel and variety of food on the menu. My recommendation is Chicken avocado salad bowl and Cheesesteak hash if you’re for a good breakfast, you won’t wait too long for your order…Plenty of parking for free.
I highly suggest to visit this restaurant if you’re in this area 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqwBtI2flDzyGbVFKZIl2kh2cBZsnHvUcgkOlu&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"MR. BLU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPUh0nslIiomcV7dF888M_L7EBu10sgWhAfVxb7vZ5kD10DiTjtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We  went for dinner and Will was our server.
He was excellent and checked to see if we needed anything else
Will should get a Best server's award of the decade.
It must be the manager 's training.The host was also polite and friendly.
I met Inder(manager )when he came to our table to see if everything was alright.We live far from this restaurant but we'll try and go there most often
Thanks you all for an excellent time we had","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Russell Aldred","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK19oSkZniRSkHkw5tMRhN0x1QJArNYrZRbDx014cxbvoi1aQBJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ben the morning sever has been at this location on the weekends for many years. I have coffee and breakfast there on a regular basis on Saturdays and Sundays with the fellas and Ben has always been a staple of the establishment.
He is the epitome of great service. Always polite friendly and accurate. He never lets the coffee cup run dry.
Food selection at White Spot is not very extensive. In my opinion breakfast is the best thing they have to offer dinner and lunch menu is mediocre at best.. The best thing I can say about the food is that after a long time of discontinuance of shredded hashbrowns they finally brought them back sometime ago.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG_ySxFukKH4AlD3VR3nfBjosMVYPyBSViwi_z0TVAUxE73g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great food but I think they need to teach their cooks about lettuce wraps…. It was pretty hard to “wrap” with the tiny pieces of lettuce they provided, lol.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhge8ImGKT-p_dwa1PxLcUpWprLz5UrMfGi02p&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Vivian Sim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxpdjWyeYzSg9LB62xxTN_EXQwUag1qqV3Y96vQ__G_8SIdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were having supper at White Spot on Lougheed in Maple Ridge last week.
The server was efficient and helpful. I had the chicken and broccoli casserole, it was delicious. Hot and savory.. yummy. My grandkids had the pirate pack meals and enjoyed their dinners immensely. My dad had the Chicken Alfredo Fettuccine, and not a speck of food was left on his plate. So, needless to say, we will be back for more delicious meals. Thanks, White Spot on Lougheed. A great time was had by all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMHrsBOCfw2yTxdERqQKMJ2ji-mtRUDAFRu6AyxgyffHuakcfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at this location has always been very friendly. The food has been good and fresh. The environment and bathrooms are always clean. We had excellent service from Ola. Thank you for a great experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNPXd0TQp1SGZuIbkzjBifXecErH9hmC9UxwybkomlWgiq8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food & I always love to go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7JkxIm6nG2wP50BjmTVEE_z7qVUCHF6S6bXex&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another successful Whitespot! Great tasting breakfast with good service. Lots of seating and parking spots!
Coming from the West, the restaurant was hard to spot, so Google ahead!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPHgQC-2QU5Hw66V0RV4qNFzKoY0sVp7MkCA9v&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2023-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alix brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV_BkP57011TQMTEtyGEJS8ghCbag5zwaUeS54byF4fYXZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So totally thrilled to be at my first vegan meetup here! We’ve been coming here for years and your vegan menu is unbelievable. Tons of options and super delicious. The service is fantastic and I love the super cozy decor. Thanks for an amazing night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxjUuoyIsEARKRj5wmM3AV7jbViSDrtpxTy58&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Julia Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFe6ysL8ycb11c9nahzMs1cSOfcFxV8wKNRtXE_nQbazDU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OBSESSED with the vegan arancini with rose sauce (aka rice balls on their menu). It's a big portion and deliciously filling. I am intrigued by how chewy and crispy their batter is and the rose sauce is liquid gold. Thank you so much for offering a huge vegan menu, at reasonable prices, great portions, and, most importantly, real TASTY food. ❤️

Please keep in mind that the wait times for orders tend to be longer than usual, but it's definitely worth the wait! Though you don't have to wait too long just to eat - everyone gets a complimentary focaccia bread with balsamic olive oil upon arrival - such a thoughtful touch!

Nicely renovated. Feels cozy and intimate. Recommend as a cute hangout or date night spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnOeiViBP6UwxhFQoQczZcPFmfkCRL-hD02Eo&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-1-27"},{"Name":"Ryan Bates","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvbi-lOAKVp_EI635G5lV9rkUZeqJmkIg2yjkrD54pM5BPfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Party of 2, we walked in, after a few seconds, the employee with bright dyed hair told us to sit anywhere, but every correctly sized table was covered in dirty dishes, so we sat at a large table. then were told to sit at a small one (understandable if on its own). We then sat at a small dirty table, that was sprayed while we sat there and not wiped down fully. We were then asked if we are vegan or not, we said vegetarian, and the employee flatly asked us again if we are vegan or not. We said no, vegetarian. We were given meat menus, then waited a while and heard this employee lightly argue and correct a customer on the phone, then did the same to the couple that walked in after us. Thankfully those customers corrected her arrogance to ensure they get the right food with their dietary restrictions. We then asked for the vegan menu and got a snappy “oh you want vegan now?” Then received a very dirty vegan menu.

I work customer service, so normally I don’t really mind if someone is having an off day. But this was far past that. First time I’ve ever walked out of a restaurant. uncomfortable unwelcoming, unclean place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayne Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUms7PcN3Vy1M-xxhw_bkbo3QTmP5q-g8ISEeKG_LRu_HHeOy0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely atmosphere. Paliottis vegan menu is really extensive with lots of choices! I had the crispy rice balls (similar to arancini) and Cajun vegan chicken penne. So delicious, I look forward to going back and trying the fettuccini cashew Alfredo!
I’m visiting town and they let my party stay and chat for a long time, they were very accommodating and great drinks menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ogMnJEuPE0xdowksSNGWfHNZ78NcmFA2ptkH&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"T Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMSEwMA3m2f2pUNvDSD01evNvY5ImU08gKtdPmCpcdgJy2LmVY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was impeccable. Very cute little restaurant with lots and lots of options including vegan options. I also love restaurants with a kids menu. That’s a plus. Only reason they didn’t get a full 5 for me was the spaghetti noodles were a little over done. I prefer al dente but the sauce and bread was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNKWDW06SyebUNwpuPwO119ro5p_lgjPBGnj3a&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Babeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf4WovMQFERSvhxzEoCuuSb4_AjZcTnpLowA2HY_C3jDQ0LV66=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were totally disappointed when we ate here. We waited almost an hour— if not for the free bread—we would have been so hungry and have left the place. It wasn’t even full (3 other tables), but we had to wait a long time; only one waitress who was doing everything from reservation, seating, serving, etc. She tried her best though. Flies were everywhere, food was not great as expected with all the “good” reviews. Too pricey for the order, steak was medium rare but it was too chewy. Mashed potatoes too salty. Waitress said they’re closing in a few weeks. Even so, they should have at least ended well as read on reviews.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Lovey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_sxu-gJcM6Bn62duXbg1cuPha8c77oPsgPbYDcIR07FvhTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"tried this place tonight and It was an amazing experience start to finish. the customer service was incredible, and we shared some great conversation with our server. the pre meal bread was soft, christ p on the outside and had a nice garlicy flavour, the portions were enormous and filling, the carbonara was some of the best i've ever had with a perfect smooth texture with well blended flavours, and the vegan cheesecake was incredibly creamy and the coconut flavor was suble and not overwhelming at all like it often is in other places. the only complaint I have was that i'm not a fan of the gluten free crust texture, but the flavour was still quite good. the experience was amazing and I will be reccomending this place to anyone with ears 5/5 stars well earned!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkquxSw3IiHVUwDqxtYBBEx9hepLAU2EJ7scp5&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2023-2-12"},{"Name":"Espartaco Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQvqC7CHvoOBhM7UyOXHX4wB1JILNV3X-lgettj-tkSlS61g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 for vegans!!
We ordered the vegan pizza rolls, the vegan chicken marinara and the vegan spaghettini carbonara, thinking we were going to get Vancouver sized portions...

We were such fools! The food portions are huge and absolutely delicious.

The amount of vegan options is staggering, there are more options here than in any other vegan restaurant in Vancouver!

From the complimentary bread to the wait staff this place is definitely worth the drive if you are from out of town!

Edit: the vegan chocolate caramel pecan cheesecake is breathtaking ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuDH6sKqx8mmaiMkBlEuMWvXeUbXN-hAvMYzLF&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2023-12-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Felipe Bautista","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD8Ocw-BYrQmD4Za-AtjcfdB8pbtfMHowdqj-NOPSE6zWVwSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to have a lunch with my child who wants to see planes. We ordered grilled cheese sandwich and Chicken pesto sandwich. Coffee milk and strawberry frappe. The broccoli soup was great. Price is average and we will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj_wmyW9tPD30wVRI5gEP-5EY_8NLmlAGmnixl&fid=0x0:0x52e8d7207fb01521"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Cara Grimshaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9C_BKlL2iOS5WFUiVvMdCbBbXL9ELV34RHXbo-2k-drW5Nm4E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to watch the smaller aircraft. Coffee is decent. Food servings are a little on the skimpy side for the price.  Friendly staff.
Please make more cheese and chive scones!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP78wjZgLkH_bB0rqLsjhcxA8XXWiBv68gz-1Kj&fid=0x0:0x52e8d7207fb01521"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Stephanie Macdonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi5yzuZFeh3XMvS2iq7PKzAnZsPWF7SHpOeU6TCEI2DZ77q43p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a BLT off Doordash. It came with 1 slice of tomato, 1 piece of lettuce and 2 thin slices of bacon, on dry toast with a mayo smear on 1 side, for $12!!!! They also forgot the salad dressing for every other sandwich. I went to support, and they could only refund $8. The fact they let this kind of food out of their restaurant is very telling of being part of the Richard Joseph group. Go elnswhere, save your hard earned money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJZKuzljWdafzfFfIAu5xpt8qXeVOyYoil5rQh&fid=0x0:0x52e8d7207fb01521"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Henrick Uy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGS4XhCIf-FkcZYzDHociCFnzj3VceF3X3H_nrHqTGVwnbQVLu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Relocated to cypk for pilot training and this is by far one of my favourite cafes. Customer service is amazing!  Food is great and iced Coffees tastes amazing! I rather have their iced coffees than Starbucks. The kindness of their service allows me to study in peace in their cafe before my flights. They are very friendly and I’ll for sure be going back regularly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYH9yaWYquWfqgvNY2v2CUBV6Elt07L7_1oYMR&fid=0x0:0x52e8d7207fb01521"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Alex Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdAWoq-KAG1uUpC9WxMsHpeLHaBr4K9bSjHUpFqTTGonqIdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of visiting Whiskey Charlie, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience that deserves all five stars!

The breakfast menu at Whiskey Charlie was a true delight. I ordered the bacon, eggs, and toast. When I requested the eggs be done over easy, they were happy to accommodate and I must say, the eggs were cooked just the way I liked them. The bacon was chewy (how I like it) and flavorful. The toast was just right.

What truly sets Whisky Charlie apart from all other cafés is the exemplary service. The staff were very attentive and visited my table often to check up on my needs. They were also extremely personable and talkative which made them an absolute pleasure to interact with. Even if the food was lacking (which it certainly is not) I would make an effort to go back just for the service!

The ambiance of the café was excellent. Watching the planes take off and land provided a level of entertainment no other café can match. I think the only thing that could improve it is if there was music playing.

In summary, if you're hungry for breakfast Whicky Charlie is the place to be. Thinking of the friendly staff and delicious food, I know for certain I'll be visiting again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMokpLcdFdIYG1WhhwrC1AD3amNlfwEQwZsPf4e&fid=0x0:0x52e8d7207fb01521"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Haylee Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqbNvAJ1csv5m6OMDOGnPySzvU2pSd69Xkh-DRZ7r9SUT6KnVR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Coffee and drinks have always been good. Sandwiches are good though sometimes a little under toasted. But today the breakfast was beyond disappointing. We got the bacon egg and toast plate and everything on my plate was cold when it was served. Toast was not toasted, butter was rock hard and eggs were over cooked and unseasoned. My friends avocado toast was also not seasoned and the egg was very undercooked. The staff was great, super friendly and quick. It was just the food that left much to be desired","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bre Tab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVTnah-5WJQwbBdfapRklgj8Fm0YuhcD7tRV-QwLFH4yhWKkh1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"overpriced.  45$ for small burnt sandwich, runny egg, plain hot dog and a couple slices of vegetable. tasted as bad as it looked.

rude, untrained staff.  we were turned away on first visit as they were getting ready to close, even though owner said they hadn't had a customer in several hours.  went back another day to try again, ordered from unhelpful, sullen employee,  waited 20 min then went back to counter to ask if it was ready and were told "No".    Not -"almost, I'll bring it out to you", or "will just be a few more minutes", or "I'll call your name when the order is up"....just "No".

dirty.  It's a shame because the new airport terminal and landscaped lot is beautiful, but the restaurant patio was full of garbage, stains and spills on tables, spiderwebs on grates and corners.  No excuse as there was only one other customer in the restaurant and the staff had plenty of time to clean or at least sweep the patio.  Also, patio being on airside at YPK, the garbage presents FOD hazard.

Extremely disappointed as we visit the airport quite often to watch the planes, eagerly awaited the opening of the new cafe, and were hoping to make it a regular brunch thing.  Sad to find that the cafe is so poorly managed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWkbn6zrbmr2qLnb3FEV_uyx94olF5gGra9pWa&fid=0x0:0x52e8d7207fb01521"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"lynn stuart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItNLxNGHK7eiF0mAoY7jS9oxADgBWpIuajfNJ5CFWH6JPOpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Breakfast. Must say , worst ever. Coffee Luke warm, toast not buttered. Over easy eggs were hard. Hubby ordered poached and they were clearly fried and hard yolked.  Never coming here again and will definitely  tell people our food experience was terrible.  Wjat a disappointment. Planned to bring two friends for a cocktail this week but not now.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jasmine Melody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRrMElQt8WAWo6pWhY1tZKC-yHf20yC8YlhfVVmawZnrYs4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was kindly greeted by Sahej who was always smiling and so patient while I ordered chicken donairs for my whole family! She didn’t hesitate to individually mark an Initial on each package and the restaurant manager Jot was so kind and friendly as well! Thank you ladies for starting off my weekend with good vibes!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Biggerstaff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq_mufPMIRsmmqWZxxUqPKwd0TodFRMPu7VbQZd-m5juPlYole=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first visit today, the service was friendly and fast. The lamb donair was exceptional and good value for money. I will return when in the area and recommend this restaurant to others.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reza Irani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIPin_cpy6cUIJ0TocdQ2e6OWsKTrKlZ9YU-SVwrXWh-NO7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"ordered my food from Uber eats. I specifically asked For no hot sauce since I am allergic to it and what did they do, they put extra hot sauce on my food. I spent almost $30 on one special platter and my order was wrong. When I called the store. This lady answered and could not help me due to language barriers.  she took my name and number for the manager to call me back and I never received a call back. Poor customer service I will never order from them ever again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJQAeP8ruG-UCqNM_45mQCHPv-HxgUjGGoOGCaA0SeoNx2rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there today and Jot made me the best Donair I've ever had. I actually called back after I ate it and let her know how amazing it is. Whenever I'm in Maple Ridge and need a Donair place, I go here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwav9sAXFjgnZp6KKPcoaDkxz7ZcOVGrkRKamKWmLv7pAw0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here for the first time yesterday. The usual place that I go to was closed for the day. The donair was okay, but both of the young girls who were working at the restaurant were very rude. For this reason, I will not be returning a second time. Looks like others have had the same experience..maybe the owner should address this for the reputation of his business. Looks like he or she does not care based on his responses to his customer reviews..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE5mTKD61HIgHQk8dxPyuoRqeGbk2g-M7HwnIwadO5n9CEZ1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place for donair.  You need to try their platters.  Food is fresh, quality and quantity is good. Been coming for a number of years now (they use to be called donair castle).

Owner and workers are friendly. Jot is fast, efficient and friendly and she hasn’t made a mistake with any of my previous orders.

Highly recommend you try them out - probably one of the better donair place in Maple Ridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-mJA4fyZ_3MNatclJ-3uNmYODULkaJfrThlkTgEfiNJUyANk4Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it is the first time to try Donair, we like it very much, there are three size available: regular, super and jumbo, we choose the beef jumbo with Hawaii and Lebanese topping. the jumbo is too big portion for my daughter, we would love to try regular next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-hqjAuaosQV8jjtIZTN3Jf9oeCiuGU--udhHh&fid=0x0:0xaade80110af25d40"],"When":"2023-6-25"},{"Name":"April Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCtEzbwF3JkeTBYJ485ARVNQXH72e_APgJQ_L7f8lCdRzxuTLimA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was a terrible experience for me! I ordered this rice for my six years old kid on Friday. He found one metal wire in the rice. Luckily, he saw that before he ate. I couldn't image if my son eat this sharped object into his mouth. This was not acceptable!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQAdLdTVNhBNGgZ4COL5gtZ5nkPSNqrkAeawXx&fid=0x0:0xaade80110af25d40"],"When":"2021-3-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great place for lunch on our way to the City of Mission.  We got chicken nuggets, crispy chicken sandwich, fish fillet sandwich, chocolate milkshake, iced tea and poutine. This store delivers very good food quality and the food is served fast.  It’s worth the price you pay.  The service is efficient and amazing.  Dining place is clean. Washrooms are well-maintained and neat.  There’s a need for you to ask the front cashier to use the washroom.  Parking is spacious and free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJKu2jfE81tLwsZq9a33OXtoyCMAqpM73xZ8Cj&fid=0x0:0x89d0f9cb00350f81"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Jane Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiiTPX_fDwYFOprgDX6WAKchWNE78d2wrdQHvem3ChMR34eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"November 14th 5:30am. Wow, all I wanted was a BLT no cheese no egg. I expressed that, and when I drove away, realized I had both on my sandwich, their cheese always makes me sick so I can’t eat. I went back through, the lady who took the order was lovely but I don’t think the kitchen listened at all, I saw her modifications on the screen were correct. I got a new sandwich and this time there was only lettuce and bacon on it. So I drove back through, and the lady that gave me the food said they were out of tomatoes… I was surprised that that wouldn’t have been mentioned since it’s a pretty big part of a BLT. Honestly, I don’t even think it was true I believe she just wanted to get rid of me at that point. Anyways, she gave me a refund- for the egg BLT. So I made a dollar for wasting half an hour of my time. The times they’ve actually got it right here my BLT has been burnt or soggy. I won’t even bother with the manager because they will probably replace them when they realize business is down 1000% percent due to lack of consistency. I worked at McDonald’s for four years and this place is a joke, my boss would have scalped us if we ran the place like that. Like I said, the lady who took my order was great, so there are some good staff members but it sounds like they are promoting the wrong ones…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Denisa Olpretean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl7WgjcufKdYwiFQkN2tKR_fJpCvqfyrTH6j_Z3gLcWWVojF7U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Someone should teach nabjul the "manager" how to do her job properly and count. I bought a 6 pack of nuggets and large fries only to receive half of the large fries and only 3 nuggets. When I drove back to ask that the correct amount be given and the issue to be fixed, she accused me of lying saying "that's not possible".... WELL NABJUL it clearly is since I drove all the way back to tell you it was wrong. Don't waste your money, the McDonald's at this location has always been terrible, and to no surprise has become even worse.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsOKqTMdlwDlUZj5DrFhoEI00VQS3_7UKW9TSu&fid=0x0:0x89d0f9cb00350f81"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Mehak Faridkot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW41qVA2Ru2BH2K2bSO2hHaFsuP6L3gxSiBCs1N5JqxvhZO5Zc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 6 junior chicken and 2 sets of medium fries. 2 junior chicken are missing from the order. ordered 3 habanero sauce but got garlic. Whole order was very cold.

Never coming back to this store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuTit7gmnx3hIryHkpkC5BoUobi5OSzpqxvhj6&fid=0x0:0x89d0f9cb00350f81"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWx_SrRlP1O06yBviUEWCNgig44vUBKe1GCzn2KDwj2EzM4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered takeout and paid for 2 paper bags.  Girl handed me my order on a tray.  I pointed out that it's a takeout order.  I need two bags.  She muttered something, picked up some bags and tossed it on the counter.       Then proceeded to walk away as I packed up my own order.  On the bright side, she threw 3 bags at me.  So overall, I'm gonna count that as a win.  Sep 19. 630pm.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sydney Soltesz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKesXoa0DOgwu8k-QJ1W5HgLsRRGht2beDOTr31REHgZFDzjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"placed on order on the app only to be told that we can't get our food. When I asked why they said it's because the menu is unavailable, I asked but you still have the food and they said yes and told us that we would have to place a whole new order to get the food that we already placed an order for. The person was not very nice when explaining it to me and I was already annoyed because the lady at the pay window couldn't even find the order in the first place. The dumbest thing ever. McDonald's is awful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Heisler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsk5HdVT6j7Pb3jfkcNNOIoQF6u7VN7cXdy2Q5ytMJ4XmUZxr3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have been an avid visitor to this establishment for quite a while. I am friendly and never mean to employees. I have noticed this place over the last 5 years turn down hill.

Lately have been noticing my drinks only being filled 3/4 and no ice or even cooling system for the drinks. My drinks are now warm and not the actual amount of ounzes i paid for.

Also, you run the risk after 11pm any night of the week that this store closes down till the morning. I now have to drive to the other end of town or across the bridge for late night food.

I just want my go to place after work to be back to normal. After tonight, quite let down.

Well normally you see a 24 establishment maybe go down for a little bit to clean but when you close at 12:30 and not open till 4am, that is misleading. Especially on the weekend. Not very happy about this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTH5-xrgUslYykTFcZBEnG2DCuL5RowGWC09O-&fid=0x0:0x89d0f9cb00350f81"],"When":"2022-6-19"},{"Name":"Cassandra Tracy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-5vKwbJUrgf_pbtU6AtIeiIYyxP3V5bWP29S8mvlOhJ7QUfRn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I placed a mobile order for the pick up kerbside hoping it would be faster than the drive-through. I gave them my number right away when I got there. And was waiting for over 10 minutes. The kerbside pick up seems to be extremely flawed at this location. I would not recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Lamb Biryani and it was delicious! Meat was properly seasoned and very tender. Price is very reasonable and the flavour was outstanding!!! I didn’t have to add salt and pepper as the dish was perfectly seasoned, and it wasn’t greasy at all. Located in Meadow Ridge Shopping Centre, easy to find and very accessible to both Lougheed Highway & 207 Street or Dewdney Trunk Road & 207 Street. A hidden gem if you’re craving for authentic and flavourful Indian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyfD5OT3HPfceWcdC3NC1_-uWwZ70n_fREjec&fid=0x0:0x5dc3122565fa06d5"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXEjN5JGe3Mrw7txzZNbJPQzEJpLs8Rpa82nsQC7v0x9esng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HANDS DOWN , the best Indian food in Maple Ridge !!
Food is always fresh, DELICIOUS ( so much flavour!!!) and their prices are the best in town. We have been ordering from them for YEARS ( I can't believe this is the first time I'm writing a review :(
My partner and I stopped in for lunch last weekend and the service and atmosphere was lovely - not to mention we were both stuffed for $20 ( plus a good tip of course :) !!!
The server was GENUINELY pleased to hear that we loved the food - it's nice to see an establishment take pride in serving nothing but the best quality and taste  ( this rarely happens anymore).

I was also pleasantly surprised at their inexpensive lunch special prices !  ( although I shouldn't be surprised as they have excellent prices for all their menu items).
If you haven't tried their food and are a fan of Indian Cuisine, you must check them out!
You won't be disappointed.
Maple Leaf is truly a hidden gem !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaydeep Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBXLByJSfdj2nIcvUyl_WMvvevCVtJDF5tLCYak7E_L25sxLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maple Leaf Indian Cuisine in Maple Ridge is a hidden gem for anyone craving authentic Indian flavors. The food here is absolutely incredible—fresh, clean, and homemade, with spices that truly capture the essence of India. Each dish bursts with flavor, and the curries are a must-try!

On top of the amazing food, the service is top-notch. I’d especially like to commend Rushi Patel for providing exceptional service. Their attention to detail and friendly demeanor made our dining experience even more enjoyable.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for quality Indian cuisine and excellent service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GURNOOR DHALIWAL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyrwXokaVNx8XD-mGLglp7fNN6Y-6xMUXfgN_AE1q_FhLUVtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"a week ago
New
Dine in  |  Dinner  |  $20–30
The restaurant had amazing food with dishes that offer so many flavours and spices. The service was over the top and very quick. Their staff is so friendly and welcoming. Overall, I had a great dining experience and I would recommend going here as it is a underrated restaurant!
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Subhasis Raha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhqQcflaEV8J43jv0eINDNNISH1YnNgulBQF-ey0oyVoWLyYyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently took their dinner service for my son's first rice ceremony , it was absolutely great!! Excellent food , excellent ambience , excellent service , reasonable price!!  The food were enjoyed by my Indian , Canadian , Pakistani friends a lot and even they were so pleased ; they are also going to refer them to their communities.

I would like to thank Lavpreet and his crew to provide the superb service and hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Paton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZT6rhi-slGGqr3OeTtzYjdXIuZhmWQ7i8LsbmbFMrtbGDE0IJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious, and got to us quickly. We sat down, ordered and ate all within half an hour.
Amrit was a great host. Very polite.
Will definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sue W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_PBDPStKirRvKGpUjtU2HGTN6XlGhzRPXtWXuYlY8saFqNqVa6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant staff. Prompt service.
Delicious food - I ordered the gluten free lunch box - it included gluten free naan and samosa!!!
Enjoyed it so much we ordered 2 more meals to bring to our friends!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Rachinski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQPizgKV4k6qSx1KXcBhJaLyQbc5ZNHoQM6QwC2JtwZe1T824=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here   And  the food is so good. 😋 will be going back.  Price is responsible.
Staff are friendly and polite.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Elizabeth A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxfTEWSeX8uYXtcmqTBPDV_ujOByqiofeonLevJdviVTPcCUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Wings were pretty decent. Service was pretty slow and we had to get up to find the waitress for the bill, but it was busy. What was confusing was that I ordered a Sapporo and got a dark coloured beer instead. Not too sure what it was (it wasn't a Guinness), but it supposedly came out of the Sapporo tap. Thankfully it wasn't a huge deal because my second choice was a Guinness or another dark-coloured beer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyTtusXiGeOLST3ayqZvn8rb6MeciAaKveEonG\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Madison Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKg_8c4BJ7CfR7Pr54kKUbOvdzzGbRH5vrwUWxRQnSSGOfk2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My husband and I went over here for Wing Wednesday and to watch the hockey game the other night. The wings were fine, but the service absolutely tanked. It was a louder night, but not over all super busy. We were sat for over 30 minutes before seeing a waitress, she finally took our drink order and didn’t come back for another 25. If we had seen her running around the restaurant, we would’ve been more inclined to be more patient, as we understand things get busy. She passed us several times, each time without our drinks which could’ve easily been placed on her tray and dropped off. She’d run past our table, tap it and say she was grabbing whatever we had asked for or to take our order, but would take nearly 30 minutes each time to come back. We saw her maybe 3 times, and what should’ve been a quick in and out for some wings, we were there almost 3 hours, had only 1 drink refill and nothing else, never asked us if we needed anything, and you couldn’t catch her otherwise. Also, they cease to mention that pop refills are not free on Wednesdays, which seems like a scam to get you in the end. While it’s just pop, I understand, be upfront with customers so they can decide what they want to do with that information. It wasn’t until we asked for the bill (3 different times) that she finally came and had a second to stop and chat, to which she instantly brought up her children and Christmas coming, which to us felt like tip baiting. Terrible experience, which tanks because the atmosphere seemed like it could be fun, and the food (wings at least) wasn’t bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw5rMQatibni75tbNpjJbP4ehPrGlbmCLKvcJ6Naf176pomyyjJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have never been to \"The Reach\" before. I simply popped in as I was early to visit friends in the area. It was 3:30 on a Friday afternoon before the Christmas week ahead. The place was packed, filled with people smiling, laughing, and having fun. I didn't order any food. The people and staff were super friendly, and the price on my favorite craft brew was an amazing $4!!! Plenty of TVs for the sports enthusiasts and KENO as well.\n\nI'll Be Back!! See you there? 😉","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"claudio quinones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6KyrjNGdxf2c2scfa5GSK3lpFjNu_-VlN0L2IvDo98alq-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I find the service was unsatisfactory. After we paid for our first order with the first attendant which she said she was off. I order for a last beer. The next attendant twice came tonight to our table asking if we were done even she saw my glass was still full. We said we’re still ok. Then left and says “ oh G with other costumer”. Felt insulted its just because i ordered with her  just 1 beer and she keeps on coming back if we were done? We were there to relax after a long hour work in the hospital. When we were done nobody came so i left a 10 dollar bill to pay my 1 glass. Good service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhdQf_e-04kQfOorEh6Rv942Kr82Ys-KeV9AxS\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Katie Muzyka-Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUujvnXnZUcxW16GjXXYyNJnygy454waBiPDJjpNZx4eoubQ0iJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I wouldn’t suggest this place for food, maybe drinks? Saturday at brunch and ordered the avocado toast. It was wonder bread with two slices of avocado on it and a poached egg. Sprouts were added to maybe fancy it up but was way too overpowering. Orange juice was watered down with sparkling water… and $4 each. The avo toast was cheap but even at that. Not worth it. Service also wasn’t good… felt like an inconvenience that we were there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU71a0FBCyCO2V3iLhyDHpBHP98FDydUYwbtyS\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Tom Truchan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5cfIGdJiUAylgwVHFyzlUO7I41GrmqAPVCXOSM5A-5reshQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for the first time in years and must be new management because it was way better than before. Was my Birthday and the service was on point with our server checking in on us constantly. The food was delicious. The best deep fried pickles I’ve ever had. And their crispy chicken sandwiches were the bomb. To top it off their prices are very reasonable. Dinner for 2 with 5 drinks for $79. Where do you find that 🤷🏻‍♂️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and service, good specials and supporting our local community with a team of people supporting fundraisers. Great place for a pint or an event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4AljeDmjQASt5kqRq7Ysf77r5yQzSVqHip3kK\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Dave J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdGWkXv3KBdawcKYa861DrCqatGIiu-Pc4zF07bXJGsitpkI62=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not a big bar guy. Went here for company thing. Was busy on a Friday afternoon. Servers were polite and knowledgeable about the products they sold. The food was not great. My sweet potato fries smelled like pee. I didn't eat them. I would give the reach another try. It's possible I'm being over critical.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBpuJIqji146u-KelAFNQARo68oyNnzYh-SnL1\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]
