[{"Name":"Cynthia Greenwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVpGTKiMjqSW2F8X8iSDMrm6t4ZcZypyovLtCBVhIMXPb0RQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This golf club is amazing! If you need to book a space for a celebration, I would highly recommend here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMitKNAndu09vIo4bAif-5rgD1ycPiXKIfe0gq4&fid=0x0:0x25b71be32091db8d"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"lindsay Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAia15Zxgfj6UjqqMjn18OCY1OjHm4ygSKUt4sU5Gu-EwYDFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would highly recommend Meadow Gardens for hosting events! We hosted a large engagement party and it was a huge success. The event coordinator, Kayla, went above and beyond to make sure our party went smoothly. The food was excellent and bar service was fantastic. I can not say enough good things about Meadow Gardens!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Caldwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFJ02fr8qzGPBUV4ZC_byMngb_wKWnFaVTlmYEQZU3QIcaffXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite golf courses! The course is well kept and has a nice variety of holes. All of them challenging. The views of the golden ears mountain range are stunning on a sunny summer day. Sunsets here are outstanding. Highly recommend checking it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw17nYu3ZTQMlXnT875c189L6oKiNKgcEUl43r&fid=0x0:0x25b71be32091db8d"],"When":"2023-11-3"},{"Name":"Jerry Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSHqXIQ70HeOoBu2UMtdnlxB4p4XF-FFogQUk-WywIwGuHBG58KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Meadow Garden Golf offers an exceptional golfing experience that is sure to please both casual players and avid golf enthusiasts. From the moment you step onto the course, you'll be greeted by beautifully manicured fairways and lush greens that showcase the natural beauty of the surroundings.

The course layout at Meadow Garden Golf is well-designed, providing a good balance of challenging holes and more forgiving ones. Each hole offers its own unique features and requires strategic shot-making to navigate the course successfully. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned golfer, you'll find the course engaging and enjoyable.

The staff at Meadow Garden Golf is friendly, professional, and attentive. They go above and beyond to ensure that your experience is memorable and enjoyable. The facilities are well-maintained, including the clubhouse, pro shop, and practice areas.

One of the standout features of Meadow Garden Golf is the stunning scenery. The course is situated in a picturesque location with sweeping views of rolling hills, majestic trees, and pristine water features. It's a true oasis for golfers seeking a peaceful and serene environment to play their favorite sport.

Overall, Meadow Garden Golf is a top-notch golf destination that delivers on all fronts. With its well-maintained course, excellent service, and breathtaking scenery, it's an ideal choice for golfers of all skill levels. Whether you're looking for a challenging round or simply want to enjoy a relaxing day on the greens, Meadow Garden Golf won't disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv9WzglJz5EzQnhguv_oMoxOOTB5RhbxIW_ZrY&fid=0x0:0x25b71be32091db8d"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Brenda Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwHHOPrgBuK6oiIGW6G2uZEvumY5aDf87ea3x8M8djwhUxyffNaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful  Easter Brunch with the Family,food was great! Service was also great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGQLpTe2V1xTuslMg_bfwU_a4cA6m0WC65XXr9&fid=0x0:0x25b71be32091db8d"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Cory Slavin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9SCXWjB9FR1hnbluEf-ozYRa2R2fNslzT9zPOmpE_hf1cUyBb9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing course. Loved the layout. First time there and will not be the last. Great spot at the end of round for a beer and bite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juliet Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSbSN92_TpkCzZcSIMi3imSCzZyDRB9nlTBYX5On61PE5f0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am writing to express my profound dissatisfaction with the service I received during my recent visit to Meadows Garden Golf Course on December 16th.

My husband and I arrived for a round of golf, fully expecting an enjoyable experience. However, our day took an unfortunate turn on the 9th hole when we were approached by a member of your pro shop staff, conveying a message from the General Manager, Frank Asin. The message was delivered abruptly and without any prior warning, instructing us to leave the premises due to our use of a power cart on the fairways.

This incident left me feeling embarrassed and disappointed, as I had not encountered such a situation in my previous golfing experiences. Subsequently, I sought resolution by contacting the general manager,  Frank Asin multiple times, leaving voicemails and messages on his office number and cell number also with the operator. Regrettably, I have not received any response, adding to my frustration.

After patiently waiting for few days, I contacted your operator again and was directed to speak with another Manager Craig. While he explained Frank is unavailability, he assured me that a return call would be made. Unfortunately, it has now been more than ten additional days since that conversation, and I have yet to receive any communication.

I find it disheartening that, not only were we not provided with a warning regarding power cart usage, but also that we were asked to leave without any attempt at direct communication from the general manager himself. My misunderstanding regarding the usage of power carts on the fairway during winter was an honest mistake, and I would have appreciated the clarification.
Additionally, the lack of refund for the remaining holes, considering we paid for a full 18-hole experience with a power cart, adds to the overall disappointment.

In light of this experience and the subsequent lack of response, I have felt compelled to share my disappointment through this formal complaint on Google reviews. I believe a more proactive approach in addressing customer concerns is crucial for the reputation of Meadows Garden Golf Course.

I sincerely hope that this matter can be resolved amicably, and I await your prompt attention to this complaint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw8weBwdQS5IBbrhv5hcS5cS-gMZphdsPBsg6e&fid=0x0:0x25b71be32091db8d"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Billy Pun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxA8SQnjh81Oc1tSXA8i55tQgrYEuatUiCZm-PW0Tq2l6FnVv8-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staffs are very welcoming and the course is great.  There are couple challenging holes especially hole 12.  However, fairways are fairly open and its not too difficult to have a great score.   Pace of play is a bit on the slower side.  Overall, a great golf club!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfRn_Qc2oqnpv4ExUpxTD3D29j6tRd8HhLii7S&fid=0x0:0x25b71be32091db8d"],"When":"2020-3-13"}]

[{"Name":"karam nadir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0a5wtzw4TcXJdLHJXA3zBu8xRI9eTYrul64_73oKlYjbXr7kzSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining  Restaurant, and it was truly an amazing experience! The staff were warm, attentive, and made sure we felt welcome throughout our visit. The ambiance added to the experience, with a cozy and inviting atmosphere that made it such a joy to dine here.

If you're looking for delicious food and a great dining experience, Sharma Restaurant is a must-visit. I can't wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmKcY4d19IaZbpCZWXqxFxfsSzXKFWbN3AkSCN&fid=0x0:0xc545b4e4d9457230"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Sam Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE5mTKD61HIgHQk8dxPyuoRqeGbk2g-M7HwnIwadO5n9CEZ1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Convenient location with lots of parking, excellent food, and great service.

Very friendly storekeeper who was great to deal with. Fair prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5QJb_JK8CMh3ikOdkijTTVf1AewiERO1uui6-&fid=0x0:0xc545b4e4d9457230"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Donair I’ve had in a long time! user_reviews: [{"Name":"RICHIE WATTERS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9oUKKu2XIt4xqmsQmmESsLxpATEw-c2eS19mkwl2F5PyRd93q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Mango Shrimp Burrito. It was made quick. The guy working was nice. The presentation of the food was great and so was the quality. I live in Langley and usually go to that one but I was in Maple Ridge today so I thought I would try this one. I can say they are consistent with everything here as to the Langley location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi5JcR056j4QAyZvj6LsT7oDacNTxsUxNLIV0l\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Furo Ciousd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW851IfOkxNRj4Tu5eOG9ui3_h-u_5dQabvZTE_4ywXIlDaGsdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love coming here it's usually quiet so we can sit wherever we want, food is always fresh and delicious, a single taco is like $7 and will fill you up! My daughter loves coming here and alternates between beef tacos, smash burger, or whatever special item they might have on. We visit more than we should but for $20 ish we are full, perfect for a busy day or day when you just don't know what to cook. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCMYcRrHagyTuAFP9e3grqu-GW2vt6dZkESpAJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Daniel Kerray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWstKt7tG-yuAbgC104e3a8f47n1rOsfU9W5Mf4nMEDoXnlInPI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was horrible. Smash burger was greasy mess. Basically meat and cheese on a bun. The fish tacos were disgusting. Litterally. I was choking on the first one and had to look at the second one and yuck! A dry piece of thin to no fish and batter no joke. We will never return again. Unfortunate as it looked promising.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZruIyn9ynugE0yQYCMk1m09bJZJyttSaOi2P7\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"S D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJYsqsfylRWb2qB-xJh6bN2jntU-d5BqDo5FMP29y23P0aTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean little restaurant serving healthy and taste food.\nService was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9fPIa9W70-wr0scotTuMp-icB33vkLIjONolD\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Rachael Hutchinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwCPba-u_HHMp0P2cqkw2U-ua9GKUt_1tADntqwICPQSQB1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Streats is on my way home from work and easily accessible for a cheeky taco when I don't want to cook. Made fresh right in front of you, and you can even donate money to pay for someone else's food that can't afford it. 5 stars hands down","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqAYnZfYr_yicNTI01xXcn_Bs1Oa1aJd1bfgOKz_PMCBrIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of parking, good food. Burritos were wrapped tight and filled with fresh, hot cooked meat. I haven't had a single grain of rice fall out even if I put it down. Nice interior with modern music playing. Lot of food options other than bowls/tacos/burritos.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jazz Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBHCxCTHiXVuPqtl34JmCBZu35ruW51P7cZ-YeDxoJeaMJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can definitely say that strEATS offers an exceptional dining experience, blending bold, global flavors with a modern twist. The menu is innovative, featuring everything from mouthwatering tacos to an exquisite poutine that’s simply unforgettable. The service is immaculate, and the atmosphere is both vibrant and welcoming. Every bite feels like a culinary journey, making this hidden gem a standout. Highly recommended!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AF Marketing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPdZHxbhbOeibJn9XiyQqrcfmXro1ul-Qsns_fIQGg9H8CXQQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW this was literally the best burrito I have had this far, and for vegetarian options it was surprising! 10/10 recommend for any vegetarians","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFkhVETs82myHiIQmN-WwdEdOc8UBCHwhCFqDB\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-9-19"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Smoll Bean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOiGGXc9C-nG6SZJHaVfYR_1EWz_FxTnHKGqEFC2VHnk5i2VU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just garbo , food tasted like my high school poutine but $12 more. The cheese made me need to poop so hard , my tum tum hurts now. $100+ for mediocre everything and poopy (actually) tasting cold pepperonis","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M. Emily Beatty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5jNf1SKe7Bq03mAlTHyuHwO6BRqIxzmM2qix9g4yyTVCtOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered online from Uber Eats and it took them incredibly long to get the food out. I wasn’t there so I can’t tell if the restaurant was busy or not but my driver was waiting for about 15 minutes after he arrived and it is a very short drive to my place from there. When it arrived it was cold and since it’s not a long drive the food must’ve been been cold already so why did my driver have to wait so long. The cheese was also barely melted and they didn’t layer anything so less than half the fries had toppings on them. Overall the food didn’t have much taste and honestly felt like something a 10 year old could make with frozen fries in a bag.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara ten Brink","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKC5ggjSTEmziUmzkBFHaUuFK6tc2PzXbRrwk34Ic2OEfESWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I spent close to 80 bucks for 3 poutines and 2 pieces of cheesecake. The gravy is so bland, the beef was totally overcooked and there wasn’t enough gravy to even cover the poutine.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Selina Lopes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwvYqwcLxGW4J503phDDKtsNmc0a_Aljui_egbYLxZKEjtWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My poutine was missing things and cold. Terrible place to find with no signage, had i known i was ordering from the public house i would have never ordered. A waste of almost $20 for a single small poutine that you cant even get right","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alicia Price","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLP1lGy3eRH8D3Gdo69oqm7oryWyXB3lb1wKS7TCEVNbMgNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What happened to your french fries?!? Normally they're so nice and crispy with seasoning. I got bland uncooked fries in my poutine. Yuk. And like a table spoon of gravy...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nathan clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcR6UgI15-VKJjA1eO_531Q8b7M3DT0061oxUQtja2SYqbsSHB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"for a place that's called gravy boat, they didn't put any gravy on my poutine.....","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JOSEPH STEPHEN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kPCurf522dVCmxFLnGxqI86HWei49Vgv_p6MsG-amvKkBELG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No gravy on my poutine","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Interior was clean and a lot of options from beef burgers to chicken burgers, shakes, fries, chicken tenders, and breakfast options. Able to customize on what you want added to the burgers. The burger itself was mediocre and was quite expensive for the portion that was given. $4 extra to make it a combo. Took a while to get our order of two burgers, but lots of seating to wait at. Plenty of parking as it’s located within a plaza. No dine-in customers in there during Sunday afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJM9GNUwI0ru9tKcbV8xDYlbCz4S4aIqcbrnrv&fid=0x0:0x10126d01160ec565"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Payam Alavizadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_ZA_YHXhgNzKTpReaxZ12Y4AWYNOtDK5ZEhHo77Gk1YUw500=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic dining experience at Fatburger! Our order included the unlimited BBQ burger with mushroom and guacamole topping and the chicken spicy burger. To start, the unlimited BBQ burger was an absolute delight. Its flavors were incredibly delicious, and the combination of mushrooms and guacamole took it to the next level. The taste was simply outstanding.

But the goodness didn't stop there. The chicken spicy burger, which came with Curly fries, was also a winner. The spiciness added a kick of flavor that I thoroughly enjoyed. The fries were crispy and perfectly seasoned, making it a delightful pairing with the burger.

What truly impressed me was the cleanliness and comfort of the dining area. It's always a pleasure to enjoy a meal in a clean and cozy environment, and Fatburger nailed it.

So, my visit to Fatburger was a culinary delight. The deliciousness of their burgers, the quality of their sides, and the inviting atmosphere make it a must-visit spot. Thank you, Fatburger, for a memorable dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-YLNstikJR2IRr8K1vdRkYZhv6X2jQkYgd7SK&fid=0x0:0x10126d01160ec565"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Clare Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjmHXghyensIvYE3dOOg7pRiT5iEI2rLXHqY3Gcojd0PnnqUY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the staff at this location always cheerful and great you with a smile. The food is made fresh and is hot good serving sizes and choices that suit everyone in our family!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julio Olmos Lima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJKQzzzyVzTetdPGAt4DxjDLUImVYVrWCOIEJ0E8uPrDYP3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fresh and delicious. Commendable customer service was given by the staff. Must visit the place, perfect for family dinner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Payam Amiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnoZzz1N_QX18pt4DdBS3NmrIlTmrurlte7uFBeXVhTkdkXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited this restaurant while traveling to Vancouver with my colleagues, and unfortunately, our experience was disappointing. The staff’s behavior, particularly the lady at the cash register, was not welcoming or professional at all. We expected better service, especially considering the restaurant's reputation. I hope the management addresses this issue to ensure a better experience for future customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"شقایق کهورزاده","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWtWJFSRRqEzEpVa7vXF80kGxbdNCVo_XDUwe2zSFTYVSLDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently dined at Fatburger, and I have to say it was a disappointing experience. The staff’s attitude was shockingly rude. From the moment I approached the counter, I was met with unprofessionalism and a complete lack of courtesy. They seemed uninterested in helping customers, and their tone was abrupt and unfriendly. It felt like they were doing me a favor by taking my order.

Moreover, the hygiene standards at this location were below par. The dining area was far from clean, with crumbs and spills left unattended on the tables and floors. The sight of it was off-putting, to say the least. The restroom facilities were also poorly maintained, which only added to my concerns about the overall cleanliness of the restaurant.

Good customer service and cleanliness are fundamental to any dining experience, and unfortunately, this Fatburger location fell short on both. I hope the management takes steps to address these issues to ensure a better experience for future customers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvkqlZ5wz-o7qQiMAPvxq4Uq26umX4_opBke6CDrVfkbGhCeuLaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at Fat Burger, and I have to say it was a good first experience. The burger I got was so delicious with all the added ingredients. The onion rings were crispy, flavorful, and delicious. They were so good that you don't even need ketchup to dip them in. I would definitely recommend this place and am definitely going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their breakfast can't be beat!!  Full breakfast at a great price ... Served til 4pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZCf9UmTW1prGjDIrKkFAi96lI-ly9VLwxPqxH&fid=0x0:0x10126d01160ec565"],"When":"2022-8-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stanley Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMA0j5YPV0e_ki7txxd7xeDBLDLGeQTP8WAcMSalz9cV9eFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to the Wendy's attached to this Timmy's.

Got Dave Single for $4.  It was pretty good.

Then I saw the pineapple 🍍 frosty ... it was quite sweet, but it was expected.

I was able to use the washroom without being let in from the cashier, but it was very clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd6v39XJPQZpemjbb5e4vmd6o9jgSqY3In8yYo&fid=0x0:0xb4036d9fe5db692a"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Krystal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0fZcwF77tlJ3T7Myml3PBpzzu1nQHXbdRqUrvoTR7La7-xRx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Time after time going to Tim’s and getting terrible service and food from different locations, this location has never disappointed! Doesn’t matter how busy it has been I’ve always gotten amazing service with a smile and the food actually tastes like it’s supposed to. Thank you to everyone at the Loughead Highway Maple Ridge location for always being amazing, welcoming and friendly! Only Tim’s location I’ll go to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ-4FlE8ezYDBOI6n7h-Zw6Rxzzyv4Q99ENzrm&fid=0x0:0xb4036d9fe5db692a"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Kelly L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMESOymlCRjEPQnHQCgCGzgukB9Q7np0tXr1R1xVLoj5Ie=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Seems to be a problem getting drinks right in the drive thru. Yesterday, after waiting 10 minutes and then confirming my order, it was wrong AGAIN. I should know better from this location that even triple-checking at pick-up it is usually wrong. It would help if the lid was marked what it was. Another drink down the sink.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Herald Jenkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7o-ofZqIe4GqYgjG0YwMLGBYhI2V9JWvvZZcpG4uOjBNPJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"All the coffee and hot chocolate here tastes like hot tap water. This place has reasonably priced pizza that's not dry but not too greasy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"33 Vastu Construction","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDayAQrmFfgLjGRQR-u0oMBRQ60h8gW7epO2iRebeWezZKBF4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its been so many year's since this family has been operating the maple ridge location. Same taste and passion since the beginning of the days ! Hats off to the entire team for keeping up with the consistency and the amazing service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM19VhtvmErGJGSmIE0fiDT_JLK3VSJLPEyVXRV\u0026fid=0x0:0xfaae31e0e192a4c9"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"John Wylie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiLO8pNw0MKyOXVcjXud9cqdMnsvOkp8gFBJ0P0kvbguNlJHK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"OK we gave our address of our apartment building which does exist our buzzer number and our suit number. They call us back and said this isn’t a game you’ve given us the wrong pay address or like no we’re at 22170 Do Trunk Rd. it is a real address. The driver can’t find it and calls us a liar. This is unacceptable if your drivers can’t use GPS or have no idea where they’re going, they should be fired. I pissed at the way we were treated. My daughter is a professional working person and I’m a retired BC ferry engineer. this is nowhere to treat customers we will never call it place again. Also at least 20 of my friends that abused that place previous have stopped using it due to the terrible service that we’ve had and they’ve had shut the place down if you can’t do your job properly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Narotam Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2F59Cf_5Ax94-RaQpJXt6NfCXlfpswnygxAcGOzAbBArd8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There pizza flavours are so good we ordered the half shahi panner and tandoori paneer pizza it was all delecious but the tandoori side was now my. Favourite list","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"komalpreet khaira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuxqdDl8ZXrxQoQG0S6Pkj0xgPA-kXU-LqcErVaPtz96iHUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady at the front desk took my order on the phone and ended the call quickly without asking what I’d like on the pizza. When I went to pick up my order, the same lady gave me one pizza and when I said I ordered two she said “just wait there” and pointed. I waited 15 minutes and she served someone else instead of prioritizing me who messed up my order. When I got the pizza she didn’t even apologize or atleast say thank you. I came home to discover that she put pineapple on my pizza when I specifically said no pineapple. She did not give a damn about making things right and I’m beyond frustrated with the way she handled things. I mean seriously she couldn’t get a simple order right. She has no common sense and does not respect her customers. I’m never going here again, a place with such bad customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wayne Aasen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3y0RjEFDsZ1YvxPl9Z961th1gC4o8pWlsaG3svPlyXVYehg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza has always been excellent. When it clearly has one pizza called HOT and SPICE with the first ingredient being listed as HOT PEPPERONI. After the manager said he doesn't have hot pepperoni, he said bye and hang up on me. Great customer service, now we have a whole pizza that the kids won't eat it. 🙄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCp1q2NdJ8iI456TiQ6ZZjo6S4pdmC-BLJW0On\u0026fid=0x0:0xfaae31e0e192a4c9"],"When":"2023-10-30"},{"Name":"Shekiba K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQzpiX6TbA7IYWgsDwXqZTl1JfdgbRJQgeAV_bnXNyRy-g6yp78Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is horrible I ordered 2 large pizza because they had special which was 2 topic 27.99 when ii go pay they charge $48 without asking me put extra toppling that I don't want like seriously that how you rip the customer will never go again","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eunkyung Kwon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8QbBfbB3hty99EF294UH5765EN21uQd87nV3J6NDBZA_Hmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit this sushi restaurant often, and it’s always a great experience. The sushi is fresh, delicious, and beautifully presented. The staff are friendly, attentive, and always make me feel welcome.

If you’re looking for high-quality sushi at a reasonable price, I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXurKrffUqVOG-xCGFNV1-iEQHmtuhG-zFucBI&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Ian Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPXqdCYowBQ_CfYk2HQttHh7IDBeUHX7Du1VtrT_RMZb6-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of my friends recommended this restaurant and it was so good today
Food is awesome and fresh also enough quantities.
Sushi is great and even ramen is good too
My recommendation menu is Deluxe combo
Servers are so kind
Price is reasonable
Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfl1My_AqQ5NX-Na8t-pEeB7o4X82urvdjXJw&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very satisfying bento box lunch! Staff are attentive even in a busy lunch. Green tea was served as soon I placed my order. Tea was nice and hot, served in a very cutesy tea cup with sushi and sashimi design. Followed by a nice, hot, not overly salty miso soup. After just a few minutes, bento box was served. Beef teriyaki is tender, not too sweet-not too salty, perfect for my taste buds! Prawn tempura was perfectly fried, airy but substantially appetizing, vegetable spring roll is crunchy and not greasy, vegetable tempura consists of yam, sweet potato and acorn squash are equally delicious, California roll is simply irresistible! Everything is 5 star except the salad, which has a lot of dressing. Overall, it was a good meal! Located at 207 Street, Maple Ridge BC, easy accessible from Lougheed Highway or Dewdney Trunk Road.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwKyq6gqLdYZ5cp0mfJfw1N_OWPan3NEAySHM&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Sky Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsnlFBmRy7tyi6QC1WQMYS-_XgUyK7bm7m7BJrwzV_4Y89SkWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their lunch special is on another level. The portions are huge and offer a variety of selections. Needless to say, the taste is great.

However, the quality of service could be improved. They ran out of trays, so I had each dish served individually, which resulted in a pretty big gap in between. I received the karaage only after finishing all the other food. Additionally, a server forgot about our beer, so we had to wait for a while and ask another server for it again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuWCPoI_R_1___NHTguJEGnU4YZtkX-f2MAnpW&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"JOY N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLByk_DtKe11r1xKloMPLR9l4eCSw7rmxqnoF5M1-9uuakdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed the dinner in wonderful restaurant. My kids like Donkatsu and cali rolls, udong. The pork cutlet(donkatsu) was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, and the meat was soft, so it was good for children to eat. Salmon poke was well seasoned and went well with vegetables. Salmon sushi is fresh and soft, delicious! Very kind staffs. Thanks! (Want to eat now!!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQBpwlfu6tCzKPU7kQoQmdqbYWUkKJJntfQqSh&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"DIIMIDOSE Mineral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQNWs0yEkOwk1jNu86jwF6IfrjSnApXJ6_zs8EV5QwFxJIdOU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have fast service, I visit probably once a week, they know there customers and always make me feel happy to come back. I love their Dynamite roll and tempura the best and have brought some of my family there too! I never really had sushi much before going here but it was such I nice place I wanted to keep coming back <3! Something I especially love is even though they get lots of take out orders their service for dine in never suffers, I can't say the same for a lot of places around here so its really nice to see!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherwin Quilay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU46rfoheSfvIQONToEKkejzhkSa1wImF0GNRLIYDvcMziumOlP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful experience! Celebrated our fathers 75th birthday and they welcomed our party of 10.  We extended our stay for a total of 2 1/2 hours and they gladly welcomed us!  I got their salmon poke bowl and it is amazing!  Will definitely stop by when I'm in the are next!  Food prices are very competitive:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmt7MLI3z37d9uV-xFwLUiSYszkSZ7xszPREaZ&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Andre Hylton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_PChy1Th0kOGUfQeikUPffIevYW6u7GEJEnZ-s8pmdSDTb2GM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this sushi restaurant today, and while the food was quite enjoyable, I found the service could use improvement. The staff seemed a bit inattentive, especially when it came to checking in for drink refills or additional orders. It would be great if they were a bit more responsive to customer needs, especially for basics like water. Overall, the food was good, but a little more attentiveness from the staff would make the dining experience even better.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Dairy Queen Grill & Chill
address: 20492 Lougheed Hwy., Maple Ridge, BC V2X 2P8
descriptions: Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barendina Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4gAXNw7bsOWNo-qAPQuFfFYX-uW_wVZHByRe8lPzJaAZZQQG6pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Well I'd like to address prices. It's getting out of control how expensive it's becoming to go put to eat, & have a treat, not just just at Dairy Queen!

A mini blizzard, which is by the way micro mini size of inside of small palm is $6 & almost $7.5 for small, which is still very small. Photos are added so u can get a price example. It's just getting out of hand.

Although this location is 1st location I've been to in a while that's listened to me asking for extra pickles, there was little condiments on our burgers, which made them dry. I had to ask for more mustard & used ketchup packages.

Now let's move on to the Blizzard. This is what was most disappointing. $6 for this little tiny thing & she didn't hang it upside down when she brought it to me (I didn't know they were supposed to do) cuz I've never purchased blizzard before.  After she gave to me I walked to car & picked up spoon & was like wait a minute, this is milkshake texture so I went back inside asking her & her response "When I gave it to u it was thick"

I'm pretty sure that only took maybe 3 min from time she gave it to me till time I walk back in with it. Hardly not enough time for it to go from blizzard thickness to liquid that was running off spoon. I asked her to remake it, she was not very happy about that. The 2nd one she gave me was better, not thick, but better...at least it didn't fall out of cup when she hung it upside down 2nd time LOL

I got the new flavor Oreo chocolate brownie & it did not taste like chocolate at all, there was no brownies in it at all. Maybe it was just this location, I don't know. Wasn't very happy with it at all.

Moving along to cakes.... wow wow wow. Inflation sure has shown in the prices of these ice cream cakes. Almost $60 for most of them with tax,  gross!!

Stick with the value meal that includes a 🍨 much better buck","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHbvEsyOjl7xT-tYl9diDKmB1rykUbXMgfTjTz&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Adolfo Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk76S2kbhMbdiRSvTJO85jQ-iHosG75dMnnm-bv3ncX6tkFuc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unacceptable Customer Service

I had an extremely disappointing experience with this Dairy Queen location. Due to a glitch in the DQ app, my orders were mistakenly sent to this store instead of my default location. When I realized the mistake, I contacted the store to resolve the issue and requested a refund for the unclaimed orders. Despite being reassured multiple times by Dairy Queen’s corporate team that the franchise owner was contacted, I have yet to hear back from them after three follow-ups over nearly three weeks.

I strongly recommend caution if you choose to order online from this store, as they appear unwilling to assist or resolve customer issues. Don’t say you were not warned!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQbGzoFomJ7Ulq4-MtAr_xQmCjiYmNrAiS9sxo&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Scarlett Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR2nrPTmLtOAwVlMAEXvQQ3zVqd8VJ-NS2NBUuOPC1WrxNnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave 0 stars I would.  Pulled through the drive thru last night and ordered the same exact meal I always order at any other dairy queen.  The chicken strip meal deal.  And asked to upgrade the dessert to a snack size blizzard.  Normally this meal is 13 dollars anywhere else. So I was shocked to hear 18 dollars when I got to the window.  I said um no... I always order this exact same meal and it's 13 dollars with the upgrade.  The staff said oh we don't do that you have to pay for the blizzard separately.  I said you're the only dairy queen around that does this... you can cancel that whole order then.  I then proceeded to the other dairy queen in town and low and behold I only paid 13 dollars.... management really needs to train their staff better.  Not to mention they are insanely slow at food preparation I had to wait 15 minutes for two cars infront of me to get their food.  Seems excessively slow for "fast" food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sister Carmen Herrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPRWAIjWri-AtghrtLshw0FpoIF6m4cG0RmjFzKebqCTsETIc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very disappointed.  The staff told me it was ok to eat the pineapple on my banana split even though it tasted fermented.  He reassured me it was a fresh batch of pineapple that just arrived and that it was meant to taste a bit sour.  I was sick later because of it.  The worst part is that it was my birthday and I was looking forward to a treat. Bad customer service or at least poorly trained staff. Will not eat there again.  The salads also leave a lot to be desired. Wendy’s salads are better for about the same price or less. Disappointed.
Recently at my local Dairy Queen in poco I asked if whether the pineapple is supposed to taste fermented and they said no. They even gave me a sample.  It was sweet and didn’t make my tongue tingle nor was it fizzy like it was releasing gasses nor anything like the one I had in Maple Ridge the previous week.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Hamming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXF7zvrQBkhho5z2JaufXuwtctcjmHV3IQU5eLESqsRmXktAY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got more like a milkshake than McFlurry. They remade it for me… the exact same way/milkshake consistency. This is a pic 2 mins after I got it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwkH51v3UbPt0AnCaFseZGgiSCIT7nubCKTSmH&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Manpreet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLZ8pTdnPBbG-WNZ73ySzFycC-YyHoY4RJzCBa0-HkPh53W1E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just got my poutine from this place 30 minutes back. Looks like they barely put gravy in it. Its so dry and all the cheese is in middle. There was 3 girls they were so busy in taking. It could be a understandable if there was a big lineup of customers. No one was in the store neither on a drive thru. Very poor customer service and presentation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4t1oDfOsmF2ez39JbXCbLJvfLu9jNIfRdD_Nu&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2022-10-15"},{"Name":"Ashley T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMgfJ5BeDkQBH8GDtey-vspO4L3doO-eFOQV3K5TUrfzOefg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Placed an order and it came to $30. Gave the guy $40 and he gave me a nickel back and left. Lol. I was dumb enough to stand there in shock for a minute before he left, but once it sunk in I tried to get his attention and was ignored. It’s possible that he was just confused, and then once he left he couldn’t hear me, but now that I’m reading these reviews I honestly don’t buy it. It seems like there’s something sketchy and off about this particular DQ.

Of course I could be wrong, and maybe it’s just that they hire people with special needs, which would actually be pretty cool. However, if that’s the case, there should still be a minimum requirement that the cashier be able to do grade 1 level math.

Word of warning to those who go here: double check your change! Better yet, don’t even go here. I know personally, I won’t be back, and hey, both my wallet and my waistline will only thank me for it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doris Escaravage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO3Yqt2t_lz040wu2YKnWfTpYtwu7zd3tuAMWCuwkfdyhDXC4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there with my grandkids. Of course they loved it, they love ice cream! Service was quick, and tables and washrooms were clean.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole Netik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3A-4p8_N-oUSsIfBHH-j4qnuWMdZ7W5Wic2AIeJhdFOboRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter and I went to Me n' Ed's last night on an impulse. We are always really careful about the restaurants we visit because she has celiac and unfortunately gets sick with the smallest amount of cross contamination.  It was super busy in there with a steady flow of customers but that didn't affect their customer service! Staff was kind and took their time to listen and was upfront with telling us about wait times (completely understandable with how many people were in there!)
The pizza was ready quicker then we anticipated, it was hot, delicious and loaded with toppings!! And the best part, safe from cross contamination for my daughter!
Thanks for a great experience, we will definitely be back 🍕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsjH-yuMueg5pU-k-PAHZgxSK9gmYy8iAM_QOl&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Afsana Tabibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzp6b-InW6PAK15vNh9v8ga8zbWmNjzR0Dlq305Lj5B3Ej-HpL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thought we would try Me-n-Ed's for the first time tonight, and it was a major let-down. We ordered a large half pepperoni half cheese with garlic jalapeno aioli, sriracha ranch, and garlic parm cheesy bread sticks. The pizza crust was some weird philo-pastry/pita bread/uncooked dough mix. I don't get it. The bottom of the crust had separated from the rest of the pizza so, the bottom was well-done and the part that had separated was undercooked. The cheese was so thick and hardened by the time we got it home. I ate two slices because I was hungry (generally food tastes better when you're hungry but not this time) but I threw the rest out. I hate throwing out food and leaving bad reviews because I appreciate local businesses, but this pizza was poorly made. I wouldn't go back and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone who enjoys a slice of great tasting pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEidUFp4IIa5NpzQHTtjxbEkPHfpsPg4s35XnZ&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Crystal V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy_8JzOAdXYM50ytFR2HidA0G9Xsyge4e68t8ePZBmeAOiPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza in Ridge. Always loaded with toppings, always delicious. My whole family and extended family enjoys Me n’ Ed’s, it’s always the go to when they’re in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAJyRLFQX3sla7T4BsmByln9cnJ9rMFCuEQk7u&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"H S Madan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTu4oMkDk1Z3MjNV_7rONLy371tsTTJL-xX0jcQ-rhkA8blIkVlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had to give this place a try. The pizza was good but was it worth $70 for 2 pizzas. It was not that good. I feel if you are going to charge that high of a premium for a pizza it's gotta deliver to that value. And unfortunately it did not. There was nothing special worth going back for, and that's really not to say that the pizza was not good. But I feel it was just over priced for what you get. The sauce could have had a little more flavor or zest. And the crust was the same. I would not consider this place to be a premium pizza quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Maguire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUjvEOVle_CBxHwXITIP_j1rPXSVCppH7zmN159uXpTYLu6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Monday night special pepperoni pizza and the Godfather pizza because the delivery took a bit longer than expected they gave us our meal for free! No complaints from our end, they just realized and took care of it for us. What exceptional customer service! We will definitely be ordering from here again! Not to mention this pizza is fantastic! Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rafael Aguirre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE6LgR-ngDwq-zcl5ddKp8YqAVzKXAfrvyM0U1OJg8S8G4mI9J=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am Pizza lover, I tried good pizzas from Italy, France, Chile and Argentina but I tried only once a good pizza in Canada and today I tested the second best from Me n Eds. I was so surprised from the pizza base, it was delicious!. The only point to improve in my opinion is to stop using product from cans, like mushrooms and peppers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me & Ed's Maple Ridge 🍕🎉
First time at this location.
Same great Me & Ed's food.
If you like thin crust (crispy thin) you will love their pizza; if you are a think bready crust lover -- you probably will not.
The toppings are super fresh - and every pizza is loaded with toppings (right to the edge).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNilhuXZWkxXwmFkInpH9ZeOcFzyPGwvjI1eHyF&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Ellen Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgbvr2VXIxmQAp2oX9KxXclaEeljzeGNAPzr2u-tCnpyZ0sXzZ9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for a casual lunch. prompt & attentive service, clean and updated atmosphere. Food was very fresh, tasty and very budget friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ3o5FgRVt7hYQyf59brPus5yBTc4VJwjDf9Kn&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-12-9"}]

title: Agri Mexican Cantina and Fried Chicken

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Strange Protocol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpcS4LA5T7o-BiPIQZEMAIs6czOPJCu3Z_Aks4N2sDFZy5FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not sure if something has changed with business ownership but both the food and overall experience has gone down !

1) Got charged for Meat Tacos but I had ordered veggie tacos. Only came to know when I asked them to send me receipt. The cashier confirmed it's veggie but just mislabeled, sure but than I had remind Cashier to refund me the difference which he did but the whole interaction seemed bizarre.

2) Ordered 4 piece chicken meal. Their online menu says it comes with Gravy, but it didn't so I had to buy one. It's fine but no consistency in pricing / displayed menu between online / offline pricing.

3) Food is not great. Veggie tacos were the saddest I ever had, they were very small portioned for what these guys charged. There were barely any beans, sauce. Not even a hot sauce was given on the side, had to settle for bland tacos with poor filling.The taco shell were white and tasted like the one you get from superstore, just not great.  4 piece chicken was meh, it didn't taste same as before ,  soggy ..chewy meat. probably meat was not fresh, who knows. Only good thing was fries were not soggy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mel Renter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEfQZDOgiGzmykYdPan5EnxDCYzS6ax3Bu0T-k0IRV3HYDAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good, will try most things eventually. Had three beef three chicken tacos on soft flour today. Good value, appreciative staff. For us, the hot sauce in the order was golden. I even called there to find out what kind…home made was the answer. No surprise !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Derman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeXMApt_w0BmokoenlHKya2iQgrMJdxA6HQ6y4TkU6YvmIipI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had them come to our grade 7 party at the elementary school. They were great to deal with, decent prices and really great food! Would highly recommend them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sad Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6NHrR0PaN5pDML6wiVposjZvLXjrsyHV9Cssb9Rt_dJH-L8q8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a shadow of a doubt, this is one of, if not THE BEST taco places I’ve ever had the pleasure of eating at, and I’m not just saying that because I was ravenously hungry. You’d be missing out if you didn’t eat here at least once.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdYW_WcRSplgCknqyw_ou-UIcLqtlctjImZLTZlLBg4sOZ7tlM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here 3 times now and service & food are always great. Please give them a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Ziebart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5RLE9bx4QU3El7VapnXcR3LTkWEnowF9-VETyYPASEQgmyO8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chimichanga was amazing, hug portion. The poutine was absolutely amazing too! The food truck was at Tinhouse brewing (amazing beer too), and was a hit with everyone! Will definitely eat and recommend it to anyone!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"william winslowhansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs6UFthdNPb2nMPDzj8Fn1ahJf-ni1YT6iOWaJXFBL1czXpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent food truck . Had burrito and fried chicken . Fried chicken was different one of a kind and cooked very well .
Spicy .
The beef burritos was fresh and tasty . Could have used more beef and in general I prefer the shredded beef style opposed to ground beef.
Overall tho I’d call this a win .
I’d eat there again .it was pretty good","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dominic Kohler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr_Rds6INzk8uBD6vTiDGl0q4vd8v53cFPe8-iHXMsWrqpx1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally tried the food truck after seeing all the good reviews. As a celebration for getting my license and being able to drive on my own I stopped by to treat myself. I've heard so many good things. I ended up choosing the large chicken burrito. It was made fresh and ready to go in 5 minutes. Has a few errands to run but it was still hot when I came home. Lots of great flavors going on, I loved the seasoned chicken as well as the choice of veggies also. The rice was quite nice as well, was like a purple color, so that was new for me. Lots of fresh quality ingredients went into this. The Chipotle sauce that comes in it was to die for. It was so good and was a cherry on top to this already good burrito. I highly recommend it to everyone, stop by pick up some beers at Ridgeway and a burrito.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ardalan mahjoubi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjC76zpSP_u1iKxJl50EXoC8H3yR8AQLam7nDsdlwVpjDhQPao=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Big Feast Bistro is an absolute gem! The food is fresh, flavorful, and thoughtfully prepared, with a great variety of options to please any palate. The cozy atmosphere and friendly, attentive staff make it a perfect spot for a casual meal or a special occasion. Don’t miss their locally-sourced ingredients and creative menu — highly recommend!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORYSHJtVLswL4X-zIBr5A_DI2yw0214FR96G9F&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Izzy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAgf2kUFFUPOmbKxXV6w4FXEglUD9hHripnX8rOvq95I8uwQcTgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this restaurant! As someone who needs gluten-free options, I was thrilled to see so many choices on the menu.

The food was delicious, and the service was fantastic—attentive, friendly, and accommodating. The only hiccup was the choppy radio, but when we asked if they could turn it off, they were incredibly kind and took care of it right away.

Highly recommend for anyone looking for a friendly spot with excellent service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5eIdOA3ydo5p3PS96aP375FXyb4pIT9Q7hZg-&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Kristine Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGP_smfmYAXXxdYn6kX34hvFr9mR1IvLF3TA-_x61hquGska6i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely marvelous server :) I had so many dietary restrictions, and she made sure I got exactly what I could eat. She wasn't short or annoyed at me at all, which I really appreciated. Thank you, nice server ♡
And the salad was delicious as well. I can't wait to go back ♡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM3hO99UAYTOGSWLJsttOF_RGvKQHzeznjceFo&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Maria Teo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWyktuFjeslZVKUjk8Q5cAT0oRtHf1mhF8v-MshhF0aeQQodU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was great!! We had the salmon benny (3.5/5) and the pulled pork hash (5/5) for brunch! The bistro was clean and has nice decor. Our service was a bit slow when we dine in but staff members were very friendly. I would definitely go back 😄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPWHOuxTroWCk7vTSJMMFIzHhTvLZau6tGyPwj&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot in maple ridge with really good food and service. The tacos were amazing. Gets really busy during peak times so be ready to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqgiVxecbAj9pT8-aq7nxoDkzoio8mxgqR3kxf&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Kyle G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK72jrQUOno3MgtLl1WKy-Lz_eO61EdbiS2qO4YAE9hJAly_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite far from Vancouver.

Came here to meet some friends for Saturday brunch.

Ordered the Big Feast Grilled Club and sneaked a few bites of the Breakfast sandwich.

The grilled club had thick crisp bacon, chicken breast, lots of mayo, shredded lettuce and a side of salted fries. The club was a bit messy/fell apart, fries were crisp and salted just right. Overall the club was good and would order again.

My sneak bites of the breakfast sandwich with roti as the bun were good but the side roasted potatoes were a bit burnt and carbonized which was a bit off putting. I would try the breakfast sandwich next time but with a different side maybe with fries if they could substitute. The carbonized potatoes were just off putting and I don’t think I’d enjoy the rest of the meal because of that.

Staff were nice and attentive always came by refilling beverages.

I would recommend and definitely say give it a try if in the neighbourhood but not so much trek from Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUmd2RqDI-EfOrMMgoERD42-nQGneS23YaRbxL&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is fantastic restaurant. I enjoyed everything about this restaurant. The service is optimistic and professional. I like the design of the interior, despite the small venue space. I ate there for lunch and had the Lennon's French Toast. It was the best French toast I have ever had at any establishment. All of the ingredients pay compliments to each other and taste great altogether. The coffee was not just great, it was Grade-A quality. I hope to come back to Big Feast Bistro very soon when I am in Maple Ridge again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3_5WxTHzhY1ttn8VTIuxmZW2fbMK6T64vznqn&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"Shirley Treger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHx6Pc61V0ABlvEQKFkcuPpCGH2YyflokfZ6ACHcUWA7KJxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is sooo Delicious. I would definitely recommend this to Everyone. Breakfast: What's your story morning glory..Yummy 😋 Meat loaf...just like mama made. My friends and I go there whenever we are in the area.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Colton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBfLmjIHS2JcyxfSk4KJvyJztcX_GoDC87RimZ30EsZPeovi5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered two Backyard BBQ Burgers, both were made incorrectly missing standard items.

Buns were overcooked and quite hard, overall just pretty bad.

Photos looked great, food looked extremely opposite.

Maybe potential for the chicken to be alright on another day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPHw0waa9drFW5_ICy4Z-H7u0zJkzF5enA1oHo&fid=0x0:0x4a80ce605c8bfd04"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Shane Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjfOe23w0jik-lBALaYSthGHVwG6dVJXu6Ilh0nUzHQpWQFx66=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely one of worst food orders I’ve ever gotten!
Chicken strips had sauce poured over them and showed up like mush.
Only got three not four stops on both orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Uppenborn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFks0324b7LzgOJ6phwHKVuYePwk0YiLsaCqJXk77q978a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food for pretty decent prices, incredible beer prices too","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marisa K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi7SX2QVAXxFvj7573IifKFZ8CRitFIgTfzmHwC6PM_IedvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I frequent Sushi Misoya quite a few times throughout the year and it’s always been really good! Their fish tastes fresh, never “fishy” like some other sushi restaurants in Maple Ridge.

I always do take-out so I cannot speak to what a dine-in experience is like (their dining area is limited), but their online ordering and pick-up service is smooth and seamless. The staff always greets me upon walking in and is kind and friendly during checkout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuLqfOYv8hDtWapXG1ygxmwF-u5aUdaW_YIdOs&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"E Melo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGgY2yvtEUZjjmIeI3CkEsrZ_2cfgxymAQyKJ9_Agamx8ifCVJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite sushi restaurants in the entire Lower Mainland! They’re always friendly and their California Rolls taste more fresh than 99% of the Japanese restaurants out there. Every food I’ve ordered from there is great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXail0hFaAr6UWwh19nZb5xdJGv0KAVLSD1VnM8OXnts_-tYe0Nrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service is quite prompt and friendly, space inside is kind of small around 6 tables but clean and cozy. We ordered miso soups and takoyaki which was very tasty and they even gave us a salad bowl on the house. The rolls were tasty, the scallops didn't taste the freshest but it was still good. I would recommend this place and come back myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLjFkFaC5H75XtyvXaII_NDspTBAbczrTWSjmI&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2018-9-14"},{"Name":"Ingrid Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpJ7BDSOGvowBGNTTCIxIzO8iKdPQulZrzi56sGNYHPbL7Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is good there and the service is attentive. It’s a small place with 4 booths and 1 small table.

You got to choose what you want in your combo, for around CAD15. The portion is good enough for one person. Everything comes with miso soup and salad.

There is some parking space right outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Lt-lvTfPY-99P8uH4yqTDsZFJDJuESUjUh33&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2020-1-5"},{"Name":"K G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdwVGlhF7NS5T1ernsxiY-PjGbDSDg6Aw0Kx8ABcKDVRDfs2C0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Family owned restaurant, you can see and taste the perfection when they give you the food! I recommend this place for any sushi lovers that want high quality sushi for low price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFxsTBHwmmziGu71czYVYUNpi2QO6StdC3bCN5&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2019-11-2"},{"Name":"Michael Xie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuofARxYvhwxxfylcnz8mBM0K5uLGN7Ke55RRoKhlEZOs358vlwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"super average why is this 4.8 stars?! Super inflated reviews, not even the best in Maple Ridge. Meh portions, especially disappointing portions for the salmon sashimi don.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfs8vrN0sBOwgn1kkF-gXwanJ97__TpInvVgTj&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2020-6-12"},{"Name":"jenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMDNH73B45edbJ-7F4SvngcK2zjK2JiHx8MJO6rHWM7lSkol_x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised with this place! First time eating here, I got the chicken katsu don. Ingredients tasted fresh, it wasn’t greasy or heavy, very delicious! Will definitely be going back to try more things on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaA9WIXHbqEAvgxkySZU9u_R-ka45gbpxdAPMQ&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2022-1-16"},{"Name":"singularity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHFnDOdkU9T5qm5o_YnaVlnciYMccPnEi9y4lS5alwLGo8pX4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found Sushi Misoya on google, based on great reviews. I get really fast friendly service right away. After ordering, the food come really fast to. I just found my favorite sushi restaurant. Highly recommended! Much thank you Sushi Misoya. Dōmo arigatō gozaimashita.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnCnuPrEPDJFhs6-QXCKNyDhIdzmLXOlM9G70K&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2019-8-17"}]

[{"Name":"Meghan Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuN2091M3PHiXBZZK2j6OwUAW7w9V1jpRVrE9H5Y0rQ7RDrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was told I can’t get my sandwich because it was an hour before closing then watched the staff answer the phone in the same gloves they answered the phone in and made a chicken salad when I said I am vegetarian. Beyond disappointed.

When I told staff she did this she said “huh” want it or not ?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Priya Badhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUWrpdymoiG3drKefuP1fHuEVUxK_kqe7u0-JFka_xzidrhRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just ordered my Santa Fe Salad from them. And couldn’t really taste anything else except lettuce. Paid $12 just to eat Lettuce not worth at all. Staff wasn’t very accommodating or friendly no greetings no smile on their face. Looks like they have been forced to work there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF3Un32WM30uhzYCYq05McMFVNxw1YupiPeytb&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Zeevy Jimenez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJeVIBfbtP6oYQmWJyFgTiDdISEA4yjzvnzN_fgN_UiKSbx0W1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I visit, the atmosphere here is filled with warmth and friendliness. The staff goes out of their way to make me feel special, and the speed at which they prepare my food is impressive. It's not just about the quick service, though – the food consistently hits the spot with its delicious flavors. This delightful combination of friendly faces, speedy service, and mouthwatering meals turns each visit into a delightful experience that I eagerly look forward to every time I visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here often for lunch for their Cranberry Pesto Chicken Sandwich on sourdough bread. It's so good and even better with their side of housemade ranch dressing! 🤤 I haven't experienced any bad customer service here. Staff are friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnh0RpVFiudnvQ41wLNK-pPR9PhKuGjVlRwuBG&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2022-8-28"},{"Name":"Joshua Boonstra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKexLwOewLLv2smIlc1UOjiRSXbUcIeZJpeo5K1-29txdUbMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily the best experience I’ve ever had ordering food and never wrote a review really but I felt I had too after today, the staff were suuuuper friendly and helpful as I have never been to a chopped leaf before. Very accommodating and I felt very taken care of, the service was very 500/5 and the atmosphere was very welcoming. to anyone on the fence about coming to this location I highly recommend you do… you won’t regret it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joseph Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtSTYiZq8sXRIg3y_SANpXr7I2Vr5frKUdU0ff6HebRfIPeezJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good! Flavors are actually bold, so keep that in mind if you don't normally like spicy food.  If you're craving a salad and are tired of bland food, this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOy8Ucs8Tf7L9k-lh_wzWicgJxKkZ-akfjgfRh&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2018-8-23"},{"Name":"Katrina H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3DY-iPyg4ZaAxHH4bZxfnPwriuRSKUXq0qKjcA6Ro1jVWY69c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was greeted by one of the owners when I entered, and noted that he introduced himself to each of the guests and stopped for a chat. Lovely customer service. This shop is brand new and still working out the kinks (so be patient) but the food is outstanding and worth it. I found out later that you can order online for pickup in store, too! Looking good Chopped Leaf Maple Ridge!! Thanks for a great lunch :D (I had bowl 3 (greek) and the mango iced tea - yumm! The food didn't last for the photo so you get to see the recyclable packaging I brought it home in! )","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN73gN7J4grtkCseCd2qA5ajqCzjdQHBnfRNYtJ&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2018-3-30"},{"Name":"charanjeet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsAfih1E0KLXFtn223q7Tb3cuWu0AEtQUZN_g3KrbY8miyIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It is definitely the worst, smelly, disgusting chopped leaf i ever had. Front counter teenager girl doesn’t know how to treat client. They were all rude and laughing. She put tons hot sauce and dont want to remake it and want to charge for it. Even the manager didn’t care and she said go for the review, she don’t care.
My recommendation, try somewhere else.
Chopped leaf is good but not this store","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Michelle Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJocMZyiQsTomlB5wIT8XWBYE0ZxEkl_aCennxKWYM5ZP7ang=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered for Halloween. This is my third order from here. The others have all been quite good but tonight the large pepperoni was very overcooked and kind of like cardboard. This was the handcrafted. The pan veggie was good. But the handcrafted pepperoni was not!  Too bad because we were so looking forward to it.
Staff was friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shannon Roodenrys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3lOg16w73yu3uuprunG3AOjKfP4_dQUxykD_4suJ_XZmnyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sat Oct 5th (I think)
Walked in to order take out. Was told about a 15 minute wait. Went in again to pick up after 15 minutes and then had to re order and wait some more due to a technology glitch. System down! Young lady was very pleasant. When I finally got food, it was good n hot","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Warren King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhEYUtjiaHqTPCDxqH6xHBeSpgYOQ6lTsEzWD4fFDTnz_NKAMZ3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered for the second time in a while (their new crust was good last time so tried again).  Pizza got delivered and was terrible, the peperoni was have just bread, no toppings!  Called for 30 mins before someone finally answered, they finally agreed to deliver a replacement.  The guy just dropped it off at the door an we didn't know it was there.  Last time ordering here, don't do it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carl - Pinnacle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJX-l3Zg4ENLvaQ2BkXSSePno8LlJ2gNfHqPUFB4ZEpqTOi6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Everytime an online order is placed, the ordering system either fails or you spend 30+ mins trying to get transferred to the store, they never answer the phone at the store and always divert to the main call centre. Constantly things are forgotten from orders and rarely show up correct. Hands down the worst Pizza Hut location in all of BC and that’s saying something.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manthan kaushal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVreUKKbyBuL1rDd3rHCEU5fDRo7eKuUo_XTKDp9VeX_MheiuuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"To this particular pizza hut's management. Ordered a pizza today at 9 and got a confirmation that it will be delivered in 30, cool!. Called your customer service rep after an hour+ wait and even they got embarrassed coz they were unable to connect me to your store to ask what's goin on?. Went to your store and it was closed before your actual closing time. Took the mentioned pic at 10:30 PM. Check your staff. Worst experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXoJS3Qu3dyN7d2SP5sWMZh9vD0cX_oFDrNBrW&fid=0x0:0xa37b1ccd45646da5"],"When":"2021-8-17"},{"Name":"Mario Figueroa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgyVpZ-MEyPnVPYI2HzYRQ9qtKaunlIOUGDz3B-UIJlQfPgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm surprised pizza hut hasn't disappeared yet all of their bigger eat in restaurants are gone though cuz business isn't that good anymore. Chicken seasar medium pizza is $28 after taxes are you kidding me??? They use cheap ingredients nowadays they forget the competition out there is plenty and abundant pizza hut is a rip off I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GREEDY PIZZA PLACE stay away there's way better deals out there my family and I are done with pizza hut they're out to gauge the customer every time you walk in their pizzas have increased in price they're roothless do they think people get wage raises every month????","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaspreet Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMn9Y7OgyTHCI0dvowhzMfvajkjJ5D-MZ1SWwg-z4_cxSqrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer service ever they never pick the phone we tried 4-5 times sitting in the front of their store they was busy with gossiping each other nobody pick up the ph the guy name emiuel was very rude","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn-lvwTGMhUxCV421M_xqu_u5MrGrT6chcjNAjFFyrJKuOzGho5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is one delivery guy here that does a great job. But the rest of them are incredibly inept.

One guy who has been to my building MULTIPLE times still can’t operate the buzzer. Another can’t seem to figure out how to open the door when the thing buzzes. They barely speak, and have no customer service skills.

Today the guy brings me pizza and his debit machine battery is so low that the machine won’t process the payment. So he leaves and days he’ll be right back to collect payment. He has to go get a new machine. Two hours later I had to call the store to find out what’s happening. I can’t wait all night for a guy who can’t figure out how to do the basics of delivering pizza to decide to come back to get the money.

The person who answers the phone hands it to the delivery guy who gets on the phone AND DOESN’T TALK. After about 30 seconds he says, “I’m the delivery guy”. I asked him when he was coming back because I can’t sit here and wait all night, and he said “oh, I’ll come right now.” HE WASN’T EVEN PLANNING ON COMING AT THAT TIME! He totally did not care how long I was waiting for him. Like a complete narcissist, he just figured he’d show up sometime before midnight when he felt like it?!!!! I mean seriously. I told him if he wasn’t here in 30 min he could forget about it because I won’t be home.

So now he says he’s on his way.

I then talked to the manager. I told him what happened and he couldn’t even manage a simple conversation. He barely said a word and had no idea what to do or what to say. And that’s when I realized this Pizza Hut is staffed by the people who can’t hold a job anywhere else and that no one from management down cares about anything at all. They’re just insipid space fillers… if I owned this Pizza Hut I would close it down because clearly the owner also doesn’t care about his business.

One competent delivery guy. I order from here once a week and the only thing that’s more frustrating than their garbage service is the fact I have kept doing business with them for the past year+.

No more. That’s the last time.","Images":null,"When":""}]
