user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ash R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVYs1oeCHR54zxfCo6bEatUrXY4UJPN4r3IiQiG3icAtrJKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HUGE portions, we got 4 items for $17 and the plates were huge! So worth the money, love to support mom and pop shops, you won’t regret it! We all left with takeout containers filled to the brim after we were stuffed. Best egg rolls ever! Great Service, very friendly and accommodating. I’d rate higher if I could. Ps- photos were after we ate some lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh5QUNhT5I-xHPQug30c4P-vOE7Q2a9qZiTzbm&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Ash R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCcJlHwE4izM0F5v3JT69CAyK03CVkDSxImo4puINMRF5V7q8eog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was recommended to us, so we ordered two daily specials yesterday for dinner pick up.

Staff: I believe it was the owners that I interacted with. They are so efficient, warm and friendly!

Food: The prices have gone up since the menu pictures posted on here. So the daily special is now $15.95 for 3 items and wonton soup. But the portions are refreshingly large, and the food is delicious! ☺️👍🏽
(Pictured is the mushroom fried rice, pork chop suey and sweet & sour pork. Wonton soup not pictured, but I would say it's a 2 cup sized container).

Parking: There is some street parking out front. Which is great for pick up.

Highly recommend and we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsBCY_VR9xw8nTt6iCU2yAv-5lDUiqwh1mNMAJ&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Dante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJJBsnDt-Jyx-wWvCneLo2yoEFwzv6R1zGdLk7DybFf-Xv7HBL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food served in absurd portion sizes made by a lovely husband and wife team. You will definitely leave with enough food for another meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZRpQbd1dwXrnY6BMQdJFpzOfV_73k8tc9HofC&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Robyn G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9GXkw-9s6-iB_2NgpG9t2eLiMtiw6ShgHbyNxnStcj0ZIWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time we ordered from here. We've tried every other Chinese food place here in maple ridge. Wow we are blown away. This is what you call authentic Chinese food. Big portions. Definitely will be our go to Chinese food restaurant! Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Stanowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcBriTpE9lCmUCcexEfwU5vbtIxzzdMxIMDrT2rcWMt02YOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don’t let the dated building fool you, this is great food! Everything was cooked perfectly and super flavourful. AND THE PORTIONS ARE HUGE! I had to stop only a third of the way in, I was stuffed! Excellent experience, we are very satisfied and happy. THANK YOU!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP_uLyk1zMWmgImheBgdF1lLEMymkepPNcc_we&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"SALLY YOUNG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfcu_oZoQJtUA7Yjtpc8LxpW0k-K7e3GcuoTzP9-IlkP9Llw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had chinese food for Xmas eve. Food was ready on time and we ordered several dishes and all were very good.  The couple who own it are very friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cdn Chick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU545v6W7r-6x-UEIb8QlKT_isW0v2lWx4NGtJqmJLsyjTjHpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small mom and pop restaurant that offers great deals and huge portions!  Best prices in town!  Thanks Peter and Lily!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPLS44vDt8ky1LGFzBKs_z92GM3WACynRcLiMK&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2023-7-23"},{"Name":"Simon Joe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0f5G4fJ3M8QEGA_STxGDiI3Ok5iguc7BSlANH3xP15ogo-pLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a small Chinese restaurant which is most likely run by a husband and wife team. The decoration is dated, but the food tastes really good, even though it may be better if the amount of salt or conditioning can be reduced a bit to suit our lighter taste. We are amazed at the speed of serving & plate sizes. The price is unbeatable too. Three big dishes of fried rice, wonton soup, cheese sandwich and fries offered more than enough for our family of 4 with 2 preteen boys. We can't believe that the total price was only a bit more than $30. What a friendly and down to earth Chinese restaurant with great value for your wallet!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM884l3nRd_9t1-MC5K57XavEsCCX_Wrdh8ccud&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2023-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brad Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQyFNsFglxRT3PC62NhebhL95uOjnpyv1STZkZSCcY47DFig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic service and delicious food. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this unique little dinner to anyone. We have some friends coming from Australia next month, and can't wait to bring them here for an experience that will last in their memories for ever. Rachel was our server and she was so pleasant and helpful. She really made us feel special and appreciated. What a great addition to the experience, she was very professional, friendly and fun to interact with. We can't wait to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcu50mtB-OjViO7YevVbLD2g9vK2QCDE4ZbEwK&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"James McCann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeljiarzTiu1tTE6Pve6MGW2hSCoI2cGrsZixTLACpSmPcWmbb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw this place on Google Maps, so I checked it out in person.

The atmosphere is fun and colourful. It's an idyllic 50s diner. The place was busy, food was portioned well for the price, and the coffee was flowing.

What really sets it apart is the friendly and happy staff. They'll make your experience worth the visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIk5YXkjJoNnfq-0sx_mC6_ebbuxl7d81r8QXx&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"James Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGMUsvXLijMfgZydLJhU2TpG1bqPFbrelq3iJSQAmmOzYoUfG8Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was one of the best breakfast places I have been to. I ordered the tater breaky bowl, and it was amazing. The staff is very friendly and provides excellent customer service.

The atmosphere feels like I've been drawn back in time to what a 50's diner would be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAqNU1AubdZV6RxSz15QkIHjBM7ndAEkC9Hqqe&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Evelyn Gendron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBYk8tTyq0cqz3UH5nMUg42YuVptTXRc3KRfTeNu004nQIZSk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came here for the first time after wanting to try it out for years - we were not disappointed!! Everything from the breakfast to the apples to the burgers and hot dogs were delicious - and the milkshakes are huge!

Our server was friendly and attentive, the place is adorable, the bathrooms were clean - we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEKCY4yPGXzWo8X6tiUjHK6T9kQVxEQFJyix5f&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Amy Kirkpatrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-tYXmnGFTf6vwO3AxZoGNgT23JsGhX_8wq-pgvkq3nfeb3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was amazing!! Walked in and took our seat and we were immediately greeted and asked what we wanted to drink. Waitress was smiling,kind and very attentive. Great experience! Will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwWs4v9CZA9qAJDXztthwtv47cysgkRmWgGsub&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Emily Froese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbwzJWFhSYv737GuczgFrZ6CSmT-VP8dLvk90Dr6uGqW4UpDOQSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The two waitresses that were hustling their butts off really made a great impression. They were polite and courteous to the first come first serve tables, speedy with taking orders and getting everything to the table. Our food was perfectly cooked, and delicious. Sitting in to dine, there are lots of conversation starters all over the walls, memorabilia to look at. Overall a really nice experience, my boyfriend and I enjoyed our dine in with you. Thank you to all the staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCsSMYmywXJf2MNyZK8AdL9KWzVqN8NtMFqZ6i&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Erin Knipstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyyA0Cg0nJfazlD7BmLvY_VQDrKwWpSceaESwRQEYhRtSxoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a sandwich wrap with cheese and poutine on the side.  I have come here very often, I'm a regular.  It's usually delicious!  Tonight however,  the wrap was half the size it normally is and if you look at the pix, where is the cheese?  And one tiny piece of lettuce???  They put double the poutine to try to make up for it.
This place used to be awesome but the last few times I've been here...it's gone WAAAAAYYYY downhill 🤢
If I didn't say anything they would've charged me for the non-existant cheese and the whole wrap.
SERVICE IS GREAT THOUGH!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO73ctKdt-cPX_0hy_cIGNvkxS2-9T4jnK7QaOI&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Wihse Stacey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLleemwAf-XK30uwy4fv5glDOpm4ky8um81Yx_HZwfIc6-vFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My burger was awesome.  Whiskey BBQ sauce!  Can't go wrong.  50's style diner truly fits.  I loved the decor.  I'm not a huge fan of 50's music, but they had some good chair dancing tunes going.  It was a last minute choice and it was a great choice. Very good prices too.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This McDonald’s location is a bit chaotic with a large focus on drive-thru customers vs eat-in customers. Lots of the employees can be seen wearing hi-vis vests for some reason. Hard plastic seats in some areas, no unlimited ketchup dispensers, and you gotta ask for extra napkins etc. Some seating available outside but is near the drive thru so the air condition is not as healthy. Good sized parking lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNil8k9sIqli9ALPfbj-succiRGcC5XR4mDo2Bh&fid=0x0:0xdfa09f93b6371d56"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Matt Beare","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNRjUevWaJuFZgzytgDZjnKEhQ_dv5B84Si-LJc4gBIWKfjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst McDonald's in the lower mainland.
It's worth it to drive to Maple Ridgle, Poco, or even over the bridge to Walnut Grove. Slow service. And it's a 50/50 chance at best if they're going to get your order right. Even the simplest things. If do get take out, or drive through. Always check before leaving. Twice in a row now, I've got home to realize they gave me the wrong order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtEgbRr-ejXH_aXCGgR-Xw90FSZOOp4u-JZiH9WaR5p8p3EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the absolute worst McDonald’s I’ve ever been to. I literally live right beside it and I will drive to another McDonald’s just to avoid this one. The food is terrible. It’s always stale or has wilted lettuce or barely any lettuce, The orange juice is just orange , It Never has receipts at the indoor kiosk, Always out of ice cream. but the quality of the food is just garbage,Every single time.
Despite this, the people who worked there are actually very lovely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"v strom spiro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8jd9_00P0sYo_oSLs9hqORaqtTrV6C0bFpIbitB-y5Etugg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered breakfast and 15 minutes later my order number disappeared from the screen and people who ordered after me were served their meals. They swiftly took care of the drive-thru folk though! I did not get angry, I just asked for a refund. What did irritate me was the managers disingenuous " sorry about that".","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanya Whalen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQkXTZXNzSbvJfyEKweuOpjj9jjKofLdIJg2tCxNSR_f53A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Employees on their phone
Tables not clean
Garbage cans overflowing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmFr_IkC3MvdADVYngqk0qZSk_W67IlQtDIpUl&fid=0x0:0xdfa09f93b6371d56"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Shauna Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVNM3Tt90W8QlMBtj9ifwj38hSJCnpt0WU0w5LvMsLZXYTEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This McDonald's is always the best out of Maple Ridge and Port Coquitlam by Walmart.  They have a fast drive thru and always make my fries hot and crispy! Which I really really appreciate! Thankyou! My McDonald's trips are at 12am-2am when I get off work and haven't eaten all evening so I really appreciate the hot food! Especially at thoes hours!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjClbJOs9GPapvdgGT-zZiShctH-V7QEbWvhmN&fid=0x0:0xdfa09f93b6371d56"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Shannon Colquhoun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3FNIgNsU5R68TfNZ-DBK2nY-fW68Ztqm6a4Yy8xBxnXxHXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Dirtiest McDonald's I've ever stepped foot in. Never a clean table, floors are always dirty and sticky. Garbage overflowing.  I complained one day about the state of the restaurant  because my husband went to the washroom and there was blood on the sink and mirror and the manager said "ok" and that was it. I sent a message to McDonald's head office where someone said they would pass my concerns over to management for this location and that someone would get back to me and that was over a month ago and I've heard nothing. I decided to stop in for breakfast on our way out today and at 8:45 and the floor was disgusting and all the tables were dirty and sticky, there was nowhere to sit. I asked the girl when I got my food if I could get it to go because all the tables were sticky and she said ok. Didn't have anyone clean, didn't apologize.  I'm assuming that this mess didn't happen between the hours of 5am and 8am on a Tuesday morning.  Just gross.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEAOSv5jVC6PTzXaLE7mZWpYPJYqp8sTBZiysl&fid=0x0:0xdfa09f93b6371d56"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Samantha Furber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXQjaoJ57Ji3D1COp_sdErIGCOlFnsamx21fVYQINj9xJihL8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Garbages were overflowing. None of the tables were cleaned. The drink station was a mess. The floors were very dirty.  The receipt printer for the order station wasn't working, but I guess it didn't matter since they didn't bother turning on the T.V. screen for upcoming orders.  The fries 🍟 were hot, which was nice but took a while.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMhfH0f2gzioJXNz-gWKXAST4HtP-FnyIGlsYW&fid=0x0:0xdfa09f93b6371d56"],"When":"2023-8-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Immanuel M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCHQQ_gUlRsGGjwdJWcNj1pi4KH38rEIuyGH3UdE60vvwMfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a sweet local spot! I came for a latte and was back the next day with my two brothers. Sue was very kind and welcoming. The lattes aren't competition style, but they are humble and strong and delicious. They use local milk and cream in their drinks from a nearby dairy which I think is very cool. I haven't tried any of the food items yet, but I look forward to doing so. The place has a friendly rural vibe, and several of the staff have charming English accents.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-uo9vHKihmm4PGfO8A3MzHj9Hr5U6wMs7m85W&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Youstina Daoud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeI1oQ6gtNrwqS4A_rt0SN5EVhVkkzvJ-OoWvkrO4SkblbFfs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything about this place is great!
The food was amazing, we had the farmer's skillet and the classic breakfast, and the hedgehog latte. Definitely recommend all of them.
The servers are nice and the ambiance gives cozy small business vibes.
Will be coming back for sure :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiE2t5YP74dXAWukeaBO8qyHFt5Ai8ILYG6zK8&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Alison Beaumont","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaY6uJGGYnSv8oB2saqACX2u-zKme2d7xoel728eC776GS0LSj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great breakfast to start the day. Lots of patio space, dogs are welcome with water bowls provided. Wide variety of breakfast items including vegan options too. Service was fantastic too, very attentive. We had the waffles, breakfast poutine and a classic breakfast. All were good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO544TLueAtgq8qDebmD5lBoZMKLsswo7_pRljL&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Jane Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiiTPX_fDwYFOprgDX6WAKchWNE78d2wrdQHvem3ChMR34eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been in the industry and been to countless restaurants in my time in multiple cities. For real, the waffles and the brisket Benny were both the best things I’ve ever had for breakfast. The service was excellent, quick and efficient, we never had to ask for anything. ALSO, the cutest spot ever, the natural wood, chalkboards and ambience was so relaxing with our gingerbread and French toast lattes. If you’re seated near the window, there are horses grazing on the grass across the street, which certainly adds to the charm! I prefer to visit new places but this place just made a regular out of me! Can’t wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Villavicencio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV021zJ0YHPNRj720U3KCT1cAiOzy15VDJDOlEMbSztzh-Yapxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved our meals! A little too much sauce (mayo?) Yam fries were on point 👌🏽
Service was really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8cQltS2waTyjuTteWKUEndtjI-p2070Ig3moo&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Sabina Billo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX3wIYxJVhRAxcrwANARt3Jv-0wo3d-3r3UXkphNKGDs-nsouR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Roots Revival Bowl.  Look at this salad bowl.  It tasted as beautiful as it looked.  Like a symphony of flavours and textures. It was an absolute delight.  Beet Root Hummus is out of this world delicious.  The added freshly picked chive flowers were a wonderful touch.  Absolutely stunning! The service was spectacular.  They were all so helpful and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSy8yYFFHQgMWw1k003o7GtvkiZEDpHm3e3PxX&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Parneet Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqz_l5BzN5_mBY3QC7SEZWEVervEPkE_VocF-ECzkBQsGcdPO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place worth visiting while you are in maple ridge… It’s my go to spot for food after hike in golden ears provincial park. They have vegetarian and vegan options aswell. Servers and very pleasant and friendly. Their food always taste fresh. Their vegetables chicken soup is to die for.

Will be back again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQHAM_NoDHWalMqgDq9WUIALcKBBGPqvYHae2W&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Stefanie Mendo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU7lHpscLJbSk-bFdm1Hw09V6ungaauZ2dqJOsoHy0-JA1MHXL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have a craving for pirogies, then grab Verónica’s Pirogies & Eggs at Humble Roots Cafe, so delicious! They provide great service, lots of veggie and vegan options as well. Next time, I have my eye on the Cheesy Ponderosa Benny. Super cozy ambience and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBHzSw2aZ_qAu8fsmEXrHbAcNqhSPT7mqQCAnC&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-5-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ooo Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLha3s3xmeSY7rh2o_ERnihgq71l9OBGLIEI9z2gSU0QPbN-l8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Each food was really delicious.

Among them, the most important rice and fish in roll and nigiri were the best.

It's a real restaurant I found when it's hard to eat out these days.

I definitely plan to come back.

It was a very enjoyable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXd2iFnu6ty5TLDzbf4or8n8q6LHsAkQw6nqg3&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"최정웅","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX_iNn8K8HEJRBCEDUMCkRKS2noDhIAd-7g-c6AmPzY_4zmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience at Sushi Bucks. Ever since new ownership, food tastes better, dining atmosphere is great, but most importantly servers and chefs are friendly. Thank you we will be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkNn1p8xP073uF_Qmon30rcd5swkEMaCR-yL0L&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Joseph Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhoASkbG_EuL_1wpqgjKFTzBy-MumIDaWq8CCrbVHl5FHjmFw16Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend Sushi Bucks, was referred by people and it did not disappoint, from the miso, to the main dishes (see pictures). Two thumbs up 👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQXAP4Er5uDldKc53gYKQv41Qn4c5DG_vkqI3k&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"lazy Dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUo-NwuyuqQn3bmOH6pgHqWT-pBeq03slmxP8k5cQ9dteGWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I so wanted to find a new sushi place that is closer. Our go to is by the brick in Pitt Meadows. I ordered the spicy Chirashi Don for $28.95. It said 12 pieces Chefs choice. The 12 pieces were the size of my big thumb nail. She upsold me from the regular saying this one is better value. Hidden under some shredded veggies was  cut up Atlantic salmon, sockeye salmon, seared tuna, tuna and tamago. It was the equivalent of  5 pieces of nigiri ….. if that.  I should have just ordered 5 pieces of nigiri for $15. Sigh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFjf_h-OBsrlZP8Nr8WFFvJWuTXfYo1BukLZx1&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Olivia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnwt0q_oxcVcqgNWdK4QtYYhOt-CzVkkpdEeWmIp1WMa1Blulz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this sushi restaurant, and the refreshed, beautiful interior created such a welcoming atmosphere. The sushi and rolls tasted incredibly fresh, as if the ingredients were handpicked that morning! The ramen was truly a standout – absolutely delicious and full of flavor. Plus, the staff here were incredibly friendly and made the experience even better with their warm hospitality. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIm9gCMBr7ceLwyi20XCRoV-FxB91zY5XfDXc&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great Friday dinner here after a long week at work. I have to say that Sushi Bucks has some of the best food in the area, and are certainly one of the better places for Japanese in Maple Ridge. We will be back to try more of their menu. I would definitely recommend trying them too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsjNmeZWtueL7FrfTpSe48NCJO4eWm6Qs3vjlF&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Dana Noh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlmQqx5HOfp8yIOHKO7DhS9P98X-FnubtAW7-CCM9T2dJdLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've ever been to It was the best sushi  restaurant. The sushi was also very thick and sliced into big pieces. Frying is crispy. If you drink a glass of traditional Japanese liquor sake, you won't be envious of the king table.

The staff who worked there were very kind. I didn't know much about sushi, but the detailed explanation and recommendation were great. I highly recommend it.🤗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQtA-_jgZxAPQUNbj8Oy6d3XgSBjcpld16eUtH&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Sohyun Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk7ULRpBuhPRFTzaMiczS8d8l1xxv5ViLPyLHyq94dqxJbVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I had a dinner here yesterday and we must say everything was so so delicious!!! Very fresh & tasty and great portions. The owner & servers were very kind & attentive. We also loved cozy & inviting vibe of this restaurant as well :) We are so glad to have found this new gem.

We will surely be a regular here for a nice sushi 🍣 for a lunch special deal and for a weekend gathering with friends & family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmYtAymotVrNtc9m8Gd9vTox13hd6vWqwTHeGa&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2023-2-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BABAK TORABI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXte01Tl3Efa_m0ADFo96Kz1F79A0-Ap8jSjGIMNFygHZjHQcocIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hopcott Farms is a great place to buy high-quality meat and fresh vegetables. They also have a small restaurant where we often go for their burgers or brisket—both are consistently delicious. The atmosphere is beautiful, calm, and welcoming. The building itself, with its timber wood structure, adds to the rustic charm of the place. It's a perfect spot to enjoy a meal while appreciating the fresh, farm-to-table ingredients. Definitely worth a visit if you're in the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvXXHQhA570MdvxWL-3cxQmnqUd6pE2F_6Nwm9&fid=0x0:0x546f624f526c25af"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Dawn Mist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyR-na2sQcGqnSW-JxTn27RMX1oocQ3hojpV86Eb8qwbPHRL0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stellar pepperoni offerings and meat. A bit on the pricy side but the quality is good. Huge bags of ground beef for those nights when a 8 ounce burger won't do and you need to hook yourself and friends up with a slab of a patty.
Nice clean washrooms.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDNha5-YbKS9bMiWwvy_yM9G37bv90QkLmKZCG&fid=0x0:0x546f624f526c25af"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Devon Squire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWzfXsYiqj7aPp8IG5yQXkTHIGodklrYtB6EBGOFnGAE_wLYk6ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must stop every time I'm in the area. Whether it's for a breakfast sandwich and tea for Brunch, or grabbing a Steak or chicken breasts to take home. The staff is always amazing and super friendly. Also, try their homade special jerkys , dried meats, sausage, and meat pastries. I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe8PYSIqQWaEOkfZ_j3mEKHlJdN2Ak8jnH547U&fid=0x0:0x546f624f526c25af"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Paul Lublinschi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwCjbz1c3FJI7-VJPfVTY5UffKZCjQsdeaRjMMTznaugLzNAFG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very clean and very organized store. But God, save your money. I used to buy from here, but yesterday I almost had a heart attack. When they scale the Striploin New York steak, it went down to $30 each, more or less, depending on each individual size. They are normal decent more twords small size. Be aware the prices in the picture are in pounds not in kg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMHodhJBhwX12HBVvtx_g8RASpkP44i5qj4v35&fid=0x0:0x546f624f526c25af"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The establishment prides itself on using the freshest ingredients, resulting in a culinary experience that is marked by the delightful taste of pristine produce. The environment maintains a high standard of cleanliness, creating a comfortable and inviting space for diners. The staff's warmth and enthusiasm further elevate the overall dining experience, adding a personal touch to every visit.

Adjacent to this culinary gem, you'll discover a world of natural wonders. A strawberry garden offers the opportunity to pluck ripe, juicy berries, while a neighboring cornfield provides a rustic charm that evokes the essence of the countryside. Adding to the scenic beauty, the surroundings are adorned with the vibrant colors of sunflowers, standing tall and elegant as they bask in the sunlight. This combination of fresh cuisine and picturesque surroundings creates an immersive experience that appeals to all senses.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOezIn2RiOyNqcl0_79ackprmpWE3spsfqZyfBj&fid=0x0:0x546f624f526c25af"],"When":"2023-8-25"},{"Name":"Melissa Carr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJN12V1aU9_vHPqbfYaNFoZLJWb03iWVWyEG3MZjhlUCfjwUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visit Hopcott weekly in their bistro and the staff is always wonderful! They always recognize us now and usually know our order. We have always had a wonderful experience! Love supporting and eating local and when buying other items, they’ve always been fresh. Feel super grateful to have this place in our community!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by to have a look around and ended up with the streak dinner special and sandwiches and dog bones to go. What a great place for all your meat and veggies. We devoured our lunch before I could snap a pic, so that means we have to go back soon and bring our pup to eat in the dog friendly tent in the back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amber Dawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7rtv3Ly17vdK-LOc_I3nFwjkMQi9sUSJAnZwi6VD7ouQdca-s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Hopcott. I could write a positive review every single time I shop or eat here.
Today I had their brisket sandwich, and just look at how good that brisket is! Dog friendly patio or picnic area, gluten-free options, perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOs1ZQENIRStQEoIm88uXAOlC3tx9ddWX_0Gis&fid=0x0:0x546f624f526c25af"],"When":"2024-4-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jake Maxim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBjxlJeIgfTzkZdhvFXRGr5bxciNoyk6AdIrCffARRZ8c_jnkivQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here for our anniversary and had a great time! The waitress was very friendly, the food was super tasty and the atmosphere was perfect. Would recommend for a special night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR0k3D31rDIMXpmrgy6Yg8pCUjbGYvZ8mRuwHh&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Danielle Self","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjSvK_MAoc4nRkFbMMJIVs87DVbwX9WsWgaU9Vcup9uEMyMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was mouthwatering, packed full of flavour and authentic tasting in every bite, and so worth the visit. Full servings! Servers were personable and helped make the experience what it was. Authentic feel for atmosphere and decor. Had too long of a wait for our meals though - grateful we had a few appetizers to tie us over. Gave only 4 stars for the long wait, but otherwise deserves a 5 ⭐️Would still highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtgup0Kw3dfNKAP1yisMuPtm1ln0rCTTlMsQiU&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"Pau-Lin Ngen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYux2bxmNndX1OIzJvZDMUqV3D_LnyzewmMivzJ6au-MZvmUjOoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried the 5 course tasting menu, everything was extreme tasty! Started off with a platter of appetizers (calamari and bruschettas), followed by a trio of pastas and a tangy balsamic vinaigrette salad that led to a surf n turf entree of grilled lamb, chicken, prawn with veggies and ending with a classic tiramisu with an an apricot purée twist ! 😋🤤

Everything was very well seasoned and delicious! I’ve lived in maple ridge my whole life and for some reason I never thought to visit this restaurant lol. Now that I’ve moved to Burnaby, I’ll have to make an effort to visit here again the next time I venture back to MR

The wait time between each dish was a bit long, our entire meal took 3 hrs so one star off for that. Also we told our server we wanted to take home our leftovers but he forgot to pack them up and we forgot to ask about it as we left, would’ve been nice as we had a bit leftover that we would’ve love to finish off the next day 😫😩🥺😢

Overall, a great experience at a MR landmark!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZyBUqJhLBogabhczvMG80XMVsMmzzejGR53ew&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2022-12-19"},{"Name":"Jamak Golshani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUj2LK0XJaxGCkMdV1Y3vwaPy3axo29-O-pu7Kb7eqy9PgvRrN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Giving four stars because we had to wait an unreasonable amount of time to be served. Otherwise, this would have been an easy 5.  The food is great. Portions are pretty big. If you're not very hungry you can probably share.
This was my second time here. Last time we did lunch. Consistent experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrTGcGpIaHafbWmiJ476Uus-gblmqmGZkgVZV8&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2022-6-12"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great night with my wife here. Would definitely try here again. Soup was sooo good, sea food and desert was amazing. the old gentleman serving us was really nice and can definitely rate him as one of the best staff l have ever seen in a restaurant. Despite the great tasty food, his warm greeting, and checking several times if we need anything , made a great night for us . Environment was kind of cool and the Italian music was so relaxing. Especially the God father one😊
In general it is one of my great food experience  in Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2_xT7TfKSry-koe59CCKkYJTWoDH93RtmBU2c&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2022-3-15"},{"Name":"Maya Schouten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO9x8oFl1z-2ncMLmfWu71Y053fpa-t4BYxDTv_0_AzOsAsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough good things about Trattoria restaurant.  The service was warm, friendly and welcoming.  They placed the napkins in our lap and brought out focaccia bread and oil which was lovely.  We ordered the calamari as an appetizer and the batter was perfect, seasoning spot on, and the dipping sauce was divine (I think homemade). The main course was phenomenal.  I ordered the Gnocchi Russa and couldn’t have made a better selection. The gnocchi was perfectly tender, and the sauce was the ideal balance of cream and tomato.  I ordered a cocktail which was perfectly poured.  The ambience was romantic with very Italian-style finishings, and romantic Italian jazz to fit the mood.  The restaurant was spotless and the washrooms were pristine.  I will most definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcx_hFxwOqG_odHOXyvVCMl74XJTcwW7XuSyI&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2019-5-25"},{"Name":"Lorene Stuart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXqnmzUHq9uX8JdgxKRCwjZLhEDZiMKRm3pIucQxFcArTvdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was welcoming, friendly, & timely.
Food was beYond 5 stars..grilled vegetables were perfection.

Dessert was light and flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcPdFVhwMU_wBAFHsjNZ9w6T_s7RFi_WLe29y_&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Byron Kerr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9mtuZPhaRBlYW6xPRz4QO7Ql9WtzXP7z0AMf0RkySIFpilhY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first trip to La Trattoria. I had heard tell of the quality of the food. I would not be disappointed. Traditional Italian fare in a cozy, classic environment led to a delicious meal for all.
A skilled cook and attentive owners/servers meant everyone went home sated and satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFl39lrzQixxtcnbzjSoiq3IEV5kN1kDMlX9db&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2019-10-31"}]

title: Paliotti's Italian Restaurant

descriptions: Comfy Italian eatery with a full bar dishing up an extensive menu of pastas, meat & seafood dishes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Divya Prakash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNiQrPUZkiYQTnFdP0lhwPK2fJ3DCNtYXc-W7edCuVdf5gJjwD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered their Raspberry Lemon Cheesecake and it was really disappointing. It was sour, unappetizing and not sweet. I was looking forward to it. Would not order again. Pasta was decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMN1i41zuv-jFmcBrlwaJSZxoBEwb8vdgzuCU2&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Elise Ardizzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1tLvG9dk778TfiZNEobPfkCOpjWPfjySchaB-Y7t1mukyJZJB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The King Caesar Review is here! I am here to rate all the Caesar salads world wide … starting at my home in Vancouver. These rating will be heavily based on the Caesar salad it’s self, and not the other food I ordered. I have been eating Caesar salad’s for the past 20 years and thought it’s about time I get serious about these leafy greens covered in cream sauce. I hope your as excited as I am.

Paliotti’s in Maple Ridge- only one other Italian restaurant to choose from

Dressing: creamy base, with a nice lemon coating, heavy garlic (yum), fresh ground pepper and anchovies. Can’t believe I’m saying this but maybe too much sauce.  Definitely tastes homemade though.
Lettuce: romaine, cold and crisp, however cut too large
Croutons: out of a package
Cheese: questionable? Powdered parm on top but within the dressing a thicker heavier tasting cheese I couldn’t figure out.
Bacon: none- which is honestly how I prefer my Caesar’s. Bacon seems to over power the sauce and texture (to me)

I went to this restaurant after 8 years of my mom passing away with my girlfriend. My mom always ordered penne alla vodka. I was searching all over Maple Ridge and could not find it on the menu. This place seemed the most authentic and warm. We obviously has to order the Caesar salad, but I asked if they could do an alla vodka sauce but on my favourite… Gnocchi!
Soooo tender, sauce missing pancetta but still very good and grateful I got to eat in my moms honour

Overall, very authentic, great service and food came quick. There is a creepy table that you can’t site at with the Mona Lisa looking over you but that’s guna stop us from coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuojeziO4jMgePhjk0PXm2X7mUMU0L7plipgTc&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Jacquelyn Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfy_pLzvat08k9FzqYD-5djtqo3UfUv3fLgHw-FhXMEBTZ9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My friend and I thought we'd try the Wednesday steak or ribs special for $18.95, misleadingly advertised on the outdoor sign as steak and ribs. We arrived about five o'clock and the place filled up steadily until our section was full.
It was my friend's first time there and she appreciated the quaint atmosphere.
She ordered the honey garlic ribs. I was looking forward to the steak, medium rare.
The complimentary foccacia was delicious.
As I can't eat potatoes, I ordered the caesar salad as a substitute.
We had agreed to share a couple of tasting bites of our entrees but when my steak arrived I was having real difficulty cutting through it.
The ribs were good but the portion of potatoes was very small.
The salad was fine, along with the few bites of vegetables.
Unfortunately our server didn't return until I'd eaten all the veg and most of the salad. I'd finally broken down and tried a bite of the steak but it was so chewy I ended up having to leave it on my side plate.
When she did come back I apologized and asked if she could possibly have it thrown back on the grill for a minute, thinking perhaps the rareness was the problem.
She also apologized and said other people had complained and that she'd use her discount.
She brought me a new steak that wasn't much better, to the point that two thirds of the way in my jaw was too sore to continue chewing so I left the remainder on the plate.
When the bill came, she had comp'd the special completely, which was more than I expected and much appreciated.
I wish I'd read the reviews before we went and am reluctant to give a negative review but I see I'm not alone.
If you want a decent steak at that price point I recommend The Reach or The Meridian Arms.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Norrie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIM0HHV52XWj0DuqS582jUGxsQfKKT4CXIFpksBWsK_BlOh4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Made a reservation for 20 people a few weeks ago.  Called Sunday to confirm one more person, so 21 people at 6pm for Tuesday.  Arrived on time.  We did get a first drink each.  Took over an hour to get second drink, even when a few of us asked.  We were told it would take another 10 minutes for waitress to come to table, it took longer.  That was the last time it was offered during our evening.  We did ask more than once and waitress never came back.  Other than taking our initial orders and delivering food we were completely ignored.  Table full of empties, what a mess.  No one ever came to clean our table.  Plates were picked up but never any glasses and never any water refills.   We had brought in a cake and those dishes were never picked up. Our time there took 3.5 hours.  It took over an hour to get our bills.  We had school aged children and 3 women in their eighties.  They waited, we all waited over an hour for the bill.  We could not understand why.  One waitress said their machine was 30 years old and it would take awhile.  I saw and watched other tables in restaurant get great prompt service.  Their bills came in a timely matter.  They did not wait over an hour for their bill.
Their tables were cleared upon finishing their meal. We were blatantly ignored. To top off such a rude experience, the waitress hand wrote a 20% forced gratuity on every bill.  We had no prompt service.  That wasn't offered.  Shady business.  Very clear we were ignored as there was a guaranteed 20% tip from us, no matter what little service we got.  They do not get the 20% guarantee from the smaller tables. Very disappointed with paliottis, our group certainly won't be back. We have had many of these gatherings at many different places and have not met such disregard for our dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmYvF6Ijp2OEyDwedI_Puw9G4J-z-wlnNj47RO&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Meghan Klassen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD-XbXwb6aAq-xlNjuC8BO0xaag0Zq5PBhSx8MCP7PI-YuvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Services is excellent, but the food is pretty disappointing. Lacked flavour, just plain boxed pasta that you are paying a pretty high price for.
I had the veal Neptune, had very very small amount of seafood and small extremely thin pieces of veal. Pasta had hardly any sauce on it. I dont think we will be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Urszula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfU5PKcg9JLueSHqTZ2mNz35scjm_8tfESVV6QKIPy8_jxxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Decided to try the Tuesday dinner special with my family of four for my birthday; was told that because I didn't  have a reservation they could not accommodate us for dinner for 30 minutes. There was no one waiting for a table and there were numerous tables empty; parking lot was half full. Very disappointing and will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The OG Paliotti’s. 35 years and 4 restaurants as a family business for Italian means they must be doing something right. This location is the original; don’t get it confused with the one 3.5km west (also same family but different style).

The food here is great. Portions are generous and they don’t skimp out on the good stuff. That first zing of balsamic vinegar and EVOO with the perfectly toasted focaccia is strangely memorable.

Service was good and suited the occasion.

The only dislike was the desserts. We found that the mains and pasta were really good but the desserts were ok. Worth trying though for sure (esp. the tiramisu).

Nice and cozy, home style feel. Will definitely come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc-P5DZTgChPWA0vAaDAPrPbQHg27i08CXYcsR&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Thunder Bolt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSq_qgrTSqFLxIQ_6IGlSw_ALrX18PVQDQQi0sWhV1N2AQ6YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My son and I visited your restaurant this past Saturday at 6 PM, hoping to enjoy a meal together, but were unfortunately turned away due to a lack of tables for two people. It was disappointing to see a few tables for three available but not offered. We value supporting local businesses and have dined here a few times before, even recommending it to friends. This experience was disheartening, and we hope this can be addressed moving forward.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"nayomi dilrukshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUCBqCVJYhiKOPG_Kq_gOhjPW_v7_VxNNSwZohvuvtYylBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Ronny's Bistro and had the pleasure of trying their Carbonara Pasta. The dish was absolutely delicious, with the perfect blend of creamy sauce, crispy bacon, and well-cooked pasta. The garlic bread served alongside was a great addition, adding a nice crunch to the meal. The presentation was also spot-on, making the experience even more enjoyable.

I’ll definitely be coming back to try more of their menu. Highly recommend this spot for pasta lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaEK7fNQtkSFNPotrNYUgfjhfNSjiO8AvXjjsC&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered breakfast. Both were overcooked. Accidents can happen 🤷 I specifically asked for soft scrambled eggs. The server repeated "scrambled"
I repeated *SOFT* scrambled. My friend ordered medium basted. They were full on hard cooked. Sausages were flavorless. Trouble is noone came back to check after food was delivered. The opportunity to fix it was there, but not attempted. Nice location in the industrial area along the river. Hope experience is not the normal one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU-Nn9IIeVfJMSqROBLEDHykrBkx6OEpeIFRRm&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Ramesh Perera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyGA6fUD6Xdk_4LzEtJUlIgguhCdAdAHW5zHo_49OVhxbKNfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently picked up Ronny's Bistro's homemade meat lasagna, shepherd's pie, and borscht, and I was happy with my purchase! The lasagna is rich and comforting, filled with a perfect blend of meats and cheeses, with a "sparkle of love" that you can truly taste. The shepherd's pie is hearty and flavorful, packed with tender beef and vegetables. To top it all off, the borscht was delicious and made my meal complete. Highly recommend Ronny's Bistro for anyone looking for quality homemade meals. Five stars all the way! I will come again for some more homemade frozen meals which are ready to eat or bake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt_LVJr_jvqfhe-y5mx7EM3w-uoORR9PRmPiBp&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Vilma Yoder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCshCxnZzZyI6-eeQNlvQN0OkpVSmJm4fyuNm5pzhGp74l2Yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I were looking for a place to eat breakfast and found this cute restaurant. Inside they were playing wonderful music, then we noticed their homey decorations that made our experience pleasant. The food was out of this world delicious. I ordered the croissant and was fully satisfied after eating it. The dish came with fried potato cubes that were crunchy and perfectly seasoned.
Friendly staff, they were smiling from ear to ear and it made us feel welcomed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBO3tyyjhDNM1tNx859qD5jS1XXy9hIXtwRoU&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Cheryl Kathler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9TQWPDmnOA_h-SxOo5p_UwYGe8FJqXXhmMfPn2eJzdkrxrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend brought me here for lunch.  It is in an unassuming location, but as soon as you walk in, it feels very welcoming and fun.  The food was so fresh and tasty (right down to the homemade pesto).  The owner is very generous and friendly and in spite of being busy, we had a great conversation with her.  I will be back.  There is a lot on the menu that I want to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9kTzAEXk3C5wUNJiWdqz0mBEPbELl4D8xE-wg&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuROdrsF7vogaT38uZexLigYz1e5VXiDiWb4Iq30REJ6CyNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding food and great ambience. Casual and clean diner. Lots of HD and other motorcycle paraphernalia. Great for everyone including families. Their cheesecakes are to die for and are made on site, but only once a week...so plan accordingly as they sell out quickly. Clean washrooms and adequate space between tables. It's located in the Industrial part of Maple Ridge, but very easy to get to. This place was previously Summer's Diner and IMO, the food is much better now. It is easily some of the best food in Maple Ridge. The only thing that needs work is the time to receive your food. We have been there a few times in the last month and the service is slow. Once, it took 45 minutes to receive our food and the restaurant was not busy. It is still worth the visit though, so go when you're not in a rush. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtk_X-IZD8h_XnLaTeGdaOnNBH-YgSk-No4Vid&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Udari Nisansala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI5wgDzbdl2O6sXNemlC6v7mOL_F2kJd_iqTO2aXvqKDlmspov=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't say enough good things about the Special Ronny's Burger at Ronny's Bistro! This burger is an absolute masterpiece. The beef patty was juicy and flavorful, topped with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and a perfectly balanced sauce that tied everything together. The bun was soft yet sturdy, holding all the delicious ingredients without falling apart.

The fries served on the side were golden and crispy, making this meal all the more satisfying. If you're a burger lover, this is a must-try. Five stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBvKBSnlZbJoXfkBEAcB7lA18EhUfIVup5SFaA&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Saumya Siriwardhana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ1IunhRfABP7fGLICHAl6HNIBzYnUAQpkceKd0QliRu_wwec=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the Lasagna Bolognese at Ronny’s Bistro today, and it was absolutely incredible! The layers of pasta were perfectly cooked, the meat sauce was rich and flavorful, and the cheese was perfectly melted and golden. The portion was just right, and it came with a side of fresh Caesar salad and delicious toasted bread, which made the meal even more enjoyable. The menu has so many tempting options, and I’m already looking forward to coming back to try more dishes. Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a memorable meal!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWKizfqDXJL0AdpuRTM2XNleCPoObL6bbEOOvz&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Max Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOIlU5nJBhhMt4LhC3zOj5-erzOKLJv2GOSpcFK4XvUCtyZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With stellar ratings of 4.9 in Surrey and 4.6 in Maple Ridge on Google Reviews, I decided to give this highly praised Indian restaurant a shot—and it didn’t disappoint.

From the moment you step inside, it feels like you’ve been transported to India. The ambiance is authentic and immersive, making the experience even more special. Following the waitress’s recommendations, we ordered their signature Lamb Korma paired with the famous Garlic Naan, as well as the classic Butter Chicken served with Fries.

The flavors were rich and aromatic, exceeding my expectations. The Lamb Korma had an incredible depth of spices, while the Butter Chicken was a perfect blend of creamy and tangy flavors. Every bite was flavorful and satisfying, making it easy to see why this place has such high ratings.

Would I come back? Absolutely! For anyone who loves curry or is curious about Indian cuisine, USTAADJ 76 is worth every visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuhE4PDtYS7uE0jxMzxCeKTR_v2nxsq6C4J1w4&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Harjot Singh Thiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzOWwYq4K3U1PHL-O7BVjU4O_407b0Owm7Wzd6z3KttiPqwyct=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hi all, I would like to explain my recent visit to Ustad G76, We were group of eight, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. We ordered $150 worth of food, and every single item was spot on—delicious and perfectly prepared. I was particularly impressed by our server, Shagal, who must have a photographic memory. She effortlessly memorized each member's order and the necessary amendments, ensuring that everything came out exactly as we requested.

A big thanks to Chef Harjap, who did an amazing job in the kitchen and truly made our day special. We enjoyed a delightful spread that included Kadai Paneer, Chana Bhatura, Pav Bhaji, two Veg Thalis, Veg Noodles, Paneer Malai Tikka, and dessert. The portion sizes were generous, far better than what you often find at other restaurants, where you might feel shortchanged.

During the meal, we all sampled each other's food and were consistently amazed by the flavours. I wholeheartedly recommend this restaurant to everyone—it’s truly great! A final shout-out to the restaurant owner for assembling such a brilliant team.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfxj_Kb--lPZA12v6wUlKAUF_cGWY8Y8fVp4EX&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Just B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbqlkGphBGO4ZFtnvvHRFErtzljMxdFcSC7D5K0agOlbgekAWrBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mmm so good. Every dish that I have tried here is absolutely delicious. The atmosphere in the restaurant is comfortable, inviting and Shagal is very kind, knowledgeable and friendly. I highly recommend that you give them a try, you will not be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkf_qtas4_paxsJhu4aG1Tj0TwVKTUurFLGvEJ&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Anju Garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_C0AyLXyV9zsoE79mnQhwb9-QfkUY_7BK5NfmZm6p2l9LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"we ordered dal makhni and we got chicken tadka free. despite being vegetarian for whole life and first meal after karwachauth and you found meat in ur meal. thing which i wasnt expecting. it was really sad and annoying. feel like throwing out. not going to order again 🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDiVtzx27KpOEb2nabatOfuHBL2gRh-QFtj5TC&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Elaine Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-cZ79vVwFEPuZ0jB7xl3YujoVxBK2BTnin4mf8s3bdVAog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this little place and we will return. The server didn't greet us when we came in so I wasn't sure how it'd be but once she came to take our orders, she was friendly and very helpful.
We have had takeout from another Indian restaurant in town monthly for about 20 years and this is just as good but different than what we're used to.
I can't remember the names of 3 dishes but the butter chicken was tender and delicious, the rice had peas in it and we loved it and we had mango lassis which were very filling but so yummy and the garlic Naan was also so good.

The location isn't great so I think it gets overlooked but I hope people check it out because it's worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxVYwdZXdW6rHD5JUMV8cij2U9tyTjkBrWNk2tBFvnLkXd-3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow wow. Very good food. Great portions perfect amount of spice.The service was amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk6xzAZ0DY_P6siuZlOyews4hyrjh6MWbL6GNn&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Shalini Sehgal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_xKGlI9Px4AT2Uw-lnQWBNnj60Kyr16zcfO4UtHOgSeYIb_Iu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Amritsari Kulcha was not at all delectable as desired. Didn't have enough flavor,  some more dash of spices, butter and chutney required. Not happy the way it was served and platted. Spoon was placed on the table with just one napkin (no paper mats/plate... Straight onto the table)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-rhMxYdTDHRqUmVKyV8n1Mg_mb3yl4OrWNBEK&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Jennifer Osborne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGAFIwFtDqyI8D36gZAiSDBU2XmVs34SHaebe4yPZ1-D2Xa3xc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has amazing food and the decor is fun. Great music, good service, I came back two times in a week when I was working in Maple Ridge. Definitely the best Indian restaurant in the area because I tried a few others.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sophia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlDgwsQnDqW--x2_xKhw-r8XwhpM_FFOR4V3mvKWmVJGfia1uy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Darwin was serving amazing service and amazing food!!! Portion were really big, will be back with my family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPw0ryrYeuwJo5v9ANAULbBj1gwxjnwwvG8oKd&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Cameron Juzda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHrTM5wyhtWpJlJXAgb9bG29O7TW7YIhFj4FhBU9FD7NSyHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have ordered from kitchen on the ridge in the past  , and the food was good, but last night the food was awful the chicken was chewy tasteless, the beef chop suoy had lots of beef but the beef was like chewing on a wet sock, I phoned today to let them know how poor quality the food was and asked if they refund our money as most of it's in fridge and will not be eaten , but they would not stand behind there products and refused to give us our money back, that's why I had no choice but to write this review.

Wokin Dragon makes much better quality food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jennifer D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXalWNYD9s8b4gtqh6W0m_J1OpchW3ccyzTF6c0AT5YaH5c6u0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order take out from them at least once every couple weeks and are never disappointed. We both order combination plates and have it delivered by them because were less than 4km from them delivery is free and food is delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs084CT-mVY-QaxF-6NlEqGC4UQyWdjCErpDWd&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Aleksander Amer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGOAz6hZJ2NwhTQXXReoo8ipuBBnVUyRU2feoLZjGgiTMM8r_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally found the best Chinese in the Maple Ridge. I was a walk in and ordered a combo for 1 bbq pork fried rice, ginger beef, and sweet n sour pork from David. I had a special request and he nailed the entire order. All the meat is tender, ginger beef was crunchy and not chewy, fried rice was perfect. Sweet n sour pork was good size bites and not all breading. Lastly the egg rolls were also perfect. I absolutely will be returning and highly recommend👍

***UPDATE***DO NOT PARK IN THE LOT OR YOU WILL GET A $126 TICKET BY DIAMOND PARKING SERVICES HIDDEN LOW ON YOUR WINDSHIELD OUT OF SIGHT***","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl6SWT2PyyAb9IOf-JuQ8_27sGSMM3clk3j2fl&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2023-8-15"},{"Name":"Alexia Sarvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc6JDa1yYfq0nUgWFW8ECuapxVZ66hckQHzZsZmHnjPE9Lhhnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Husband and I were craving chow mein over the weekend but didn’t feel like driving to pick up at our usual place (that doesn’t deliver to our location) so we decided to order delivery directly from Kitchen on the Ridge. We ordered on Saturday night at around 5:30pm and it was delivered right on time (within an hour). We ordered chicken chow mein, beef & black bean sauce crispy chow mein and almond chicken. It was all very delicious and fresh. Portions were huge so we had tons of leftovers which was great. We will definitely order from Kitchen on the Ridge again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3nhAJrBFqNb0GuQgVRj9TiqJ_B9gN4IODhwew&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2023-2-6"},{"Name":"David Dyck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5xjijpXaZs2STs6BFRe-cNEGv-QQjprJx3-f3GHeEQh2Z4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered veggie chow mein, beef and broccoli and sweet and sour pork.  The chow mein had no flavor whatsoever, the beef and broccoli was absolutely disgusting and tasted more like fish than beef. The sweet and sour pork was edible, I’d give it maybe a 5/10.

Overall, would definitely not recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Deagle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4172m11rBMIloP_3iH8GRIdcve4rXahqQ4ex_Npkmxc6mnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Chinese in maple ridge! Super friendly family run business. My 97 year old mom is from Hong Kong and loves this place. Thank you for your great food and service!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan Meloche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2cfpbCLahRZZfYL915tBomhuHC8EgGDfGSULODUyhGvNO9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The only positive aspect was that the food tasted decent and the doordash service/driver was excellent.

Our biggest problem was that multiple different food items were stored in the same container, not just as a way to save containers, but to hide the portion size. We had to call our doordash driver to make sure he delivered all the food because we thought we were missing half of it.

Everything we ordered was under portioned and left us still hungry afterwards. Compared to the portion size, the prices are nearly double what I would be willing to pay again.

Putting different food items in the same container is also a problem for cross-contamination. You never know if someone has a life threatening allergy (or even religious values about certain foods) and mixing food unnecessarily drastically increases the risk of contamination.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Logan Thorsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyGKdrRHPcOJIil6q3po3UIzA7owhkhFhX-9LFXvEPftFLwf6W=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always great food, never disappointed. Nice little donair spot. Super friendly owner too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCzy2gdVWcSRiNc8JiUs6qn9JtPnfAu_rKelnx\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Miguel Augusto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCWgqTRMpLX5iisHx7eFrVWsvRVmPBc6nX5Rst9FpLVpiT9uwd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today while visiting the area. I’m from Toronto so I’m a huge shawarma/Donnie fan, and this place had top notch food. The owner was super friendly too - I got the ‘super’ size donair and the size is extremely big. Would highly recommend, amazing prices as well (super size mixed chicken and lamb donair was $12.99).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM22k5jDsY5m6RxabB20heCh2q4v9A8a_Rs1VC-\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ammaar Malik Awan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWPvJ4-9e6vSq5FkEkPtt1WaLR8XEX3AL4DiLo4qqRApuu3nAP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in Maple Ridge last night. Browsed some food places and ended up at Donair City. The couple managing it is welcoming and friendly. The food is absolutely amazing. Loved it. 😍  I would love to come back again. As a South Asian, i found the food less spicy, but it is still worth it. Portions were generous, and prices are low comparatively.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCdMEZcIrA3SB3tU_VHAfBE5ihgAjCn4ntdTNK\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"Dominic Kohler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr_Rds6INzk8uBD6vTiDGl0q4vd8v53cFPe8-iHXMsWrqpx1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying donair city. Had to come in after reading reviews online. Had to try a platter as that seems like a popular item here. So I went with a lamb platter with everything. Comes with rice, meat, salad, pita, and sauce. Lots of food, and super fresh. Can't go wrong with the price either, with the lamb platter being $13.99. Really good bang for your buck. I'll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJVyymsNIeRsBxYr36s1MaKwwlBUyGxQPbin8u\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Emily hyde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbC0C6FmgId4QLvUPSo-KulEwIlFzLpNM7n36eYxzLuoKvl2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just moved back into the neighbourhood and needed dinner while all of our dishes were packed. Oh my god this was delicious. The gentleman who made our food was super polite and made the food super quick.\nThey definitely don’t skimp on sauce which is what sold me. Our new favourite spot:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marjane A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpfOS44plOriCjgJ2ip4IlQmMZEL6iAoJ5uDeWaFagUpQvwsRi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best donair I’ve had in a while! The garlic sauce is delicious and the meat is so flavourful! Can’t wait to go back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eston Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZf50HNdIFLNy3MPJ7T0z_SKBvprsk5TrIt59f6By2jLBx8sq5rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in to place an order for take out, took less then 2 minutes to prepare our food and pay. Super fast and friendly service, the food was delicious my Girlfriend had the Donair salad and I had the Caesar Donair. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvSh1X89w6rJJ4L9nsnbWOSiUGmoEgynbTYuZC\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2022-10-6"},{"Name":"Steph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo2ldc7gL5TcEsvyfo5gbnp9HL3LACmWOh6B2i7p_dD7uS7H8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for lunch. Got the chicken platter. Huge portion. So yummy!!! Only managed to eat half!!! Service was super friendly and I got my food so quick!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-FdIRBgmVBoi_1cyTipR3Zy02xnqao-ufTkQN\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-2-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thais Audibert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmqiVpaZE4jUxQqAYgZclR0jTUQ1hX29eWeQ8HMCKvBpb-Md3Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3/5 I loved the atmosphere and the drinks. However, the pizza was disappointing. It was frozen and reheated it up (whatever that’s fine). But it took 30mn to arrive and the taste was bland. I would love to come back just for the drinks and atmosphere. i would highly recommend they ameliorate their food menu. more options would be great and better quality. Love the beers though!

4/5 Edit: I can see the owner put a lot of thought into their response which is very much appreciated. We were definitely not aware there was a medical emergency and we can see how that could have had an impact. Regarding the pizza, I definitely think it can be improved as well as the food menu. I give a higher rating to reflect the professionalism of the owner of this establishment. I absolutely plan on coming back and if the food menu improves, I will for sure give a 5/5

PS. please have hot sauce available. Always nice to sprinkle some on the pizza","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjv_SKo1DeAru7qK7zQyTfH03eDSa8KYKBKnb4&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Brittney Cerritos Kroiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzs74OWdsTEXPNevXDKt4yjRt1tvG8kz7_IZQS_xePF-HLCrj-gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our fave brewery in Pitt Meadows-Maple Ridge. It's our go-to. A good variety of great, consistent beer paired with a nice atmosphere and friendly staff. They also have some food options, from pizzas to pretzels to chips and a few more. They also sometimes have the odd food truck there. They also host fun events as well from love music nights to trivia to hosting drag shows and comedy shows! Fantastic place all around. Check them out and support them! :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Hut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUldhrl_mlLGq3Tq4d_5kxmKfaDgU3pPox8cgoHn442R9Eur4T8MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty great brewery overall! Great beer, really nice patio and tap room space too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNevI5ZNyj_FWr1oF1jMt5JXrU-r3FpJPRS3pqt&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large selection of in house beer, around 20! Family friendly. Delicious, always rotating beer list. Large outdoor space, and comfortable indoor area with lots of natural light. Downfall is parking when it’s busy there is no street parking available, if lot is full. Definitely worth a stop, always a sour beer on tap. Cans to go, beef jerky, chips, and sodas made by Foamers for the non alcohol options. Food available! Friendly staff and knowledgeable staff, generally enthusiastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8AtPdoclKw98QQTty09wnpSISsz6alEpHRxFu&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2020-7-6"},{"Name":"Catherine Byrdy (Byrd)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8uqMGqbkqGknJWQpYOqYnRycihvurvs3aDaz_7RfiDzMksAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best place in Pitt Meadows to just hang. The staff are amazing. Super friendly, super helpful. And they’re always happy to welcome you back. We love the new outdoor patio!! And the live music 🥰🤗. This place is kid friendly, dog friendly and all around people friendly. We come for the wine, fizzy drinks and the ambience but I’m sure the beer is fantastic… well, from what we know Foamers Lager is the best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHH-W-udR3gNID5UYPcHhq_KG99lOFB7KvFSY&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2022-7-20"},{"Name":"Pablo Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUalbYbdMUlU2hg6Ddb8mnhyzEXoAsMTybeKkeEvs9jcEpko0vV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Poor parking, nice atmosphere, good service, good beer, food was quite poor. The 20$ pizza was worse than a frozen pizza from superstore. 3.5/5","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyeana Edgington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZCFzaIgKU5lTB7YWfmS7VIENMgFFgSFxZC-9WXgh9Ek6j0oXRQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little spot to come for a beer with friends. The rotating cocktails are hit and miss but mostly pretty delicious. Pretzels are my favorite food item for sure but it's fun when they get food trucks in for more variety.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiO1_88L3kLl2-7XBd9U-l3veFPByFszNuNaiJ&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"A Miraji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKbtSn1-d3iEkTDQas0xH_xCGg1PKv8z1hKaZIhPkrsgM_kICp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and staff are very nice and helpful. Beers are very good too. Tried bunch of'm and no regrets! If you are around and wanna chill and drink this is the place you should hit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuI9wvZpGsmQBzHeETOmUo3OIYdR19eiLYdgmF&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2021-8-1"}]

address: 22370 Dewdney Trunk Rd, Maple Ridge, BC V2X 3J2
