user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeremy Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9h-pOVPEAO5xTo8LGpQ0sa5A7PNB_Rp1SEXGX_qf0-nayw0WaDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It was my son's 10th birthday today - I called and made reservations for 530 for my family of 5

Food takes a long time to arrive - we complained about how slow it was and the waitress said "this is a 2 hour seating" and that's "how the kitchen works". I could understand if it was fine dining but let's be clear, this is store bought pasta with home made sauces.

My three boys liked the marinara sauce and the pasta was cooked nicely.

My wife had the "special" which was roasted chicken (two drum sticks and one thigh) for $29. No mention on the menu that it was only dark meat. She said it was ok and ate most of it but was also very hungry as we had been waiting nearly 1.5hrs for the food to come out.

The manager?owner?/chef? Went around to every table except ours to check in with customers. We heard him mention it was someone else's birthday and congratulated them - he made no mention to my son about it being his birthday even though it was specified in the reservation (whatever).

The worst part of the night was when I asked the manager?owner?/chef? About my carbonara sauce. The sauce was cooked improperly - carbonara is supposed to be silky smooth without any curdling of the eggs. My pasta basically had cream, oil and scrambled eggs on it. Apparently this is "how we do it there".  When I explained that this is not what I was expecting and that it wasn't properly made he became very standoffish and rude. I had to ask to have it removed from the bill - which he did but not without his nasty entitled attitude.

The atmosphere is nice, it was clean and cozy. There's not a lot of seating and I guess the only downsides are the very small washrooms (1 person per washroom) and the tables on the right side of the dining room are so close together that my 8 year old could barely fit between the chairs to get to the washroom.

We thought this would be a nice treat for my son's dinner as we are an Italian family but this was just a letdown on all accounts. Even with my main removed the bill was over $130 (for a glass of house wine, one app- the prawns were tasty, three plates of store bought pasta and my wife's "special").

Won't be back.

***Edit: we ordered two sides of garlic bread and they never brought it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLi9b1a6K79_tuyWX1dKP-SCvx_AKUQTTU8jjk&fid=0x0:0xe2da073352bb98a3"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Monkey Couch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjBJae2rKS_uXWCMGu9-Vey95DYSzaWVHAACfGX9Lt21SDIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here the first time with my husband and my friend for her birthday. Food was great. Everyone loved their food. If I am going to go out and eat pasta I want it to either be cheap or amazing. This was amazing. My dish came with the most tender fall off the bone chicken I have ever had. My husband kept trying to steal more of my dish. Service was quick and friendly. For the quality and service the price is right. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol Pow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNTxZqPK4X8aOtVF2rc4ragFral1AR_tqdwpR5cJKJNofBJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We arrived at 5 when the restaurant opened.  We know from past visits they are busy.  We didn’t have a reservation.  They had to check to see if they could take us.  They said they could but we’d have to be done by 7.  Because someone else had reserved for then.  Just not a warm welcoming  feeling.  It was my mom’s birthday I said to the waitress/hostess.  She went oh Happy Birthday.  No special treatment at all.

The Cesar salad and house were good.  The food was subpar at best. Ordered the roasted chicken with Penne pasta.  Store bought pasta under cooked with no real sauce or flavour.  The chicken which I thought was in the pasta was roasted chicken on the side all brown meat thighs and drumstick.  No mention of this and I only like white meat.

Other people in our party ordered the combo.  Again no flavour for the sauce and chicken was dark and not very flavourful.

Overall total disappointment for a dinner out none less a birthday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"danielle loranger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnptNzs1wQbaw2FFsd1jy4E7t0vjMoJDS7syMM-SOyTKG9og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our favourite restaurant in ridge! It’s so cozy, the staff are so attentive, friendly and helpful and the food is delish. We love the Caesar salad and have never been dissapointed with a dish. Check for reservations on the weekends as it’s not a huge place. We love the house red wine and always leave full with some leftovers as well! Visiting for a birthday dinner tomorrow and already drooling thinking about it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reece Kopeschny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULKOa8APzPB-oiZ47ByVkOUw3cvI4vI6xSWNOo647veRKgca1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have heard great reviews about Il Corsaro for a while now and the reviews are correct. Started the meal with the prawn appetizer and the sauce on it was unbelievable, the main course was the house made lobster and crab ravioli which hit the spot and came with a salad and house dressing which was some of the best I have ever had. Ended the evening with house made Tiramisu which was just as perfect and even better than the rest of the meal.

If I could have given them 6 stars I would have, the server was able to answer all of the questions right away and was a perfect date night. I can’t wait to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbcbjP5yJs5gkNEr4RnGtaFvirnwc__6NQ6nyd&fid=0x0:0xe2da073352bb98a3"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"Brad Ricketts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjqJT0OuLQXt06Dc_FpXglVwWIq_Tlr0-bsBV-LmQdJK6w9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I happened on this restaurant while looking for a late dinner.  We arrived at around 830PM and the restaurant was not very busy, a group of 6, and two other couples.  We got seated right away, and the hostess returned shortly with glasses of  water
and some amazing warm buns with butter.  The server came to our table shortly afterward and took our beverage orders, and discussed the evening specials. She left us with the menus and returned a short time later with our drinks.  She took our appetizer order and our main dinner orders, and my wife and I enjoyed the warm buns. Relatively quickly, our Caesar salad arrived, and we began our meal.  The timing on our main courses was perfect, and we had a short break between the completion of our salad and our main courses. I decided on the Penne Amatricana, and my wife had linguini Bolognese and meatballs.  The meatballs were about the size of a tennis ball and they were delicious.  My penne dish was also delicious, and I ate the leftovers the following day for lunch.  I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants a great Italian meal. The service, course timing, and servers were excellent.  Our server was very friendly and explained the story of the restaurant, and I am not surprised it has been in business as long it has, serving great food in a great spot by great people.  5 stars from me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX46jwTvLLxQHMqh-_Tq6ADgdla67lzdwdqPBC-oI4JI8tfgn0q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Make sure to get a reservation as its booked up plenty (for a good reason), I was lucky enough to get in as someone had cancelled. The pasta was absolutely amazing probably the best ive had and the atmosphere of the place was lovely too, will be back again for that 10/10 pasta","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Laughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq_l7wggmzJItBUT8JuYycSZA4ZE8w7Kup0NGmSBUCAXhkpsDr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 60 dollars worth of takeout and basically had to throw it all out. The cesar salad was brown, and had literally 2 croutons on it, NOTHING else almost no sauce either, worst I’ve ever had. They forgot our soup and the pasta was extremely disappointing and flavourless.  I never call to complain about anything but I just had to. When I called I was told ‘pasta is pasta’ whatever the hell that means. I make better pasta at home in ten minutes. I was really excited for this meal but will never go back, shocked at all the good reviews… listen to the bad ones!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF0FNcyUma6ORPuN5g4Fgg9e1hCXAxp09CXh06&fid=0x0:0xe2da073352bb98a3"],"When":"2021-10-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Maya Schouten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO9x8oFl1z-2ncMLmfWu71Y053fpa-t4BYxDTv_0_AzOsAsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mona Pizza in Maple Ridge is a standout. Their service is top-notch, the crust on their pizzas is crispy and bursting with flavor, and their prices are competitive. Plus, they offer a wide selection of sodas to complement your meal. It's a must-visit for pizza lovers in Maple Ridge. My favourite pizza in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsTPpoeJwwjJy5GBR9WWMrnlmv5MJ48gaJt-s\u0026fid=0x0:0xf4884f71279ae235"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Sonia Sareen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiDW-rt0-DUnaWiyEifM9hg1rz-r3JSXx6bsiUf6kZL83eNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently, we got a chance to try this hidden gem of maple ridge. My friend was recommending big Brand name like Pizza Hut, domino, Panago but I don't know why I choose this store for our special dinner party. we placed a Quite big order. it was Game day n they were super Busy. We ordered a lots of different items almost all items.  At the time of picking up the order, we felt some thing extra which makes them different from other pizzas store. we noticed that they have a huge variety of pizzas, drinks \u0026  they told us that they are serving keto crust, gluten free crust, vegan cheese, plant based pepperoni etc. Amazing everything at one place. they  Gave us few  complimentary drinks. which was interesting, who don't like free Stuffs. Store was Super clean, staff was very helping but still we were not sure about the taste of food because it was our first order so we all were very excited. we came back to the hotel \u0026 we start to try every item \u0026 we were speechless, all items were made with fresh \u0026 proper balanced ingredients n sauce. Pizzas \u0026 chicken wings were Awesome. it was so delicious that after finish it my friend order some food again. everyone enjoyed a lot at that day. Everyone were appreciating  my suggestion \u0026 we are waiting that when we can go there for have this food again. Everyone should try this small n locally family owned business. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"martin andersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5isR81obH5tVmlSlmgLEcHdDcK4UjDh0_nAgkfHIul6d-HA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I feel this owner goes way out of his way to please the customer. I haven’t been eating a lot of pizza lately, but decided today was the day, I ordered one large pizza, only like $23 worth. And selected to pick it up at 12:00-12:30 pm, not realizing they didn’t open until 3:00pm. When I arrived to pick up the order the sign said open, but I noticed the business hours were 3:00-11:00pm. When I walked in the owner said he saw the order and drove straight to the store to make the pizza. I felt super bad for unconvincing him on his time off, but was super happy to have the pizza. And the pizza was amazing, I will definitely be ordering again very soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laura Edwardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJX6nOwhdj3WIXQTRA7h6KjuT6TDLLu_XlCd0QcX5edLKznOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just ordered a baked lasagne from Mona’s and Wow! It’s my first time here and I have lived in Maple Ridge for 30 years… what I have been missing. The flavors ( especially the tomatoes that tasted off the vine ) and the good cheese ratio at a great price were all impressive ! Thank you, I’ll be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Salij Shrestha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjVCJE6xjPX3-rWN_UqcMn6I0MeVIv265rCmUawjOV-IJZDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dedication of this restaurant to serve customer is unmatched. Perfect taste combination and accurate delivery timing is what has made me regular customer of Mona Pizza. I prefer to call their cook pizza artist as they always amaze me with the freshness and flavours.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Pulido","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcXPRJOi53Zd0i5CXX5r2JtJPzQfXYXCZgjSW1_EUe5BIR5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mona Pizza has by far the best vegan pizza in Maple Ridge or maybe the whole GVRD. My son has dietary restrictions due to allergies and have tried many different restaurants and store bought pizzas and could not find one that he liked. He loves Mona Pizza and asks for it whenever its family Pizza Night. Please keep up the good work, we are customers for life.\n\nPS - we love that they have Jarritos too! :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nakia Maher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNHq13yHIHj7Vld6XI4uJaAXCOznlMvaF8kTpZD78kZ_-d4ERO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just ordered from here. Pizza was bla and barely any toppings. Got a 2 large pizzas  a meat lovers with jalapeño and I did a 50 50. Half taco half cheese burger.   All were lacking in the meat  especially the taco. Took off the  lettuce and tomato and there was barley any meat or cheese. Also had wings. They were ok. For over 80 dollars this was not worth it 😒   will  not be ordering from here again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nishtha Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMmzHFddSpR6IkZJ7L7mtJ9zjaN8kJdGBphf-20HelYse2dw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem of maple ridge. Pizza , chicken wings all stuff was delicious, we tried keto pizza with plant based pepperoni \u0026 vegan cheese pizza. highly recommend. 10 out of 10 \u0026 they have a huge variety of specialty drinks. everyone must try.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Smile Thai Cuisine
address: 22624 Lougheed Hwy., Maple Ridge, BC V2X 2V3
descriptions: Colorful dining nook featuring classic Thai dishes such as curry, noodles & stir-fries.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Riley Takeo Hooge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgIva6PMRpqUulaj2E9b567gf1t64PfCIHKigFv65LY803xA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smile Thai is one of the best Thai restaurants in the Lower Mainland, let alone the Ridge-Meadows area. I have been coming here since they first opened, and it has been a pleasurable and diverse addition to the community.

Do yourself a favor - instead of grabbing takeout at one of the many non-authentic Chinese restaurants in Maple Ridge, try an actual authentic Thai alternative. The flavours are exotic and complex, and the staff are very friendly!

They no longer do dine-in, but don't let that shy you away. Some of the best foods are takeout only, and this is absolutely no exception!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Clark-Roesch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHUJ1USG6gqe3ILZYlPE5sEULzxPYzVCYQUpc3cXGQ3FO1vdwV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down best Thai food and customer service in Maple Ridge and surrounding areas. Never disappointed with the quality or price and the customer service, a family ran business goes a long way! The facility is always so clean and welcoming. Highly recommend supporting this business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"marlon mcclain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTqWT-EhH3S15LYcpz3NgsdaQaRy5PMHt06Mn-Np63xQQ7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst Thai food I have ever had. Red Currey had no flavour no fresh bamboo shoots or  fresh thai basil,  super runny water down with coconut rice seemed it was day old and dry  crunchy absolutly no coconut taste, TomYum soup again no flavour, Padthai was best of the bad even my 15 year old son thought it was not spicy and tasteless. Also cant dine in May 2024 because of covid? What? Arent we past that?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtwqHpaCdgt9tRJrSuDhH7FIgUAgSZKnsnkgIh&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Hanna Waite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4w9rddcQ9lpExu1dNfEghJjG9ydsVVggFFRamVAbNCDWVaWj7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is good, service is friendly, and the restaurant seems clean.

I would advise caution if eating gluten free- I mentioned twice when ordering that I need my order GF, and confirmed that it was GF when I picked it up, but there was a spring roll in the container with my salad, so I couldn’t eat it. I ate the Pad Thai as it was in a different container, but the spring roll being included made me question if the Pad Thai had actually been made GF.

Wouldn’t hurt to ask when someone orders GF if they want the spring roll, because more than likely the answer would be no 🤷🏻‍♀️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mrityunjay Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK02yKU4inEgudvhGGlKrBrAKZRxhuwnfeJyD_JeTGVlWa7qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst thai food ever. I didn’t expected like this. They have thai chef even though it’s not good. I don’t say make exactly like authentic thai food but it’s not even near that taste. Red curry was just watery red spicy broth and spiced with only chilli powder they didn’t use thai red chilli. Thai food is all about 4 kind of flavor that is spicy, sour, sweet, and salt. The one I had was not thai food no taste just bland. I don’t know what it was. Next time I will try different that restaurant. 0/5. Plus no dining only take away.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdALS6-K1AhdfLOcF6-O11KPUw7FdAEcnuKZueiEPEdvDPh3k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Thai I've had outside of Thailand. I'm gonna remember this green curry for a long time. Sad I don't live in Maple Ridge or else I'd be here weekly.

Staff was super friendly. I called for takeout about 8 minutes before close and they still happily took my order. Glad I found this place. Will be back whenever I'm in Maple Ridge.

I don't normally write reviews but this place was too good not to praise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOybU2c8qbDwc_UJMXwMiMKJYMnUuurzpi9y-wR&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Indianna Moon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8OPCNbUxooZdcKgFJhZk7FGEHUiGCQmqp2MgQIwJtRY_kgZEthQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered take out from this restaurant today for the first time, and I must say I am pretty disappointed in what I received. The "salad" in the box is merely some brown iceberg lettuce with no dressing and one sliver of a shredded carrot. In the photo attached  the reddish colour of the lettuce is not the curry, it  is in fact the rotting of the lettuce itself. The curry I ordered is way too sweet, has mooshy and spongy tofu in it, and maybe 4 small chunks of bell pepper. I spent an extra dollar for coconut rice and my Curry is sweeter and tastes more like coconut than the rice... I don't know what the heck is going on, but I've had Thai red curry about 30 times and it has never been this bad. Im writing this review in hopes that the owner sees this and looks into the quality of their take out orders, as I will not return to this place or recommend it to anyone.
It is not a fun experience ordering food on my break to take it back to work and have to throw out half of my meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWzhNNyEplyqnHzH_bmgM3SsnspIujIUlCrxiY&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2017-8-8"},{"Name":"Duke Pufus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWukW7L6iD7Fsj98lKPEw1hzjJ0B-rpWvm75WLGKOM6jjGxeeRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Okay here it is, we ordered take out for 4, staff were awesome, food tastes good, portion size is small for the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC3RCWVzmvKkYroY0GruV8SIkPe_AMSoXKuEah&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2022-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matthew Burger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJRolkmm2fzfIke3005sW5UKXFG1l2S4OhjL21TYo52WLgLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I just celebrated our anniversary at Chameleon in Maple Ridge and were blown away by the food and service. From the amazing flight of margaritas and crispy pork belly, to the beautiful duck and salmon entrées and silky smooth Creme Brule. The food was matched by the super friendly and professional service. The next time we want a fine dining experience, we'll save ourselves the drive into Vancouver and go back to Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM23BRISycp1Rbn993xX_elG-AFBpZ-v7rCfxsN&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Tabitha Marie Geraghty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9l1bo7byb7Ucg-7YubvvEIA3WJTeAtKK5wv4tH4R1rOlNJiNsuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Definitely kudos as we came during the holiday season and it was rushed..

Our server was incredible, the atmosphere and feeling of the holiday season was nice.. the food was good and the cocktails were great.. cost of the cocktails seemed a little bit high considering we were in Maple ridge..

The food was good and the intentions were great I think. Had we been there and ordered just a single meal that was hot and fresh we would have done better..

I will definitely give the chameleon a second try as I love the vibe and think that this type of restaurant is much needed in Maple ridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"I M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1LyaX0CiLTrEq3bzFkA46TOUxf3F2uw04JXuyWMEYipULAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time being in Chameleon restaurant. Very open concept, nice decor. I would say a furniture could be upgraded a bit to more luxury seating or at least more comfortable. Air conditioning was a bit too much on for a cold evening outside so everyone in the restaurant wore their jackets on. The prices for food are apart with some of the expensive restaurants in Maple Ridge. Food was cooked very nice and very flavourful but by the time we got it 2 out of our 3 dishes were already not hot. Service was very good and the ladies are very friendly and professional. Bartender was very good and he made very tasty drinks. Overall a very nice restaurant and very good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3u3wArI1S0QGuEnAexQKPIxi7m91IU1WXwgtc&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-2-11"},{"Name":"Jordyn Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsI3LX_wvDAdV8BpWxjJFMdZu6awlgZNab56wLuIe4uRha2LHqUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great restaurant! Came with my family for Mother’s Day. Our server was great and the girl they were training too!
The bartender came over to offer us a round of drinks because, to them, our food was taking a while but honestly it was such a great time to talk and catch up with my family. Overall experience was amazing and super friendly and welcoming! I can’t wait to come back and really wanting to try their brunch on weekends!

We got the house fries to start, soooo good! Then my dad got the pork belly, another amazing starter.

My main was the Seafood Risotto, so filling! Everything was so yummy.

My images consist of the seafood risotto and the butternut squash ravioli (without arugula)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPD4elmKG2FI9WAamuWkKRE6FXTvT4qdhX4PQ3&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Adrienne Thiery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUBXCivlSBhJvOBZazHc4ioFjrNhntsDhE4PMl3eZOKT8Bi10S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem of a restaurant. I was sat on the lovely outdoor patio by my server, Kegan, who I am certain has fine dining experience and if he doesn’t then this place has outstanding training because he has that air of grace and courteousness I’ve only seen in fine dining. For the cocktail, I ordered a hibiscus spritzer (made by Kegan) and as soon as I tasted it I knew I was in for a treat regarding the rest of the food because this is a place that takes great care in getting things right. For appie I had the house fries which were cooked with the perfect amount of crisp and served with delicious aioli at well as fresh Parmesan. Also for appie fluffy fresh bread was served with cranberries in whipped butter…this was a stroke of genius, how often does one eat butter and think “wow this is remarkably delicious butter”. For the main course, I had the seafood risotto. It was perfection. Took the little bit I couldn’t finish home with me because I want every bite! I can’t wait to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObS2A0Wh_perm73oY3q44eJJ_lPDK8bIi5EyMB&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Lori Maginnis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXMpF1QdVxNT7xKos53oPkdIhvucK7OFj4gMh8jaKRBtudgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thoroughly enjoyed my meal at this restaurant!  Smoked tomato soup and grilled three cheese sandwich on sour dough. Good size portion. Reasonably priced. Very tasty. Soup was served up hot enough that it was hot to the last spoonful. Finished my meal off with a dessert of warm chocolate cake with a delicious chocolate sauce and gelato. I thought the portion was small but it was so rich and so delicious it was enough.

It was quite busy and only one server so it was a little slow but well worth the wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFhDWn7ZUpLtRn99UuZsUyHFtHtjy_5DOO3shBPyiizb4_vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time customer, had an anniversary date here. The smells from the open kitchen had me salivating from the moment I entered. Food and service were top notch. Ceasar salad was the best I have ever had. The duck and the tenderloin were absolutely perfect. Very impressed with the desert. We shared a strawberry cheesecake deconstruction. The overall presentation of the food is artful and tidy. The portion sizes were reasonable. Inside the space is fairly small, but tastefully decorated, and lit for romance. Definitely not a cheap date, but worth every penny. I am so glad we chose this place to eat on our anniversary! I would rate 6/5 stars if I could!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C Akins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfJ5TOZAppAoK1v3vAH4WnWh-tBc433e5bioDUDCccco7SkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in Maple Ridge with great food and service. Prawns and oysters were fresh and delicious and the acknowledgement of our anniversary was appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnTXw_ll8EK2bg0_AeQ0jD4V8ANr2jDeMMm2NT&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-9-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mumtaz June","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJ57yuZsE_ZTkcmBSuSsnrCUFQFFqIO1h71zfMaPC0pedJxc4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Desi Village! The biryani was absolutely flavorful, with the perfect balance of spices, and the chilli chicken was a standout—succulent, spicy, and incredibly tasty. The restaurant also has a warm and inviting ambiance, with tasteful decor that complements the delicious food. It’s a great place to enjoy authentic Indian cuisine in a relaxed setting. Highly recommend and will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6XdGqgBOUTwZS_nyT60fYqy2x300WU1JO-gh7&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Prabhjot Pallan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgO21cjeV01RW1fYtVVl6PtIv5eeCe5VS5GzlzoGXz_pXnTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing experience at Desi Village Restaurant. Food and customer service was outstanding. An attractive ambiance is very welcoming. My kids loved their Shahi paneer, garlic naan and desserts. Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3aWzdxmd3Y5aXwOQpSHQq46J5gD8DFKo0OKmY&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"H M E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_onQ_VWTg3rT--s4p5BWrgkdHsv4YFtp2G5IvwsR019b0iUL7ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic. I found all the Indian restaurants in Maple Ridge so far to be quite bland (in terms of flavors, not just spice level) OR really inconsistent. The flavors of the food here absolutely blew me away. Can't say enough good things about it. I hope this restaurant stays!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3KZli8btK833TtkTWUawdGbGxiWYzaATbxEPz&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Lovelreet Saroya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvOGb2IfCFbypZsuOw-IjYYD3blCxyEfzhhvvKF0CGDaT7vTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has a high-end, clean appearance, and the ambiance inside is very pleasant. The food was quite good, allowing me to experience a taste of indian cuisine. this place felt safe and clean. While the staff were friendly,. Overall, a good dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRz1dgufk1-EgU7uN8o-EnxilF0mDl-2eOWHE&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Daniel Momich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMLmjbBzipiWC9y5kDPd5UcqBNmqkZL6tcv-IJKvt7gyj3UtM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! This place exceeded my, admittedly high, expectations on everything! Even the doggy bag containers. Absolutely the best onion bhaji I've ever had and the lunch special (pictured) is fantastic. Wish this was closer to me so I could eat here frequently","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSl3I4ij-VLSDZ4MKJLVkvbLVt2c46K-W0fMYK&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"kim steve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY0aDu0XYBkItQHLfUVtDyOF6M60HTL1zv2rPb7HeY4cWcnBitsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was friendly and attentive, making for a truly enjoyable experience. Whether you're a fan of traditional Indian dishes or exploring new flavors, desi village is a must-visit. Highly recommend!

We order from desi village for company catering all time and it is always fresh and warm-  arrived on time +packaging is awesome. Food is warm for hours!

Call desi village for your next company catering. You won't be disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA5wvlXEzVrdlb_SPpPXqlNM9BiJLrCYaK4a35&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Harsimrandeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGFt-x6HLFjHpb_Q3PLYde7ugytZerHeSXMefsrXsO0NCc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for dine in first time and we had a really good experience over there . Ambience is so good and food was delicious. The manager and owner were so welcoming. They really put lot of efforts to ensure we are enjoying our food . Manager Jasmeen is polite and she make sure food is being served hot and asked us if we are having good experience. Must recommend to someone who wants to taste Indian food with good ambience in maple ridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simmi Khanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGpUak9WlX6-Up2MwVKzB2TnrCjSwj55Jg-LZgTqdZv_Bb4sKK4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re in the mood for an exceptional dining experience featuring authentic East Indian cuisine, I highly recommend visiting Desi Village,  Recently, I had the pleasure of attending a Christmas party there, and it was an amazing experience. The ambiance was warm and inviting.The service was truly remarkable.
Every dish we tried was a testament to the chef's skill and dedication to authentic flavours. From the aerobatic biryani  to the flavourful curries, each bite was a celebration of spices that danced on the palate. The appetizers were equally delectable, perfectly complementing the main entrees.
Overall, my experience at DV was nothing short of fantastic. I left feeling satisfied and eager to return. This restaurant offers not just a meal but an unforgettable experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPi8sRijUsu9llNYT3I-sR3ScNW7ZyiXxstfCg5BogBKRJ4AVO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A big Mary Brown’s fan here, never ordered from this Mary Brown’s, and the food was very much below quality. The mashed potatoes were dry and looked like crumpled flour chunks, and there was no gravy in there at all. The chicken was alright, but i’m so ruined by their mashed potatoes performance tonight because their mashed potatoes are usually smooth, flavourful and the best.

First time ordering, would not order again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGOiOJ6Ge1fjgSAyw9aY9jrIc4jkJHBNAQMtEy&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Helen R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCbxoYK7OzzvURDW5v9by_T_p7QjfLy2ItI2-8MkpGJbiZBjDp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant experience at this Mary Brown’s location, customer service was great! Our favs were the chicken pop-ins and the k-crunch burger. The chicken was juicy and fresh, cannot wait to come back and try the other items on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs-hcAP6u5qqgRYcylV4Pfq1dQnKMmiMK6ump5&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"roger ren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbZmMngTgALDmAXLrB5Z4F38AmsLSpi0apJkfqMS3B8E2Fod5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time dining at Mary Brown! The food was delicious and freshly prepared. I ordered the chicken sandwich and 2 pieces of chicken, and it was perfectly cooked with great flavor. The service was fast and friendly, which made the whole experience even better. The staff were attentive, and the restaurant was clean and well-maintained","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tracy G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKya3bJqbpfKv6rakAxCiPjR2WZ_OCBbXQAbcLl4HAoV30-Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Just picked up the 3 pc chicken tenders combo and a spicy mayo big Mary. They could’ve done much better on the batter as you can see. The big Mary has 2 pcs of tenders or something. No Louisiana sauce in the store. The girl was super nice but this place is typically lacking attention to food and presentation. It wasn’t busy either. Sad representation. And I love Me some mary browns. 🙁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW8u9RhV7UIlRwG9oStmIh7PnITlG9tnvT-cro&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Elizabeth M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuhhJ3L27gYQJMwvKARhYEqE4v9PowLqfpDtvNV5G-CUir9-oeQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will start off by saying that the customer service we received was excellent. just pleasant. The quality of the food however was a whole other experience. My husband ordered a chicken breast on the side which was $4.00 i have attached a picture of what the "chicken breast" looked like. This was not a chicken breast. And to charge a customer $4.00 for that is a complete rip off. I specifically asked foe no pickles because i dislike pickles with a passion so i make sure that i let them know. As you can see in the receipt it says no pickles but my chicken sandwich had pickles. Plenty. The tator tots were cold. We were eating in the parking lot and they were cold yet we waited at least 15 min. To get out meal which is no problem if the quality of foof is good. This was such a disappointment and we will not be wasting our money here again oe the new one you are getting ready to open in pitt meadows. I hope whoever is reading this reviews takes this feedback serious because you are a brand new bussiness and having so much negative feedback is not good. Do better.
A year later let me add more. I emailed you guys and no one ever got back to me. My husband decided to give you guys a try again and this time it was even worst. You had 2 guys working there looking really dirty. His nails had dirt under them and he was all greasy. I really don't know how you guys stay in business. Literally ripping people off. You guys suck. Literally the worst place ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6sdouKr5XlONx3ASdC2_vULA7pj7qvCRW2A1H&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2022-8-21"},{"Name":"Andy Whynot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6Wx1H81P4sGWekCIkluthtIbEKcAsj-XhC6tN8JY4pnUraQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in tonight for a small snack and decided the wings looked a treat. After being greeted with a warm smile, I got into a short discussion about the different wing flavours on offer. The nice young lady said her favourite was definitely the new “Swicy” one - a cross between sweet and spicy. She was right; the wings with that sauce were delicious.

Great service, lovely, very clean restaurant and no annoying germ-ridden key attached to a shoe-horn needed to use their very clean washrooms.

Will go back for more for sure. Great place for a quick snack.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shinn Inagaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpF1gPQ6II9FjL7HoACMWpgmrVznxivHZdomkvTJ9wRIkWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good chicken 🍗  I had Korean burger and it was good but it tasted better without the pickles.🥒","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXyQBa7fSzd3uK8fy7mplU9NzRm3Gap51cFOA&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"June Palmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINNQVf0VMp_AM8GsS_vy48JkwARaLb0Qmlm21riwu4voOVJRU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend and I thought we would try the $4.99 Monday Mary's chicken burger. First of all the tables were filthy, we had to ask someone to clean a table so we could sit down. The chicken burgers were horrible, soggy bun, hard chicken, my friend could not finish hers. The fries were
good but this is Mary Brown's CHICKEN!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"HT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJND89l3Ycjb5kra1C82V9YCBn3eR1Qr3n8_M37JdXtGEBpcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious foods at Silver House. The owner Jenny is so kind to customers. Everyone feels at home and tastes homemade dishes. It’s one of the best Chinese cuisine in Maple Ridge!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-cZ79vVwFEPuZ0jB7xl3YujoVxBK2BTnin4mf8s3bdVAog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"After decades of ordering food, we finally give up. Over the last year or two, the food has become pretty devoid of flavour. The chow mein used to be so good, I could just eat it and be happy. Now, it is still in the fridge since we ordered takeout a few days ago. It will probably go in the compost. I think the breaded almond chicken and sweet and sour chicken balls are pretty good but the sweet and sour sauce used to be thick and it was very thin this last time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benjamin Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBA5FB1OgRxlCyVinYuA7HZyCMqwaGLSrehr4Mn4kDvdqi1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I relished the exquisite sweet and sour pork. It melted a variety of colourful flavours that exploded on my tastebuds, giving a great impression of sweetness and balance of sour. Impeccable!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeannie Derton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZyxCXSgbV4TQc7z58ed2nkPmk33vV5j37P6kaGFdtYFoeqkI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very unsanitary resturant . There where flies all around . Table not wiped down. The condiments where almost empty and not wiped off . Service was horrible . The wonton soup was not even edible . Broth was hot water.  Dissatisfied and disappointing.  I hadn't been in a couple years and has it ever gone downhill. It used to be good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"megumi s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEDV-T-arppY7Ggy0cXgR13FfJZbF8Ty9M2t3rSR9PNBspi7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice spot with fresh food that comes out quickly. Good option if you’re looking for a straightforward, tasty meal without a long wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered takeout.

Ordered shrimp with cashews but it didn't come with any cashews just vegetables.

Got the hot and sour soup, we didn't like the huge chunks of tofu that was cut all unevenly.

Pan fried beef and noodles was great, wasn't too oily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-_OKK6LaQdtXmw_28o-YmlaSszQD_0y4q1a5G&fid=0x0:0xa5345ef2d2e4be6f"],"When":"2022-11-6"},{"Name":"Niko Bellic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwv_LQBDJWISpeRF602du0NEESI9E9uJ7oSXckjgAEnCHE6mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lived in maple ridge for 20 years now, this is my go to Chinese food place. I have been everywhere, ocean village closed so this is my new spot. Me and my wife love the food here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angie Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7BBJoUkE9g2G7lUv1UlHuRpg2b8AJ9VKryPW2FIFPgfkv6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"good fresh food, lots of them, taste good-no salty. owners were friendly. best chinese food restaurant in maple ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo8tKnpe6pJyAb3_jjyCKuVp8AIfUvAf2ou7p1&fid=0x0:0xa5345ef2d2e4be6f"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve never had Korean fried chicken before and I kept hearing that this was the place to go. Words can’t describe how impressed I was but I’ll give it a shot.

The restaurant was clean and spacious and very well organized. There was only one person working (I’m assuming the owner) and he was very friendly and attentive. He also brought us a couple of glasses of water even though we did not ask for any which was very nice.

We decided to try 2 half orders of boneless chicken. One of their signature seasoned chicken and the other was the garlic pepper chicken. At $16.50 for a half order I have to say that they were massive portions! The chicken was boneless thigh meat in an insanely crunchy breading and tossed in these delicious, sweet and spicy sticky sauces. We managed to eat half of both and packed up the rest.

The chicken was hot, juicy, and stayed crunchy even after sitting in the sauce for a bit. This place is seriously amazing and I would recommend this to anyone. Can’t wait to come back and try their different flavours! I read in some reviews that the cream and onion flavour is good so will most likely try that one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_-4XpVXwS4tuiPw6wDS5_y5bBOxBRywq3CB-z&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you're a fan of Korean fried chicken, this place is a must-visit! I opted for the cream onion flavor, and it was absolutely delicious. Just a tip: if you're short on time, it's best to order ahead. Despite calling in advance, we still had to wait an additional 15 minutes upon arrival.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDLVd5vGEFwAwdybRijl7rs9DyaZuw9XPlJ74R&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious fried chicken. Slightly pricy but worth a visit.

Service is good, staff come round filling water/tea every so often without having to call them over.

We had the soy chicken, spicy and original chicken and they were all delicious. A perfectly battered and crunchy fried chicken.

I’d highly recommend coming with friends to share different platter flavours.

Parking is a slight pain given how limited street parking is in this busy downtown maple ridge area.

Great place. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXdqRqFugRFsjSIar-OrOFg9YSYS3BANxLtdar&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2021-12-26"},{"Name":"MB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIefn3FTp9aV_tkLEMerRsiSn9abrY5dqOppBPJehNZyaGMiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the garlic and spicy pepper and the Honey chicken. They were both amazing! Great portions, we will definitely be back and highly recommend them if you’re wanting Korean fried chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvBzA7dB5WU4vdi-h7GyCGuFA1fhuSxSZTNOfu&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"What did Dada buy Today!","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7GTyMhR08A6awgaZC75A11vjN-sR6OzhegVertGwB80jthNLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious 😋  excessive wait time however he was working alone so that's understandable. He did open 10 minutes early for us which was extremely kind. I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdSi3lCKQgXgN3RIgT3BeDbZtbh41YkuS-2QJN&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Mahsa Abtahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzZdwC4FLiBEJuimDmJEsrIg9RPx_6E61CBkExvji0Lr8i8fNl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fried chicken! Perfectly crispy and not greasy at all. We got the half order of original boneless chicken and the portion was big and good for two people.
The best fried chicken I've had in a very long time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Duke Pufus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWukW7L6iD7Fsj98lKPEw1hzjJ0B-rpWvm75WLGKOM6jjGxeeRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered pick up, half boneless soy, half boneless honey with an order of fries. No complaints at all, excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfmuSnNKgRyuaboSV8knt3Kvt-4gSwI6r6C-QZ&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Em Sm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlvVFz7AHLmpCOuf_XMefZGhUTofAT-w3GkZDB3K6y9G__d1JL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best Korean Fried Chicken in the area. We've eaten in and done take out a few times, after all there is nothing like grabbing it to go and then going to a local brewery. Our go to's are the spicy mayo chicken, honey chicken, and garlic & pepper. Service is always friendly and the only thing I wish is that there was a parking lot instead of just street parking as it fills up quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4wOA9AZsNdcaAHlSUDtDacmbGg3YwKHaGGfPc&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2023-8-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kim Rhindress","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGV1bXDBhXJzPDI9KSedz8MMWu5WbOPshbJnxk8ecoAvwrcRUU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A local gem!
Small and cosy spot with divine Pho!
We ordered the rare beef with brisket, no noodles but extra veggies and it was absolutely perfect! Lots of tender beef, fresh Thai basil and the broth was delish!!
The owner is so friendly and you can tell she puts LOVE into every dish. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Rt-CHtSutsJN3oXG1vthiP_jA2MrajpiIr8R&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Jioh Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKSWfpbNYcWQsWaiXfEMb52v-8T7Q_sZwrESiKgHFQas3hVA414Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by on our way into the city. The warm soup was much needed after a few nights of camping in the cold. Huge portions of food, the bun bo hue had soooo much meats but also variety of meats so it was very fun to eat. Everything was very good! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPADTtkpSie1_AQsFEiCONH0NMXjhygogJv1pph&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Tyler Hazelman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaOeOfMrKb93Y_IutfdRfQ5RnvS47tYfW1M-2iSLOIvO-Sl_d1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Song is the epidemy of your local mom and pop shop. Staff is always quick and attentive; by your 2nd or 3rd visit they'll usually have ur order down by heart. Food is reasonably priced, Song makes quite possibly the best broth in the lower mainland, its my personal favorite anyway. I've been a repeat customer for years, Song really makes u feel like home. I Highly recommend this spot! Rain or shine Song will take care of you =)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVfYB3FtJA6xutB0TT28UgND8WPkeYBdJjYpNX&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Patricia Yogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjlKd9mThgf7cTYIXLMXbilhcd8ljSFZMn37lWe0i8h43OGeOavQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch at Pho Song Restaurant recently, and it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was not only well-served but the portions were incredibly generous! Each dish was bursting with flavor and made with fresh ingredients. However, the service was the friendliest I've ever encountered and very fast. The staff went above and beyond to ensure we felt welcome and taken care of throughout our meal. I highly recommend Pho Song Restaurant to anyone craving delicious food and exceptional service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk5Zq3xFT_PAHSymKc9pinl9STDVc9qFuCDSog&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Chris B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEm2JgFRxD6_hP2n3YeBkcnvE01P3EXsVOtV_iNzZjYGK0ng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The broth was excellent. Had a great meal at a decent price. The waitress was exceptional. We ordered a Pho that was a little spicier than anticipated and she without hesitation suggested that she could take half the broth out and add less spicy broth. The thing that really made it amazing is she suggested it and did it immediately with a no problem at all attitude. Thank you for the great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for lunch recently after a morning at Golden Ears Park.  Were quite hungry from walking so ordered salad roll in addition to lemongrass chicken pho and Bún Bò Huế.  We soon found out we ordered too much, as the soups were very good portions.  The salad roll was just okay, being rather dry.  The soups however, were excellent.  They came out fast, were piping hot and had a generous amount of meat and noodles.  he broth was delicious!  Will definitely return next time we're in Maple Ridge","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN03LG0PddWL1XrtkM7t1WUeLHzku9k0zMK2YiR&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Judy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNU7X0Zh-GjDXqejNfoqiI2QGASul0OZwrdH-FpCgF4pWayvIz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We like the mixed meat board. Its so good !
The staffs are friendly and price is reasonable👍❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHlBydWrm8-OeIXOfkxV4CZxmqstQ1occGbtcN&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Leiliya Fazli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPEB0OMpX-XgtffPw7aSDZBmhIqNp5EzWMUJrGlIpvLqIC9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend
I order salad roll and I fall in love with it ❤️
very friendly staff
They suggested me salad roll bar with chicken it was very delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7avzfLUBrtNMUOCmSLZ_F-eSH-Zm4I5uzgxKg&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-12-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For me, this wasn’t about the food – it was all about the experience! Got invited by friends to check out this quirky spot for all-you-can-eat Taco Tuesday, and I left with a pretty positive impression. Sure, the tacos are buffet-style, the simplest Tex-Mex you can imagine, but you can load up for just 11 bucks and change with no limit. Probably even better if you are having a few drinks too. But what really stood out to me was the saloon-style vibe and the farm surroundings, complete with scattered farm machinery and, the best part, horses! It’s simple, humble, and you won’t find many places like this around Metro Vancouver and close by. While the food might not blow your mind, at least in my experience, the atmosphere and the memories are totally worth the trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg-SRzMYbykNFWD1NFF318L6Nb-fahQiO8vegw\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Mary Servant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHgLbeT0gou0iFPpk0IOFdoMBnJ7rC_3eS_v5DrAOPsTKPD22a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went down on Sunday for the first time for a meat draw that was a lot of fun. They had 4 draws, breakfast specia,l drink specials. It was a fun way to spend the afternoon. The place is quite rustic with a horse ranch out behind. You'll see some pictures of the horses. I liked the rustic feel. Really enjoyed my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBYTloUDO_3mMB6KSrPd3uXAmZiM3bf1TFn67C\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Jacquie Montgomery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVakvhPhacxeS1WwgOroGpzbPBsfmFp83Y69hps_mEVBdCz0b2z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Attended a live music event. It was excellent with very friendly servers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSVo-QEX8FGmh7-d8ovHYch8CTvJk7DJqvKbSy\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"John Pozer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe0BvqmYZVSdl8vMzkjfI5nnnXlGPCIuhLYzs9LnFZvwXYyqQh7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had lunch on the dog-friendly patio. Service was wonderful! Good pub-type food: fish \u0026 chips, chicken quesadilla. Limited beer selection. Not crowded at noon on Friday. The lovely server made our stop here a memorable one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPhsay5SYwp30uFbPYnmAfTuXDlmxJJBDaftNO\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here with the famjam for the all you can eat taco buffet! You can't make food for this price at home. The food and the service was great. I can't get over the pricing of the food on the menu! I will defs have to come on a Wednesday for the burger and fries deal ($8.99). The price was right! I love how it's on a farm, love the vibe and best of all there where not too many other people (although I'm unsure why). We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpmKfrNrOh_MdTO8D2gO0TcoJI9_X7B6rt1luV\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Cassandra McDougal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEBUUqL3tIKmBdP0uJmyV8mvHRYPUb5ko5tg4188n33eDiww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Super overpriced for the quality and serving sizes. Only 1 server for a large place so she was struggling. The pound of wings for $17 didn’t look like a pound and were overcooked. Not to mention the additional $0.75 for each dip… $19/Lb for those wings + 2 dips squirted out of a bottle is offensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNkWZf4c2jQlsm2vYIe7nN6Q5vSX9x3rnLGrTv\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Laura R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGZhuVC2uAx0k5suRhJV1ugZ6Fs5IjHznwevseQ2nCnLEtoYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The turkey melt was so good. everything we ordered was delicious and the staff were so kind and attentive. And it’s fun to watch the horses in action.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Hanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXVOmlBlEhbzkV_jpUru9Vvzi9QoyuA3ekzi2Ai80O6XQWoEI8sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came in on Friday night, despite it being busy, the servers were on their game making the experience pleasant, food was good, would return.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jasmimaria R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4pJsI6zmjzg6T7Vv1nULcTI0hckuLuMTShtjT6u4cC-gzFPL6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a good experience at Sammy J’s in Maple Ridge. The food was delicious, and the customer service was friendly and attentive, which made the visit enjoyable. However, I was disappointed with the drinks. Out of the three different drinks we ordered, all of them were either watered down or lacked flavor. I hope they improve the consistency and taste of their beverages, as this was the only aspect that missed the mark for me. Overall, a great spot for food, but the drinks could use some work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDiRl-nZy5cP77L5fnmFOLJtL88N6_3XaxGg5Z&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Fallon Conway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRn0Q61dGB1Ogh71s4IMnyPpSgIxz2IAOpiPuQnyr0ts3m-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our experience was amazing. We went to Sammy J’s as a family. We showed up and got a table right away. Our food came fast and was incredible. Highly recommend any of the bowls. The dips were delicious! Our server Marisa was efficient but also picked up on all of our needs and didn’t rush us through our experience.
Over all it was a 10/10 and definitely recommend this restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mrityunjay Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK02yKU4inEgudvhGGlKrBrAKZRxhuwnfeJyD_JeTGVlWa7qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Me and my wife had good time there, it was sunny afternoon and happy hour. We had chicken wings half with sriracha lime and half salt and pepper but I would say the wings quality was amazing. Lindsay served us, she is very charming and good server. We had Guinness beer, good vibes, nice ambience. Will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPixfVGvfjQYbS1HHSlBjrodmEy10jDdg7HXY0E&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had the Canadian burger, which was good but didn’t stand out as exceptional. The fries were actually the highlight of the meal for me. I also tried the chicken wings, which seemed a bit small and were served in a bowl that made the portion look less impressive. The honey garlic wings were somewhat dry, but the Cajun flavor was fantastic. Overall, it was a mixed experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5OL_bw8B-kUBbiNtC0Axq7qm7qO8arvvn-P3b&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We managed to get in without a reservation on Father's Day without any delays, but had to sit at a bar stool high table because all other tables for 2 were allegedly reserved (even though we could clearly see there was 2 booths by front window for 2 but dirty). I would have gladly waited for them to clean them because I have poor balance due to strokes and asked for a low table or booth but was denied. The tables ended up unused for at least 20 minutes.👎 Lucky for me a brought my percussion gun to use on my leg for most of our time there.
The food is decent and service is ok. The drinks were good and there was lots of people there, but the music is a bit on the loud side. Which is kind of ironic because if you go outside there is a sign asking people not to be loud. 🤔
Hopefully next time I can get a proper chair or booth that will not make the side of my body go completely numb and I can enjoy the atmosphere since they gave us a $10 promo card for "Dads."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9j41vk7-ebX0mWwHOb3HEIFZ94f8sfoN_rb8c&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"RIO HR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIF7GpV4m64oZ0qQLa2t66NMefnxrzruALvqDOSbCmwkvF-Ues=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The girls out here are so dam. Courteous. We sat at the bar and the bartender was such a sweet delight.. knowledgeable and a master at hospitality.. will definitely go back soon.. Sammy j is the place to be for great food, awesome cocktails and drinks and smiles of happiness","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9JiN0_n4boMTj3oipaqeLn1vRMSbG0U0ikbhK&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Anna Manansala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmPEjbEU--G6ZvwM9BF3cXB1twGAgi58wl6xVmDzsfFIrX-aN6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great! Yum yum!
Friendly staff.

We had a long day hiking, and my boyfriend brought me here to eat steak. My heart is happy. 🥹💗

(⁠⊃⁠｡⁠•́⁠‿⁠•̀⁠｡⁠)⁠⊃ 🥩🍝🖤✨
May 02 2024 🌸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBWfzarkGIsTg2LIUJ1THNwuKIfrkk77qjL4nJ&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Hangout CAN (出走加拿大)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLsataZBHdbXdf5fvvtSixzA7_P_SmPgA4k4U2s2VVx5uk12E8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great meal at Sammy J’s Grill & Bar.

Overall we enjoyed the meal very much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt04Ztdx8uPi41vccNzMvvmiEBZPMgA1zPYbN4&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2023-6-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nidhi Kukreti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkwLGU0qL5R4gpFxJSktJd2bFgwdSs8uzUdgRJFVvHPQaNnjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for dinner, it was good 👍. Food was decent i like onion naan(must try). Chole bature were also good in taste. Service is little bit slow. Overall my experience was good.
If you’re looking buffet for a lunch in good price then do visit. Parking is available and free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdhJaDq--0Ap2MoURqhN_MUbNlhlOtOT7FGqal&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Boomer Melba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpQCzaaqJHvJb1W9difmwMVVfm_-vvbvXCCr9-sUgk4-fMLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always the best. We drive by dozens of Indian restaurants to get to this gem.
They have now added a mango cheesecake for dessert that was the bomb!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgEqodMqRMKqHn_6MedZOpEedkAW6PzYdl1EaI&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Angadpal Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1E381c52z9XIVulx92KauqWKJLwuMBE0Z7OrBhAurLG5IAkAInw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently visited JMK Mahal Restaurant for their lunch buffet, and it was an okay experience. The buffet offered a decent number of dishes, but the quality was hit-or-miss. For appetizers, there were only two options - tandoori chicken and samosa. Unfortunately, the tandoori chicken was dry and not impressive.

The main course had two chicken items, and the butter chicken was the highlight - it was flavorful and enjoyable. The vegetable mix was just average, and the rice was good. However, I was disappointed that they ran out of basic salad items like onions and cucumbers by 1:30 PM, and they didn't replenish them even after we asked. This was a letdown, especially since the buffet was supposed to be available until 3 PM.

Overall, it was an okay experience, and the price of $15 per person was reasonable. However, I hope they improve their buffet offerings and replenish items more regularly to enhance the dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN94vgQ14iXtz_OpUP7y9Iab_xIy9VY2sf7fXRv&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Happy to see this place spring back after a fire during covid if I recall correctly... Went for the Dinner Buffet. They have a lunch buffet every day I think. The dinner buffet is Friday through Sunday. Tasty food, seemed like good quality ingredients. With a nice variety of dishes. There was a lot of available seating and the place wasn't busy (2 other tables in use), which is why the service was kinda shockingly bad (there was a high staff to guest ratio). I think it might have been just bad luck, or maybe just the person responsible doesn't understand buffet service expectations. In my opinion, even at a buffet service is important. Plus it's an opportunity for the staff to earn tips to share with the kitchen etc. It would take much effort to really elevate the experience. Clearing the plates, bringing more water, asking if I wanted anything else to drink... I just didn't feel the care you want to feel eating out somewhere. Hope the owner / manager sees. Will come back sometime and try again to see if it's a consistent issue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQDdTzB_27kVawKu9G0jAbi1h_m0luszfJe5YW&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Frances Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW5Hv49QyUd0tzfirSnNxCfr7BBsJHZ8ToeL86V4tPrquxKFaGXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered delivery from here for the first time today. I called just to check on the order. The employee who answered the call was very kind and gave me an ETA for the delivery.

My order arrived perfectly. The delivery employee was nice and friendly. Food is extremely delicious and flavourful. The dishes were not cold and the naan and rice not stale.

Fantastic food and awesome service. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yasmine Esmail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEZXBMNTPF4jvg42VCs7awd7M64MsfZxN-AdLy-sBCNVAIaJYSAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is amazing. We had lamb kabob, Amritsari kulcha and butter chicken.  It was amazing. The set ice was great too. Very friendly and very welcoming  we will surely go back there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbwCHNs5zajDHigc6JF02w_-XsAjqzeF0b0kV3&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Souparno Bandyopadhyay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuCmVH2mv_B0Bnwyt-4L46dIFgiFVTDV9cKvZ2hdJ2RLLkzO9WWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Buffet is well priced.

Lot of their menu item’s closely resemble how they’re served in India. Which is good for those seeking authentic taste.

Choley bhature and samosas are my go to.

Tandoori chicken could be better but not bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeV5nBddl87-hPty9lULHuNsEV2sCet-xl41J3Ed5ab4jE70h2xA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant! The service was excellent, and the staff was super friendly. The food was tasty, and the people were really nice.  You can tell this place is run by genuinely good people who care about their customers. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]
