user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was our first time ordering from here through Uber eats as we have been craving Chinese food.
Portions were decent, packaging was great as everything was neatly assembled and there’s also a 2-for-1 for their spring rolls and dumplings.
The food was delivered quickly and still hot.
Overall everything tasted good and we will have to try the popular entrees for next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0KDOw1bazjMeIHW9bYLWcAk6oBkGSyT-iDRLe&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Dave backeland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcv64Vs5yBlfxYxoVSibb1CSK_GewvZ_CHwRAGyPnm_H2NUHk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"140 dollar order no cookies and 4 soy sauce. Chow mien all stuck together and dry. Almond chicken blond but over cooked. Chop suey all broccoli no othe veg really very little chicken and beef in each. Ginger beef a bit tough but very tasty. Not worth the money. Very disappointed. First time ordering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLqvh1y65HgADrC7fj8FbDDoU5QTvpDanEIDc&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2023-12-22"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious meals! Really enjoyed the flavors of each dish and they had decent sized portions. The flavors are in my opinion "Canadianized." Which I am happy with.
Definitely will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSVNWTBKlk64tJzYYpa0Pk9DkB4-cIE2xXXw-F&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Manesh Shafiei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE7oGsfssj_uLcNg0FiHdMtfhxS54WeE6dbk048uYFpL0C-jZW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered beef chow fun and shrimp chow mien.

First impression when opening the bag, 2 soya sauce packets for 2 tubs of food. No fortune cookies.

The shrimp chow mien had nice flavour and a bit oily.
The beef chow fun was bland, full of oil and soggy noodles.

Very disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwZWBKrxRmHXNZHVr-zQfZRm4N18XdLSix4dpB&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Aaron Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn-lvwTGMhUxCV421M_xqu_u5MrGrT6chcjNAjFFyrJKuOzGho5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST Chinese food in Maple Ridge/Pitt Meadows - Woking Dragon Maple Ridge.

Three things make them stand out: Awesome, fresh, and quality menu items that are made to order. A really cool decor and atmosphere for singles, families, or groups. And, they thing that really puts them above the rest, the people that work there from the servers to the kitchen staff to the owners, are absolutely stellar. The staff are really our kind of people. They’re always willing to connect and make the experience friendly and welcoming. Go there for dinner, you won’t be disappointed!

EDIT - DECEMBER 2023: a few friends and I eat at Woking Dragon Chop Suey House in Maple Ridge once a week. We’ve been doing it just about every week for the last 18 to 24 months.  It’s our place - we even have our regular table.

Tonight was no different. We came in and sat. The server team brought us drinks without asking because they know what we order. They don’t usually even take food orders now because we order the same things each week.

But what WAS different tonight… is that when it came time to bring us the bill… they comped our entire table. They said “Merry Christmas” and comped us more than $80 in food to say thank you for our loyalty.

This was amazing. The profit margins are worse in restaurants than almost any other business. So for them to comp us all to say thank you, we recognize just how big a deal this was.

Thanks Woking dragon and staff. You folks are amazing. We very much appreciate you.

https://fb.watch/7d4hEohP_4/","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-wn50iD6CU3_LGK68I0ozEewHbdMjFaQn1B0n&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2022-4-11"},{"Name":"John Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX_G2KhQ4UDvw4Nu1dqA3AsXfC53tIj_AZn0iIn-6oDOg1Yst1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The waiters are young people, the environment is spacious, bright, clean, and the background music is dynamic.  This is really good place!
Hot tea is authentic Chinese flavor. Noodles are not way I familiar with，but it is ok.
I took a look at some pictures posted by other people,it seems to be more delicious.
I will come back to try again!

The following is a review after a week.
I change the rating from 4 to 5. This time my family order 5 dishes, each one is authentic Chinese taste.

Finally there is an authentic Chinese restaurant in Maple Ridge!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp-Ow7MOso06iXQ_X9iKQ98uokidx8nryL8JKJ&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2019-11-30"},{"Name":"Robb Farion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7HA8fb1QGGEpC6CRgNHKUnOhvL1F-nQKaUcRfo6kSW4m_5dM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another fantastic meal at Woking Dragon in Maple Ridge. Everything was delicious and fresh and service was friendly. We had Beef Sirloin Stir Fry in Black Pepper Sauce, Honey Garlic Pork Ribs, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, and House Special Lo Mein w Roasted  Almonds added. The key to having a good meal here is knowing what to order as some items are a little bland tasting - as some reviews will tell you. The black pepper sauce is really tasty and you should try anything w that! Although we did not order any this time, their spicy salted prawns are also really good. In my opinion this restaurant does all things deep fried very well. Some restaurants have doughy chicken balls but not here. My only complaint would be the portion sizes are smaller than average here but the good quality makes up for that if you order the right items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJenNuRneIFVu8nyN4I_HGfjK-OcgrLjy4NqZB&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2019-8-24"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It wasn't horrible but it wasn't great either. I've been hearing so many raves about this place I had to check it out. I did not enjoy it but I went back a couple months later to give it a second chance. I thought they might have been having an off day since everyone else seems to like it. The second time it was just as bad.

(Feb 2019) My first visit I ordered chow mein, chop suey, almond chicken, sweet and sour pork for take out. The food had zero flavor. It's like they didn't use any sauce, salt, msg, soy sauce or anything at all. The noodles were cooked perfectly. But it was like they cooked them and then did absolutely nothing to them. No sauce, no spice, no flavor. Completely naked bland noodles. So the texture was great. Same with the chop suey. The veggies were fresh and cooked perfectly. They were nice and crispy. But it tasted like boiled broccoli, cauliflower, celery and mini corn. No sauce, no salt, nothing at all added. I've had worse. Some restaurants make their noodles and veggies all soggy and mushy so I appreciate the crispness. But is it common for restaurants to add nothing to these things? Or maybe they did and I just couldn't taste it at all. It just tasted like water. The almond chicken was flavorless. It literally tasted like flour and water. Again no salt or msg or whatever it is that Chinese restaurants usually add to give it that zing of flavor. The quality of meat in the sweet and sour pork was good. Cooked very well again but no flavor again. Is this an msg free restaurant, did they run out of salt, did they forget to add sauce? I've not a fan of salt, I never add it to my food and I often find Chinese food to be heavy on the salty flavor. But I found this food inedible without drowning it in soy sauce which I don't usually do with takeout.

(May 2019) Decided the give this another try, maybe they were having a bad day. Ordered the same thing for takeout plus Char Siu and ginger beef. The veggies and noodles had a bit a flavor this time but nothing special. So that's an improvement there. But the almond chicken was so undercooked. It was soggy and completely white. I'm used to almond chicken being slightly browned (almond colour). I had to pull out my deep fryer to brown and crisp the chicken for my family. The ginger beef was pretty good. I've give it 7/10. The Char Siu sounded amazing on the menu "slowly oven roasted to perfection" but tasted like a chewy, tough pork chop. We ordered enough for 4 people. Usually all the food is gone with Chinese but most of it was left over. No one in the family was really into it.

So overall good quality meat and veggies but poorly executed. You don't get very much for the price and it seems a little high priced. The staff was nice both times I went in for pick up. Very young though and inexperienced. Several of the girls looked about 15 years old. I think it's great that they are offering students in the community their first jobs. Would I recommend this place? I don't know. I know I'm never going there again because I was not impressed. But the rest of the Chinese restaurants in Maple ridge and Mission are awful with soggy mushy food and gnarly meat. So by default it makes this place "the best Chinese in town". I guess I'd say give it a try and decide for yourself. I'll leave you with this, at least it's not horrible....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeFbAAvRIofLTWXtjgDu2doO0v-0Zf3nJALha1&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2021-4-1"}]

Great work !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO47CilFubpWquxjN1JMztIz46D4bjix5xuzKve\u0026fid=0x0:0xca6b5c89104b2924"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Adeline Ji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ778zHJEPezRvsfqtnTHW0kDkB9HNW0Uxxy3fzX2M7sKMYDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We often get take out from this restaurant, and the food always good, fresh, hot, and service is great!\nI would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for authentic Chinese Canadian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6RyaOiZD_BOP-3Sn0_jyBZ7pwWbR7tYsbf9Tg\u0026fid=0x0:0xca6b5c89104b2924"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered takeout - food was pretty basic and portion was OK. It hit the spot for a quick Chinese food dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPoW1hqXSicxlNUsY_3VQ-m3CMwigzTzD2yiM6\u0026fid=0x0:0xca6b5c89104b2924"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Jen Murray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0qMT8h5zhWyfx5VokoULyUAXE28rHlFzQs7fVKzYclCDSnYe-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to try a new Chinese restaurant and were glad we did! Really good Chinese food but the absolute best part was being seated, having our order taken and being served by the owner’s son who is maybe 12 years old. He takes his job very seriously, and my two young boys were completely in awe of him. They said he was the best waiter ever and we should go back there all the time. ☺️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hunt's","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL4u2q1p3m9vSs6ezZzqzfxtS4mdmdgmYrL1DM8XovBS1bFhVN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is okay but portions are a bit small compared to a few other Chinese joints I've been to, it's a neat looking place and probably would serve best as comfort food as opposed to a date.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJND89l3Ycjb5kra1C82V9YCBn3eR1Qr3n8_M37JdXtGEBpcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extreme delicious foods \u0026 perfect Chinese cuisine at MR. Every guest feels at home and tastes homemade dishes. Additionally, I’m so lucky to be served by the owner’s cute boy who looks like a little bit younger than fifteen years old but takes ‘professional’ job ever😊. In a word, a fantastic experience in the restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anita Fedorak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWK7ND3hPz9IZ9Jrie5VmhfvlJcJog6LmX2KP3kT-ulDqZ4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered dinner for 4. Fresh and packed containers.  Very tasty. Our go to. Keep up the great work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlene Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCH17nrS_PCkrzU81NvC2QpAs55qbs4yuZUUKYIcJDQ4QQCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tonight I ordered from Kings kitchen for dinner and the service was so fast!! The food was all really fresh and my order was packaged very nicely, The delivery driver was super friendly and I have ordered from other Restaurants in town this one by far is the shining star as of the current moment. Highly recommend. From the gentleman who took my order on the phone, right down to it arriving at my home they exceeded my expectations!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Connie Robson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcD3CpjQ2KIT9ukXOt3q6p8B8SMkttAVRJsUo328I8e2x3t4I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the apple cinnamon French toast but there was not a single piece of apple on it. My friend ordered the same thing and again, no apple. It was still very good but I don’t know if the missing apple was an oversight or if it doesn’t come with it then the description is misleading.

Overall I liked the restaurant - very lively and popular and will come back to try some of the other menu options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-O4q7PCGAe_Q_exHXbh66W5xF0fvIy5DjDcX0&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"BABAK TORABI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXte01Tl3Efa_m0ADFo96Kz1F79A0-Ap8jSjGIMNFygHZjHQcocIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited this restaurant again and noticed that the portions of some dishes are quite large for one person. This time, we decided to share, which worked out perfectly.

The food tastes great, the quality is excellent, and the staff is incredibly friendly. The environment is clean, modern, and welcoming. One of the highlights is the open kitchen, which lets you see the chefs at work—always a nice touch.

The only downside is the noise level. The sound seems to reflect a lot, likely due to the ceramic flooring, which is easy to clean but amplifies noise. The ceiling also doesn’t seem to have much for sound absorption.

It was a bit crowded on a Saturday morning, but that’s to be expected for such a popular spot. Overall, a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5kNNNIObhREuuSscKObbYbvBBCdaYd8SvrHjg&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy to finally have brunch and it did not disappoint!  The location is easy to find and lots of free parking. The atmosphere is easy and friendly and the food and service were excellent. Can’t wait to come back.

Returned with my family and it was even better. Our server Gurleen was an absolute delight while she managed a busy restaurant full of guests. Today was savory and it was amazing. The boys shared the big 3 and it was more than enough. Can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiCPG4ng_rPed3P8NoMqKZwG2zyzEYpkFnrOYt&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Craig’s Food and Fun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUha2Q8WiUjbezKLoCbc8g-ZcFkFuHpjx0PE6RArmNeLmTAwJN4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing! And the staff was very friendly and professional, definitely coming back! We had the fried chicken eggs Benny and the fried chicken sandwich. The potatoes and fries were tasty and seasoned and the chicken crispy. The eggs were farm fresh and the hollandaise sauce was excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx6ygBpCV1nh9QvLFAAD3WtpH8Ta9carJ7YKDn&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Nick Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9cUtJY153nRWD4hzNcIo_gDDe44hWUa0zRGkneCYmPYO49A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for family!  We came here on a Sunday morning for their Kids Eat Free Special.   Between 7~9am, for every $25 order of an adult meal, you get a kid’s meal for free.  We ordered a Canadian breakfast and Pesto Philly steak, both tasted amazing.  Usually when you order a kid’s meal from restaurants, it’s small portion and not very appealing.  But the free kids’ meal at Pur and Simple, were full size crepes and waffles, filled with banana, chocolate chips, and strawberries.  I also really like the country style decor that they have.  Great vibe, great value and great food!  Definitely worth your visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2uPEhDiPYzzlUmh-jAKSk098DjZpOsiek7DqQ&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Sia Ghaem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEMQ83Io5sE_IiypwGW5tpjSnD5RcP1dPzKLkdTOi-SisSW8bCuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been to Pur and Simple a few times and it has been a satisfactory experience every time. They are border line Good/great time restaurant. Not great to blow you away, but good enough to draw you back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1cabewFzUoYl0Ck3t7YQ0X5raQ_yGu8-dips2&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5pgqDcV4jXxCDs44gFpKqBE7-kpDe9pqH0qySpykt9h70rZWn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"During a recent visit to Pür & Simple in Port Coquitlam, my girlfriend and I enjoyed a delightful breakfast experience. The restaurant’s bright and modern ambiance created a welcoming atmosphere, complemented by attentive and friendly staff.

I opted for the Coconut French Toast, which featured thick slices of brioche infused with a subtle coconut flavor, topped with fresh fruits and a light dusting of powdered sugar. The combination of textures and flavors was both satisfying and indulgent.

My girlfriend chose the Gourmet Breakfast, a hearty platter that included perfectly cooked eggs, crispy bacon, savory sausage, and a side of their renowned P&S potatoes. Each component was prepared with care, resulting in a balanced and flavorful meal.

The service was exceptional; our server was attentive without being intrusive, ensuring our coffee cups were always filled and promptly addressing any requests. The menu offered a diverse selection of breakfast and brunch options, catering to various tastes and dietary preferences.

Overall, our experience at Pür & Simple was outstanding. The combination of delicious food, excellent service, and a pleasant atmosphere makes it a top choice for breakfast in Port Coquitlam. We look forward to returning and exploring more of their menu offerings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLLZ6a2rGBYbAJu6qxbOFMZlUqdNznKM-GgC9i&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Nazanin Tehrani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNvnOcnvQZmQRfgcZ1xIfiff0XhYrv3BK46Bu6rg2GKUDhBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent breakfast experience at Pur & Simple. The atmosphere was welcoming, and the food was just what I needed to start the day right. The menu offered a great variety of options, and everything I ordered was fresh, delicious, and beautifully presented.

A special shoutout to our host, Dyson, who provided outstanding service. He was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtjwERVXfcA2zNYNfAsBJWo_5Pds5RsfhS84G2&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cafe has a cozy ambiance and relaxed atmosphere. Great addition to the neighborhood. Service is prompt in a timely manner. Good selection of baked goods!While the cinnamon bun is not overly sweet, it is a little bit dense and dry. The beef brisket sandwich on a brioche bun is served warm and flavorful, but way too saucy and the amount of beef brisket slices is insufficient to match its price point. Other than that, it was a pleasant experience. Free parking is available, few at the front and ample parking at rear.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCQWjBSFyYOgLAIW2cI25Y9HmIExTC2tVeolI&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Mitchell Cal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCInjOq0GbuMYvswH5jGHYwxFeM4jx1U9pkGzuh7TznGL4H6tT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited The Coffee Pitt on opening day! I had a Sweet Cream Cold Brew and my partner had an Iced Carmel Macchiato! We also ordered two cinnamon buns. Everything was delicious! We originally ordered to go but decided to sit and enjoy our coffee at one of the many tables. Beautiful coffee shop! Front & rear parking and entrances make it very easy to stop for coffee :)!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRtLHb2CxHpR7sxWFYY8yyo53ZIpRFHYfdqqep&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Nicole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrnay6I9mPBAQn3EedJwyNDFkKYL1Xsipc_mdCcSav_hkpysVe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Relaxed, comfy atmosphere.  I had a tasty brisket deli sandwich and a latte and was very impressed.  Staff were friendly and quick.  It was a nice place to hang out and chat over lunch and I noticed that they had a corner with kids toys which I thought was a great idea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ysflWK-fiscvLYRHI4x3-Z88aRvaWav0OKgv&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Jessica Bonney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPiJS6khTgMhlaNjvct3gC3YfQs313-0JoJ5uRg03BRfSweg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to the Coffee Pitt today with some friends and our kiddos and thoroughly enjoyed my experience!

The staff was super friendly and their service was quick!

Not sure if the coffee/espresso they use is the same as when it was Caffe Delish but today my drink (which was originally called the Boss Babe and but a new name now) tasted fantastic and I think I enjoyed it even more than I have in the past!

I was also wonderfully surprised by the food I tried today too—I got a Beef Brisket Brioche sandwich and it was probably the best brisket sandwich I’ve ever had. The meat was super moist, tasty but not overly salty, the coleslaw was fresh and delicious and lastly there was even the perfect amount of pickles! The bun was perfect soft, chewy and not at all too dense! I was beyond satisfied and the meal didn’t feel overly heavy either!

My 4yo son has a blueberry scone which he loved as it was super moist and not overly sweet!

Definitely going back (lots) and trying something new off the menu every time!

(Not the best picture as I took it after I cut my sandwich up but man it was heavenly!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw8dyspHPMOdJgtm9AXcTDdO_-slEvurQPOziA&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Bekah French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiYLh-7emQ9AthzE2N_CGxwmtRUdZguPeMRuVIWmhyOtllxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really enjoyed this cafe. Great coffee and selection of treats. They also offer alcoholic beverages and gluten free options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi7rQTd0ssiqh6il386xEVbCIVqzvuED4WcMqW&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Cherisse Lapointe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWTXySB8op9jQHBC6S5_OpNmWX1XSFLSsXjk_hE2fzXLCgMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently stopped by The Coffee Pit and had a wonderful experience!

We ordered the ham and cheese croissant and the salted caramel brownie, both of which were delicious. We also enjoyed a couple of coffees that were equally great. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it the perfect spot to relax. As a bonus, we were happy to support a small family-run business rather than a big multinational like Starbucks. A special shoutout to the girl who served us—she was incredibly friendly and made our visit even more enjoyable. Highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmMckOmAN8GrvVQJhxxE3_0PZkbBmVCh1pa0Y4&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute, clean and welcoming staff. Decent selection although I wish they had a vegetarian breakfast option. I got the chocolate chip muffin, the lemon bar and the almond croissant all of which I loved and I'm very picky. I got a decaf iced oat milk latte with caramel and it is delicious. My order was taken pleasantly, arrived promptly and was happy with prices. I will definitely come back when I'm in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariana Hyson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJare-XBmxTXLSgcQO3wAJOmS8xQDnW0XNPP7aeldKs_vOHxGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited a new coffee shop, and it was a delightful experience! The atmosphere was cozy and inviting, perfect for a relaxing afternoon. My husband absolutely loved the beef brisket sandwich, praising its tender meat and flavorful seasoning. As for the drinks, we both fell in love with the salted caramel latte—it's a perfect blend of sweet and savory that left us wanting more. Overall, I highly recommend checking out this gem for both great food and fantastic coffee!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO92t20YEKxiXCcJUWtn1RipZZssQaJrR-Soh7u&fid=0x0:0x258e4695debe4e5e"],"When":"2024-10-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nidhi Kukreti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkwLGU0qL5R4gpFxJSktJd2bFgwdSs8uzUdgRJFVvHPQaNnjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG, I love this cafe. I visited this place with my partner in evening. Everything was so good. I love the ambience, food and drinks. Recommend to set outside in evening, sunset looks amazing.

If you’re nonalcoholic and vegetarian you should try Blended cocktails peach flavour and Mediterranean falafel burger both are amazing. For alcoholic beverage we tried Corona bomb and original Bellini bomb and chicken wings. It taste so good. If you visit this place must try Corona bomb, chicken wings and their burger, they taste amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_ArvjDJcwgWIbb7HemgNeVJbeXv5QbLrTASJE&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Hay Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3lw-VM_9NiDkl3P2xmDBrgW_mHw454nMiYrvTPrl44QLhjbc7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This was our first time dining at kingfishers, and likely our last. The wait time for food is definitely longer than it should be, perhaps they’re short staffed on bussers and kitchen staff. The chowder is very underwhelming and bland. The wings were decent. The oysters arrived not on ice but in a pool of water. They were replaced but as another diner review stated, they seemed slimy? I wouldn’t recommend getting oysters here.
The burger tasted sort of good but it is thick and on the dry side. The fish and chips seemed to be the only dish that was enjoyed with no complaints. The service was really friendly and accommodating, I feel for the servers as the kitchen is clearly struggling to provide quality dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuxMNOufg28u_6KGNZclsLjNfE_Troz9ZqaNiJ&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"MAY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaprK9T_y6Ya-MZ-gYNQwYVv0YO4LriJa7e6HtacNm__1Wvj4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the halibut burger and fries. Burger was good. Fries were great! Location on the river is very nice and the staff were all friendly and wonderful. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYTRPm0a0h4igfVbXKb5_9aw4iyjfMFsBEwzDx&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Cleemar M (CLM)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCGYDgdTLDzn3zRPmQzI47thdkSDXTgZ2wOwEV-c1M78oYSBe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a long time this restaurant was maligned and we did not go. Then we heard new management and went back and it was good. We decided to go back for a non transition time. The potato pave was spectacular and oysters were delicious. the chicken wings were overly salty and the chicken tenders were slightly dry but the salad was good. Service was excellent and the view is always good. The frozen mule was award winning and the margarita was kick arse. Beers and wine are solid and parking is ample. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrZRPKgwT3O47ybARkJNqte4xCS7-lOuAR-KY7&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have a veggie burger which is amazing to see. We rate it 8.5/10. The falafel patty and sauce is really nice but there is a weird dry after taste. But it’s still yummy and would recommend it. Much better than any beyond meat type products.

Bellini 7/0. The ice is yummy but it’s at the top. The bottom tastes too alcoholy

Very nice along the river outside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhRgjhISHMh98uNj2jaFOVr7Lm1l9TH1R1Eph-&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Genn Richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIv-Bp7UhIKlk7R_WNzPvF8-SHy2B8dPh4abiUjm-9Owih0FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful sunset dining on the patio.  One of the very few quiet places to enjoy a good dinner.  I had chicken, brie and arugula sandwich on focaccia.  Real chicken breast and not too much bread.  With house side salad was perfect with house wine.  Partner was happy as always with their fish & chips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ5A-x7Zl1vfgaAaxS62rOS113eXGACnXnU6Pm&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Shawna Tregunna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYTagW2AheSQ7DO79y1mQQdFj6wxJ7_zgBzjQovYKazP5V_Mm_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great view, great service, fantastic food! The salmon trio was excellent, my sister loved her fish tacos, we both commented on how delightful the crab cakes were and the beignets and mousse desserts were sinfully wonderful! After lunch we lingered and worked from our table for a while and it was lovely! Was surprised it wasn’t busier considering what a great experience we had. Will definitely be back when I visit the area again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5IBW8zm9iBC8lVI7T3ab71ardDEoHMh7XsSM&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2023-10-6"},{"Name":"Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNzJbWMZ95Bu6OYJjVkBX_DVmBC4cvkfu0ynB-Z65Byxh-Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an exceptional evening at the wine and food pairing event! The food was fantastic – every dish reflected the chef’s dedication and artistry in creating a memorable menu. Greg was a warm and attentive host, making sure everyone felt right at home in the relaxed, casual atmosphere. Steve’s insights on the wines added a deeper layer of appreciation to each pairing. It was a wonderfully laid-back yet elevated experience that we’d highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Decent course to play.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW1e2AJwNYCvLiBvNgC43r0pskWeWqT8TliIEP&fid=0x0:0x2b2c79e9ba1b1c75"],"When":"2022-9-29"},{"Name":"todd storms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1XkzDcF3cJmL_uvxlQcSyqKZ81uK3m5kC1te14v1hGmXv0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing course,  tuff 18th hole but the type of course where you actually have to plan your shots, not just rip it as far as you can and move on!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkvHVZqne9KN9-ofplOlt6HLyyrR3C1usZfRX3AV_AG5Fb_VSV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good parking place & very good golf course!

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jodine Morehouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkI3ILmstAY-XeAWqv2CETEpjWiJVODW602jRpnYogrvfslqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t wait to come back here again! Such fantastic food and a fun environment. The fried chicken was top notch and the waffles were some of the best we’ve ever had. The breakfast truly felt homemade and with care. The kids breakfast was a great size and my kiddo was very happy. Service was okay; you can tell the servers are very busy maintaining a constant flow of customers. It was efficient and we didn’t have to wait overly long for our food. We did have to wait 20 mins to get a table initially, but we wrote our name and number down and were called when our table is ready. There is plenty of free parking around. This has the be the best breakfast I’ve had in the tri cities.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKJgj8sWDLDS9qegVktaFJLY6wHAIH52u_I1Iw&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Christina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAZU__kcA5bzRg06Xj5DBBJ8cZ62N3LvOHAgj11jS16XxVPZvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a good brunch. Can’t say anything bad about it. Not to pricey and the serving is neither big or small. Customer service is superb. We’ll definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvn0YrbOK9PQexBbmH0uzrLD7g4XyCGtU_9RmR&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Maria Fernanda Mejia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuRq66bP7uwZvuWOAzrXMaIaP65fNk1AbmES51ho5i654OFOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best place Ive had brunch in Vancouver. Food was delicious, the place was so cozy and had the perfect temperature. I went with my sister and we share the Benny Eggs with cubed potatoes fries and pan cakes and hot chocolate. Everything was so tasty and well done, the eggs were pefectly done and the pancakes werw so fluffy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOrT4XQKDGK2dJViD6VsKyNO0Zqf0UnFIb9_9w&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Korean western breakfast and brunch joint located in downtown Port Coquitlam. Lots of exciting dishes to try with Bulgogi dishes being the most exciting (Bulgogi Benny, Bulgogi pasta, Bulgogi sandwich, etc.). Service was a bit slow as the restaurant was busy. We had to wait around 10 minutes after we put our name and number down to get called. Food was good and presentation was impecable, but the taste was not particularly memorable. The door of the restaurant was open so it attracted a lot of flies from the outside which wasn’t ideal and really made the entire experience not super great.

Interior decor is very interesting with a lot of Lego input.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4awtX1JY8GFBJy9bWY0sS6Pd9fHU7-n1sKPpK&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great brunch spot in the center of Shaugnessy. Came in Sunday around noonish, luckily no lineup. Food took a little bit but was definitely worth it as it tasted great!
Seems like service is team based? It was a little confusing who was taking care of our table. Overall great experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGRk5-xoM7MNas2Lf8X9-8tL5TPa1NyfeG2t5K&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Helena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiYVJyd2ntFwLRumbYS9Kznuj6jXHoPn0UkQ_zdJDM29rWiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s easy to find the small and clean restaurant on main street in Port Coquitlam downtown. We ordered a Bulgogi Benny and a Corned Beef Skillet. The portion size is quite large. I love the soft and fresh eggs that danced in my plate. The pan fried potatoes were crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.  Overall, their food is so delicious and service is great as well. The only downside is that the food is too salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOodTPBFYt_-JZobr-pvtMCbt6_xvN_fc6G6khW&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"JESSICA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB2i5CpRP7UX8-wv47l2MrFmMz2VuMLPi87EdWVFtliHFbqvwR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute spot, warm and cozy. Reasonably priced and tasty. Benny’s made on sweet English muffins/crumpets versus traditional. Potatoes very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpj7mBBwvQ0YWcrdYBHVE_81woZdvdFQHDUKKA&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Mike Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL20X_OxbcK6Mq4LfB8wD0MzYN5bZWaRAXw5XJobEo4cGthsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love how everything is flavored really well and that the Korean fusion element is delicious. I got a simple 2 eggs with sausage and hashbrowns. Everything was done really well. Note that the hasbrowns do have a layer of onions as a filling. The cubed potato’s were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzoRfYSvHs4qQ-gqmZ89EYwZ0drtW3HbqfgRVO&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ping D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-_KBk5-yIGzGmKAkX1L-6QPRrz_RZKkgRnIY4il5exhoL_sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a perfect lunch. Kids menu pizza was the same size as the regular pizza. Food and service were both very good. I’d suggest they offer more selections of pizza flavours at lunch time. It’s definitely a good deal to go at lunch. The comfortable meal started with complimentary dinner rolls with garlic oil.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN47_Do9ZdDwPr-MU16mYYSZu6ND1uoZmOWqwg4&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Amanda Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX2-QkU6r0X4DLM6-w27hOoQabXaFOXnHBh92gU3KWWKAd6KWGjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have ordered takeout before and loved it, so we decided to dine in this time. Very cozy atmosphere and lovely service. The food was so, so fresh and the flavours were outstanding. I ordered the Scusa Mi Pomodoro and I understand now why it's a challenge winner - it was to die for, and I can't remember the last time I had such good, fresh, perfectly cooked prawns. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0E5mjnxKtwgfWXwsftGkVtde8Fcyw_qHRefWm&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful family dinner at this restaurant! The ambiance is truly lovely, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The staff went above and beyond, being both accommodating and welcoming throughout our meal. We highly recommend the Baked Chicken Parmesan—it was absolutely delicious! A great experience all around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC3AKdGWBqxc-jukm25cD5f_HXE9kVmRakX-oM&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Nathan Ferlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBBwm7N9m9VsEZe8oXWT3QVjEQHlJhduQ22vfMGOziLtc2Ouo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Culinary Experience to Remember!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

If you’re looking for a dining experience that leaves you craving more, look no further. I recently had the pleasure of indulging in the most exquisite Pasta & Prawns, and I’m still savoring every memory of it. Each bite was a masterpiece—perfectly cooked pasta with tender, flavorful prawns, all bathed in a rich, savory sauce that danced on my palate. The balance of flavors was simply divine, making it one of the best dishes I’ve ever had.

But what truly made the night unforgettable was the outstanding service. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel like we were more than just customers—they made us feel like family. Our server was down-to-earth, warm, and attentive in a way that made the whole evening feel special. Every request was met with a genuine smile and care that is rare to find.

The ambiance, the incredible food, and the impeccable service all came together to create a perfect dining experience. I had such a great time, and I’m already counting down the days until my next visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6ocpt4jzjfqUqjB2OE7Fa55VrOmI8L5U_KNDR&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pasta Polo is an exceptionally great Italian restaurant that serves quality food. You know the workers take pride in their food and service when they post the restaurant's review articles on the walls.

I ordered the Osso Bucco with the Virgin Purple Sour drink. I was served complimentary bread with my entrée that included butter and a bottle of fermented garlic. The bread tasted pretty great on its own while the garlic made it taste much better. The Osso Bucco was delicious with the Bolognese sauce. The side pesto pasta was very good and was well seasoned with parmesan. The non-alcoholic Purple Sour tasted excellent with its exceedingly sweet flavours.

The servers were very formal with their customers when it comes to preparing their tables. They check on me as often as possible during busy hours while maintaining a positive attitude. The establishment was dark yet classy and clean.

I look forward to eating as this restaurant again to try their other entrees.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXlV9QLG73dgmJm2MgWDAp3IaT80Wb7UqKSEgR&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"S Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDCpcHtfixdQ1nlZ-cnjxErMYcSiJY3vif9B2kRQjg0W11mPsG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s been a few months since we were here last. We ordered the chicken Marsala and gnocchi.  Both were delicious!  I love the Marsala sauce!  My husband enjoyed the garlic oil that was served with a bun.  The bun was ok. Could have been tastier.  I enjoy good bread and this wasn’t anything to write home about.  Service was excellent. We had Thea and she was great!  I also enjoyed their art gallery.  So much talent.  We will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZaMW99B_vyd2v_54Cdz758FoKxJtAP-r08b85&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Y Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB62F2-VitrTkpd3TexeBmDt6LJ-Ec6lzQvbbyCIp7HJAIiB3b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely Italian restaurant. The carbonara was tasty and creamy,  pasta is fresh and the sauce was enough to cover all the pasta and not drenched in it.  The meatballs were tender and mixed with fresh herbs,  a perfect meat side to the pasta.  The tiramisu was delicious,  creamy melts in your mouth.  Definitely coming back to try other dishes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdg_N9cATCFpMd2RK_yR7Qj4KSOp6mP1XOgxD7&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spent our Mother’s Day celebration in this restaurant and we had a great time. Everything was awesome from food to their service. Our server even took our photos, too bad I forgot his name. The pizzas were all soo good and my fave was the Anchovy pizza. Pastas were yummy and their desserts too were all a treat. We will surely be back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbGw58cAzM4X4wXEw-LloHV5v2YTXfNlioydQo&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A pretty solid dim sum place with some good portion sizes for its price! It's nothing spectacular, but it's enough to fill our dim sum cravings. I also highly recommend trying out their congee dishes, it's a very big portion even for the smaller sizes :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqLUIR3113JQiwghJ0rTtfOg6MeBLHIom1Nusz&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Izmet Barranco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiQo1jy483UmDOGk0DLpOPmwFqDxOxzKBlrj-9MTXzn_Zhoww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I gave a try to this place through Uber Eats (had a craving for Dim Sum) and I was very pleased with the result. Everything came well packed and hot. Portions are generous (had left overs for 2 more meals) and tasty. I will definitely order again from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmD7UXmUboit2xbF_yN5Ys4HOi60O1H1dOHOlJ&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Amy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXqddZyajPNoFhSfeKC0jxyRc2Om1n2-N6OKu8IHOhfMDJ3cE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Third time to come this restaurant for lunch. Nobody write down your name or give a number to get a table. That’s not good. Always need to walk to cashier area to ask for table. It’s very noisy inside restaurant and hard to talk with friend to bring along. Th good timing for dim sum is after 2pm, no need like up and more quiet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQnvjNsoDWrZlglHOi1dhcGhcoRCXeaAcuWXnW&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Stacy Purum Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJokIsJGL-fv0gSK_iI4jQxVk_jmrb_b6s-LN0DAYOqzSpY2xQLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wonderful place to have family celebration, big group gatherings. But as a big group, prepare to be hungry a little bit. Serving is not super fast but your stomach will be full for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdARKT_83o7JGkz1gZt3M9u5asO5tb7xwpZ3CG&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Christine W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKPsEE58m4l7C5YBEcOPLQtBTaYwdBFGzTSKEIraaLnCr6OYcs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We made it just before the lunch rush at noon and only waited about ten minutes for a table of 3.

The hostess asked me if I would like Jasmine tea, I said no and asked for Chrysanthemum tea.  She didn’t understand me and brought me jasmine anyway but it wasn’t a big deal.

We marked off the dim sum we wanted on the paper and the dishes came out relatively quickly considering how busy it was, one at a time.

The food was steaming hot and delicious.  We had the egg tarts, fried tofu, shrimp rice rolls, beef balls, pan fried prawn and chive dumplings, chicken feet and beef brisket rice rolls in a clay pot.

Everything was absolutely delicious, the shrimp rice roll was loaded with prawns!  The servers aren’t the friendliest and don’t hide that they’re annoyed when you ask for other things such as hot sauce or a drink.  I understand that they’re busy though and I’m there for the food so it’s not a big deal.

The hostess also missed one item that I checked off on our order but we were full anyway.

Bottom line, yes I would absolutely return for dim sum!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnaVG2kGThAKwI_-1GwALL1JRsn48bC2BI75fc&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Ngoc Ha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBQDR7xuHV7zpmSmm8y3qArF6yv91O7Kuz_kGRJuYZ6FiARojF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a 3rd time I am here. There are long line up for brunch. I have never had to pay, so I can't tell about tipping thing. The service has room to improve certainly. For example, when we say today the food seem to be a little bit saltier than the last time we were here, and we ask if they have new chef or what; the server acts like we speak nonsense. I am attaching here the updated menu in case you need to know the increased price. Today is September 30, 2024. I recommend you to bring cash to pay and ask for promotion of cash payment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhQqJazyjZJ780aB1nl5jFq0sJazfM_7PRRv9&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"---edit June 2024---
I tried different dim sum dishes.
Deep fried squid tentacles - really good. Portion is a bit small

Beef Rice rolls - good texture.

Shrimp paste on eggplant - came out piping hot

Shrimp patty with chives - this one came out cold... it was good but it probably sat there for a while

Deep fried glutinous rice balls with meat filling - the outside mochi was good but the filling was lacking in flavor and in portion

Beef brisket on chan chuen fan - love the noodles. Can't get this type of noodle in many places. Beef brisket was tough and not much flavor. Would try the pork riblets next time.

-------------
In terms of flavor, this has got to be one of the wosrt ones I have been to.

Century egg and pork congee - flavorless. No salt. No base whatsoever.

Hand shredded chicken salad - extremely small. Most places that give smaller portions have expensive jellyfish in the salad. This place is only chicken and preserved vegetables so there is no need for it to be half the size of the plate, smaller than other specialty chef items.

Deep fried chicken knees - giant pieces only to find out it is 80% batter. The garlic salt and spice just sat at the bottom and the chicken was never stirred with it.

Minced pork fried glutinous rice dumpling - the glutinous rice wasnt very sweetened. The insides were ok. The only good thing is that it came with 4 pieces instead of 3.

Overall, the dimsum dishes were not very good. The prices are high with poor quality dishes. Maybe their dinner menu makes up for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRL0bQXOdXOmLCPckVyE40kKNkpOpokL1auaQZ&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"Brayden M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPBZNPVNqHW8dSCFike-NLUMkuCrsmT6ZW7ysivwMhyRbgUxkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch again, and it's always a great experience here! Arrived around 2p, so we were seated promptly (wait time ~20 minutes during peak hours).
We ordered the 蝦餃 shrimp dumplings, 牛筋肚 beef stomach tendon, 菠蘿叉燒包 BBQ bun with crispy topping, 鹹水角 'football' pork croquette, and 炸兩腸粉 fried rice roll.
The Pineapple BBQ bun was sold out, so we replaced it with a regular BBQ bun. However our order was not properly registered, and we had to wait around half an hour for it to come out, though our server handled the situation very well.
The shrimp dumplings were large and fresh, the pork bun serving was generous, the croquette was hot and fresh, and the rice roll was super quick to come out.
Overall, we had a great experience, save the minor hiccup with the pork bun, and I look forward to coming back!
Total cost for 5 dishes: $48+tip","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marissa McKinnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBtcJLgdPMQpgMt2XQrlMeQ9B_SDnMecxrkflkfI6-e9ON270=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"sucks that there are such mixed reviews!!! i had the salt and pepper wings with a side of hot sauce and they absolutely hit the spot. the wings were crispy but not too breaded and had lots of meat on them!! tasted so delicious as well as the fries (u might think how can fries be bad) but i have very high fry standards and these were crispy, hot fresh and delicious…not too salty!! They had a delicious garlic dipping sauce that paired perfectly i definitely recommend trying these out!! The space is so gorgeous. It is quite a fancy atmosphere which was a little unexpected for the location, i’d love to come back for drinks as well!! The server was very kind and accommodating :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3lN4DT_Iycz4TIRz_nUw4Y8sS2jJWKbtd1FJy&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"tru klass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJULljo2CZpIBgCzW01ZQWqWOBp8nxIDLyMxp6UUoq4toUJ6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My mum and I had lunch there on Saturday and everything was perfect. The drinks were delicious, and so were our meals. I had the prawn power bowl and it was so well balanced and I'd definitely recommend. The service was also great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlyjqXTgBKhX_ls-QU-rYod3bwan86mGUNs6eh&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Grace B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYzRmU5pRggounfGFdNhaCgFB1i2Hk7bErahU4qwNuN7tYIZyf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had read good reviews but this was a disappointing and mediocre experience. Hostess was lovely and the server was trying but had no idea about the food or drink and couldn’t answer any basic questions and didn’t really seem to be trained at all. If craft beer is on the menu either have the details on a board or train your servers to know a bit about your beer and wines.

My heritage is Portuguese and I cannot see how this is in any way Portuguese influenced food. Chicken was clearly reheated with sauce poured over it, grilled veggies and mashed potatoes were ok.  Chicken was extremely dry and rubbery. Arrived way too quickly to be fresh.  We only had two mains;a chicken bowl and grilled chicken meal.  Weren’t compelled to try anything else. Underwhelming. Prices ok but quality not there. Not a good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_28xVzDr6ampMPh-VrxFTVBo9NkMFOOXoOsxE&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Andrew J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVmNa6jisgEJLsGMynHFW0Nb2To-ki1W8gv-mWfe16waRH8-6p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not bad! Enjoyed the atmosphere & service here immensely. Food is fine. Wish it was a bit more impressive for thr price. Don't bother with the cesar salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjAwxz4vmvDkzHTbjJ79xAPH5Hv2gweELvkjqP&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Kevin Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWJMxLZr-3YvPOYEYkCwOqoRgX8yyWGLPYZ19IJEKzgIUssXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Health food deluxe! I stopped by to grab a quick bite, and I was impressed by its ambience. I had the prawn power bowl, and it was delicious and extremely healthy. The flavour of the fresh vegetables and quinoa is very well balanced by the creamy sauce and shrimp. I'm just not sure how Portuguese it is though. Overall a delightful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi9dwa8kkM4BNbDBwDwSuoJTW9Xh-nRrWgwOaX&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvBO_gAscD4jQgf7WwLgwSNvcd9hd0WZ5uykstCAcxi1lOdl4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! I was so surprised that the quality and portion size were spot on the for the price. the food was very tasty and I was happy with everything we got.

The restaurant is also extremely well decorated and comfortable.  They do play music but at a volume that is easy to still have a conversation.

The staff were very friendly and helpful. They had a good knowledge of what they were second and what went into it. Also the different courses are well spaced and seem to appear at just the right time.

I will definitely be going back soon and would recommend to friends and family without hesitation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfbzsmuipmh58Tlxh-nSzNEZH3rRQbrO-pzxRa&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2021-7-31"},{"Name":"Adele Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmg9O9eJVdKcgQE9EcLI7KacahS0x1nMw1eZrnJFYsRp_QwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant was dead, only 2 groups of 4 people. The server did not come to greet us. 15 mins goes by and I had to flag her over. After the food was served she didn’t come by to see how everything was. Again we had to flag her down to get the bill. They did surprise me with a piece of cheese cake saying Happy Mother’s Day. To which I was surprised. That was nice! I think if the staff was more tentative and had more training it could be a better place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6paIURZCtNemTEJJFNJXiMLROrf43REDF9D_Y&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW45IYuhuQceepraBGwk75o-s6TtuC_5_eWJedl6juhh8_2uy_gyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent value! Good food, big portions, attentive service, good drinks and craft beers. There is what looks like a lounge side that is visible from outside and a restaurant side with huge booths that is hidden, so even though it looks empty there may be people sitting in the restaurant side, they should probably be sitting people in the lounge instead as nobody likes going into an empty restaurant and I think seeing people inside would cause more people to come in. So even if it looks empty go in and try it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Wah Wing Szechuan Restaurant
address: 2748 Lougheed Hwy., Port Coquitlam, BC V3B 6P2
descriptions: Classic Chinese dishes & dim sum are presented in a large room with chandeliers & fish tanks.

[{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is a very unassuming place. I would have never guessed it looked like this inside based on the exterior. It was very clean and the staff was super friendly with a great sense of humour.  The food was also very flavourful.  We all enjoyed our meal very much for not being a high end restaurant. Prices were very reasonable as well. Will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCVOc1V1GanW0vAfXOMHxUlD7OXgwln2QuHrH_&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hadn’t been for a while. Food was really good and service super friendly. Good size portions. I would prefer a menu with pictures though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxcvuP86fZtjp3Yr1fSFBnF1sXV3XGZII_RYI&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellently executed every time we visit. Flavors are on point. Always fun times there ! ☆☆☆☆☆ / Dec. 15th Sun 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFnUCp9_Bgr50_ywSBFmDWPht7MdMv6uwMz8wv&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place has been here since I was a kid. Glad to see it's still here and I'm visiting again after 20+ years. All I remember was that I liked their hot and sour soup.

Not really an authentic Szechuan restaurant. 30 years ago, most chinese cuisines were cooked by hong kongers or south chinese people. So, most of these dishes are going to be a southern take on it.

Hot and sour soup - price is awesome. $11 enough for at least 6 bowls. Souo base is missing a bit of flavor but it is jam packed with ingredients.

Drunken chicken - it was ok. Little on the salty side.

Shanghainese pan fried pork buns - these were probably the worst I've had. Not made in house and not properly pan fried. No juice, super dry, no fried bottom crust.

Bean curd wrapped pork dim sum - surprisingly this came out last. At least 20 min has passed. This is a steamed dish but it came out with dried edges like it was sitting on a dry heater. Taste was ok.

Mapo tofu - asked for extra spicy and extra numbing. Numbing was there but nowhere near real szechuan numbing. Was not spicy at all. Sauce was more oily than saucey.

The price point reflects the quality. Things are either mediocre or a complete miss. Would come again to try only the better stuff. Staff was friendly. Came to try to refill the tea way more times than normal. The iron goddess tea tastes much better than a lot of dim sum places elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsyXtmZVjFTpSM7j5XHpsMqasJjiN51hrkn9sk&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good Chinese food, some of the best we’ve tried! Brought my family of 18 there and everyone had a very positive review to leave. The restaurant is clean, nicely decorated and the service is phenomenal, on top of amazing Chinese food. 100% recommend. Accommodated us no problem and efficiently being a large group.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4Zm-hsHEcTAf_11Ju8D7ypxHDl4umZ6xffmp0&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Marie Amin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKR0qp3fose5GsYts0dtMeJqwXo1MWNFSPwo4SjCtJGEbgYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I have been craving for a good Chinese food. We have done take out here many times before,  it's our first time dining in actually.   I am so amazed on how good the service is at this restaurant. Food came out fast and it was delicious.  Did not disappoint 🙌.  Thank you wahwing, we will definitely dine in again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVB0fCOEp8ge2kh842Ux2XpFXVwgqLutUtBbEG&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Amy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUamHxgbXpYwrJI1uE5cJUYfe1wmxOQk5ygeSabzKwSDEQZmU3C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my first time to dine in at this restaurant. The service is good but the food need some improvement. I ordered a noodle but the soup base taste salty . Chef should put less salt or no salt since the veggie already taste salty and the Chinese broccoli taste not much flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCpErihv2HeGr4hQralU6fnwyOSS6XRaqyldOu&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Julio Cipriano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiL69VWk_HhrY9vvXJcaFkLa2z0igCrSjghxutPFMYl05ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going or ordering from here for 20+ years. Can’t remember a less than great meal!  Same applies today for lunch ginger beef, pork buns, even something simple like spring rolls all 5 *.  Tried the fried banana balls  and mango ice cream.  So so good!  Staff went out of their way to make sure my mother (little older) was taken care of. Congrats on 30 years and hope your here for another 30 for my kids to keep coming to!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"jinhee Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv12D1dUp7fxcV6NS3xJRpAmiob0RH2Bo_SiAxIgnsqIMG3PKE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended !
We started our first meal on Sunday at Jimmy’s Lunch Box in maple ridge.It was our first time there, and we ordered the server’s kind recommendations. Pulled pork skillet and eggs Benedict with shredded was amazing! I feel like I’ll want to go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYE1amwNbIB-E2dII2Zdu9zos5rugV72ApNIkl&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Yeon-jeong Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLE9xNVuyMj6yf4UydQM6ulLbBC5vMx06AACG1GFypCXWinBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went there with a big group. It was my second time there, the new owner was very nice. I ordered the chicken waffle, some pancakes, french toast, and a sandwich with onion rings. All the food was good. I definitely want to go back with my family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtGZ8EmQdFjW2KVpE_eUkJfcs2szgoh5GnZ2ci&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Dy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIcI8ZA9E0JLMr6grGqIysSzElCZrGwCQhhhH5NGKCTspJ3-JLVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The warm onion rings were the best I've ever had. The staff were all incredibly friendly. We ordered the wonton soup, two egg breakfast, and skillet, and every dish was absolutely delicious. Highly recommend this place!

정말 맛있었어요!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttKg5C1XEQX6f4T0WBwWb8EwFg_oIbC5JqHnS&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have walked past this plenty of times, but never stopped in until now (after reading several good reviews on social media).
It was definitely worth the drive.  Good/ clean food, reasonable prices, and a well presented plates. The service was great and servers are attentive to you even if you are a different table they are waiting on. I think other coffee shops need to come here to learn how to make and present a coffee!  We will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6uUZINCZoKQ2mqg9VaiRuGf-lQsBcQHjyJyiM&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Yuju Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7YUbT5ICRWYIEoxny3p8mhJo7E4GJlH7z-0QRvSKvcZu8Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cozy brunch spot has such a welcoming and warm atmosphere—The staff are incredibly kind and attentive, making you feel at home. If you visit, I highly recommend adding the wonton soup to your meal. It’s flavorful, comforting, and just what you need to chase the cold away. Definitely a must-try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhgvzHj2ye3DGttkL9R7mMcn6m62Ios8jku93p&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Brianna Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCxjGqq-S1P9AXC3kyzrcipFbDfAa10QiVhewDcELC-y7EHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven’t tried this spot, you’re seriously missing out. All the servers were so kind and the food was amazing, especially the pulled pork skillet!
Also tried their hand made wonton soup and you can definitely taste the difference that the wontons are hand made, super juicy and tender.
It’s definitely my new go-to brunch spot, and I can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORs1c74i358tM_45WF0Sdw4vTE8jO7oYh1JYLG&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Willow kehler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrGyM4Cox8sgLgFo2GdYuDP6ylhpy80buz1nGPvDlIYwB5ju7P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a good lunch! Beef bulgogi skillet was amazing! Wish there was a few more iced coffee options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlPrDoKV5U4ezighE12rKFhPmc5AU4QtFtL6Ua&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Clara Shin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8r3qq6Ia1p9jreBiNgO6aoNhyUS6wr0640Ek21mGJv2Pi2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually avoid eating meat when dining out because I am very sensitive to smells. Many restaurants seem to use lower-quality meat, which often has an unpleasant odor. However, I was pleasantly surprised when my friend ordered wontons here, and I decided to try one. They were absolutely delicious! I was told they are handmade, which explains the exceptional taste. I liked them so much that I ordered takeout to enjoy at home. I was also impressed that the packaging they use is made from safe materials without harmful chemicals.

Although it’s a bit far from where I live, I would love to come back often. This place serves incredibly delicious and healthy food. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]
