user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3scViopAORi774ildzflEHh5pl-bSj6U2vL-BMpzIsqze-7mF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"THIS PLACE SUCKS! I ordered a filet o fish no bun. I paid .75 cents for tomatoes! (see picture) and .25 cents for lettuce. They forgot to put Tarter sauce on my fish. They didn't put the cheese on my fish. They closed the lid on the cheese (see picture) The fries were old and dried out. My coke had a plastic lid that was deformed and wouldn't stay on. This McDonald's is seriously the worst McDonald's I have ever been to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiU1UiL6os669yLj7NaT_tBQ5dGzAIxf-irbTe&fid=0x0:0x3404f93563e282d9"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Terrance Ballinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfXPM0VnVW25XGLTurN53qTTrBcGu0EFRlRUVkF2_Fa_j4hjxG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"⭐️

I can understand why this place has a low rating. Despite the sign claiming they are open 24 hours for drive-through service, I found the entrance blocked by barriers, preventing any orders. I tried honking, but no one seemed to notice. Disappointed, I decided to head to A&W across the street, which will likely provide a better experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjqrXG3Nzt4p12kqUDrR6ND1vOEMiSWwcur5b8&fid=0x0:0x3404f93563e282d9"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Elijah Levesque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7Aczv7Ghc-Yorwk6DsXa-HtxJfAu1znMhtnvYvSc2hJofQRM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First drive through guy (told by another worker his name was Shawn) very very happy  to be serving us great attitude made experience very enjoyable. 2nd person who gave us our food was also very pleasant. This experience was a very good one and I’m glad to see there are passionate people in the world today. I appreciate that they care so much. Chicken nuggets and fries are great. Tastes like high quality chicken.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Javed Ahmad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzLOK44A7RCpuA8JJFm7H-6eeSsC8gVih0J43gH7HyhEAb_Tke=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The old Canadian  lady in 228 McDonald in maple ridge, who is always working on night shifts is not got with skip/uber/doordash drivers and customers as well. She is always not giving order on time, put drivers on wait without any reason especially late night. Talking too much.
She needs special train for how to attend and deal with customers and drivers.
The rest of the staff is supper good especially Pakistani manager, super personality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"manvir singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrd54X2_nb55a0cDOELiSLG98Enp_nd5lopdb8Ad8CGUfCnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is not the first time this location missed something. Every-time they forget to add extra sauce i purchased on the side in the order.

Next time i tell them about kissing item. They don’t bother about the feedback. Rude staff on window where they pass the food.

These guys will never learn.

Better to visit the location near save on food on 240st. Atleast they know how to take care of the customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gagan Joshan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4664kgFH2TicuDGEvUeh5-YclNwZ7ZL27xTDLnvzSpTjH9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Dear McDonald’s Management,

I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with the behavior I encountered during my recent visit to your location. I was shocked and upset by the rude and unprofessional conduct of your staff.

When I attempted to place my order, the staff member was not only uncooperative but also dismissive of my concerns. It felt like my questions and requests were ignored, and instead of receiving assistance, I was met with a tone that was both condescending and unhelpful. It was clear that my attempt to explain my order or ask for clarification was unwelcome.

At no point did I feel like my issue was being listened to, nor did I receive any effort from the staff to resolve my problem. As a paying customer, I expect a certain level of respect and courtesy, neither of which were extended during my visit.

I hope you can address these issues with your team so that future customers do not have to experience the same frustrating and unpleasant service. Timing of this kind of behaviour was 1:40 am and she also shut the door on my face. I am say that I am not serving to you so that’s very rude behaviour to customer","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lee G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNveP1p5MAFeF1xo_-pxim66duQc1h4fbDVIKAE54QY6cHTvaN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a quarter pounder BLT, and it was perfect to me! the lettuce was fresh, and it was not iceberg lettuce either. Right amount of toppings and sauces and grease, because there is always some grease on hamburger patties, and it's part of the overall flavor. I should know I'm still a customer, and when I was a young adult, I worked at McDonald's, and that's over 30 years ago. So I'm a bit judgmental when it comes to McDonald's food and restaurants, and I will definitely come back to this one in Maple Ridge. The older lady cleaning tables was very friendly also this was around noon Cheers to the staff and management 👏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sunny Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMzWAiXdng0rCtZP9l45dHvlvYqeLHGoUweyd_OjqtW7kL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good table service, play place was great for toddlers, food was as expected. Would come back for playpen and service only specifically. Thank you for a good experience with my kids.

Food - Food was as expected. Ordered QP meal and happy meal, everything was hot and as expected.

Service - They delivered right to my table in the play place. Brought me a bag too, really kind of the staff to do and made sure I was good before leaving.  They did this for 2 other tables too with kids.

Atmosphere - Newly renovated, the play place is nice and clean. It was oddly nice and clean inside. The new renovation post COVID has a nice aesthetic to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt7Y5rr_WSjtPq26l29uhAok3djMi2apDIWUQ&fid=0x0:0x3404f93563e282d9"],"When":"2024-2-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Romulus Lubbong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWl63ax3o3o4tRI1t8NUxKzpyp1s6eSGkV0Q-QKsUCogPksxGiz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We tried Big Red's at the Abbotsford Airshow. Loved their Beef Chicken Poutine. In fairness, I like the texture, crisp not soggy.

HOWEVER, the sauce quantity was not enough to cover the entire box of fries, didn't reach the middle and bottom. Could you please be generous with the gravy from now on?
I would definitely try again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chantal mishler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_a-ta-zwFaboUjK8xHMFTs-VRx5Cbdvf7S8BMeebygb0WSCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently tried them at the PNE fair. It was beyond disappointing. I don't know how one can manage ruining such an easy dish, but it was honestly the worst poutine I've had. The fries were undercooked, crunchy (but not in the way you'd hope), and cold middles. The gravy was SO sad. It was the bland-est gravy I've ever had. There was no flavour. The cheese curds were good, they obviously were store bought. I am NOT one to normally complain, but if the lineup wasn't so long I 100% would have returned it. For $13+ I would have expected something atleast edible. I tossed it out after 3 bites, my friends who tried it also urged me to return it.
Wouldn't return again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Skreech xx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc4x6b1aP-dudAsR9a3FuhUpNF7pj7sloojuiK3LAan2FdAzY8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got the classic poutine the other day at the luminary festival in North Delta from this truck and I was very disappointed. Gravy tasted old and It was very small for what it cost. The classic poutine was $13 and all I have to say was it was super small. Such a rip off. You could get TWO big and very filling poutines at costco for the price of what big reds costed. I 100% wouldn't recommend getting it ever again. Waste of money and time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV69jahocJXJ5Qpy7louD-ELbmPOE6eYM1Nj6s_NTGEI-5bRlF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got the chicken strip poutine. The chicken strips were horrible quality and tasted bad. The gravy had 0 flavor and was not hot enough. The fries were bomb tho! EDIT- I see some are saying the chicken strip poutine is 12$?! we paid 17$!!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Curnew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKOGpLkRh8MeITTuZ5zi75R5eK5M8fJ43s3uhiIPsXQPeX0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, the new recipe for the gravy is not good.  We used to travel far and wide to get Big Reds,
Now the portion was half the size and the gravy was weak and no longer authentic poutine gravy. Such a shame.  We won't return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHacRgtrfS5scu3MsrBBl1IethxtxLJfCNuTudFilbMAs0Lw6P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the chicken strips poutine. It came with only a few pieces of chicken. The cheese curds were cold and unmelted. Only decent part was the fries that were hot and crispy. I would not recommend this place. Overpriced and terrible quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Kasal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ7x5LYWndAM_AD9nf6k2i-FeY_3xsTMgvio9skajGHNrhi8vV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had their poutine at the PNE and can’t say I’ve ever been more disappointed in a poutine… it was cold and the cheese curds were just not it. Also pepper in the gravy? Really?? Yikes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ArwadM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgsgXFbTGDtqQIP5j1Cq6f4xf3uHjdhCwRRHQHYFzk7Z5xag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the chicken stripes I ordered at the PNE my friend ordered the classic poutine and he also enjoyed it. I'll definitely come back for more!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eduard Novikov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL98rjO3Kq1FDDl3Eq1FDDp10IPiGeI2amJQdN-mEQSAxLSKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the burger I received last weekend. It was a mushroom swiss, which is generally a pretty messy burger, but this one was ridiculous. The grease was leaking through the wrapper and into the bag, and for some reason there seemed to be half a bottle of mayo on the burger. The fries were also ice cold.

I used to be a regular here because I work nearby, but the quality has been steadily getting worse over the last several months. Now it seems that the food is always cold, the portions are smaller, the staff less trained, and the prices higher. I will be finding somewhere else to go on my lunch breaks from now on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqKlwpSOoDA4RUD-MmCreb_aQ7GU589pex1gaG&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Harley6.0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0YNA_cDN710Z97fGmqku50-ldR6ud9yUGAGn-J2qr6tKKC85x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly pathetic. Took a while to get this “fast food” After finding a clean ish table with no sauces, dirt, or left over food on it.
The wrap was just the cherry on top of this 13$ expirience of people sleeping in a booth with an just awful chicken strip in it the wrap. Most dissapointing Dairy Queen experience ive ever had unfortunately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7M9wlOfRX9Sb_s9d3Tuesa8RcSvWzz7vpTcnt&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Austin Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDgSP-CiGZQU9IbF1EyZSoCamWWJ5gFcKGeQSrPhlIPNKeP-wQOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Update: This review is now nearly 6 months old and may or may not reflect the current situation at this location. Please read with that in mind.

Preface: I tried to submit this complaint privately through their website 'contact us' page, however their feedback form only throws errors.

The manager or owner put up a sign stating that they wouldn't be accepting expired coupons anymore. That's fine, and totally fair. What isn't fine OR fair is that the sign subsequently blamed that change on a minimum wage increase, and suggested that the store wasn't profitable with the new wages. That's the work of a really, really bad leader. Simultaneously throwing employees under the bus to customers ("don't be mad at me, the one who should be accountable for this decision, be mad at my minimum wage employees!") while also announcing your resentment over being forced to pay minimum wage to your staff? That's really upsetting. Can you imagine being an employee and knowing your boss doesn't even think you're worth minimum wage? How awful for employee morale and retention. I can tell you for certain that, if I worked there and saw that, my motivation to work hard would disappear.

Shame on the manager/owner who posted that sign. Seriously. The minimum wage workers are the only reason you HAVE a business. You owe ANY success you have to them, not the other way around.

As for the staff we interacted with, they were all lovely people who were absolutely doing their best while crazy busy and understaffed. I have only positive things to say about the staff. They were far better than the manager of this location deserves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE7Rz5onbSbt9Q8K2tSwwLssMmrjwnGLdxmNEE&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The famjam came here for a cool treat, which was perfect with the warm weather. We made our order and sat down, they even brought our food to our table. Service was great. The parking lot is hard to get out of when the drive thru is busy. Inside was almost empty when we went in. I had a cookie dough Blizzard (omg so good).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJMllTBX2ulIOgJdgP8s34WMwHDYlMsGnmDgA0&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Kevin R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmk-hZYkAC3ARtrGA73ogA4rgOZmGYmt45F4aYD05VWT0tTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Power was out at the West Ridge location, so gave this one a try.
I love DQ, but the South Asian Employee with the floppy hair made me cringe. "Working" in the food prep area(more like hanging out), then grabs his cell phone and scans it at the register. Then works a little drive thru and saunters back to the food prep area...cell phone in hand. Zero washing.
Not sure about you, but disgusting cell phones should be nowhere near food prep.
Will not be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dr Yogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-qq8x0Qpi21fE63UXCn-27tpi-1gl3b-ffJjg0qAkEHiuWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wish they could be more selective when hiring people or train them better to get our orders correctly. Furthermore, one of the burgers came with a chunk of black rotten lettuce which shows poor quality control or perhaps they simply don't care. It was disgusting. Will never buy food there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jeremy dagg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJor96dIwG_6DENW0Tt8PHMgX7LeLzmpwvKxe61z4kkrju_rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As a long-time Maple Ridge resident, I always enjoyed seeing how our local businesses hire local and young workers. It has been a few months since being here last, but I was surprised that there is a new owner and looks to have hired non Maple Ridge residents. Our youth have lost an opportunity of employment for corporate greed and government handouts. I'll be boycotting both Maple Ridge locations as I do with Tim Hortons. As a parent with 3 kids, I now see less opportunity for Canadians to find starter jobs to gain that experience they need. This location was great for local youth, and now there is only 1 person left, and I would give her 5 stars for her service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brett B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZMFBVQKBh4r7pfh4pwoYOtzSGxo0peBMhqMuuYHS1DWnTB7fR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order 4 strips basket. These are the 4 strips I get. A small amount of fries. My wife ordered a "basket" of fries and she has maybe 8 fries more than I do. Didn't get our gravies. I bet you guys are just sitting there laughing at us right now aren't you. Who cares about what people pay for just give them whatever and send it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfgYV0Vhyq3EQ7GM24Bmb988idf9UBBAerEXW-&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Claudia Amaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX12djr0_Y8bEf6N8cNb1tqOObfsJozSff3Ep2mfyThDWLwyBLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi in the lower mainland. Highly recommended. Staff are always great and friendly. Christine and Jennifer are amazing. The quality of the food is superb, you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrMwuXW9f_fW0XktUobGyP6rp8F5mikhlcIEdo\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Yvonne W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnlT5aFvoCFVCaIdG7Esr5bPrredov3mfrrZ5ZyWoi0nZ0gQcj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite comfy meal all the time from Shinobi.  For 16 dollars-ish, you can get a variety of food in big portion. I cannot think of any other place in the Lower Mainland that can beat this price! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIIQjHvd5KxQADpRvTyAeJizonVNTVP0tGcvBo\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Tammie Barker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXxI2bXd-3sND1oFIskvMVhbpiWnyCfjF3YU_4kqx8norU2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a teriyaki chicken lunch box to go. The portions were good and the food was delicious!  I will definitely be ordering from Shinobi Downtown again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyUO7bctF6H7ZruH5S-6COzmV-tYesIMADp00g\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Jessica Clark-Roesch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDV5_0TU2jFjH8aZU9TGAOogV1cB5enHy4mAkM9us0VcJlObKj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here a few times a week because of Christine , Jennifer and the quality of the food!!!! I cannot say enough good things about their customer service and how well these ladies take care of me as a customer ! This place is superior to the rest of the Sushi businesses in town and surrounding areas! Not only do you get treated with the best customer service but the price of the food is incredible and actual food is amazing, always fresh, delicious and looks very appealing. I am never disappointed and refuse to go anywhere else. Even if I have to drive from home in Abby to grab some lunch or dinner! Its worth every penny and mile!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First trip in since the fire. Much the same as it was, but all booths now. No padded seating so not too comfortable. Music too quiet to blend in with the noise and conversations so not helpful in creating an atmosphere. Was hoping they would have added cushions. Take out is better organization and u have seating to wait for order, no more going to the back and lingering. Food still good! 😊 Recommend👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fiorella Vallejo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1SnfWM9cmXxEh39oA3RY-NSjUql11rlkIUXcbtqnf0ItMOAys=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family’s favourite restaurant in downtown Maple Ridge! The food is delicious, we always get the caterpillar roll, maple ridge rolls, and chicken teriyaki a la carte. Christine and all the servers are very attentive and lovely!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrW1IRrxRL9lGqDvY6T8p-DuyH_8CNET0s5wQE\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Marcos Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrIx99K0w17o1_jz1_EhQur2HjhBKK7Idj_Dw1mjT3aruNUbguXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere. I was happy to finally be in a Japanese restaurant with Japanese music instead of american pop.\nEverything was amazing, but I really wish they stopped using plastic cups. I know this is very common amongst oriental restaurants, but it has to stop. It makes me think less of the food been served, although food quality is impeccable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKFL_BsgxaR9ddA8Q-1A-_EGID8RLZWZCQtxn3\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"angelique switzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPKWLQEEaqOlrXt9kl-Pif0-MHsDLg7BtCU_bRXCTCmazrOpJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming to this location for 10 years. It's the best sushi outside of Vancouver!!! Quality fish and very fresh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgykLzn8WO__BMwhny0yMcytV4K7YGx9cz_v5J\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-11-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hmong BC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILJgUBlBkN02LpfLC7CWCzdW3ilMHVPfdxwDRBM3_l0A-cDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"KFC website don’t tell you a dam thing about a price why is that they scared to tell ppl the price or what","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Denise Konings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRDxMpqdhnlZ7uS_oSxsbGG5gDoaa0GmnoLL1JWmSnmlLQnTzE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow, unbelievably BAD.  Ordered 4 pc box all dark. Got only one piece of dark. All the chicken was way over battered and sooooo very very over cooked. I had a bite of a couple pieces and tossed it all in the garbage. No condiments, no napkins,  no utensils and no ice in the very warm pop. Coleslaw was good.
